2025-01.daily_overview: During the 2025 New Year's holiday, Yu Xiaowen slowed down her pace to conduct an annual review and planning, connected emotionally with her family, and prepared for the new year.

events.name: Waking up naturally and tidying up the apartment.
events.description: Woke up naturally at nine in the morning on New Year's Day, thoroughly organized the apartment, cleared out medical materials, and rearranged the desk to create an efficient environment for the new year.

events.name: Annual Review and Reflection
events.description: In the afternoon, while brewing tea, I reviewed my professional progress, reading plans, investments, and advancements in pottery for 2024, analyzing both achievements and shortcomings.

events.name: Develop the core objectives for 2025.
events.description: List the New Year's goals in detail, including cardiology studies, medical humanities reading, financial management courses, and pottery creation, and post them on the wall above the desk.

events.name: Video call with parents
events.description: In the evening, I had a video call with my parents in Luoyang to share my plans, receiving warmth and support from my family. My father suggested breaking down the goals into quarterly tasks.

events.name: Quiet Night and Preparation
events.description: Have stewed noodles for dinner, relax by listening to classical music, check the schedule, and prepare a white coat and stethoscope for the first workday.

events.name: Set up a new fitness tracker
events.description: Set up the fitness tracker before going to bed, planning to start using it for tracking exercise data from tomorrow morning's run.

2025-01.daily_overview: This was an ordinary workday for Yu Xiaowen during her rotation in the cardiology department. During the day, she focused on ward duties and departmental study sessions. After returning home in the evening, she organized what she had learned from the meetings into notes and engaged in deep reflection. Additionally, she used her spare time to sign up for a weekend music and cultural activity, demonstrating her efforts to balance work with personal interests.

events.name: Morning Ward Rounds and Case Discussions in Cardiology
events.description: In the morning, Yu Xiaowen followed her supervising teacher, Li Wei, on a routine ward round in the cardiology department. She was responsible for reporting the latest changes in the conditions of several patients under her care. Together with Teacher Li Wei and her colleague Liu Qiang, she engaged in a brief discussion about adjusting the treatment plan for a patient with coronary heart disease, learning how to personalize medication based on examination results.

events.name: Attend the departmental professional learning session
events.description: In the afternoon, the department organized a professional learning session on "Latest Advances in Drug Therapy for Heart Failure." Yu Xiaowen listened attentively to the sharing by the presenting doctor and took notes on the mechanisms of action, indications, and key points for clinical use of novel vasodilators and ARNI drugs. During the session, she raised a question regarding a case of dosage adjustment and received answers from her colleagues.

events.name: Organize study notes and reflections
events.description: After the study session, Yu Xiaowen returned to her home in the Jinshui District. She systematically organized the key points discussed during the meeting, the core viewpoints of the literature, and her colleagues' answers into electronic notes. Reflecting on the inspiration the study session provided for her clinical thinking, based on the cases she reviewed during her rounds earlier in the day, she planned to apply her knowledge of ARNI drugs to the subsequent management of a stable heart failure patient.

events.name: Sign up for the Classical Music Salon
events.description: While browsing public accounts before bed, Yu Xiaowen discovered that a community bookstore would host an offline salon titled "Appreciation of Beethoven's Piano Sonatas." After carefully reading the event details and confirming the time (Friday evening) and location (the community bookstore), she completed the online registration through the link provided by the public account. She received a confirmation notification of her successful registration and looked forward to the cultural activity over the weekend.

events.name: Video chatting with my brother.
events.description: In the evening, Yu Xiaowen had a brief video call with her brother Yu Xiaofeng in Shenzhen, sharing updates on her work and discussing the latest developments in health technology. Her brother encouraged her to maintain regular exercise to relieve stress.

起始状态.心情: Peaceful, ready to welcome a new day of work.

结束状态.所处地点: In the bedroom of the home at No. 89 Jingsan Road, Jinshui District, Zhengzhou City, Henan Province.
结束状态.心情: Fulfilling and slightly anticipatory, it not only absorbed professional knowledge but also planned for amateur cultural life.

2025-01.daily_overview: The workday on Friday passed smoothly, but an unexpected situation at night added some variation. Yu Xiaowen mainly handled routine matters in the ward and coordinated personal social and leisure plans. Due to an emergency case, she stayed up late briefly in the evening, reflecting the pressure of the job.

events.name: Handling routine paperwork in the ward.
events.description: In the morning, Yu Xiaowen concentrated on handling the medical records of the patients under her care, including progress notes and consultation request forms, in the doctor's office. She paid special attention to the standardization of medical orders, and the rigorous atmosphere of the cardiology department made her more meticulous than ever before.

events.name: Agreed to have a meal with my best friend Zhang Jing.
events.description: During the lunch break, Yu Xiaowen contacted her close friend Zhang Jing via WeChat to discuss this month's dinner arrangements. Considering that both of them were busy with work this week, they finally decided on tomorrow (Saturday) evening and chose "Yun Wei Chu," a Yunnan restaurant in Jinshui District that they both enjoy.

events.name: Book a Shooting Range Experience
events.description: After work, Yu Xiaowen, responding to a previous invitation from her colleague Wang Fang, contacted a well-reviewed and compliant shooting range in the suburbs of Zhengzhou through an online platform. She inquired in detail about the experience programs, pricing, safety guidelines, and whether it was necessary to book a coach. After confirming the relevant details, she and Wang Fang finalized their plans to go the next afternoon (on their day off) via WeChat and completed the online reservation and payment.

events.name: Consult a financial advisor
events.description: In the evening, Yu Xiaowen briefly communicated with financial advisor Wang Mingyuan via WeChat about her idea of adjusting the budget for this month's "Self-Improvement Fund." She sought Wang Mingyuan's advice on the allocation of these funds and the balance of long-term financial planning to enhance the rationality of the plan. Wang Mingyuan provided some preliminary thoughts and agreed to discuss the matter in detail next week.

events.name: Handling emergency cases at night
events.description: Before going to bed, Yu Xiaowen received a call from the department. A patient experienced fluctuations in blood pressure, so she remotely guided the on-duty nurse to adjust the medication and stayed up late reviewing relevant literature, resulting in a slight lack of sleep.

起始状态.心情: Calm, with a slight sense of relaxed anticipation for the upcoming weekend.

结束状态.心情: Slightly tired but with a sense of relief after plans were settled, the weekend arrangements made her feel that life was rich and colorful.

date_attribute.weather: Cloudy with a light breeze, suitable for outdoor activities.

2025-01.daily_overview: This was a day off filled with novelty and excitement. Temporarily stepping away from her role as a doctor, Yu Xiaowen, accompanied by her colleague Wang Fang, experienced the thrill of live ammunition shooting for the first time. The activity not only helped her effectively release work-related stress but also deepened her friendship with her colleague.

events.name: Morning Community Jog
events.description: In the morning, Yu Xiaowen went for a 20-minute jog in the community park, maintaining a heart rate of around 120 to start the day with gentle aerobic exercise.

events.name: Go to the shooting range.
events.description: In the afternoon, Yu Xiaowen and Wang Fang drove together to a shooting range in the suburbs of Zhengzhou. Along the way, they chatted about interesting work stories, creating a relaxed atmosphere. Upon arrival, they first completed the registration at the reception desk and stored their personal belongings.

events.name: Receive safety training
events.description: Subsequently, a professional coach assigned by the venue conducted rigorous safety rule training for them, covering topics such as the basic structure of firearms, safety zones, firearm handling and aiming, as well as procedures for loading and unloading. Yu Xiaowen listened attentively to ensure she understood each rule and, together with the other trainees, signed the safety agreement.

events.name: First Handgun Shooting Experience
events.description: Under the coach's one-on-one guidance, Yu Xiaowen chose a .22 caliber pistol with relatively low recoil for her first attempt. The coach provided detailed explanations on stance, grip technique, aiming skills, and breath control. Wearing protective goggles and noise-canceling earmuffs, Yu Xiaowen pulled the trigger for the first time with nervousness. The loud noise and recoil made her heart race, but after a few shots, she gradually began to adapt and attempted to aim at the target paper.

events.name: Try rifle shooting
events.description: After getting used to the pistol, following the coach's suggestion, Yu Xiaowen tried shooting with a small-caliber rifle. She learned the prone position for holding the rifle and experienced a more stable aiming system and a completely different shooting sensation. When she saw through the scope that the bullet successfully hit the bullseye area, the sense of accomplishment brought her an unprecedented feeling of release and excitement.

events.name: Communication Experience and Return Journey
events.description: After the shooting experience, Yu Xiaowen and Wang Fang retrieved their respective target papers to examine the bullet hole distribution, and the coach provided brief feedback. The two excitedly discussed their experience in the rest area, with Yu Xiaowen sharing her psychological shift from nervousness to enjoyment, while Wang Fang expressed delight at successfully "recommending" this new experience. Afterwards, they drove back to the city.

events.name: Savoring and Sharing
events.description: At home in the evening, Yu Xiaowen was still savoring the thrill of pulling the trigger and the sense of accomplishment from hitting the target. She felt that although this experience was completely outside her usual profile, it was indeed novel and exciting, serving as an effective way to release stress. She shared the photo of the target with her brother Yu Xiaofeng and a few curious friends, sparking lively discussions among them.

起始状态.所处地点: At home, No. 89 Jingsan Road, Jinshui District, Zhengzhou City, Henan Province
起始状态.心情: Relaxed and full of curiosity, with a slight nervousness about the upcoming new experiences.

结束状态.所处地点: At home, No. 89 Jingsan Road, Jinshui District, Zhengzhou City, Henan Province
结束状态.心情: Excited and satisfied, stress is released, and there is a more open attitude towards new things.

state.今日运动: 20 minutes of morning jogging is a low-intensity activity.

date_attribute.weather: Sunny with occasional clouds, comfortable temperature.

2025-01.daily_overview: After a tense shift in the cardiology department during the day, Yu Xiaowen switched gears in the evening and enjoyed a warm and pleasant dinner with her close friend Zhang Jing. Friendship serves as an important emotional support station for her.

events.name: Cardiology Daytime Duty
events.description: Yu Xiaowen was on daytime duty in the cardiology department, responsible for handling newly admitted patients and temporary situations in the ward. She independently attended to a patient admitted due to chest tightness, completed the initial consultation, physical examination, and electrocardiogram, and prescribed examination orders under the guidance of a senior physician.

events.name: Going on a date after work
events.description: After finishing her shift, Yu Xiaowen, feeling a bit tired but full of anticipation, took the subway to the Yunnan restaurant where she had arranged to meet Zhang Jing. Along the way, she listened to music, gradually shifting out of her work mindset.

events.name: Dining with my best friend Zhang Jing
events.description: Yu Xiaowen and Zhang Jing met up at the "Yun Wei Chu" restaurant, where they ordered several signature dishes such as steamed pot chicken and black three chop. During the meal, Yu Xiaowen shared the intensity of her rotation in the cardiology department, the novelty of experiencing shooting yesterday, and her plans to return to Luoyang for the Spring Festival. Zhang Jing, in turn, opened up about the ups and downs of teaching as a primary school homeroom teacher. The two listened to and encouraged each other, with Zhang Jing jokingly asking Yu Xiaowen to gift her a handmade pottery cup next time. The atmosphere was warm and pleasant.

events.name: After-dinner walk and farewell
events.description: After the meal, the two of them still felt like they hadn't had enough, so they took a stroll and chatted along the dimly lit streets near the restaurant, continuing to share details about their lives—from favorite books to recent movies and TV shows. Finally, they said goodbye at the entrance of the subway station, agreeing to meet again after the Spring Festival, and reminding each other to take care of their health and not overwork themselves.

events.name: Share happiness with distant friends.
events.description: After returning home, Yu Xiaowen was still in a good mood. She posted the food photos taken during the gathering in the "Childhood Friends Trio" WeChat group with Zhang Jing and Wang Lina, briefly describing the fun moments from the event. She shared this joy with Wang Lina, who was far away in Shenzhen, and the group chat quickly became lively.

起始状态.所处地点: Home at No. 89 Jingsan Road, Jinshui District, Zhengzhou City, Henan Province
起始状态.心情: Slightly tired, but looking forward to the evening gathering.

结束状态.所处地点: In the bedroom at home, No. 89 Jingsan Road, Jinshui District, Zhengzhou City, Henan Province.
结束状态.心情: Warm, joyful, and thoroughly healed by friendship.

date_attribute.weather: Cloudy with localized light rain, temperature dropping.

2025-01.daily_overview: A new week begins amidst a flurry of activities. Yu Xiaowen has taken on new critically ill patients in the cardiology department, elevating the challenges of her work. At the same time, she has enrolled in a financial management course and stays up late studying, showcasing her ability to multitask.

events.name: Management of Critically Ill Patients in Cardiology
events.description: Yu Xiaowen was rotating in the cardiology department, responsible for managing a group of patients, including a newly admitted elderly patient with acute heart failure. She spent the entire morning completing a detailed admission assessment and medical record documentation for the patient. She also discussed the initial treatment plan, primarily focused on diuresis and vasodilation, with her supervising physician, Li Wei. Through this experience, she felt the pressure and responsibility of treating critically ill patients.

events.name: Processing Medical Orders and Communication
events.description: In the afternoon, Yu Xiaowen prescribed detailed medical orders for the heart failure patient based on the treatment plan, including medication dosages, infusion rates, and monitoring frequency. She meticulously verified the specifications of each medication. Subsequently, she conducted a handover with Head Nurse Wu Min, clarifying the key points for nursing observation.

events.name: Enroll in the Financial Literacy Introductory Course
events.description: During a work break, Yu Xiaowen used a link sent by her financial advisor, Wang Mingyuan, to complete the online registration for the first phase of a six-month introductory financial planning series and paid the course fee. She carefully reviewed the course outline, confirming that the first phase focuses on basic concepts and principles of asset allocation, with the first lecture scheduled for this week.

events.name: Evening Reading and Lesson Preparation
events.description: In the evening, Yu Xiaowen reviewed the section on the management of acute pulmonary edema in the "Heart Failure Diagnosis and Treatment Guidelines" to prepare for possible work the next day. After that, she opened the book she was currently reading, "Being Mortal," and read a chapter on medical decision-making and patient autonomy, making brief notes along the way.

events.name: Stayed up late due to attending a financial management course.
events.description: Before going to bed, Yu Xiaowen previewed the first lecture of the financial management course and consulted relevant materials until quite late, which delayed her sleep time.

起始状态.所处地点: At home, No. 89 Jingsan Road, Jinshui District, Zhengzhou City, Henan Province
起始状态.心情: Focus, facing the challenges of the new week's work.

结束状态.所处地点: At home, No. 89 Jingsan Road, Jinshui District, Zhengzhou City, Henan Province
结束状态.心情: Feeling slightly pressured but maintaining a learning mindset, with dedication to both professional and personal growth.

date_attribute.weather: Light rain turning to overcast, the weather is cold and damp.

2025-01.daily_overview: This was a day of memorable setbacks and growth in Yu Xiaowen's career. She personally participated in a thrilling rescue, experienced a brief yet crucial moment of hesitation due to a gap in her knowledge, and after an exhausting night shift, it prompted a shift in her professional mindset.

events.name: Participate in the rescue of acute heart failure.
events.description: In the morning, the heart failure patient under Yu Xiaowen's care suddenly deteriorated, developing acute pulmonary edema with rapid breathing and a sharp drop in blood oxygen saturation. She immediately joined the rescue efforts. However, when preparing to administer a new type of vasodilator (recombinant human brain natriuretic peptide) as prescribed, she briefly hesitated and double-checked the procedure due to her lack of familiarity with the precise dosage conversion and fine adjustments to the infusion rate. With the team's collaborative efforts, the patient was eventually stabilized and transferred to the ICU for observation.

events.name: Accept guidance from the supervising teacher.
events.description: After the rescue operation ended, the supervising teacher, Li Wei, found Yu Xiaowen in the doctor's office. Instead of reprimanding her, he gently pointed out her lack of familiarity with the specific medication usage during the emergency. He explained in detail the pharmacological characteristics of the drug, its standard usage, principles for individualized adjustments, and techniques for quick calculations. He emphasized that in emergency situations, a solid and readily accessible knowledge base is the foundation for confidence and precision.

events.name: Night Shifts and High-Intensity Work
events.description: That day, Yu Xiaowen was on the night shift in the cardiology department. Throughout the night, she handled multiple emergency cases involving blood pressure fluctuations and palpitations caused by weather changes. Her nerves were on edge, and she felt both physically and mentally exhausted, clearly experiencing physical strain and difficulty in recovery.

events.name: Late Night Self-Review and Learning
events.description: During a brief rest in the early morning, Yu Xiaowen still felt self-blame and frustration over her hesitation during the day. She used her phone to look up the latest guidelines for the diagnosis and treatment of heart failure, relevant clinical trial literature on medications, and drug instructions. She compiled the key information, especially the dose calculation formulas and titration methods, into electronic notes, determined to fill this gap in her knowledge.

起始状态.所处地点: At home, No. 89 Jingsan Road, Jinshui District, Zhengzhou City, Henan Province
起始状态.心情: Calm, ready to embrace the daily routine.

结束状态.所处地点: Doctor's Duty Room, Department of Cardiology, Zhengzhou Central Hospital, Henan Province
结束状态.心情: Complex, mixed with exhaustion and self-blame, but even more so, a pressing desire to make up for shortcomings and delve deeper into learning.

2025-01.daily_overview: After enduring intense night shifts and setbacks, Yu Xiaowen finally had a day off. She chose to "listen to her body's signals," shifting from intense exercise to gentle restorative yoga. She also had a healing conversation with her close friend, learning to adapt flexibly.

events.name: Morning Fatigue and Reflection
events.description: After returning home from the hospital, Yu Xiaowen slept in until nearly noon but still felt exhausted. She realized that her original plans for a morning run or badminton would be difficult to carry out in her current physical condition. She began to reflect on how rigid exercise routines might impose additional strain on her body amid the high-intensity rotation schedule, recognizing the need for a more flexible and recovery-focused approach to physical activity.

events.name: Sharing lunchtime with my best friend Zhang Jing.
events.description: In the afternoon, Yu Xiaowen arranged to have lunch with her best friend, Zhang Jing. She recounted in detail the emergency rescue from the previous day, her own mistakes and sense of frustration, as well as the hardships of working the night shift. Zhang Jing listened patiently and offered comfort by sharing her own similar growing pains when she first became a homeroom teacher and felt overwhelmed. She helped Yu Xiaowen understand that setbacks are an inevitable part of professional growth, encouraged her to let go of her burdens, and affirmed that she was already doing a great job.

events.name: Adjust the exercise plan
events.description: After returning home, Yu Xiaowen decided to put the concept of "flexible adjustment" into practice. She canceled her evening badminton activity and used a mobile app to search for and select a 30-minute yoga session titled "Deep Relaxation and Soothing Stretches."

events.name: Home Relaxation Yoga Practice
events.description: In the evening, Yu Xiaowen followed a soothing stretching and meditation routine on her yoga mat at home, guided by a mobile app. The session focused on relaxing the tense muscles in her shoulders, neck, and back, which had become strained from prolonged standing and intense work. It also included guided meditation to help alleviate feelings of anxiety and self-blame.

events.name: Record the New Concept of Health Management
events.description: After the workout, Yu Xiaowen felt physically relaxed and much calmer in mood. She briefly recorded today's feelings and the adjusted exercise philosophy in her personal health journal, namely 'listen to the body's signals, adjust flexibly, and focus on recovery,' as a new reference for future health management.

events.name: Contact the supervising teacher to seek communication.
events.description: Before going to bed, after a day of relaxation and reflection, Yu Xiaowen decided to proactively seek more in-depth guidance. She contacted her mentor, Li Wei, via WeChat, briefly explaining her confusion following yesterday’s incident and requesting an opportunity for a discussion tomorrow. Li Wei replied promptly, agreeing to meet in the small conference room of the department after work the next day.

起始状态.所处地点: In the bedroom at home, No. 89 Jingsan Road, Jinshui District, Zhengzhou City, Henan Province.
起始状态.心情: Tired, slightly downcast, in need of physical and mental recovery.

结束状态.所处地点: Home bedroom at No. 89 Jingsan Road, Jinshui District, Zhengzhou City, Henan Province
结束状态.心情: Calm and relieved, I have gained emotional support from friends and look forward to tomorrow's conversation.

date_attribute.weather: Sunny, the weather has turned fine with bright sunshine.

2025-01.daily_overview: Today is a pivotal turning point. Yu Xiaowen proactively transformed the setbacks from the previous day into an opportunity for growth, engaging in a profound and insightful conversation with her mentor, Li Wei, that went beyond ordinary work guidance. This exchange deepened their teacher-student relationship.

events.name: Routine Ward Rounds and Case Management
events.description: During the day, Yu Xiaowen carried out her usual rounds in the cardiology department. She paid special attention to the latest data of the heart failure patient whose condition had stabilized after being transferred to the ICU, and once again reviewed the calculations for the medication dosage in her mind. Her work demeanor was more composed than the previous day.

events.name: Engage in in-depth communication with Teacher Li Wei.
events.description: After work, Yu Xiaowen met with Teacher Li Wei in the small conference room of the department as scheduled. She candidly described the process of the medication error and her psychological state at the time, expressing self-blame and raising her long-standing core confusion: how to maintain humanistic care for patients while pursuing technical precision and avoiding mistakes, and how to effectively integrate the two rather than treating them as opposing forces.

events.name: Obtain Mentor-Style Guidance
events.description: Teacher Li Wei listened patiently, sharing his own similar experiences of setbacks from his youth and affirming her reflective attitude. He offered specific advice for Yu Xiaowen's confusion: first, he suggested she integrate this reflection with her ongoing "Medical Humanities Reading," seeking wisdom on balancing technology and care from books like "Being Mortal"; second, in her daily work, he advised her to consciously ask "How are you feeling?" during ward rounds and spend an extra minute listening to patients' or their families' concerns. He encouraged Yu Xiaowen to transform setbacks into motivation for growth and expressed his trust in her future development.

events.name: Reflections and Records After Communication
events.description: After the conversation with Teacher Li Wei, Yu Xiaowen felt a sudden clarity, as if a new window had opened. She returned to her residence and meticulously recorded the key points of the discussion and her reflections in her diary, especially her thoughts on the idea that "composure stems from knowledge and experience, while care arises from inner awareness and respect." She felt that a deeper level of trust had been established between her and Teacher Li Wei.

events.name: Relaxing Evening Reading
events.description: That evening, she no longer forced herself to read professional books. Instead, she picked up Being Mortal and read the chapter on "Dependence and Independence." Combining it with the conversations from earlier in the day, she felt a deeper resonance.

events.name: Temporary Pottery Practice
events.description: Before going to bed, on a whim, she tried her hand at simple pottery sculpting at home to relax, but did not complete the piece.

起始状态.所处地点: At home, No. 89 Jingsan Road, Jinshui District, Zhengzhou City, Henan Province
起始状态.心情: Steady and composed, ready to face the new day with questions in mind.

结束状态.所处地点: At home, No. 89 Jingsan Road, Jinshui District, Zhengzhou City, Henan Province
结束状态.心情: Bright, confident, and grateful, with a clearer sense of career direction.

date_attribute.weather: Sunny, with lower temperatures at night.

2025-01.daily_overview: The workday is drawing to a close. During the day, Yu Xiaowen applied her reflections to practice, becoming more proactive and meticulous in her work. In the evening, she attended a classical music salon, immersing herself in the artistic atmosphere and experiencing pure joy and relaxation.

events.name: Actively Practice New Insights
events.description: During her daytime work, while making rounds, Yu Xiaowen not only focused on the patients' vital signs and data but also took a little extra time to talk with an elderly gentleman with coronary heart disease who was about to be discharged. She listened to his concerns about recovery after returning home and provided more detailed discharge instructions. She felt that this kind of communication brought greater peace of mind to both the doctor and the patient.

events.name: Please provide clinical details.
events.description: Regarding the previously unfamiliar new vasodilator, she proactively consulted Teacher Li Wei on two clinical details concerning dosage fine-tuning and application in patients with renal insufficiency, thereby putting her learning into practice.

events.name: Attend a music salon after work.
events.description: After work, Yu Xiaowen had a simple meal at the hospital cafeteria, then took the subway to the community bookstore. She arrived on time for the "Appreciation of Beethoven's Piano Sonatas" salon, signed in, and took her seat.

events.name: Immerse in Art Appreciation
events.description: During the nearly two-hour event, she listened attentively to the professional lecturer’s in-depth interpretation of the creative background, musical structure, and emotional expression of works such as "Pathétique" and "Moonlight," and enjoyed classic performance recordings together with more than twenty other music enthusiasts present, completely immersing herself in the atmosphere of music and knowledge.

events.name: Brief Communication and Return Trip
events.description: After the salon ended, Yu Xiaowen had a brief exchange with several other participants who were equally reluctant to leave. They shared their listening experiences and recommended other similar music event resources to each other. On her way home by subway, she put her headphones back on and listened to a few excerpts of Beethoven's sonatas that had been discussed that evening. Combining the lecturer's interpretations, she gained new insights.

起始状态.心情: Peaceful, looking forward to the evening cultural activities.

结束状态.所处地点: At home, No. 89 Jingsan Road, Jinshui District, Zhengzhou City, Henan Province
结束状态.心情: Fulfilling and joyful, it provided excellent nourishment and relaxation for the mind.

2025-01.daily_overview: A relaxing day off. Yu Xiaowen's main tasks were to unwind and prepare for the upcoming Spring Festival, including sharing cultural experiences, planning the journey home and gifts. Her focus in life began to shift towards the holiday and family.

events.name: Morning Community Jog
events.description: In the morning, Yu Xiaowen jogged for 25 minutes in the community park, maintaining a moderate heart rate to uphold her exercise routine.

events.name: Organizing and Reading
events.description: After getting up, Yu Xiaowen tidied up the room and continued reading Being Mortal. The content of the book constantly resonated with her recent thoughts.

events.name: Share the salon experience with friends
events.description: On WeChat, she shared her experiences and takeaways from attending a music salon the day before with her close friend Zhang Jing and college classmate Sun Yue. She recommended that they also pay attention to similar activities to enrich their leisure time. Sun Yue expressed great interest and invited her to go together next time.

events.name: Plan for the Spring Festival homecoming.
events.description: In the afternoon, Yu Xiaowen began to make specific plans for returning home for the Spring Festival. She used a mobile app to search for and book a high-speed train ticket from Zhengzhou East Station to Luoyang Longmen Station (on the afternoon of January 28). At the same time, she started thinking about what gifts to bring for her parents, initially deciding to buy a neck massager for her father (to alleviate occupational hazards from teaching) and a soft cashmere scarf for her mother.

events.name: View Financial Management Course Notification
events.description: She received a notification from the financial planning course platform that the first lecture will be held online next Monday evening. She added the meeting link to her calendar reminder.

events.name: Gentle Home Exercises
events.description: In the evening, following the principle of "flexible recovery," she did a 20-minute set of stretching and core exercises at home by following a video. The intensity was not high, mainly focusing on moving her body.

events.name: A last-minute decision to walk in the park was canceled due to rain.
events.description: The original plan was to go for a walk in the park, but it was canceled due to a sudden light rain, so I switched to relaxing at home by listening to classical music.

起始状态.心情: Leisurely, enjoy the slow pace of the weekend.

state.今日运动: Morning run for 25 minutes, followed by 20 minutes of home stretching.

date_attribute.weather: Sunny, with the warm winter sun.

2025-01.daily_overview: The continuation of the rest day, with the theme of deep reading and pre-holiday preparations. Yu Xiaowen completed an intensive reading of "Being Mortal" and wrote a profound reflective article based on clinical experiences. Additionally, she refined her Spring Festival arrangements, including purchasing gifts and planning holiday exercise routines.

events.name: Read "Being Mortal" carefully and complete a reflection.
events.description: In the morning, Yu Xiaowen focused intently on reading the final chapters of "Being Mortal." As she approached the end of her close reading, she recalled the elderly patient with heart failure she had cared for in the cardiology department and the patient’s anxious family members. Integrating the "interpretive" doctor-patient communication model from the book with her personal experiences, she composed a lengthy reflective essay in her note-taking app. In it, she explored practical issues such as "how to communicate prognosis with patients and their families" and "how to provide emotional support beyond technical treatment," completing a crucial step from reading to internalized reflection.

events.name: Recording Reflections on Medical Humanities
events.description: After closing the book, she opened her dedicated medical humanities reading notebook and recorded the entire reading experience. She wrote: While pursuing "technical precision," we should not let the fear of making mistakes squeeze out the space for "humanistic care" toward patients. True composure stems from solid knowledge and rich experience, while care arises from genuine empathy and respect. She noted her reflection: "Aware of shortcomings, we strive forward; gazing at distant mountains, we act with determination."

events.name: Selecting gifts for parents
events.description: In the afternoon, Yu Xiaowen went to a large shopping mall in the center of Zhengzhou. She carefully selected a neck massager for her father, which was easy to operate and had a good reputation. For her mother, she chose a beige cashmere scarf with an incredibly soft texture and asked the store staff to wrap it as an exquisite gift.

events.name: Planning Family Activities for the Holiday
events.description: Considering the Spring Festival holiday in Luoyang, Yu Xiaowen planned alternative exercise options for the holiday period in advance. She decided to replace her personal morning runs with outdoor family activities such as hiking or playing badminton. She also searched online for information about parks suitable for winter hiking around Luoyang, such as Zhou Mountain Forest Park, and prepared to suggest these ideas to her family.

events.name: Video chatting with high school classmates.
events.description: In the evening, Yu Xiaowen had a video call with her high school classmate Chen Siyu, who is in Luoyang. They shared updates on their lives and made plans to meet during the Spring Festival.

2025-01.daily_overview: The last working day before the Spring Festival. Yu Xiaowen’s pace at the hospital noticeably quickened, as she needed to complete the handover and wrap-up of various tasks before the holiday. After work, she attended the first lecture of a financial management course and began packing her luggage, making her daily rhythm quite tight.

events.name: Pre-holiday Work Wrap-up and Handover
events.description: Yu Xiaowen completed her last workday shift before the Spring Festival in the Cardiology Department of Zhengzhou Central Hospital. She carefully reviewed the medical records of the patients under her care, ensuring that all medical orders, examination forms, and shift handover records were clear and accurate. She conducted a detailed bedside handover with her colleague Wang Fang, who was taking over the shift, paying special attention to the precautions for several critically ill patients to ensure a smooth transition in the department's work.

events.name: Attend the first lecture of the online financial management course.
events.description: After returning home from work in the evening, Yu Xiaowen attended the first session of the financial literacy introductory course via an online meeting software. The topic of the session was "Basic Financial Concepts and Financial Health Diagnosis." The instructor systematically explained core concepts such as income, expenses, assets, liabilities, and net worth, as well as how to prepare a simple personal balance sheet. Yu Xiaowen took detailed notes while reflecting on her own situation and found that her financial structure was relatively simple and healthy.

events.name: Post-class exchange with financial advisors
events.description: After the course ended, she briefly discussed the course content with Wang Mingyuan via WeChat and raised the question of whether the "self-improvement fund" should be categorized as an asset or a consumption expense. Wang Mingyuan provided a professional explanation.

events.name: Start packing for the trip back home.
events.description: After the course ended, Yu Xiaowen began packing her luggage for the trip back to Luoyang. She carefully placed the gifts she had bought for her parents into the suitcase and packed a few warm clothes and daily necessities. Thinking about returning home the next day, she couldn't help but feel a sense of relief and joy.

events.name: Staying up late due to coursework.
events.description: Reviewed the financial management course content until late, resulting in a delayed bedtime.

起始状态.心情: Busy, focused on completing the final tasks before the holiday.

结束状态.所处地点: At home, No. 89 Jingsan Road, Jinshui District, Zhengzhou City, Henan Province
结束状态.心情: Slightly tired yet relaxed, work is temporarily over, and home is just around the corner.

date_attribute.weather: Clear sky, a rare warm sun in winter, with a strong festive atmosphere.

2025-01.daily_overview: On Chinese New Year's Eve, a day for family reunion, Yu Xiaowen took a high-speed train from Zhengzhou to her hometown Luoyang, officially kicking off the Spring Festival holiday. She cleaned the house, put up Spring Festival couplets and prepared the New Year's Eve dinner with her parents, relaxing herself in the warmth of family love and the festive atmosphere.

events.name: Departing for Home
events.description: In the morning, Yu Xiaowen made a final check of the water, electricity, doors, and windows. Carrying her luggage and gifts, she left her home in Jinshui District, took the subway to Zhengzhou East Railway Station, and boarded a pre-booked high-speed train back to Luoyang. The train carriage was filled with the cheerful laughter and chatter of passengers returning home.

events.name: Arriving in Luoyang to reunite with family.
events.description: Parents Yu Jianguo and Li Xiuying had been waiting at the exit of Luoyang Longmen Station early on. Upon seeing their daughter, the mother quickly stepped forward to take a small bag, while the father smiled and patted her shoulder. The family then drove back to their old house on Kaixuan Road in Xigong District.

events.name: Participate in the family year-end cleaning
events.description: After arriving home in the afternoon, Yu Xiaowen set down her luggage and immediately joined in the final stages of the family’s thorough cleaning. Together with her mother, Li Xiuying, she wiped down the furniture, washed the dishes, and then cooperated in putting up Spring Festival couplets and festive window decorations. Meanwhile, her father, Yu Jianguo, was busy adjusting the newly purchased floor lamp in the living room. The house was filled with a busy yet joyful New Year atmosphere.

events.name: Collaborate to prepare the New Year's Eve dinner.
events.description: In the evening, the whole family gathered in the kitchen to prepare the New Year's Eve dinner. Yu Xiaowen was in charge of rolling out the dumpling wrappers, while her mother, Li Xiuying, skillfully prepared the three-delicacy filling. Her father, Yu Jianguo, took on the task of boiling the dumplings and cooking hearty dishes like sweet and sour pork tenderloin and braised carp. As they worked, the three chatted away—Yu Xiaowen shared interesting stories from the hospital, while her parents recounted amusing anecdotes from their retired life. The kitchen was filled with laughter, cheerful conversations, and the enticing aroma of delicious food.

events.name: Enjoying the New Year's Eve dinner together while watching the Spring Festival Gala.
events.description: In the evening, the family gathered around the dining table to enjoy a sumptuous New Year's Eve dinner. Yu Xiaowen presented gifts to her parents, which brought them great joy. After the meal, everyone watched the Spring Festival Gala together, snacking on nuts and fruits, chatting while staying up late to welcome the New Year, and savoring the warmest reunion moment of the year.

起始状态.所处地点: At home, No. 89 Jingsan Road, Jinshui District, Zhengzhou City, Henan Province
起始状态.心情: Elated, my heart yearns for home.

结束状态.所处地点: In the bedroom of my parents' home on Kaixuan Road, Xigong District, Luoyang City, Henan Province.
结束状态.心情: Happiness, warmth, and complete relaxation, immersed in the rich affection of family and the festive atmosphere of the New Year.

date_attribute.weather: Sunny, with gentle sunshine, the first day of the Spring Festival.

2025-01.daily_overview: On the first day of the Lunar New Year, Yu Xiaowen was completely immersed in family time. During the day, she accompanied her parents, enjoying leisure and delicious food; in the evening, she engaged in deep emotional conversations with her mother. Family companionship and heartfelt dialogue were the themes of the day.

events.name: Praying for Blessings in the New Spring
events.description: In the early morning, Yu Xiaowen went with her parents to the Guanlin Temple near Luoyang to pray for blessings for the new year. In the solemn and tranquil atmosphere of the temple, she devoutly prayed for the safety and health of her family, and silently made wishes for her own smooth work and professional advancement in the coming year.

events.name: Home Leisure and Companionship
events.description: During the day, Yu Xiaowen enjoyed a rare moment of leisure. She accompanied her father, Yu Jianguo, on the balcony, basking in the sun and playing chess. Her father enthusiastically explained the intricacies of the game to her. She savored the various Luoyang-style pastries and nuts prepared by her mother, while the newly added floor lamp in the living room cast a warm glow.

events.name: Try cooking sweet and sour pork tenderloin.
events.description: Under the on-site guidance of her mother Li Xiuying, Yu Xiaowen tried to make her favorite sweet and sour pork in the kitchen. From cutting the meat, marinating, mixing the sauce to frying and stir-frying, her mother patiently taught her step by step. Although the finished product was a bit darker in color, its taste was praised by her parents, giving her a great sense of accomplishment.

events.name: Help mother prepare Spring Festival gifts
events.description: In the afternoon, Yu Xiaowen helped her mother package some homemade pastries as gifts to give to relatives, enhancing their mother-daughter collaboration.

events.name: A long, late-night conversation with my mother.
events.description: In the evening, with the background sound of the Spring Festival Gala replay, she and her mother sat side by side on the living room sofa, sharing the same blanket, and engaged in a deep, lengthy conversation. She talked about the work pressures, setbacks, and growth she experienced over the past year, as well as her future career plans and some uncertainties in her personal life. Her mother, Li Xiuying, listened quietly, offering understanding, comfort, and wise life advice.

events.name: Propose a family hiking plan
events.description: Before going to bed, she suggested in the family group chat that the whole family go hiking at Zhoushan Forest Park on the second day of the Lunar New Year, which would not only provide exercise but also allow them to enjoy quality outdoor family time. Both her father and mother happily agreed, and her brother Yu Xiaofeng also replied in the group chat to express his approval.

起始状态.所处地点: In the bedroom of my parents' home on Kaixuan Road, Xigong District, Luoyang City, Henan Province.
起始状态.心情: Peaceful, waking up with New Year's blessings.

结束状态.所处地点: In the bedroom of my parents' home on Kaixuan Road, Xigong District, Luoyang City, Henan Province.
结束状态.心情: Surrounded by love, the heart is full and peaceful, and the relationship with my mother has become even more intimate.

state.今日运动: Low intensity (walking to the temple to pray for blessings)

date_attribute.weather: Partly cloudy with a gentle breeze, suitable for outdoor activities.

2025-01.daily_overview: On the second day of the Lunar New Year, the activities were diverse. In the morning, Yu Xiaowen fulfilled her family's health hiking plan, enjoying the freshness of nature and the joy of family bonds. In the afternoon, she reunited with childhood friends and classmates who had returned to their hometown, reliving youthful friendships through reminiscing and heartfelt conversations.

events.name: Prepare for a family hike
events.description: In the morning, Yu Xiaowen and her family prepared drinking water, some snacks, tissues, and other items needed for the hike. She specifically reminded her parents to wear comfortable sports shoes and warm clothing.

events.name: Family Hiking at Zhoushan Forest Park
events.description: Since Xiaofeng was driving the family car, the family headed to the Zhoushan Forest Park on the outskirts of the city. They strolled along the park’s mountain trails, breathing in the crisp winter air and admiring the sparse yet expansive mountain forest scenery. Yu Xiaowen and her brother Yu Xiaofeng even had a brief racewalking competition, while their parents cheered and laughed on the sidelines. The entire outing lasted about two hours, making it a pleasant low-intensity aerobic exercise and a heartwarming family gathering.

events.name: Family Lunch
events.description: After the hike, the family chose to have lunch together at a farmhouse restaurant near the park, enjoying local Luoyang specialties such as "hutun" noodles and fried salted snacks. During the meal, they shared their hiking experiences and family anecdotes, creating a warm and joyful atmosphere.

events.name: Gathering with Childhood Friends
events.description: In the afternoon, Yu Xiaowen met up with several friends in Luoyang, including her childhood friend Zhang Jing and high school friend Chen Siyu, who were also back home for the Chinese New Year. They gathered at a quiet café, sharing stories from the past year—Zhang Jing’s amusing teaching anecdotes, Chen Siyu’s experiences as a teacher, and Yu Xiaowen’s insights as a doctor. They also talked about their plans and hopes for the new year, laughing and reminiscing as if they had returned to their school days.

events.name: Visiting Mother's Friend and Having a Big Family Dinner
events.description: In the evening, Yu Xiaowen went with her parents to visit Aunt Zhao Xiulan (a close friend of her mother's) who lived nearby, extending New Year's greetings. That night, she had a lively family dinner with her brother Yu Xiaofeng, who had returned from Shenzhen, and other relatives in Luoyang, fully immersed in the festive atmosphere of the New Year.

起始状态.所处地点: At my parents' home on Kaixuan Road, Xigong District, Luoyang City, Henan Province
起始状态.心情: Relaxed and happy, looking forward to outdoor activities with family.

结束状态.所处地点: At my parents' home on Kaixuan Road, Xigong District, Luoyang City, Henan Province
结束状态.心情: Happy and content, both body and mind have been fully relaxed and nourished.

state.今日运动: Moderate intensity (approximately 2 hours of family hiking)

date_attribute.weather: Clear, sunny weather, the last day of the holiday

2025-01.daily_overview: On the last day of the Spring Festival holiday, Yu Xiaowen engaged in a series of "mind-refocusing" and summarizing activities: she completed the final tasks of her monthly reading plan, implemented new financial strategies, organized holiday photos and memories, packed her belongings for the return journey, and looked forward to the new work cycle with warmth and reluctance.

events.name: Complete the monthly reading summary of "Being Mortal".
events.description: In the morning, Yu Xiaowen sat at her desk and finished reading the appendix and afterword of "Being Mortal." She reviewed her reading notes from the entire month of January and the lengthy reflective essay she had written. On her Douban reading list, she marked the book as "read" and added a brief comment: "It doesn’t provide answers but prompts deeper reflection. The balance between technology and care is a lifelong pursuit." She felt satisfied with her persistence and the insights she had gained.

events.name: Execute the first deposit of the "Self-Improvement Fund"
events.description: The phone received a bank text message, indicating that this month's salary had been deposited. Following the plan discussed with her financial advisor at the beginning of the month, Yu Xiaowen used her mobile banking app to transfer the first installment of her "self-improvement fund" (amounting to 5% of her monthly salary) from her current account to a previously established investment sub-account, completing the first savings action of the plan.

events.name: Packing for the return trip
events.description: Mother Li Xiuying prepared many Luoyang specialties and homemade snacks (such as peony cakes and homemade chili sauce) for her to take back to Zhengzhou. While chatting with her mother, Yu Xiaowen carefully packed her clothes and these "tastes of home" into her suitcase.

events.name: Share family photos
events.description: She sorted out the family photos and scenic shots taken during yesterday's hike, carefully selected a few, and posted them to the family WeChat group and her social media circle. The caption read, "New Year, new journey—cherished moments in nature with family." This captured the healthy and heartwarming Spring Festival activity.

events.name: Review and Planning
events.description: In the evening, Yu Xiaowen briefly reviewed the past month in her diary: the challenges and growth during her rotation in cardiology, the in-depth exchanges with Teacher Li Wei, the insights gained from reading medical humanities, the novel experience of shooting practice, and the fulfilling family life during the Spring Festival. Combining her New Year's Eve prayers and recent reflections, she silently reaffirmed her specific goals for the new year, ready to return to Zhengzhou in a better state of mind.

events.name: Chatting with family to say goodbye.
events.description: Before going to bed, have a warm farewell chat with parents, share the return journey plan, and engage in emotional communication until late.

起始状态.所处地点: At my parents' home on Kaixuan Road, Xigong District, Luoyang City, Henan Province.
起始状态.心情: Peaceful, with a slight reluctance as the holiday draws to a close.

结束状态.所处地点: In the bedroom of my parents' home on Kaixuan Road, Xigong District, Luoyang City, Henan Province.
结束状态.心情: Enriched, grateful, and mentally prepared to return to work.

date_attribute.weather: Cloudy, with a light breeze, low temperatures, and scattered light snow.

2025-02.daily_overview: The Spring Festival holiday officially ended. Yu Xiaowen bid farewell to her parents, drove from Luoyang back to Zhengzhou, and switched from the warm family reunion mode to an independent work and life state. The main activities of the day were settling in and organizing, making physical and mental preparations for the upcoming rotation in the cardiology department.

events.name: Driving back to Zhengzhou and settling in.
events.description: In the early morning, Yu Xiaowen had breakfast with her parents at their home in Luoyang before bidding them farewell and driving back alone to her apartment in the Jinshui District of Zhengzhou. Upon arrival, she carried the Luoyang specialties—such as peony cakes and silver-striped vegetables—and the medical journals her father had given her from the car into her home. She then began organizing them and opened the windows to let in fresh air.

events.name: Organizing the Heartfelt Sentiments of Hometown
events.description: Yu Xiaowen carefully organized the food prepared by her mother, Li Xiuying, placing perishable items in the refrigerator and storing dry goods in the kitchen cabinets. She set aside a stack of the latest medical journals given by her father, Yu Jianguo, in a corner of her desk, planning to use them as reference materials during her rotation.

events.name: Cleaning to restore order.
events.description: Due to being unoccupied for several days, a thin layer of dust had settled inside the house. Yu Xiaowen changed into her home clothes and spent about an hour thoroughly cleaning, including wiping down the furniture, sweeping, and mopping the floor, restoring the living environment to the tidy and orderly state she was accustomed to.

events.name: Reporting Safety and Confirming Work
events.description: After cleaning up, Yu Xiaowen video-called her parents in Luoyang via WeChat to let them know she was safe, showing them the tidied room and local specialties to reassure them. Then, she checked the hospital's OA system and messages in the department group, confirming the reporting time and location for her rotation in the cardiology department starting the next day (Sunday). She prepared her white coat, stethoscope, notebook, and other items, placing them by the door.

events.name: Plan to restart morning runs.
events.description: In the evening, Yu Xiaowen reflected on her goal of "developing a habit of exercising at least three times a week within two years" and decided to restart her morning runs, which had been interrupted by the Spring Festival, starting from the next day. She took out her running shoes and sportswear and set reminders for morning runs every Monday, Wednesday, and Friday on her fitness app.

events.name: Organize rotation learning materials
events.description: Before going to bed, Yu Xiaowen opened the textbook and notes on cardiovascular medicine at her desk, quickly reviewing the key points of diagnosis and treatment for core conditions such as heart failure, coronary heart disease, and hypertension. She was preparing herself with a warm-up of knowledge for tomorrow's rotation, feeling both nervous about the new challenges ahead and a hint of anticipation.

起始状态.所处地点: No. 42 Kaixuan Road, Xigong District, Luoyang City, Henan Province, at parents' home.
起始状态.心情: Warmth, reluctance, and a touch of parting sorrow.

结束状态.所处地点: Home at No. 89 Jingsan Road, Jinshui District, Zhengzhou City, Henan Province
结束状态.心情: Calm, orderly, and ready for work switching.

date_attribute.weather: Sunny turning to cloudy, with a slight rise in temperature.

2025-02.daily_overview: Yu Xiaowen officially began her rotation in the cardiovascular medicine department. On the first day, she focused primarily on familiarizing herself with the environment, procedures, and team. Her mentor, Li Wei, provided systematic introductory guidance. In the evening, she processed the experiences of the day by organizing her notes and contacting her family, while also committing to her morning jogging routine.

events.name: Restart Morning Running
events.description: At 6:40 a.m., the alarm clock rang. Although she felt a bit reluctant to get out of bed, Yu Xiaowen still struggled to rise, changed into her workout gear, and completed her first morning run after the Spring Festival in the neighborhood. Her pace was slower than usual, covering 3 kilometers, and she broke into a light sweat, feeling refreshed and invigorated. She recorded the data using an app.

events.name: Report for Rotation in Cardiology Department
events.description: At 8 a.m., Yu Xiaowen arrived punctually at the Cardiovascular Medicine Department's doctor's office. Her mentor, Dr. Li Wei, warmly welcomed her and guided her through the department's layout, including the distribution of wards, the nursing station, the emergency room, and the locations of commonly used equipment. He also provided a detailed introduction to the department's workflow, the electronic medical record system, commonly used medications, and the team members, including her colleague Wang Fang, whom she already knew.

events.name: Initial Integration and Observation
events.description: Teacher Li Wei clarified the learning objectives and key disease types (such as heart failure, myocardial infarction, hypertension, etc.) for this rotation to Yu Xiaowen. For the remainder of the morning, Yu Xiaowen accompanied Teacher Li on ward rounds, observing how he communicated with patients, adjusted medical orders, and assisted with some simple documentation tasks. She also had initial interactions with colleagues, including head nurse Wu Min.

events.name: Assign initial tasks
events.description: In the afternoon, Teacher Li Wei assigned Yu Xiaowen the task of managing two patient beds, primarily assisting senior doctors with daily medical orders and progress notes. Yu Xiaowen carefully reviewed the medical records of these two patients, taking her first step in her cardiology practice.

events.name: Evening tidying up and calling family.
events.description: After work, Yu Xiaowen organized today's observations and experiences into notes at home, focusing on documenting work processes and key points to note. She then had a brief phone call with her parents, sharing her feelings about the first day of rotation. Her mother reminded her to keep warm, while her father encouraged her to ask more questions and learn as much as possible.

events.name: Temporary Overtime Handling of Documents
events.description: In the evening, due to urgent documents that needed to be handled in the department, Yu Xiaowen worked overtime for an hour to complete some medical record supplements through the hospital system, which resulted in her staying up late.

起始状态.所处地点: At home, No. 89 Jingsan Road, Jinshui District, Zhengzhou City, Henan Province
起始状态.心情: Slightly drowsy but with a clear goal.

结束状态.所处地点: At home, No. 89 Jingsan Road, Jinshui District, Zhengzhou City, Henan Province
结束状态.心情: Fulfilling, with slight academic pressure but a clear direction, feeling somewhat fatigued due to overtime work.

2025-02.daily_overview: The rotation entered a substantive stage, and under the guidance of Teacher Li Wei, Yu Xiaowen independently took charge of a comprehensive pre-discharge assessment for a patient with heart failure for the first time. From reviewing medical records and conducting bedside examinations to drafting the discharge summary and completing patient education, she fully practiced the discharge process, gaining valuable first-hand independent operational experience and boosting her professional confidence.

events.name: Accepting the first independent task
events.description: After the morning handover, Teacher Li Wei called Yu Xiaowen to the office and formally assigned her the task of conducting a pre-discharge assessment for a stable chronic heart failure patient scheduled for discharge the next day. He emphasized the importance of completing it independently and assured her of his full support throughout the process.

events.name: Systematic Medical Record Review
events.description: Yu Xiaowen sat in front of the doctor's workstation, spending over an hour meticulously reviewing all the patient's progress notes, lab reports, imaging studies (such as echocardiograms), and daily vital sign records since admission. She pieced together the complete evolution of the patient's condition, from acute exacerbation to gradual stabilization after medication control.

events.name: Bedside Assessment and Communication
events.description: With the organized information in hand, Yu Xiaowen arrived at the ward. She conducted a detailed physical examination for the patient, focusing on assessing the jugular veins, lung rales, and lower limb edema, and confirmed that the cardiac function had improved. Subsequently, she patiently listened to the patient and their family's concerns about medication and daily life after discharge.

events.name: Write the discharge summary
events.description: Based on all the information, Yu Xiaowen independently drafted the discharge summary, which includes the admission details, course of treatment, discharge diagnosis, detailed discharge instructions (medications, dosages, follow-up appointments), and home care recommendations (salt restriction, daily weight monitoring, and recognizing signs of worsening heart failure).

events.name: Supervisor Review and Revision
events.description: Yu Xiaowen submitted the first draft to Teacher Li Wei for review. Teacher Li acknowledged her logical organization while pointing out that several details regarding medication and follow-up timing could be more personalized. Yu Xiaowen promptly revised and improved the draft based on the feedback.

events.name: Complete patient education
events.description: With the finalized discharge summary in hand, Yu Xiaowen returned to the bedside once again. She explained each point to the patient and their family in simple, easy-to-understand language and repeatedly emphasized the key details to ensure their comprehension. The patient’s family expressed their gratitude repeatedly, and Yu Xiaowen felt a strong sense of professional fulfillment.

events.name: Reflection Record After Work
events.description: After returning home, Yu Xiaowen meticulously documented the entire process and reflections of this independent evaluation in her rotation notebook. She analyzed the strengths (such as patient communication) and areas for improvement (such as insufficiently detailed explanations of certain drug side effects), and planned to apply this experience in the future.

events.name: Pay monthly rent
events.description: In the evening, Yu Xiaowen transferred the rent for February to her landlady, Aunt Song Yumei, via mobile banking, along with a message of greeting. Aunt Song promptly confirmed receipt and reminded her that the temperature in Zhengzhou had dropped recently, advising her to keep the windows closed to stay warm.

起始状态.所处地点: At home, No. 89 Jingsan Road, Jinshui District, Zhengzhou City, Henan Province
起始状态.心情: Focused, with a slight sense of tension.

结束状态.所处地点: At home, No. 89 Jingsan Road, Jinshui District, Zhengzhou City, Henan Province
结束状态.心情: A sense of achievement is significant, job satisfaction has improved, feeling slightly tired but content.

state.今日运动: None (intense mental labor throughout the day)

date_attribute.weather: Light rain turning to overcast, with a drop in temperature.

2025-02.daily_overview: After the intense independent tasks yesterday, Yu Xiaowen's work pace returned to normal today. She continued managing hospital beds and learning about common disease treatments under the guidance of her mentor. In the evening, she arranged some relaxing alone time for herself, immersing herself in classical music and reading to balance work-related stress. However, her weight slightly increased due to overeating.

events.name: Routine Ward Rounds and Progress Notes
events.description: Yu Xiaowen followed Dr. Li Wei on a routine ward round, gaining a deeper understanding of the patients under her care. She independently completed the daily progress notes for two patients and learned how to adjust long-term medical orders based on the feedback from the ward round.

events.name: Preliminary Interpretation of Electrocardiograms
events.description: In the afternoon, during a break from work, Teacher Li Wei took out several typical electrocardiograms (such as those showing myocardial ischemia and arrhythmia) and explained the basic interpretation points to Yu Xiaowen. Yu Xiaowen listened attentively while taking notes, feeling that she had gained a better understanding of the "language" of cardiology.

events.name: Handle outpatient follow-up appointments
events.description: Yu Xiaowen assisted the nurse station in coordinating outpatient follow-up appointments for several discharged patients, experiencing the continuity of medical services.

events.name: Failed attempt at trying a new recipe.
events.description: After work, Yu Xiaowen attempted to make sweet and sour pork tenderloin, but she struggled with controlling the heat, resulting in the dish being overcooked. She ended up having a simple fruit salad instead, feeling a bit disappointed.

events.name: Evening Music Reading Time
events.description: After the meal, she played Mozart's Serenade for Strings and began flipping through the chapter on the latest guidelines for heart failure in the medical journal she had brought from home. Immersed in the music, she focused on her reading, gradually relaxing both body and mind.

events.name: Brief chat with best friend Zhang Jing
events.description: Before going to bed, Yu Xiaowen exchanged a few words with her close friend Zhang Jing on WeChat, sharing the fun and stress of her rotation. Zhang Jing invited her to have a meal together over the weekend if she had time, and Yu Xiaowen happily agreed.

起始状态.所处地点: At home, No. 89 Jingsan Road, Jinshui District, Zhengzhou City, Henan Province, China.
起始状态.心情: Peaceful, ready to welcome a new day of work.

结束状态.所处地点: At home, No. 89 Jingsan Road, Jinshui District, Zhengzhou City, Henan Province
结束状态.心情: Relaxed and fulfilled, stress has been alleviated, but there is a slight annoyance due to a cooking failure.

2025-02.daily_overview: The work in the cardiology department is filled with challenges and a sense of urgency. Today, the department admitted a patient with acute myocardial infarction. Yu Xiaowen was fully involved in the intense emergency rescue process and later listened to the analysis of senior experts during the case discussion. She deeply understood the meaning of "time is muscle" and felt immense work pressure, which led to a slight weight loss.

events.name: Participate in the rescue of acute myocardial infarction.
events.description: In the morning, an elderly patient with sudden severe chest pain was brought to the emergency department. The electrocardiogram indicated an acute anterior wall myocardial infarction. The department immediately activated the green channel. Under the guidance of Teacher Li Wei, Yu Xiaowen assisted with electrocardiogram monitoring, established intravenous access, drew blood for myocardial enzyme tests, and accompanied the patient to the interventional catheterization laboratory. The entire process was tense yet orderly.

events.name: Independently admit and treat newly admitted patients.
events.description: During a break in the emergency care, Yu Xiaowen independently attended to a newly admitted patient with hypertension. She completed a detailed history collection and physical examination, and under the on-site guidance of Teacher Li Wei, formulated an initial treatment plan that included medication adjustments, lifestyle interventions, and examination arrangements. She also documented the admission medical record.

events.name: Postoperative Case Discussion Meeting
events.description: In the afternoon, a postoperative case discussion was held for the morning's myocardial infarction patient, chaired by department director Zhang Lei. Director Zhang analyzed the key decision points during the diagnosis and treatment process, the challenges encountered during the surgery, and the focus of subsequent treatment. Yu Xiaowen took careful notes and gained a more comprehensive understanding of the management of acute coronary syndrome.

events.name: Fatigue and Reflection After Work
events.description: After an intense day, Yu Xiaowen felt a noticeable mental drain and physical exhaustion. On her way home, she reflected on the rescue scenes from the day, feeling both inspired by the miracles medicine can create and a touch of heaviness over the fragility of life and the intensity of the work.

events.name: Video chat with high school classmate Chen Siyu.
events.description: In the evening, Yu Xiaowen took the initiative to contact her high school classmate Chen Siyu. Through a video chat, she poured out her work-related stress, and Chen Siyu offered comfort and shared amusing anecdotes from her teaching experiences, which helped to slightly ease Yu Xiaowen's mood.

起始状态.所处地点: Home at No. 89 Jingsan Road, Jinshui District, Zhengzhou City, Henan Province
起始状态.心情: Clear-headed, ready to tackle unknown challenges.

结束状态.所处地点: At home, No. 89 Jingsan Road, Jinshui District, Zhengzhou City, Henan Province
结束状态.心情: Fatigue and deep contemplation after intense stress, a coexistence of a sense of achievement and pressure, slightly eased by social interactions.

state.今日运动: None (High work intensity has replaced physical exercise consumption)

2025-02.daily_overview: Yu Xiaowen continued her rotation in the cardiology department, where she managed several patients with stable coronary heart disease, reinforcing her knowledge of chronic disease management. In her spare time, she began to feel the fatigue accumulated from continuous work. To regain her energy, she opted for simple household chores and an early bedtime in the evenings, while her weight slightly decreased due to stress.

events.name: Strengthen the Management of Patients with Coronary Heart Disease
events.description: Yu Xiaowen conducted thorough rounds for several coronary heart disease patients under her care, assessing the effectiveness and side effects of their medication, addressing patients' questions about post-stent rehabilitation, and improving the relevant medical records.

events.name: Learning to Interpret Cardiac Ultrasound Reports
events.description: Teacher Li Wei, using a patient's ultrasound report, explained to Yu Xiaowen how to assess cardiac structure, ventricular wall motion, and cardiac function (ejection fraction), helping her better connect imaging findings with clinical manifestations.

events.name: Casual Lunchtime Conversations Among Colleagues
events.description: During the lunch break, Yu Xiaowen and her colleague Wang Fang had a simple meal together in the hospital cafeteria. Wang Fang shared some interesting stories from her rotations in other departments, and the two of them vented a bit about the pressure of writing medical records. The brief social interaction left Yu Xiaowen feeling much more relaxed.

events.name: Handling personal backlog matters
events.description: After work, Yu Xiaowen felt a bit tired and didn't plan any outings. She washed the accumulated laundry at home, tidied up the scattered books and magazines on the coffee table, and restored the living space to a clean and organized state. This process itself also brought a sense of relaxation.

events.name: Going to bed early replenishes energy.
events.description: Considering she had work the next day and felt her body needed to recover, Yu Xiaowen went to bed half an hour earlier than usual after washing up. Listening to soothing piano music, she quickly fell asleep.

起始状态.所处地点: At home, No. 89 Jingsan Road, Jinshui District, Zhengzhou City, Henan Province
起始状态.心情: Calm but slightly weary

结束状态.所处地点: At home, No. 89 Jingsan Road, Jinshui District, Zhengzhou City, Henan Province
结束状态.心情: Relax, gain a sense of inner order through organizing, and alleviate fatigue.

state.今日运动: None (Strong wind weather, morning run cancelled)

date_attribute.weather: Cloudy day, air quality is average.

2025-02.daily_overview: This is the last day of the first week of rotation in the cardiology department. Under the supervision of Teacher Li Wei, Yu Xiaowen attempted a more independent patient consultation process, applying theoretical knowledge to practice and receiving immediate feedback from her teacher. She began planning for the weekend, but her body was already signaling the need for rest, as her weight continued to decline.

events.name: Attempt to independently receive new patients
events.description: In the morning, a young patient with newly diagnosed hypertension was admitted to the hospital. At Yu Xiaowen's request, Teacher Li Wei allowed her to independently conduct the medical history collection and preliminary physical examination under his supervision. Yu Xiaowen was somewhat nervous but tried to remain calm, systematically asking questions and completing the examination.

events.name: Develop Preliminary Plan and Obtain Feedback
events.description: After the consultation, Yu Xiaowen reported her findings and preliminary assessment to Teacher Li Wei, and proposed a diagnostic and treatment plan. Teacher Li acknowledged her progress in communication and physical examination, while also pointing out areas that needed more comprehensive consideration in differential diagnosis and ordering tests, providing specific guidance.

events.name: Complete this week's rotation summary
events.description: During a break in the afternoon, Yu Xiaowen briefly summarized her gains from the first week of rotation in her notebook: she had become familiar with the environment and workflow, completed her first independent discharge assessment, participated in emergency rescue efforts, and attempted independent patient consultations. She also listed the key areas she wanted to focus on learning next week, such as the pharmacological treatment of arrhythmias.

events.name: Early signs of feeling unwell
events.description: As the workday neared its end, Yu Xiaowen felt a dry, itchy sensation in her throat and a faint headache. She realized it might be a sign of her body's weakened resistance, caused by continuous work, stress, and frequent contact with patients during the recent peak flu season. She decided she would take a good rest over the weekend.

events.name: Reserve a weekend pottery activity
events.description: Despite feeling unwell, she thought of her pottery goals and reached out to her pottery classmate Su Ya and teacher Zheng Guodong via WeChat, confirming that she could go to the studio on Saturday afternoon to trim the teacup.

起始状态.所处地点: At home, No. 89 Jingsan Road, Jinshui District, Zhengzhou City, Henan Province
起始状态.心情: Looking forward to the weekend, yet need to persevere through the final day of work.

结束状态.所处地点: At home, No. 89 Jingsan Road, Jinshui District, Zhengzhou City, Henan Province
结束状态.心情: There is progress in learning but physical fatigue, beware of the yellow light of health.

date_attribute.weather: Cloudy turning to clear, with a slight rise in temperature over the weekend.

2025-02.daily_overview: It was supposed to be a day off, but Yu Xiaowen faced an exceptionally busy 36-hour shift. From routine ward rounds and admitting a large number of influenza patients during the day, to supporting the emergency department at noon, and handling critical cases at night, she pushed her physical and mental limits to the brink. This grueling schedule laid the groundwork for her subsequent illness and led to a significant weight loss.

events.name: Morning Handover and Busy Ward Rounds
events.description: At 8 a.m., Yu Xiaowen completed the handover with the night shift doctor. She then began her rounds, and the patients under her care had remained stable overnight. However, due to the high incidence of influenza during winter, the department had admitted several elderly and pediatric patients with obvious symptoms of high fever and cough. She needed to quickly complete preliminary diagnoses for these new patients, issue examination orders, and write admission records, which suddenly accelerated the pace of her work.

events.name: Supporting the Emergency Department at Noon
events.description: At noon, due to a surge in patients in the emergency department and a shortage of staff, Yu Xiaowen was temporarily assigned to provide support. She handled several patients in the emergency room who were experiencing high fever convulsions and severe respiratory distress due to the flu. She performed emergency treatments and coordinated their admission to the hospital, remaining highly focused and stressed throughout, without even having time for lunch.

events.name: Race against time to write medical records.
events.description: After returning to the department during a break, Yu Xiaowen hurried to write the medical records for the patients admitted that morning. Staring at the computer screen for extended periods left her eyes dry and her headache worsening, but she knew the records had to be completed promptly.

events.name: Night Duty and Emergency Rescue
events.description: Entering night shift mode, she conducted regular rounds of the wards, addressing patients' sudden fevers and pain. In the early hours of the morning, an elderly patient with underlying health conditions suddenly experienced an emergency situation: rapid breathing and a sharp drop in blood oxygen saturation. Yu Xiaowen's heart tightened. She immediately organized bedside rescue efforts, contacted her senior doctor, Li Wei, for guidance over the phone, and directed the nurses to administer oxygen and medication. After nearly an hour of intense efforts, the patient's condition finally stabilized. Throughout this period, she managed to rest for less than an hour in the on-call room, still in her uniform.

起始状态.所处地点: At home, No. 89 Jingsan Road, Jinshui District, Zhengzhou City, Henan Province
起始状态.心情: Knowing it's the start of a long day on duty, I brace myself mentally.

结束状态.所处地点: On-Duty Room for Cardiovascular Department Doctors, Zhengzhou Central Hospital
结束状态.心情: Extreme exhaustion and the feeling of collapse after intense nervous tension, accompanied by a slight sense of relief from fulfilling one's duties.

date_attribute.weather: Sunny, with sunshine but strong winds.

2025-02.daily_overview: After 36 hours of intense, continuous work, Yu Xiaowen's body finally succumbed to the strain.
