After handing over her shift, she struggled to make it home, only to develop a high fever, forcing her to take sick leave for the first time. The onset of illness made her feel particularly vulnerable and gave her a firsthand understanding of the saying "physician, heal thyself," while her weight continued to drop.

events.name: Complete morning handover and ward rounds.
events.description: At 8 a.m., Yu Xiaowen, looking weary, conducted a detailed handover with her colleague taking over the shift. She specifically explained the follow-up precautions for the elderly patient who had undergone emergency treatment during the night. She insisted on completing the morning rounds for the patients under her care, updated the medical orders, and organized and filed all the medical records written during her shift.

events.name: Struggling to make it home and then collapsing from illness.
events.description: After working continuously for over 36 hours, Yu Xiaowen felt a splitting headache and chills all over her body. Summoning her last ounce of energy, she drove back to her apartment in the Jinshui District and nearly collapsed as soon as she entered the door. Upon taking her temperature, she found it had soared to 38.5°C. She realized she had likely been infected during the peak flu season.

events.name: First Sick Leave in Career
events.description: Filled with guilt towards colleagues and patients, but physically unable to continue, Yu Xiaowen contacted Zhang Lei, the head of the department, and her mentor Li Wei via phone and WeChat to explain her high fever and request sick leave. Teacher Li Wei advised her to rest well and not worry about work.

events.name: Begin self-isolation and recuperation.
events.description: She changed into her loungewear, took some fever-reducing medicine, drank a large glass of warm water, and then curled up in bed. She ordered light white porridge and fruit for dinner through a food delivery app on her phone. The entire afternoon passed in a cycle of drowsy sleep, sweating, drinking water, and checking her temperature.

events.name: Notification of salary deposit received.
events.description: In the evening, as dusk settled, her phone vibrated drowsily. It was a text message from the bank, notifying her that her February salary and the previous quarter's performance bonus had been deposited. Yu Xiaowen glanced at it wearily—the total amount seemed slightly higher than expected, but at that moment, she had no energy to scrutinize it or make any plans.

state.起床时间: I hardly slept at all the night before the shift change.

起始状态.所处地点: Cardiovascular Medicine Ward, Zhengzhou Central Hospital
起始状态.心情: Exhausted to the extreme, I can only hope to hand over my shift and go home.

结束状态.所处地点: At home, No. 89 Jingsan Road, Jinshui District, Zhengzhou City, Henan Province
结束状态.心情: Weakness, discomfort, loneliness, mixed with the guilt of being unable to work due to illness.

date_attribute.weather: On a cloudy day, the temperature difference between indoors and outdoors is significant.

2025-02.daily_overview: Yu Xiaowen was suffering from illness. She experienced recurring high fevers, along with body aches and weakness. In her vulnerable moments, she received emotional support from her close friend and a business contact from her financial advisor. Despite her condition, she mustered the strength to handle the initial financial arrangements after her bonus was credited. The illness prompted her to reflect deeply on the relationship between health and work, while her weight continued to decline.

events.name: Suffering in Illness and Confiding in a Close Friend
events.description: During the day, her body temperature remained above 38°C, accompanied by body aches, weakness, and a lack of appetite. At night, feelings of loneliness and discomfort peaked, prompting her to proactively make a video call to her close friend Zhang Jing. Seeing her friend’s concerned face on the screen, Yu Xiaowen’s grievances surged, and she poured out her physical pain and the sense of collapse after intense work. Zhang Jing patiently comforted her, sharing many home remedies to alleviate cold symptoms and reminding her to get plenty of rest.

events.name: View salary and bonus details
events.description: During a moment when she felt slightly better, Yu Xiaowen opened her mobile banking app and carefully reviewed the transaction details. Her basic salary, position allowance, night shift subsidy, and a substantial quarterly performance bonus were clearly listed. The performance bonus exceeded her expectations, perhaps as recognition for her recent work, which brought her a small comfort during her illness.

events.name: Contact a Financial Advisor
events.description: Considering the additional income, Yu Xiaowen briefly explained to financial advisor Wang Mingyuan via WeChat about the bonus being credited to her account and expressed her desire to allocate these funds conservatively. Wang Mingyuan replied that he would prepare several options for her to discuss in detail after she recovers.

events.name: Plan for Contingency Funds
events.description: Based on Wang Mingyuan's past advice and her own financial planning, Yu Xiaowen operated through her mobile banking app to transfer 10,000 yuan from her bonus into a highly liquid money market fund account, establishing it as an emergency reserve fund and thereby strengthening her personal financial safety net.

events.name: Update personal ledger
events.description: She updated her income for the month on the electronic bookkeeping app, detailing the composition of her salary and bonuses, and noted the allocation to the emergency fund. Even while ill, her rational, planned habits of spending and saving remained in effect.

events.name: Video call with parents to report being safe (did not mention being sick)
events.description: When she felt a bit better in the evening, she took the initiative to video call her parents in Luoyang. To avoid worrying them, she forced herself to appear energetic, sharing only the good news of receiving her performance bonus, asking about her parents’ recent situation, and assuring them that everything was going well at work. After hanging up, she felt a tinge of bitterness from withholding the truth, but she was also relieved that she hadn’t caused her parents any distress.

起始状态.所处地点: Home at No. 89 Jingsan Road, Jinshui District, Zhengzhou City, Henan Province
起始状态.心情: Persistent weakness, loneliness, discomfort

结束状态.所处地点: At home, No. 89 Jingsan Road, Jinshui District, Zhengzhou City, Henan Province
结束状态.心情: I felt slightly better after receiving comfort from friends, but my body was still in pain, and I began to reflect on the relationship between work and health.

date_attribute.weather: Light rain, the weather is overcast, cold, and damp.

2025-02.daily_overview: On the third day of being ill, her body remained weak. At the moment when she needed care the most, her mother guided her remotely via video to prepare a simple bowl of convalescent noodles. This bowl of noodles, filled with maternal love and the taste of home, not only warmed her stomach but also greatly comforted her lonely heart. It made her deeply realize the supportive power of family affection, even as her weight dropped to its lowest point.

events.name: Continuous Sick Leave and Colleague Care
events.description: In the early morning, her body temperature dropped to 37.8°C, but her sore throat and fatigue were still noticeable. She continued to stay at home in isolation and take her medication. Her colleague Wang Fang sent a WeChat message to inquire about her condition, and the two briefly discussed the situation in their department. Wang Fang reassured her to focus entirely on recovering, as everyone in the department would cover for each other.

events.name: Loneliness in Illness and Seeking Help from Mother
events.description: In the afternoon, Yu Xiaowen felt particularly lonely and miserable. With limited ingredients in the fridge and no energy to prepare a complicated meal, she took the initiative to make a video call to her mother, Li Xiuying. Seeing her daughter's haggard appearance, her mother's heart ached with concern.

events.name: Mother's Remote Cooking Guidance
events.description: After inquiring in detail about her symptoms, the mother guided her step by step through a video call on how to make a light, nutritious, and easily digestible bowl of tomato and egg noodles using only the tomatoes, eggs, and dried noodles available in the refrigerator. From the details of washing and cutting the tomatoes to beating the eggs, and from the heat for cooking the noodles to the seasoning, the mother patiently gave her instructions.

events.name: Complete the patient's meal and feel the warmth.
events.description: Yu Xiaowen struggled to support her body and, following her mother's instructions, finished making the bowl of noodles. As she took a bite of the steaming noodles, which carried a simple yet comforting aroma, it felt as though she had tasted the flavor of home. Although her physical discomfort persisted, the warmth brought by this bowl of noodles dispelled much of the loneliness and helplessness in her heart.

events.name: Thanks to Mother and Commitment to Recovery
events.description: After finishing the noodles, she once again described the taste of the noodles to her mother via WeChat, thanking her for the remote "rescue." Her mother repeatedly reminded her to take her medicine on time, drink plenty of water, and get enough sleep. Yu Xiaowen assured her mother that she would rest well and recover as soon as possible.

events.name: Online Medical Consultation
events.description: Feeling that her coughing symptoms had somewhat relapsed, she used the hospital's online consultation platform to describe her symptoms to a familiar dental colleague, Dr. Chen Mingyuan (though not a respiratory specialist, he could provide preliminary advice), and obtained further suggestions on relieving cough, reducing phlegm, and medication.

起始状态.所处地点: At home, No. 89 Jingsan Road, Jinshui District, Zhengzhou City, Henan Province
起始状态.心情: Weak, lonely, longing for care.

结束状态.所处地点: At home, No. 89 Jingsan Road, Jinshui District, Zhengzhou City, Henan Province
结束状态.心情: Deeply warmed by maternal love, the sense of loneliness has significantly diminished, bringing more confidence and motivation for recovery.

date_attribute.weather: Cloudy turning to clear, with sunshine bringing warmth.

2025-02.daily_overview: The body begins its journey towards recovery, with body temperature returning to normal and energy slowly replenishing. During her illness, Yu Xiaowen found more time for deep reflection. She pondered the issue of health depletion in the medical profession and took action, systematically collecting and organizing her health data. This marked the first step in establishing a personal digital health record, and her weight began to increase.

events.name: The body is gradually improving.
events.description: The body temperature has basically returned to normal, and although the body still feels tired, it is no longer a major concern. Yu Xiaowen got up, performed a simple wash-up, cooked millet porridge and eggs for herself, and her appetite has also recovered.

events.name: Reflecting on the Balance Between Work and Health
events.description: During the break, the experience of falling ill replayed repeatedly in Yu Xiaowen's mind. She deeply reflected on the paradox and helplessness of doctors often "overdrawing their own health to save others." She began to seriously consider how to better balance the demands of high-intensity work with proactive personal health maintenance in the future.

events.name: The idea of establishing a health record came to mind.
events.description: During her reflection, she connected this to her emphasis on data (such as exercise logs and financial records), giving rise to a clear idea: to manage health as meticulously as finances. She decided to establish a personal digital health profile, systematically tracking her medical examination data, symptom records, and more, to engage in proactive health management.

events.name: Start collecting health data from previous years.
events.description: Said and done. That afternoon, she began searching in the study, retrieving the paper-based physical examination reports and outpatient medical records from the past three years. At the same time, she downloaded the electronic physical examination reports and electronic medical records from the hospital app on her computer and phone, saving them all in a newly created folder titled "Personal Health Archive."

events.name: Follow the progress of pottery firing.
events.description: In the evening, she saw a notification from pottery teacher Zheng Guodong in the studio's WeChat group, announcing that the bisque kiln had officially been lit and was heating up. She followed the kiln temperature curve posted by Teacher Zheng in the group, exchanged ideas with other students, and gained a more intuitive understanding of the ceramic firing process. This also filled her with a renewed sense of anticipation for life after recovering from her illness.

events.name: Plan for Returning to Work and Reporting
events.description: In the evening, she felt much more energetic. After checking the department's work schedule, she sent a brief update via WeChat to her mentor, Li Wei, informing him that she had mostly recovered and planned to return to work the next day. Teacher Li replied, advising her to rest for another day to fully recover and not to rush back.

起始状态.所处地点: At home, No. 89 Jingsan Road, Jinshui District, Zhengzhou City, Henan Province
起始状态.心情: Tired but awake, beginning to regain vitality.

结束状态.所处地点: No. 89 Jingsan Road, Jinshui District, Zhengzhou City, Henan Province, China
结束状态.心情: Calm and purposeful (establishing a health record), with new plans for recovery and future work.

date_attribute.weather: Sunny, fresh air, suitable for outdoor activities

2025-02.daily_overview: Yu Xiaowen has entered the recovery consolidation phase. She engages in light activities and has had candid conversations with her parents about her illness, feeling a strong sense of family connection. At the same time, she proactively reached out to her close friend and scheduled a deep conversation over the weekend, beginning to rebuild the social connections that had temporarily drifted apart during her illness. Her life rhythm is gradually returning to normal, and her weight continues to recover.

events.name: Light Activity and Rest
events.description: Yu Xiaowen felt a noticeable improvement in her physical condition, with more energy restored. She engaged in some slow walking and simple stretching exercises at home, gradually activating her body after lying in bed for several days. In the afternoon, she tried her hand at molding clay for a while, engaging in a relaxing creative activity. Although her skills felt a bit rusty, the process was very therapeutic.

events.name: Have an honest conversation with your parents.
events.description: In the evening, she had another video call with her parents. This time, she honestly told them about her illness a few days earlier, shared the heartwarming details of her mother guiding her remotely to make noodles, and also opened up about her reflections on the intensity of her work. Upon hearing this, her parents felt both concerned and relieved. Her father shared his experience of balancing work and rest from his time as a teacher, while her mother reminded her to always prioritize her health no matter what. This conversation made her feel closer to her family than ever before.

events.name: Contact your best friend to plan a weekend gathering.
events.description: Having largely recovered, Yu Xiaowen was eager to reconnect with her friends. She took the initiative to contact her close friend Zhang Jing, suggesting they meet over the weekend to catch up on each other’s lives. After discussing on WeChat, they settled on meeting on Saturday afternoon at a quiet café, where they could have a meaningful conversation.

events.name: Making final preparations for returning to work.
events.description: She confirmed her official return to work the next day, sorted out some personal matters during her sick leave, and prepared the items she needed to bring back to the hospital. She went to bed a little earlier than usual in the evening to ensure she returned to work with full energy and a positive mindset.

起始状态.所处地点: At home, No. 89 Jingsan Road, Jinshui District, Zhengzhou City, Henan Province
起始状态.心情: Relaxation, the body's recovery brings a sense of pleasure.

结束状态.所处地点: At home, No. 89 Jingsan Road, Jinshui District, Zhengzhou City, Henan Province
结束状态.心情: Warmth (after deep communication with family), Anticipation (gathering with close friends), Preparing for returning to work

state.今日运动: Light indoor stretching activity for about 20 minutes.

date_attribute.weather: Sunny, with a gentle breeze in the evening.

2025-02.daily_overview: On Valentine's Day, Yu Xiaowen chose a quiet yet fulfilling way to spend the evening. After work, she carefully crafted a solitary night filled with ritualistic touches: fresh flowers, hot tea, and classical music. This "feast" of self-care effectively soothed the fatigue of returning to work after recovering from illness, while also showcasing her independent and fulfilling inner world. Her weight further recovered due to a normal diet.

events.name: Returning to work on the first day after recovery
events.description: Yu Xiaowen returned to the Cardiology Department in high spirits. Her colleagues greeted her with concern. She quickly immersed herself in work, handling the backlog of paperwork accumulated during her sick leave and following up on the patients under her care. When Teacher Li Wei saw her, he also made a point of inquiring about her recovery and reminded her to balance work with rest.

events.name: Preparing for a Cozy Night Alone
events.description: On her way home from work, Yu Xiaowen made a special trip to a flower shop to buy a small bouquet of elegant champagne roses. She also stopped by a convenience store to pick up her favorite peach oolong tea and a delicate matcha cake. She wanted to treat and care for herself on this Valentine's Day.

events.name: Creating Atmosphere and Listening to Music
events.description: Upon returning home, she changed into comfortable loungewear, arranged the fresh flowers in a vase on the coffee table, carefully brewed a pot of tea, lit a lavender-scented candle, and dimmed the lights in the living room. She then connected the speakers and selected Bach's "Goldberg Variations" in its piano version. Curling up on the sofa, she closed her eyes and let the melodious and profound piano notes flow gently, washing away the fatigue from work and soothing the sensitive nerves that were still recovering from illness.

events.name: Record feelings and calm the mind
events.description: After the music ended, a sense of peace settled within. She wrote briefly in her diary, "Having recovered from illness, I now cherish health and inner tranquility even more. Bach's music is like a meticulously structured building, offering a feeling of stability and order. Celebrating the holiday alone can also be fulfilling." She then went through her bedtime routine and drifted off to sleep with a calm and contented heart.

events.name: Organize pottery tools before bedtime.
events.description: Before going to bed, she tidied up her pottery tools and reviewed the suggestions given by Teacher Zheng Guodong regarding the initial form of her natural-textured teacup. She confirmed with Su Ya, a classmate from the pottery class, via WeChat the time for trimming and bisque firing at the studio the following afternoon.

起始状态.所处地点: At home, No. 89 Jingsan Road, Jinshui District, Zhengzhou City, Henan Province
起始状态.心情: Vitality restored, ready to take on the challenges of returning to work.

结束状态.所处地点: At home, No. 89 Jingsan Road, Jinshui District, Zhengzhou City, Henan Province
结束状态.心情: Tranquility, contentment, and the profound joy that comes from self-care.

date_attribute.weather: Sunny, good weather for the weekend.

2025-02.daily_overview: On the first weekend after her recovery, Yu Xiaowen's life was rich and fulfilling. In the morning, she attended a financial management course to deepen her knowledge of asset allocation; in the afternoon, she immersed herself in pottery creation, completing the trimming of a teacup and placing it in the kiln; in the evening, she was inspired by the idea of decorating her life with green plants. This day marked her comprehensive recovery and active expansion of the breadth and depth of her personal life, with her weight reaching 50.5kg, signaling the end of her health-focused phase.

events.name: Participate in offline financial management courses.
events.description: In the morning, Yu Xiaowen went to the Private Banking Department of China Merchants Bank Zhengzhou Branch to attend the second offline course organized by financial advisor Wang Mingyuan, with the theme "Risk and Return Characteristics of Major Asset Classes." She listened attentively, learning about the features of different assets such as stocks, bonds, funds, and real estate. After the class, she exchanged preliminary ideas on fund investments with other participants and scheduled a follow-up one-on-one portfolio review with Wang Mingyuan.

events.name: Trimming and Bisque Firing in a Pottery Studio
events.description: In the afternoon, Yu Xiaowen arrived at the "Between Earth" pottery studio. Under the on-site guidance of teacher Zheng Guodong, she meticulously refined the initial clay form of a teacup she had completed in January. Using various tools to scrape, tap, and carefully carve the natural texture of the cup's body, she worked with precision. Once finished, she and Teacher Zheng carefully placed the fully dried clay form into the kiln, beginning a day-long bisque firing process. She inquired with Teacher Zheng about the temperature and duration of this bisque firing, her heart filled with anticipation.

events.name: Research on Ceramic Glazing Techniques
events.description: After returning home from the studio, Yu Xiaowen, driven by her keen interest, used her computer to research a wealth of information on ceramic glazing techniques and color coordination. She paid special attention to the effects of traditional glazes suitable for teacups, such as transparent glaze, matte glaze, and celadon, and diligently took notes in preparation for the glazing stage after the bisque firing.

events.name: The idea of purchasing green plants has arisen.
events.description: When resting in the evening, Yu Xiaowen looked around her apartment and felt a stronger desire for vitality and tranquility after recovering from her illness. Recalling her preference for "seeking peace in nature," she came up with the idea of buying some green plants to decorate her living space, purify the air, and improve her mood. She immediately opened a mobile app and began browsing care tips and pictures of "healing" green plants.

events.name: Join the Classical Music Sharing Group
events.description: While scrolling through WeChat before bed, she saw an invitation from Lin Feng, a classical music enthusiast she had met at a bookstore salon last week, inviting her to join the "Zhengzhou Classical Music Fragments Sharing" WeChat group. Yu Xiaowen happily joined. From time to time, members in the group shared music links, performance information, and post-listening reflections. She felt she had found a like-minded community.

events.name: Light city walk recovery activity
events.description: In the evening, to aid her recovery from illness, Yu Xiaowen took a 15-minute slow city walk near her residential area, breathing in the fresh air and feeling her body gradually adapt to light exercise.

起始状态.所处地点: No. 89 Jingsan Road, Jinshui District, Zhengzhou City, Henan Province, China
起始状态.心情: Calm, slightly fatigued

结束状态.所处地点: No. 89 Jingsan Road, Jinshui District, Zhengzhou City, Henan Province, China
结束状态.心情: Weak but content, looking forward to tomorrow, confident in recovery.

state.今日运动: city walk 15 minutes, approximately 4,000 steps on foot

date_attribute.weather: Clear, breezy, with slightly low temperatures and a large temperature difference between morning and evening.

2025-02.daily_overview: A Sunday centered around deep socializing and self-reflection. Having just returned to Zhengzhou from a family reunion in Luoyang, still carrying a bit of the lingering warmth of the Spring Festival, physical fatigue and thoughts about health prompted her to have a rare, profound conversation with her close friend, laying the groundwork for future life adjustments.

events.name: A Deep Conversation with My Best Friend Zhang Jing at the Cafe
events.description: In the afternoon, Yu Xiaowen and Zhang Jing met at a quiet, health-focused café on University Road. Yu Xiaowen shared her reflections during her recent illness, candidly expressing her exhaustion as a resident physician from the intense workload and her desire for a better work-life balance in the future. Zhang Jing, in turn, confided about the teaching pressures she faces as an elementary school teacher, the challenges of communicating with parents, and a subtle sense of professional burnout. The two listened to and comforted each other, offering advice based on their respective professional backgrounds (medicine/education). Yu Xiaowen realized that a doctor’s "healing" extends not only to patients but also to oneself and those around them.

events.name: Formulate the 'Health Partner' Agreement
events.description: At the end of the conversation, based on their mutual sharing of stress, Yu Xiaowen and Zhang Jing made a joint commitment to pay more attention to each other's physical and mental health in the future. They plan to have at least one in-depth conversation each month, encouraging each other to maintain regular routines, eat healthily, and share methods for coping with stress. Zhang Jing suggested creating a shared online memo to track each other's exercise check-ins and small health goals.

events.name: Organize Thoughts and Journal Entries
events.description: After parting ways with Zhang Jing, Yu Xiaowen returned to her apartment on Jingsan Road. She recorded in detail the insights from today’s conversation, particularly her reflections on doctors’ self-health management and the "health partnership" agreement with Zhang Jing, in the notes app on her phone. She contemplated how to transform this abstract agreement into actionable, concrete steps, such as systematically organizing her own health data.

events.name: Evening routine reading and rest
events.description: In the evening, after washing up, Yu Xiaowen leaned against the headboard and flipped through a few pages of a book on medical humanities, but her thoughts remained on the conversation from earlier in the day. She turned off the lights half an hour earlier than usual, deciding to start fulfilling her commitment to a "good routine" from tonight onward, in order to conserve energy for the upcoming intense workweek.

起始状态.所处地点: In the bedroom at home, No. 89 Jingsan Road, Jinshui District, Zhengzhou City, Henan Province.
起始状态.心情: Calmness carries the weariness after recovery and the complex emotions of contemplating the future.

结束状态.所处地点: In the bedroom of the home at No. 89 Jingsan Road, Jinshui District, Zhengzhou City, Henan Province.
结束状态.心情: Feeling relieved and grounded by being understood and supported through sharing, and looking forward to putting new commitments into practice.

state.今日运动: None, primarily focused on rest and light socializing.

date_attribute.weather: Cloudy turning to clear, with temperatures rising somewhat.

2025-02.daily_overview: On the first day of returning to work, the pace was intense yet fulfilling. After reflecting over the weekend, Yu Xiaowen approached her tasks with a more proactive and systematic mindset, gaining recognition in her professional field. She also began taking initial steps toward implementing her ideas for health management.

events.name: First Day of Cardiology Rotation and Case Preparation
events.description: Yu Xiaowen officially began her rotation in the Cardiovascular Department today. After her shift, she used her break time to review all the medical records of a patient with refractory heart failure, whose case would be discussed the following day, in the department office. Not only did she revisit the latest guidelines for heart failure treatment, but she also searched the hospital database for several articles on managing the patient's comorbidities (renal insufficiency). She then outlined the key points of her analysis in her notebook.

events.name: Participate in departmental case discussions and actively contribute to the conversation.
events.description: In the afternoon, under the guidance of the supervising teacher Li Wei, the department held a case discussion meeting. After listening to the case report, Yu Xiaowen delivered a well-organized speech from multiple perspectives, including pathophysiology, medication adjustments (particularly the balance between diuretics and renal function), and patient compliance education. Her analysis earned a nod of approval from Teacher Li Wei, and she engaged in in-depth discussions with colleagues Wang Fang and Liu Qiang regarding the details of "intake and output management."

events.name: Review and Discussion Meeting Gains
events.description: After the discussion ended, Yu Xiaowen returned to her desk and quickly jotted down Professor Li Wei's comments, the different viewpoints raised by her colleagues, and the new ideas that had suddenly come to her mind in her notebook. She specifically marked the term "cardiorenal syndrome" as a topic that required further study, planning to look it up after work.

events.name: Send a message of thanks and confirmation to Zhang Jing.
events.description: On her way home from work, Yu Xiaowen sent a message to Zhang Jing: [After our chat yesterday, I felt much more at ease. Thank you, dear. Let’s start our health pact with an early bedtime tonight! We’ll check each other’s progress next time we meet.] Zhang Jing quickly replied with a cheering emoji and suggested they visit a bookstore together next weekend. Though brief, this online exchange was powerful, confirming a new dimension to their friendship.

events.name: Research on Health Management Apps
events.description: At home in the evening, thinking about setting up a personal health record, Yu Xiaowen downloaded and tried out three highly-rated health management apps from the mobile app store and professional medical forums. She focused on comparing the convenience of data entry (whether it could recognize medical reports by taking photos), the professionalism of chart analysis, and the data privacy protection policies. Eventually, she tentatively selected an app with a clean interface and professional medical data fields.

起始状态.所处地点: At home, No. 89 Jingsan Road, Jinshui District, Zhengzhou City, Henan Province
起始状态.心情: I feel a bit nervous about the new rotation department, but overall, I maintain a positive mindset and am ready to embrace the challenges.

结束状态.所处地点: At home, No. 89 Jingsan Road, Jinshui District, Zhengzhou City, Henan Province
结束状态.心情: Feeling a sense of accomplishment from being recognized in professional settings has provided more specific tools for implementing health management plans.

state.今日运动: None, work requires significant mental exertion.

date_attribute.weather: Sunny, warm during the day, cool in the morning and evening.

2025-02.daily_overview: A day of balancing work and personal matters. After efficiently completing her clinical learning tasks, Yu Xiaowen officially initiated the establishment of her personal digital health record. Starting with the organization of scattered historical data, she took the first step toward systematic self-health management.

events.name: Consolidate the Learning Outcomes of Case Discussions
events.description: Taking advantage of a brief break before her lunch break, Yu Xiaowen browsed the abstracts of several core literature articles on 'cardiorenal syndrome' that she had bookmarked the previous day in the hospital's electronic library, and recorded the key points in her electronic notes. She exchanged a few words with Wang Fang via WeChat and discovered that Wang Fang was also reviewing related content. The two agreed to find time to discuss the progress in drug therapy for heart failure together.

events.name: Organize health records from previous years
events.description: Returning home in the evening, Yu Xiaowen retrieved the paper health examination reports and electronic outpatient records from the past three years from her bookshelf and computer folders. At her desk, she began sorting these documents by year (2022, 2023, 2024) and category (annual check-ups, specialized examinations, outpatient medical records). She used different colored sticky notes to mark them, preparing to input the information into an electronic archive.

events.name: Create a list of data to be entered.
events.description: After completing the classification, she created a new spreadsheet and quickly listed key information entries in chronological order, such as '2023.05 Annual Physical Examination—Complete Blood Count, Liver Function, Kidney Function, Lipid Profile, Blood Glucose' and '2024.08 Outpatient Visit—Acute Upper Respiratory Tract Infection (Medication: xxx)', forming a clear to-do list.

events.name: Register and set up the health management app.
events.description: After completing the checklist, Yu Xiaowen downloaded the health management app she had selected the night before, registered with her phone number, and carefully read the user agreement and privacy policy. Only after confirming that the data was stored on encrypted servers within the country did she feel comfortable using it.

events.name: Enter basic physical data
events.description: According to the records in her phone's memo and the latest physical examination report, she filled in basic information such as name, gender, and date of birth in the personal profile module of the APP. She also entered her approximate height and weight data since college (as far as she could recall) as well as accurate data from the past three years. The APP automatically generated her BMI change curve, which showed that it had consistently remained at the lower end of the standard range, with a stable trend.

起始状态.所处地点: At home, No. 89 Jingsan Road, Jinshui District, Zhengzhou City, Henan Province
起始状态.心情: Smooth, with a sense of fulfillment from completing the learning tasks and a slight excitement about starting a new project.

结束状态.所处地点: Home Study, No. 89 Jingsan Road, Jinshui District, Zhengzhou City, Henan Province
结束状态.心情: A sense of control is gained as the data organization begins to take shape and trends in physical data become visible, leaving one slightly tired yet fulfilled.

date_attribute.weather: Overcast turning to partly cloudy with brief sunshine in the afternoon.

2025-02.daily_overview: The day of completely bidding farewell to sick leave and fully returning to the workplace. The body is already fine, but psychologically, there has been a shift from being a cared-for individual to an independent professional. The care and professional guidance from senior colleagues in the workplace have injected a shot of confidence into her, prompting more concrete reflections on the balance between work and health.

events.name: The idea of decorating the home with green plants began to sprout.
events.description: Waking up in the morning, Yu Xiaowen looked at her slightly cold and messy apartment during her sick leave and suddenly felt a lack of vitality. Recalling the joy brought by the small garden her mother tended at her parents’ home in Luoyang, she had the idea of buying a few low-maintenance potted plants to decorate the windowsill and desk, making the living environment cozier and more vibrant.

events.name: Formal Return to Work and Familiarization with the Latest Department Updates
events.description: Yu Xiaowen arrived punctually at the Cardiovascular Department of Zhengzhou Central Hospital. She first reported to Head Nurse Wu Min to learn about the patient flow in the department over the past week and the changes in the conditions of key patients. She then handled a small backlog of paperwork and updated the medical order system for the patients under her care.

events.name: Participate in routine ward rounds
events.description: At nine in the morning, Yu Xiaowen followed her supervising teacher Li Wei, along with other residents and nurses, on the grand ward round. She listened attentively to each patient's chief complaints and vital signs reports. When Teacher Li Wei inquired, she was able to supplement some information based on her understanding of the patients before her sick leave and noted down the new medical orders.

events.name: Accept the care and guidance of the mentoring teacher.
events.description: After the ward round, Teacher Li Wei specifically called Yu Xiaowen to a corner of the doctor's office. He first inquired with concern about her physical recovery, then, speaking from the perspective of someone with experience, earnestly shared insights on how young doctors can protect themselves and prevent burnout in high-intensity work—such as taking short breaks during fragmented time and cultivating interests outside of work. Following that, he offered specific praise for Xiaowen’s performance in yesterday’s case discussion, noting that her clinical thinking had improved, but also pointed out areas where she could delve deeper into "assessing treatment risks and benefits." This conversation left Yu Xiaowen feeling deeply warmed and encouraged.

events.name: Temporary overtime to handle emergency cases.
events.description: In the afternoon, the department admitted a patient with acute myocardial infarction. Yu Xiaowen participated in the rescue and subsequent treatment, which resulted in a two-hour delay in her off-duty time.

events.name: Sharing Workplace Warmth with My Best Friend
events.description: In the evening, Yu Xiaowen had a video chat with her close friend Zhang Jing via WeChat, sharing in detail the conversation she had with Teacher Li Wei during the day and her experience of working overtime. She expressed how touched she was by the care that went beyond the ordinary superior-subordinate relationship, but also mentioned the exhaustion brought on by overtime work. The two discussed how to implement the concept of "balance" in their specific work, such as trying the Pomodoro Technique to break up long periods of mental labor.

起始状态.所处地点: At home, No. 89 Jingsan Road, Jinshui District, Zhengzhou City, Henan Province
起始状态.心情: I feel a bit anxious about returning to work, but more than that, I am determined to quickly get back into the rhythm.

结束状态.所处地点: At home, No. 89 Jingsan Road, Jinshui District, Zhengzhou City, Henan Province
结束状态.心情: Filled with gratitude for the recognition and care from seniors, yet exhausted after overtime work, I have gained clearer insights into adjusting my work patterns.

state.今日运动: Walking to and from work (approximately 20 minutes round trip) and moving around within the compound, light activity.

date_attribute.weather: Clear skies, fresh air, suitable for outdoor activities.

2025-02.daily_overview: A day of reassurance brought by financial bookkeeping. Amidst work, Yu Xiaowen's attention is scattered across various personal interests and matters: from conceptualizing ceramic art creations, to reading medical humanities, to reminders about vehicle insurance and planning weekend sports and social activities, life reveals a rich tapestry of multiple dimensions.

events.name: Salary and Bonus Payment Notification
events.description: In the morning, Yu Xiaowen received a push notification from her bank app, indicating that her February salary and a quarterly performance bonus had been deposited. She clicked to check and confirmed that the amounts matched her expectations, providing a financial foundation for her monthly budgeting and subsequent investment activities.

events.name: Design a glazing plan for a ceramic teacup.
events.description: During the lunch break, Yu Xiaowen took out the photos of the unfired ceramic teacup stored on her phone and began brainstorming glazing ideas. Drawing on her previous knowledge of glazes, she came up with a preliminary plan: the interior of the cup would be coated with a smooth, easy-to-clean colorless transparent glaze, while the exterior would feature a matte pea-green glaze with subtle crystalline textures to complement the cup's natural, textured design. She sketched a simple diagram in her notebook and jotted down her ideas.

events.name: Online consultation with pottery teacher Zheng Guodong.
events.description: After work, Yu Xiaowen organized her glaze design sketches and several technical questions (such as the application thickness of matte glaze and the firing temperature) and sent them to Mr. Zheng Guodong, the teacher of the pottery class, via WeChat. Mr. Zheng quickly replied, affirming the idea of combining bean green glaze with texture, and provided detailed answers to her questions. He suggested that she could first test the glaze on small pottery pieces.

events.name: Read "Being Mortal" and take notes.
events.description: In the evening, after washing up, Yu Xiaowen leaned against the headboard and continued reading the first half of "Being Mortal." When she reached the chapter on how modern medicine confronts the inevitability of aging and death, she recalled several elderly critically ill patients she had encountered during her rotation in the cardiology department, as well as the complex doctor-patient communication scenarios at the time. She jotted down some reflections and questions in the margins of the book, such as [How can we provide support for patients and their families between technical rescue and the dignity of life?]

events.name: Received a reminder for car insurance renewal.
events.description: Before going to bed, Yu Xiaowen received a text message and an in-app notification from the insurance company, reminding her that the insurance for her vehicle would expire in a week. She was advised to renew the policy as soon as possible to avoid a lapse in coverage. She added this task to her phone's to-do list.

events.name: Organize the key points of Teacher Li Wei's talk.
events.description: Using a bit of time before bed, Yu Xiaowen created a new document on her computer, reviewing and recording the key points from yesterday's conversation with Teacher Li Wei. She divided the content into two sections: [Health Management Suggestions] and [Clinical Thinking Improvement Directions], and preliminarily outlined several follow-up learning and adjustment plans, such as summarizing a complex case every week.

events.name: Invite university classmates to play basketball over the weekend.
events.description: Yu Xiaowen sent a WeChat message to her university classmate and good friend Sun Yue, who also lives in Zhengzhou: [Yueyue, are you free this Saturday afternoon? It's been a long time since we last hung out. How about going to our usual spot to play badminton? I’ll treat you to yogurt.] Sun Yue quickly replied to agree, and the two briefly confirmed meeting at the badminton court near their workplace at 3 p.m. on Saturday.

起始状态.所处地点: At home, No. 89 Jingsan Road, Jinshui District, Zhengzhou City, Henan Province
起始状态.心情: Calmness, with a small sense of stability from the income received, and plans for the new day.

结束状态.所处地点: In the bedroom at home, No. 89 Jingsan Road, Jinshui District, Zhengzhou City, Henan Province.
结束状态.心情: Fulfilling and tranquil, reading brings deep reflection, social invitations are something to look forward to, yet accompanied by a slight sense of fatigue.

date_attribute.weather: Cloudy with localized short-term light haze.

2025-02.daily_overview: A day of steady work pace and orderly progress in personal affairs. The focus lies in deepening health management actions, from data entry to plan settings, as a preliminary digital health record begins to take shape. Meanwhile, daily care habits for a new hobby (green plants) are starting to sprout.

events.name: Record supplementary miscellaneous expenses for February.
events.description: After work in the evening, Yu Xiaowen organized the shopping receipts and electronic payment records accumulated in February, particularly during the Spring Festival and sick leave. She then entered the previously overlooked miscellaneous expenses, such as cold medicine, online book purchases, and snacks, into her mobile accounting app to ensure the completeness of her monthly financial data.

events.name: Refine the reading notes of "Being Mortal".
events.description: She reviewed last night's reading notes and added more specific ideas on how to practice patient-centered care in future clinical work, such as spending an extra minute during rounds to ask about patients' feelings and concerns. She then digitized the updated notes and archived them into her personal cloud drive's learning materials library.

events.name: Set reminders and plans in the health app.
events.description: Opening the health management app, Yu Xiaowen set up an alarm clock in the 'Reminders' module to measure and record her weight every Monday, Wednesday, and Friday morning, along with a reminder to measure her blood pressure on the first day of each month. Next, in the 'Plans' module, she planned and entered her annual health check-up schedule and project reminders for the next six months (July 2025), based on the packages provided by the hospital's physical examination center and her personal circumstances.

events.name: Observing Green Plants in the Early Morning
events.description: After getting up in the morning, Yu Xiaowen went to the window and carefully observed the lighting conditions at the spots she had previously considered for placing green plants (the windowsill and the desk). She casually wiped away the dust with a damp cloth while pondering which plant varieties would be suitable.

events.name: Evening Simple Chores and Green Plant Watering Rehearsal
events.description: After finishing a day's work and returning home, Yu Xiaowen routinely cleaned the living room. Looking at the empty flowerpot (left behind by a plant she had previously managed to kill), she decided to go shopping for a new one over the weekend. She watered the old soil in the pot to "activate" it, imagining how lush and green it would soon look.

events.name: Cardiovascular Medicine Routine On-Call
events.description: During the day, Yu Xiaowen carried out her normal duties in the department, admitting new patients, handling medical orders, and writing progress notes. After the adjustments made in the previous days, she tried today to focus for 50 minutes at work and then take a 5-minute break to get up, fetch a cup of water, or look out the window, beginning to practice adjusting her work rhythm.

起始状态.所处地点: At home, No. 89 Jingsan Road, Jinshui District, Zhengzhou City, Henan Province
起始状态.心情: Start the day peacefully and systematically.

结束状态.所处地点: Home living room at No. 89 Jingsan Road, Jinshui District, Zhengzhou City, Henan Province.
结束状态.心情: I feel a slight sense of achievement due to the completion of my health profile setup and trying out new work methods, and I am looking forward to purchasing green plants and exercising over the weekend.

state.今日运动: Daily walking and brief activities within the courtyard, light exercise

date_attribute.weather: Sunny, a fine weather for the weekend.

2025-02.daily_overview: A highly productive Saturday handling multiple personal matters. The core revolved around the financial management cycle: from reviewing income and expenses, consulting advisors to executing adjustments in fixed investments—rational and steady. Meanwhile, there was notable progress in the pottery hobby, and after feeling physically recovered, a cautious restart of exercise was attempted.

events.name: Complete the first assignment of the online financial management course.
events.description: In the morning, Yu Xiaowen followed the requirements of the online financial management course she had enrolled in. During her break, she used her computer to organize a simplified personal balance sheet (assets: savings, funds, car; liabilities: none) and a statement of income and expenses for the past three months, completing her first homework assignment. This process gave her a clearer and more quantified understanding of her financial situation. She then submitted the assignment through the course platform.

events.name: Review of income and expenditure for February
events.description: After submitting her assignment, she opened the mobile expense tracking app and meticulously reviewed the total income for February (including the recently deposited salary and bonuses) against various expenses (such as Spring Festival gifts, dining, medical supplies, daily commuting, and course fees). She then compared these figures with the budget set at the beginning of the month. It was discovered that due to higher-than-expected bonuses and lower spending during sick leave, the monthly surplus exceeded the budgeted amount.

events.name: Consult financial advisor Wang Mingyuan.
events.description: Based on the additional surplus identified from the review, Yu Xiaowen communicated with financial advisor Wang Mingyuan via WeChat to consult on how to optimize her fund-dominated asset allocation with this capital under the current market conditions. After understanding her risk preference (conservative) and recent cash flow, Wang Mingyuan suggested appropriately increasing the monthly fixed investment amount in a stable bond fund to smooth portfolio volatility.

events.name: Execute adjustment of fixed investment amount in the fund.
events.description: After integrating her personal financial goals with the advisor's recommendations, Yu Xiaowen logged into her mobile banking app. She located a stable-performing bond fund she held and increased her monthly fixed investment amount from 800 yuan to 1,200 yuan, confirming the revised deduction agreement. This proactive adjustment marked her application of financial planning knowledge into practice.

events.name: Pottery Works Firing and Kiln Opening
events.description: In the afternoon, Yu Xiaowen received a notification from her pottery teacher, Zheng Guodong, in the WeChat group. The teacup greenware she had previously trimmed had completed its bisque firing, and the kiln had cooled down. She hurried to the studio and, together with Teacher Zheng and her classmate Su Ya, opened the kiln. Carefully, she retrieved her greenware and inspected it closely. After undergoing bisque firing at 800 degrees Celsius, the body had become firm, with no cracks or deformations. Its surface displayed a light earthy yellow hue, perfectly prepared for the subsequent glazing process. She took photos to document this stage of her work.

events.name: Carefully Restart Evening Running
events.description: In the evening, feeling in good physical condition, Yu Xiaowen changed into her sportswear and went for her first evening run after recovering from illness at a park near her home. She deliberately kept her pace very slow and reduced the distance to just 2 kilometers, focusing the entire time on her heart rate and breathing. The goal was to recover and pay attention to her body's feedback, rather than chasing data or speed. After the run, she felt refreshed and experienced no discomfort.

events.name: Familiarize with the advanced features of health apps.
events.description: In the evening, Yu Xiaowen spent time familiarizing herself with other features of the health management app, such as generating periodic health reports with one click, receiving professional interpretation prompts for abnormal indicators, and accessing interfaces with certain online consultation platforms. She attempted to generate her own "Weight and BMI Trend Report" for the past three years.

events.name: Research Intent: Key Points of Green Plant Maintenance
events.description: Before going to bed, Yu Xiaowen used the memo app on her phone to create a simple table listing the initial watering schedules and light requirements for several preferred green plants (pothos, snake plant, monstera, succulents), preparing knowledge for tomorrow's purchase.

events.name: Compare Vehicle Renewal Insurance Plans
events.description: Making use of fragmented time, Yu Xiaowen carefully reviewed renewal quotes for her specific car model on several mainstream insurance company apps and price comparison platforms. She compared the prices and value-added services (such as the number of roadside assistance calls) of different insurance coverage combinations (including vehicle damage, third-party liability of 2 million/3 million yuan, and no-deductible coverage). Considering her short commuting distance and cautious driving habits, she preliminarily selected a cost-effective basic coverage package.

起始状态.所处地点: At home, No. 89 Jingsan Road, Jinshui District, Zhengzhou City, Henan Province
起始状态.心情: Relax and enjoy a day where you can freely arrange your personal affairs.

结束状态.所处地点: At home, No. 89 Jingsan Road, Jinshui District, Zhengzhou City, Henan Province
结束状态.心情: Very fulfilling and productive, with substantial progress in finance, hobbies, and health, resulting in a strong sense of accomplishment.

state.今日运动: Evening jog of 2 kilometers at a very slow pace, mainly for recovery.

date_attribute.weather: Clear skies, comfortable temperature, gentle breeze

2025-02.daily_overview: A typical vibrant Sunday. In the morning, adding new greenery to the living space, and in the afternoon, engaging in exhilarating exercise and socializing with peers. Yu Xiaowen releases stress amidst nature and sweat, gaining resonance and support through conversations with old friends, allowing both body and mind to be fully nourished and relaxed.

events.name: Research and determine the purchase list for green plants.
events.description: In the morning, based on her research from the previous night and the actual lighting conditions at home, Yu Xiaowen finalized her shopping list: a large pot of pothos (to be placed in the corner of the living room for air purification), a snake plant (to be placed beside the desk for its shade tolerance), and a small pot of mixed succulents (to be placed on the windowsill as decoration). She checked the address and business hours of a nearby large flower market on a local lifestyle app.

events.name: Go to the flower market to select green plants.
events.description: Yu Xiaowen drove to the flower market. After browsing for nearly an hour and comparing the prices and quality of several shops, she finally selected a pot of green pothos with lush, dark green leaves and long vines, a sturdy and upright snake plant, and a combination pot containing various succulent varieties such as lithops and echeveria. The shopkeeper also gave her a small bag of nutrient-rich soil.

events.name: Setting up a new home for newly purchased green plants.
events.description: After bringing the greenery home, Yu Xiaowen eagerly began arranging them: she placed the pothos on a white flower stand next to the TV cabinet in the living room, positioned the snake plant to the left of the desk in the study, and set the succulent arrangement on the south-facing windowsill. She carefully watered each plant to help them settle in and cleared away any fallen leaves. Looking at the instantly revitalized room, she felt immensely satisfied.

events.name: Prepare badminton equipment.
events.description: After the lunch break, Yu Xiaowen organized her badminton sports bag, checking the sportswear, sneakers, spare towel, water bottle, and racket to ensure all equipment was ready for her afternoon date with Sun Yue.

events.name: Playing badminton with university classmate Sun Yue.
events.description: At three in the afternoon, Yu Xiaowen arrived punctually at the badminton court near her workplace to meet Sun Yue. The two warmed up first, then engaged in nearly an hour of doubles and singles practice. Although Yu Xiaowen was still in her recovery period physically, her touch was good, and she exchanged shots back and forth with Sun Yue, working up a sweat and thoroughly enjoying herself.

events.name: Deep Communication with Peers After Exercise
events.description: After playing, the two of them rested by the court, chatting while rehydrating. The conversation naturally shifted from skills to work. They shared interesting and frustrating stories from their hospital rotations, complained about the complex medical record system, and discussed the common challenges they faced as young female doctors in terms of career advancement and research pressure. This mutual understanding and support among colleagues made Yu Xiaowen feel particularly relieved and connected.

events.name: Agree on a fixed frequency for sports social activities.
events.description: Before leaving the stadium, Yu Xiaowen and Sun Yue agreed to try to schedule at least two such badminton gatherings each month in the future. This would not only allow them to exercise regularly but also help maintain their precious friendship as classmates, encouraging each other along the way. With a smile, they sealed the agreement with a high-five.

events.name: Post-Exercise Cool-Down and Relaxation
events.description: After returning home, Yu Xiaowen immediately put her sweat-soaked sportswear into the washing machine and cleaned her racket before storing it away. After taking a hot shower, she felt a slight soreness in her muscles but was mentally relaxed and content. Reflecting on her conversation with Sun Yue, she thought it was wonderful to have a companion to walk alongside on this journey.

起始状态.所处地点: At home, No. 89 Jingsan Road, Jinshui District, Zhengzhou City, Henan Province
起始状态.心情: Relaxed and happy, looking forward to buying green plants and the afternoon exercise.

结束状态.所处地点: At home, No. 89 Jingsan Road, Jinshui District, Zhengzhou City, Henan Province
结束状态.心情: Feeling physically and mentally refreshed, there is both the exhilaration after exercise and the satisfaction and warmth following deep conversations with friends.

state.今日运动: Badminton activity lasts about 1.5 hours (including warm-up and rest), with moderate intensity.

date_attribute.weather: Cloudy day, with sporadic drizzles in the evening.

2025-02.daily_overview: The start of the new workweek is set against a backdrop of deep reading and systematic planning. Immersed in reflections on medical humanities and drawing from her recent health fluctuations, Yu Xiaowen begins to design a more sustainable and stress-resilient personal routine and work pattern.

events.name: Read the second half of "Being Mortal" intensively and write systematic notes.
events.description: In the evening, Yu Xiaowen continued reading the latter half of *Being Mortal*, which focused on doctor-patient communication skills and the practice of palliative care. Drawing on the perspectives in the book, she reflected on several challenging doctor-patient communication scenarios she had experienced, contemplating how to deliver bad news more humanely and respect patient autonomy. She took out her notebook and, no longer content with marginal annotations, systematically compiled a set of reading notes. She highlighted the book’s core ideas, her reflections on her own clinical work, and particularly her thoughts on [finding a balance for patients between technological intervention and the dignity of life].

events.name: Consultation on the First Use of Health Records
events.description: Using the online consultation feature (free sessions) of the health management app, Yu Xiaowen conducted a text and image consultation with the platform's contracted general practitioner regarding precautions during her recovery period from this illness (no fever, but occasional coughing and fatigue). Based on her description, the doctor provided recommendations and reminded her to have a follow-up blood test after one week. Yu Xiaowen plans to update the subsequent test results into her medical records.

events.name: Systematically Plan Work and Rest Schedules and Introduce the Pomodoro Technique
events.description: Based on reflections after illness and the data awareness brought by establishing a health record, Yu Xiaowen decided to systematically adjust her personal routine. In her study, she meticulously planned fixed sleep times (aiming for before 23:30) and wake-up alarms (6:40 on weekdays) for the upcoming week. At the same time, she carefully studied the principles of the Pomodoro Technique (25 minutes of focus + 5 minutes of rest) and downloaded a simple timer app. She plans to try applying this method tomorrow at work while writing medical records, reading literature, and other tasks, aiming to build a more stress-resistant and sustainable work rhythm.

events.name: Routine Work and Ward Rounds in the Department of Cardiology
events.description: During the day, Yu Xiaowen participated in the department's work as usual, accompanying Teacher Li Wei on rounds, handling medical orders, and admitting a new patient with angina. While writing the medical record, she attempted to organize her language in a more structured and efficient manner.

起始状态.所处地点: At home, No. 89 Jingsan Road, Jinshui District, Zhengzhou City, Henan Province
起始状态.心情: The usual slight tension of Monday, but with the determination to try new methods.

结束状态.所处地点: Home Study Room, No. 89 Jingsan Road, Jinshui District, Zhengzhou City, Henan Province
结束状态.心情: Feeling clear-headed and at peace due to deep reading and systematic planning, with anticipation for future adjustments.

state.今日运动: Walking to commute, and tried two 5-minute office stretches.

date_attribute.weather: Cloudy with a slight drop in temperature.

2025-02.daily_overview: A little interlude to look forward to on a workday. The notice of the department team-building event brought a lighthearted topic to the otherwise dull Tuesday afternoon. Yu Xiaowen signed up with familiar colleagues, looking forward to relaxing and strengthening bonds during the weekend group activity.

events.name: Sign up for the department's escape room team-building activity.
events.description: In the afternoon, the department head posted a notice in the work group about organizing an escape room team-building activity after work this Friday (February 28th), with the theme "Pandemic Crisis." The notice detailed the time, location, cost, and registration method. Upon seeing it, Yu Xiaowen discussed it with her close colleagues Wang Fang and Liu Qiang in a private WeChat group. Everyone found the theme interesting and felt it was a good time for team-building just after the New Year, so they decided to sign up together. Yu Xiaowen completed the registration and paid her personal fee online.

events.name: Try applying the Pomodoro Technique
events.description: While handling paperwork and reading literature today, Yu Xiaowen practiced the Pomodoro Technique she planned last night for the first time. She used a timer app to set a 25-minute focus period, during which she tried her best to block out distractions from her phone. Once the time was up, she stood up to get some water and gazed out the window for five minutes. During her lunch break, she shared her initial experience with Wang Fang, feeling that it helped maintain concentration but required some adaptation.

events.name: Enter historical complete blood count data into the health record.
events.description: In the evening, Yu Xiaowen continued the data entry work for the health records. She pulled out the paper-based physical examination reports from the past three years, organized the key indicators from the blood tests (white blood cells, red blood cells, hemoglobin, platelets) by year into an electronic spreadsheet, and then entered them one by one into the "Historical Lab Data" module of the app. The system automatically flagged that the hemoglobin values had consistently remained within the normal range but were at the lower end, suggesting attention to iron intake.

events.name: Daily Care for Newly Purchased Green Plants
events.description: Before going to bed, Yu Xiaowen checked the newly purchased green plants from yesterday. Based on the dryness of the soil surface, she used a fine-mouthed spray bottle to lightly water the snake plant and succulents, while the pothos plant remained unwatered as its soil was still relatively moist. She noticed that one leaf of the pothos had a slightly yellowed tip, so she carefully trimmed it off.

起始状态.心情: Stable, somewhat curious about trying new work methods.

结束状态.所处地点: At home, No. 89 Jingsan Road, Jinshui District, Zhengzhou City, Henan Province
结束状态.心情: Good, the initial success of the Pomodoro Technique brought a small sense of achievement, and the weekend team-building arrangements also added a little anticipation to life.

state.今日运动: Walking commute, and brief activities during several Pomodoro intervals.

2025-02.daily_overview: A day of continuously advancing the improvement of health records, seeing my consistently stable biochemical indicators over the years brings a sense of reassurance. At the same time, I efficiently handled the annual must-do tasks (car insurance renewal) and shared the new routine adjustment methods with colleagues, seeking external supervision to make changes easier to stick to.

events.name: Record key indicators such as liver and kidney function, blood lipids, and blood glucose.
events.description: Utilizing the evening hours, Yu Xiaowen continued organizing the physical examination reports, extracting the historical values of liver function (ALT/AST), kidney function (creatinine, urea nitrogen), four lipid profiles (total cholesterol, triglycerides, high/low-density lipoprotein), and fasting blood glucose. After entering these data into the app, the system automatically generated trend line charts for each indicator. She was pleased to find that her lipid and blood glucose levels had consistently remained at an ideal level, and her liver and kidney functions were completely normal, which she attributed to her long-term, disciplined diet and exercise habits.

events.name: Exchange insights on the Pomodoro Technique with colleague Wang Fang.
events.description: During the lunch break, Yu Xiaowen and Wang Fang had a meal together in the hospital cafeteria. She proactively mentioned that she was trying the Pomodoro Technique and shared her initial impressions, such as how it could reduce procrastination and improve efficiency per unit of time. However, she also admitted that it wasn't applicable in emergency situations like urgent care or resuscitation. She invited Wang Fang to try it as well, suggesting that they could remind and supervise each other while also discussing any issues they encountered. Wang Fang expressed interest and decided to give it a try starting with writing medical records the next day.

events.name: Complete online renewal of vehicle insurance.
events.description: After work, based on the comparison results from the previous few days, Yu Xiaowen finally confirmed the renewal plan on the insurance company's app: vehicle damage insurance, third-party liability insurance with a coverage of 2 million, passenger liability insurance, and a special clause for non-deductible coverage. She used her linked bank card to pay the premium online, and the electronic policy was generated and took effect immediately. The entire process took less than ten minutes.

events.name: Archive New Car Insurance Electronic Policy
events.description: After completing the payment, Yu Xiaowen downloaded the newly generated electronic policy. Following her personal financial management habits, she uploaded and archived it in the ‘Insurance Documents’ folder on her cloud drive. At the same time, she updated and recorded important information such as the new policy number and the insurance company’s customer service phone number in a fixed location in her phone’s memo.

events.name: Cardiovascular Medicine On Duty
events.description: Yu Xiaowen is on the day shift today, responsible for handling new admissions and daily departmental affairs. Amidst the busy schedule, she still tries to maintain a Pomodoro rhythm, feeling it helps somewhat in managing multiple parallel tasks.

结束状态.所处地点: At home, No. 89 Jingsan Road, Jinshui District, Zhengzhou City, Henan Province

2025-02.daily_overview: End-of-month review and settlement day. Yu Xiaowen conducted a practical review and flexible adjustments of her exercise habits for February, while completing the closed-loop management of monthly finances (paying rent and organizing expenses). At the same time, she also checked in with her parents to maintain the daily bond of family affection.

events.name: Review and flexibly adjust the exercise plan.
events.description: At the end of the month, Yu Xiaowen reflected on the ups and downs of her morning running routine this month (restarted at the beginning of the month → interrupted due to illness → cautiously resumed recently). She realized that, under the irregular and high-pressure work of a resident physician, she needed to maintain a more flexible rather than rigid approach to exercise. She revised her future fitness plan, deciding to alternate evening runs with activities like badminton and weekend outdoor walks, while also leaving flexible time to accommodate unexpected night shifts or overtime work. Her goal is to ensure she engages in moderate-intensity activities 2–3 times per week.

events.name: Informing parents that the car insurance renewal has been completed.
events.description: Yu Xiaowen sent a message in the family WeChat group: "[Mom and Dad, I have renewed my car insurance. The new policy is now in effect, so don’t worry.]" Her mother, Li Xiuying, quickly replied: "[Alright, as long as it’s done. Be careful when driving, always wait patiently and never rush.]" Her father, Yu Jianguo, then sent a [thumbs-up] emoji.

events.name: Review all consumption receipts and bills for this month.
events.description: In the evening, Yu Xiaowen gathered all the consumption receipts and screenshots of electronic bills for the month at her desk, and opened the mobile bookkeeping app to make final preparations for her monthly financial review. She clipped the paper receipts by category and organized the electronic bills into a dedicated folder.

events.name: Review monthly expenditures and evaluate the budget.
events.description: She carefully reviewed every expense in the accounting software for February, highlighting several irregular expenditures: medicine purchased due to a cold, green plants and flowers bought for the home, and expenses for gifts for family members during the Spring Festival. After evaluation, the total expenses slightly exceeded the initial budget for the month due to these items, but they remained within manageable limits, and the overall monthly balance still showed a surplus.

events.name: Pay the rent and miscellaneous fees for the current month.
events.description: Yu Xiaowen transferred money via her mobile banking app to the account of her landlady, Aunt Song Yumei, to pay the rent for the current month and the utility bills for the previous month, such as water, electricity, and gas, which Aunt Song had covered in advance. After the transfer was completed, she kept the electronic receipt.

events.name: Complete the monthly financial summary and fine-tune the budget for the next month.
events.description: After completing the payment, Yu Xiaowen recorded the rent expense in her accounting app, which automatically generated a summary chart of income and expenses for February. Based on the actual spending for the month (such as new items like houseplants and learning courses), she made slight adjustments to the budget for March, increasing the allocations for the 'self-improvement' and 'hobbies' categories, thus forming a simple monthly financial cycle.

events.name: Temporarily received an emergency consultation task.
events.description: In the afternoon, Yu Xiaowen was unexpectedly called to participate in an inter-departmental consultation to discuss an elderly patient with multiple chronic conditions, which delayed her departure from work by an hour.

起始状态.心情: Calm, ready to handle routine end-of-month matters

结束状态.所处地点: Home Study Room, No. 89 Jingsan Road, Jinshui District, Zhengzhou City, Henan Province
结束状态.心情: Feeling relaxed and organized after completing multiple sorting and settlement tasks, though overtime work has brought slight fatigue.

date_attribute.weather: Clear and sunny during the day, cool at night.

2025-02.daily_overview: The last day of February concluded with a unique team event. Yu Xiaowen and her colleagues swapped their white coats for an escape room challenge, where they applied their professional expertise to solve puzzles, followed by a relaxed dinner and casual conversation. This successful blend of stress relief and team bonding provided a lighthearted and enjoyable conclusion to a month marked by health fluctuations and significant adjustments.

events.name: Confirm rent payment
events.description: In the morning, Yu Xiaowen sent a polite message to her landlady, Aunt Song Yumei, via WeChat, inquiring whether the rent and miscellaneous fees had been successfully received and attaching a screenshot of yesterday's transfer. Aunt Song promptly replied to confirm receipt and reminded her to remember to eat on time, no matter how busy she was with work.

events.name: Depart for the team building location.
events.description: After work, Yu Xiaowen and her colleagues from the department gathered at the hospital entrance and boarded the department's pre-booked bus to head to the escape room venue located in the city center. On the way, everyone chatted and laughed, discussing the upcoming "Plague Crisis" theme and speculating about what kind of puzzles they might encounter, creating a relaxed and lively atmosphere.

events.name: Listen to the game rules and background introduction.
events.description: Upon arriving at the venue, all colleagues participating in the event gathered in the hall. The staff introduced the background story of the "Plague Crisis" theme (an unknown virus outbreak in an abandoned hospital), the game rules, safety precautions, and the 60-minute time limit. Yu Xiaowen's group (including Wang Fang, Liu Qiang, and about five or six others) was assigned to an entrance simulating an abandoned hospital scene.

events.name: Escape Room Game Process
events.description: The game begins as the team enters a dimly lit, simulated scene filled with discarded medical props. Leveraging her medical knowledge, Yu Xiaowen quickly identifies clues related to pathogen transmission routes (droplets and contact). Faced with a puzzle requiring the "preparation of an antidote," she takes the lead in calculating and reasoning the proportions of different reagents. The team collaborates with clear division of labor: Wang Fang, with her meticulous attention to detail, finds a hidden key, while Liu Qiang, with his strong practical skills, successfully cracks a complex mechanical lock. Ultimately, the team manages to "escape" with just minutes to spare, celebrating their success with high-fives.

events.name: Game Review and Group Photo
events.description: After successfully completing the challenge, the group returned to the hall, where the staff conducted a brief debriefing, specifically praising Yu Xiaowen's team for using their professional knowledge to quickly solve key puzzles. Everyone enthusiastically discussed the exciting moments and amusing mishaps during the game, and took a group photo with colleagues from other departments as a memento.

events.name: Department Gathering and Communication
events.description: After the escape room activity, the department organized everyone to go to a nearby well-known Henan cuisine restaurant for a group meal. During the meal, colleagues chatted freely, with topics ranging from the game to daily work, amusing life anecdotes, and parenting experiences. Yu Xiaowen sat together with Wang Fang, Liu Qiang, and others, sharing more insights about the game and discussing some department gossip, which made her feel closer to her colleagues.

events.name: Returning Home and Looking Back
events.description: After the dinner ended, everyone said their goodbyes. Yu Xiaowen shared a ride-hailing service home with two female colleagues who were heading in the same direction. On the way back, she reflected on the special team-building event, finding it both mentally challenging and enjoyable—a great way to relieve stress and strengthen team bonds. Upon arriving home, she felt a bit tired but in a pleasant mood.

events.name: A brief evening walk
events.description: After returning home, Yu Xiaowen took a 15-minute short walk near her house to aid digestion and relaxation, practicing the evening walking habit from the conclusion of the health state.

起始状态.心情: Looking forward to the evening team-building event, the sense of relaxation after the workday ends.

结束状态.所处地点: At home, No. 89 Jingsan Road, Jinshui District, Zhengzhou City, Henan Province
结束状态.心情: Pleasant and relaxed, the team activities brought a sense of freshness and belonging, wrapping up February with good health.

state.今日运动: Light physical activity and mental exercise in an escape room game, walking approximately 3,000 steps, and a brief 15-minute evening walk.
