She carefully filled in the delivery address for her hometown in Luoyang and wrote in the order notes: [Happy Mother’s Day, Mom! Wishing you health and happiness! —Your daughter, Xiaowen]. After completing the payment, she breathed a sigh of relief, imagining her mother’s smile when she received the gifts.

events.name: Inquire about the details of applying for youth apartments.
events.description: Upon learning the exact news from her colleague Wang Fang that the youth apartment would soon be open for applications, Yu Xiaowen took advantage of a relatively quiet afternoon at work to make a special trip to the hospital’s union office. The staff warmly received her and provided her with a detailed application information sheet. Yu Xiaowen proceeded to inquire and take notes on the aspects she was most concerned about: the eligibility requirements (including income and length of service), rental standards (which are significantly lower than market rates), apartment sizes and layouts, the application process (combining both online and offline steps), and, most importantly, the necessary supporting documents (such as income certificates and proof of no property ownership).

events.name: Review ACLS first aid knowledge
events.description: To be more confident in the weekend's retraining, Yu Xiaowen set aside an hour in the evening to retrieve her previous ACLS textbooks and notes from the bookshelf. She reviewed the key points of the latest cardiopulmonary resuscitation (CPR) guidelines, the identification and management procedures for several life-threatening arrhythmias (such as ventricular fibrillation and pulseless ventricular tachycardia), as well as the usage and dosage of commonly used emergency medications (such as epinephrine and amiodarone). She marked some easily confusing knowledge points, planning to focus on them during the training.

events.name: Adjusting to an earlier bedtime due to fatigue.
events.description: Due to continuous work fatigue, Yu Xiaowen decided to go to bed early to regain energy.

起始状态.所处地点: At home
起始状态.心情: Positive, with a clear to-do list.

结束状态.所处地点: At home
结束状态.心情: A sense of achievement, feeling satisfied that both my mother's and my own work and life have taken a step forward.

2025-05.daily_overview: The workday on Friday was spent in practical preparations for settling down in the future. Yu Xiaowen systematically organized and verified all the application materials, from basic documents to personal statements, with each step reflecting her meticulousness. The completeness of the materials marked a substantial step toward a more stable and convenient life.

events.name: Organize the basic part of the application materials.
events.description: After work, Yu Xiaowen didn't rest immediately as usual. Instead, she took out a transparent document folder from the drawer and began organizing the materials required for applying for a youth apartment. She photocopied her ID card and household register (which showed her individual household registration was already in Zhengzhou), and carefully placed the original employment and income certificate issued by the hospital's personnel department. These basic materials were sorted into different compartments of the document folder.

events.name: Prepare personalized application materials
events.description: Next, she exported her salary transaction details for the past six months through her mobile banking app and connected to a printer to print them out. Then, she opened a document on her computer and began drafting her personal statement. Drawing on her work as a resident physician—which involves shift work and requires being on call at all times—her stable but not high salary, and her urgent need for a stable, safe, and conveniently located living environment, she explained her application reasons in sincere and straightforward language. After finishing the draft, she revised it several times to ensure it would resonate with the reviewers without being overly exaggerated.

events.name: Please ask the supervising teacher to confirm the work certificate.
events.description: During her lunch break, Yu Xiaowen found her mentor, Li Wei. Feeling a bit embarrassed, she took out the work income certificate issued by the hospital and asked Teacher Li Wei whether the format and content (such as job title, start date, annual salary level, etc.) met the requirements for applying for youth apartments. After carefully reviewing it, Teacher Li Wei nodded affirmatively, [No problem, the certificates issued by the hospital are all very standard. Xiaowen, applying for an apartment is a good thing—it can relieve a lot of life pressure. Prepare well.] The teacher’s encouragement made her feel more at ease.

起始状态.所处地点: At home
起始状态.心情: Focus, with clear objectives

结束状态.所处地点: At home
结束状态.心情: Steadfast, watching the materials gradually come together, I have a more concrete expectation for the future.

2025-05.daily_overview: A compact yet fruitful Saturday. It was both payday and a day for professional skill enhancement. Yu Xiaowen spent an intense day at the hospital training center, progressing from theory to hands-on practice and then to team-based simulated rescue drills. The ACLS recertification not only reinforced her emergency response skills but also enhanced her leadership and collaboration abilities under high-pressure situations, thereby strengthening her sense of professional security.

events.name: Confirmation of Salary Deposit
events.description: Waking up in the morning, Yu Xiaowen received a text message from the bank, indicating that her salary for the month had been deposited. She habitually opened her mobile banking app to confirm this fixed income, which supports her daily life and investment plans. Seeing the increase in her account balance, she quickly calculated her monthly fixed investments and essential expenses in her mind, feeling reassured.

events.name: ACLS Refresher Theory Course
events.description: In the morning, Yu Xiaowen arrived punctually at the hospital’s skills training center. The senior instructor from the emergency department spent three hours systematically explaining the latest updates to the international first aid guidelines, the core decision-making process of the ACLS resuscitation protocol, and the responsibilities and key points of collaboration for each role in the team (such as the team leader, airway management, chest compressions, medication preparation, etc.). Yu Xiaowen listened attentively, frequently taking notes and comparing the new information with her previous understanding to update her knowledge.

events.name: First Aid Equipment Operation Practice
events.description: After the theoretical session, it was time for the hands-on group practice. Yu Xiaowen and several colleagues formed a team, repeatedly practicing the correct placement and use of an Automated External Defibrillator (AED) on a model, as well as effective techniques for bag-valve-mask ventilation and simulated procedures for establishing advanced airways, such as laryngeal mask insertion. The instructor closely monitored and corrected errors, ensuring that each person’s movements reached a level of muscle memory precision.

events.name: High-intensity team simulation rescue drill
events.description: The afternoon training session reached its climax with a multi-scenario team simulation of emergency resuscitation. Yu Xiaowen’s group was randomly assigned roles and faced preset critical cases such as [sudden ventricular fibrillation] and [pulseless electrical activity]. They needed to quickly assess the situation, clarify roles, communicate efficiently, and execute life-saving measures under high-pressure conditions. During one drill, Yu Xiaowen took on the role of team leader. Although nervous, she made an effort to keep her voice clear and her instructions precise. After the drill, the instructor provided detailed feedback, commending their teamwork while also pointing out that Yu Xiaowen could be more decisive in [timing the defibrillation order]. This realistic, hands-on exercise proved to be immensely beneficial for her.

events.name: Obtain a retraining qualification certificate.
events.description: After all the courses and assessments were completed, Yu Xiaowen and her colleagues successfully received their ACLS recertification certificates, valid for two years. She carefully stored the certificate along with the newly issued guidebook and her own notebook, which was filled with notes. She planned to share some key updates with colleagues in her department who were unable to attend the training once she returned to work the following week.

起始状态.所处地点: At home
起始状态.心情: Anticipation, mingled with a slight nervousness about the full day of training ahead.

结束状态.所处地点: At home
结束状态.心情: Tired but very rewarding, the sense of fulfillment and security brought by the improvement of professional skills.

2025-05.daily_overview: A Mother's Day filled with warmth and a sense of ceremony. The video call with her parents in the evening was the highlight of the day, as her mother's joy and father's smile transcended the screen, soothing Yu Xiaowen's exhaustion from the week. After the call, with a heart full of love, she completed the final review of her apartment application materials, making last-minute preparations for the important submission tomorrow.

events.name: Confirm the delivery of Mother's Day gift.
events.description: In the morning, Yu Xiaowen checked the logistics app and saw that the foot-soaking basin and gardening tools she had bought for her mother were marked as [delivered]. She immediately sent a message on WeChat: [Mom, did you receive the package?] Her mother, Li Xiuying, quickly replied with a voice message, her voice filled with joy: [Yes, I got it! You silly child, always spending money on me! This foot-soaking basin looks so fancy, and the tools are nice and light—perfect for me!] Learning that the gifts had arrived safely and were well-received, Yu Xiaowen smiled.

events.name: Mother's Day Family Video Call
events.description: After returning home from work in the evening, Yu Xiaowen washed away the fatigue of the day, changed into comfortable home clothes, and then solemnly dialed a video call with her parents. On the screen, her mother, Li Xiuying, eagerly picked up the new foot-soaking basin to show her, explaining its various functions in detail, while her father, Yu Jianguo, watched the mother and daughter with a gentle smile. Her mother repeatedly said, "You’re so thoughtful, my daughter," and reminded her to take good care of herself in Zhengzhou, not just focusing on work. Her father also briefly asked about the progress of preparing the materials for the youth apartment application. The family chatted for nearly an hour through the screen, and the warmth of home was transmitted through the electronic waves. Yu Xiaowen felt that all the hard work of the week was worth it, and her heart was filled with a soft, comforting strength.

events.name: Final verification of application materials
events.description: After the video call ended, Yu Xiaowen felt cheerful and calm. She took out all the prepared application materials for the youth apartment from her desk once again and went through them one by one, following the checklist in the application guide from start to finish: photocopy of ID card, photocopy of household registration, original income certificate, salary statement, personal statement... ensuring that each document was complete, clear, and met the requirements. Finally, she neatly stacked all the materials, placed them back into the transparent file folder, and attached a sticky note to the folder that read [Youth Apartment Application - Yu Xiaowen], ready to submit it at work tomorrow.

events.name: Slight weight gain due to holiday gatherings.
events.description: After video chatting with her family in the evening, Yu Xiaowen was in a cheerful mood and celebrated by having some snacks, which led to a slight increase in her weight.

起始状态.所处地点: At home
起始状态.心情: Relax, delighted by Sundays and holidays.

结束状态.所处地点: At home
结束状态.心情: Warmth, happiness, filled with the energy of being loved and supported by family.

2025-05.daily_overview: The start of the new week brought both significant personal progress and unexpected setbacks. In the morning, Yu Xiaowen solemnly submitted her application for the youth apartment, turning days of preparation into a concrete action. In the afternoon, she immersed herself in professional case discussions. However, during her evening Pilates session, she accidentally strained her back, which affected her subsequent exercise plans.

events.name: Submit application materials for youth apartments.
events.description: As soon as she started work in the morning, Yu Xiaowen took the transparent document folder and headed to the hospital's labor union office. The staff member took the materials, skillfully checked and sorted them, submitted the registration in the system, and gave her a receipt, informing her that the process would proceed to the review stage and she would be notified of any updates. Holding the receipt as she walked out of the office, Yu Xiaowen felt a wave of relief, as if she had completed an important milestone task. Now, all that was left was to wait, with hope just ahead.

events.name: Share application progress with best friend.
events.description: After submitting her application, Yu Xiaowen sent a message to her close friend Zhang Jing on WeChat: "Jing, I just submitted my application materials for the youth apartment!" Zhang Jing quickly replied with a "You can do it!" sticker and asked, "How do you feel? If your application is approved, I’ll definitely come help you move!" The two briefly chatted about the conveniences that a successful application would bring to her life (such as shorter commute times and reduced rental pressure). Through the lighthearted conversation, Yu Xiaowen’s nervousness gradually faded, replaced by a shared anticipation for the future.

events.name: Participate in departmental difficult case discussions
events.description: In the afternoon, the department organized a difficult case discussion meeting as planned. Doctors Yu Xiaowen, Wang Fang, Liu Qiang, and others gathered around to analyze an elderly patient with an unclear diagnosis and complex condition. Everyone expressed their opinions, offering possibilities from different specialized perspectives. Yu Xiaowen also shared her insights based on the knowledge she had recently acquired. The department director, Zhang Lei, concluded and summarized the discussion, determining the direction for further examinations. This collision of collective wisdom made Yu Xiaowen deeply appreciate the complexity and allure of clinical work.

events.name: Slight back strain during Pilates training.
events.description: In the evening, Yu Xiaowen attended her usual Pilates small group class as scheduled. However, during a core training exercise, she suffered a minor back muscle strain due to improper posture. She immediately stopped exercising, reported the incident to her coach, and decided to rest for a week, avoiding strenuous activities to facilitate recovery.

起始状态.所处地点: At home
起始状态.心情: Slightly nervous, as the application is about to be submitted.

结束状态.所处地点: At home
结束状态.心情: Calmness tinged with hope, yet slightly uncomfortable due to a back strain.

2025-05.daily_overview: During the waiting period for the application results, life continues to maintain a colorful rhythm. Outside of work, she adds nutrients to her green plants and shares her thoughts over dinner with close friends. However, due to a back strain, she canceled her badminton activities and switched to light walking, demonstrating careful management of the injury.

events.name: Try fertilizing the green plants.
events.description: Yu Xiaowen noticed that the potted pothos and spider plants she kept on the windowsill had been growing somewhat slowly lately. During her lunch break, she searched online and decided to fertilize them. After browsing an e-commerce platform, she ordered a bottle of all-purpose liquid nutrient suitable for foliage plants, planning to dilute it according to the instructions during the next watering session. She looked forward to seeing them regain their vitality.

events.name: Worried about the application results and future plans.
events.description: After submitting the application, it felt like a stone thrown into the calm lake of her heart, sending out ripples that lingered. During work breaks, Yu Xiaowen would occasionally drift into daydreams, imagining how she would decorate her new home if the application succeeded and what her commute would look like. She would also unconsciously log into the query page of Zhengzhou's housing security website. Even though she knew the review wouldn't be that quick, she couldn't resist checking whether the status had been updated. This preoccupation was a sweet anticipation of the positive changes the future might bring.

events.name: Having dinner with my best friend Zhang Jing.
events.description: After work, Yu Xiaowen arranged to meet Zhang Jing at a Yunnan cuisine restaurant in a shopping district they both liked. During the meal, Yu Xiaowen naturally brought up the topic of applying for the youth apartment and mentioned that if successful, she might have to move soon. Zhang Jing immediately showed great support: "Move! You absolutely should! When the time comes, Sun Yue and I will help you pack. We won’t let you get tired." The two also discussed the rough process of moving, the old items that might need to be dealt with, and what would need to be purchased for the new home. The meal was both warm and filled with plans for the future.

events.name: Cancelled badminton due to back strain and changed to walking.
events.description: The scheduled Wednesday badminton activity was canceled due to a back strain. Yu Xiaowen opted for a light evening walk near her home instead, aiming to alleviate the injury and maintain some level of activity.

起始状态.所处地点: At home
起始状态.心情: Calm, with a subtle hint of concern for the unknown outcome.

结束状态.所处地点: At home
结束状态.心情: Relaxation effectively regulates one's mindset through social interaction and light exercise.

date_attribute.weather: There will be showers in the evening.

2025-05.daily_overview: The day was filled with surprises and warmth. During the day, an in-depth conversation with her financial advisor strengthened her understanding of financial matters. In the evening, as the core organizer, she successfully orchestrated a perfect surprise birthday party for her close friend Zhang Jing, together with their friends. From the secret preparations to the moment the surprise was revealed, Yu Xiaowen’s organizational skills and deep appreciation for friendship were fully displayed. The joyful memories they created together further strengthened their bonds.

events.name: Engage in learning discussions with a financial advisor.
events.description: Yu Xiaowen scheduled an online video call with financial advisor Wang Mingyuan. She raised several questions she had noted while studying financial planning courses, such as how to determine whether the stock-bond balance ratio suits her and the significance of dollar-cost averaging in a one-sided declining market. Wang Mingyuan, taking into account her relatively conservative fund portfolio, provided clear and easy-to-understand answers. He also gave a preliminary analysis of how her holdings might perform under different market conditions. This conversation helped her progress from "knowing the what" to "understanding the why."

events.name: Secretly preparing a birthday party
events.description: In the afternoon, Yu Xiaowen and several friends, including her college classmate Sun Yue, gathered early. They rented a community activity room with a kitchen. Yu Xiaowen took charge of cooking, preparing her signature dishes: sweet and sour pork tenderloin and a large bowl of colorful fruit salad. Meanwhile, Sun Yue and the others were responsible for blowing up balloons, hanging colorful streamers, and decorating the photo wall to create a warm and joyful birthday atmosphere. Everyone worked busily while sharing quiet laughs, eagerly anticipating Zhang Jing’s surprised expression in the evening.

events.name: Execute the [Abduction] Plan
events.description: As the appointed time approached, thanks to Xiaowen's intervention, she called Zhang Jing with the excuse, "I got off work early today and found an incredibly delicious dessert shop. Come quickly, I'll send you the location." This successfully lured the unsuspecting birthday girl from her home to the party venue downstairs. Xiaowen met her at the entrance and even deliberately complained, "This place is a bit hard to find," which completely put Zhang Jing at ease.

events.name: Birthday Surprise Party Climax
events.description: When Zhang Jing was led by Yu Xiaowen into the newly decorated activity room, her friends shouted "Happy Birthday" in unison and played the birthday song. Zhang Jing was completely stunned at first, then let out a delighted scream. Everyone laughed as they presented gifts, lit the candles, and shared the delicious dishes prepared by Chef Yu Xiaowen. The gathering was filled with laughter, playful teasing, and heartfelt wishes. Watching her best friend’s happy face, Yu Xiaowen felt an immense sense of satisfaction—creating joy for a friend with her own hands was a happiness in itself.

events.name: Post-party cleanup
events.description: After the party, Yu Xiaowen, Sun Yue, and a few other friends stayed behind. They quickly cleaned up the venue, sorted the garbage, stored the reusable decorations, and completed the handover with the activity room administrator. Although they were a bit tired physically, they were still excited.

events.name: Weight gain due to party eating
events.description: Enjoying delicious food at the birthday party led to a slight increase in weight.

起始状态.所处地点: At home
起始状态.心情: A little excited because I'm about to carry out a secret plan.

结束状态.所处地点: At home
结束状态.心情: Extremely joyful, filled with a sense of accomplishment and the warmth of friendship.

state.今日运动: Light activity (setting up the venue, cleaning)

2025-05.daily_overview: This day was truly a double stroke of luck for Yu Xiaowen, both in her career and personal life. Professionally, she unexpectedly secured a crucial opportunity to participate in a national-level clinical research project, broadening her career path. On the personal front, she received the good news that her application for youth housing had been preliminarily approved, offering hope for resolving her accommodation challenges. With these two blessings arriving at once, she felt a newfound clarity and positive momentum toward the future, all while her back strain was steadily recovering.

events.name: On night duty handling emergency patients
events.description: This is Yu Xiaowen's night shift this week. She independently oversees the ward, handling several newly admitted emergency patients. She quickly completed preliminary diagnoses, issued urgent medical orders, and worked closely with the on-duty nurses to stabilize the patients' conditions. The busyness of the night shift keeps her alert and professional, which is a routine challenge for resident physicians.

events.name: Appointed to participate in a national-level clinical research project
events.description: In the afternoon, Yu Xiaowen was called into the office by Zhang Lei, the head of the department. Director Zhang formally informed her that the department had decided to appoint her as a liaison officer to participate in a national multi-center clinical research project led by Beijing Fuwai Hospital. Director Zhang emphasized the importance of the project for both the department and Yu Xiaowen's personal development, mentioning that she was selected because of her diligent work ethic, ACLS certification, and strong learning ability. Upon hearing this, Yu Xiaowen felt both surprised and honored. She carefully noted down the project name, her preliminary responsibilities (patient screening and data entry), and the upcoming online kick-off meeting time. This was undoubtedly a new beacon on her career path.

events.name: Share Party Joyful Memories
events.description: During the day's break, Yu Xiaowen carefully selected a few of the wonderful photos and short videos taken at last night's birthday party and posted them in the WeChat group she shares with her two close friends, Zhang Jing and Wang Lina. Soon, the group chat became lively. Zhang Jing expressed her gratitude once again, while Wang Lina, who is far away in Shenzhen, enviously said she would definitely join next time. Everyone reminisced about the joyful moments online, further strengthening their friendship in the digital space.

events.name: Received preliminary approval notification for the youth apartment.
events.description: In the evening, Yu Xiaowen's phone vibrated with a text message notification from the housing security system, informing her that her application for the youth apartment had passed the preliminary review and entered the next stage of eligibility verification! She could hardly believe it, reading the message twice to confirm her name and application number. Overwhelmed with joy, she immediately shared the good news with her parents and her best friend, Zhang Jing. This meant that the stable home she had longed for was likely about to become a reality!

events.name: Progress in Recovery from Back Strain
events.description: Yu Xiaowen, please rest and avoid strenuous exercise. The back strain has improved, and the plan is to continue monitoring for recovery.

起始状态.所处地点: Hospital Duty Room
起始状态.心情: Slightly fatigued from the night shift, but still in good spirits.

结束状态.所处地点: At home
结束状态.心情: Overjoyed, filled with hope and motivation, feeling that both career and life have reached an upward turning point.

2025-05.daily_overview: On weekdays, the schedule is tight, balancing career development (research project initiation) with personal life (apartment application progress). The days are busy with work, while evenings are spent handling paperwork at home. The commute is short, allowing for efficient use of time.

events.name: Weekly routine call with mother
events.description: As usual, Yu Xiaowen had a video call with her mother, Li Xiuying, in the evening. She reported to her mother that she had submitted the application materials for the talent apartment and was now waiting for the results. Concerned about the chances of success, her mother advised her to stay calm and not worry too much. At the same time, she began to worry about whether her daughter could handle the move alone if the application was approved, wondering if she should come over from Luoyang to help.

events.name: Receive research project materials
events.description: In the doctor's office, Yu Xiaowen received a complete set of clinical research materials issued by the project lead unit, including a thick research protocol, informed consent form templates, and standard operating procedures. During her lunch break and work intervals in the afternoon, she quickly reviewed the core content, gaining a preliminary understanding of the purpose, inclusion and exclusion criteria, and main procedures of this national multicenter study. She felt the rigor and significance of the task.

events.name: Study the research proposal
events.description: After work, Yu Xiaowen did not go home immediately. Instead, she stayed in the office to read the overall research protocol of the cardiovascular disease cohort study more carefully, attempting to gain a deeper understanding of its research hypotheses, detailed design framework, and specific requirements for participating centers. She found that many details required careful digestion.

events.name: Organize and supplement apartment application materials.
events.description: Returning home on Jingsan Road in the evening, Yu Xiaowen began organizing and scanning supplementary materials based on the email notification from the talent apartment management. She retrieved electronic versions of her salary statements from the past three months and her social security payment records, and also contacted the hospital’s human resources department to obtain a certificate of employment. As she scanned and uploaded the documents, she felt a mix of anticipation and unease.

events.name: Due to the abundance of research materials, I tend to sleep a bit later.
events.description: After finishing the apartment materials, Yu Xiaowen spent some time reading the appendices of some research proposals, which caused her to go to bed about 15 minutes later than planned, but it was still within the range of her initial health condition.

起始状态.所处地点: At home, No. 89 Jingsan Road, Jinshui District, Zhengzhou City, Henan Province
起始状态.心情: Calm, with some expectations for the work of the new week and the apartment application.

结束状态.所处地点: At home, No. 89 Jingsan Road, Jinshui District, Zhengzhou City, Henan Province
结束状态.心情: Fulfilling yet slightly weary, my mind is preoccupied with two things: the research proposal and the apartment application.

state.今日运动: Commuting on foot, no dedicated exercise.

2025-05.daily_overview: A day off, but it was largely taken up by an important work kickoff meeting. During the day, I handled apartment applications and rental contracts, and in the evening, I attended the meeting and followed up afterward—a hectic pace. In between, I had a brief gathering with my close friend Sun Yue, which served as a relaxing break.

events.name: Review the terms of the rental agreement.
events.description: At home in the morning, Yu Xiaowen retrieved the rental contract she had signed with her landlady, Aunt Song. She carefully reviewed the clauses regarding early termination of the lease, including the required notice period, conditions for deposit refund, and responsibilities for maintaining the property's facilities. This thorough preparation was aimed at ensuring she was well-equipped for any necessary communication.

events.name: Upload supplementary materials for the apartment.
events.description: Logging into the online application system for the talent apartments, Yu Xiaowen uploaded the scanned copies of all the supplementary materials she had prepared the night before. After carefully reviewing her personal information and the content she had filled in, she confirmed everything was correct and solemnly clicked the "Submit for Review" button.

events.name: Weekend City Walk with My Best Friend Sun Yue
events.description: In the afternoon, Yu Xiaowen took the subway to Erqi Square to meet her college classmate and close friend, Sun Yue. The two strolled leisurely along Dehua Street, enjoying the comfortable early summer sunlight and gentle breeze. They reminisced about fun times from their university days and delved into their experiences and pressures during hospital rotations and night shifts. Amidst the venting and laughter, they found a sense of relaxation.

events.name: Taste the Time-Honored Braised Noodles
events.description: In the evening, the two had dinner together at a famous old-style braised noodle restaurant near Dehua Street. The steaming hot braised noodles warmed their stomachs as they chatted over the meal, and they agreed to invite other classmates also in Zhengzhou to play badminton together next time. After the meal, they said goodbye at the subway station and headed home separately.

events.name: Attend the online project kick-off meeting
events.description: Shortly after returning home in the evening, Yu Xiaowen attended the national kick-off meeting for a project led by Beijing Fuwai Hospital via video conferencing software. The meeting lasted nearly three hours. She listened attentively to the general manager's explanations of the research plan, division of labor among various centers, data collection standards, and ethical requirements. She took detailed notes of the key points in her notebook, gaining a clear understanding of the project's overall framework.

events.name: Proactively contact the project coordinator.
events.description: As soon as the kick-off meeting ended, Yu Xiaowen wasted no time and immediately reached out to the project coordinator via email. She proactively addressed several detailed questions that her institution might encounter during implementation, such as the integration of the electronic medical record system with the research platform and the enrollment criteria for special cases, aiming to clear any potential obstacles as quickly as possible.

events.name: Study and Research SOP Documents
events.description: In the intervals between waiting to meet Sun Yue and attending the kick-off meeting, Yu Xiaowen focused on studying the project's data collection standard operating procedure documents in her home study. She gained a preliminary understanding of the specific steps and standardized requirements for patient questionnaires, physical examinations, and biological sample processing.

events.name: Drinking milk tea temporarily increases body weight.
events.description: During the City Walk, Yu Xiaowen and Sun Yue tried a newly opened milk tea shop. She ordered a half-sugar milk tea, enjoyed a brief moment of sweet indulgence, which resulted in a slight weight gain.

起始状态.所处地点: At home, No. 89 Jingsan Road, Jinshui District, Zhengzhou City, Henan Province.
起始状态.心情: Relax, looking forward to both the weekend gathering and the evening meeting.

结束状态.所处地点: At home, No. 89 Jingsan Road, Jinshui District, Zhengzhou City, Henan Province
结束状态.心情: A slight weariness after information saturation, but with clearer goals and a sense of responsibility on the shoulders.

state.今日运动: Walking around the city with friends for about 1.5 hours.

2025-05.daily_overview: Another day off, trying to find balance amid the stress. Released emotions through badminton in the morning, and continued delving into research plans in the afternoon and evening. During this time, there was good news about the apartment application, and her best friend's emotional issues also caught her attention.

events.name: Weekend Badminton
events.description: To prevent the anxiety of waiting for the apartment results from affecting her mood, Yu Xiaowen followed her usual routine and went to the badminton court near her workplace in the morning to play with her friend Lin Wei. The exhilarating exercise temporarily allowed her to set aside the worries of work and applications, and after sweating, she felt much more relaxed both physically and mentally.

events.name: Intensive Reading Research and Ethical Documents
events.description: In the afternoon, Yu Xiaowen continued to delve deeper into the clinical research protocol and SOPs in her home study. She carefully reviewed the project’s ethical review approval documents and the regulations related to patient privacy and data security. She took detailed notes, specifically highlighting key and sensitive aspects such as patient screening, informed consent, and adverse event reporting.

events.name: Detecting unusual emotions in a close friend.
events.description: After returning from exercise and resting, Yu Xiaowen chatted with Zhang Jing on WeChat as usual, but noticed that Zhang Jing's replies were brief and her tone was not as lively as usual, even somewhat downcast. This immediately made Yu Xiaowen worry, wondering if Zhang Jing had encountered some trouble.

events.name: Conceive ceramic art pieces
events.description: In the evening, to refresh her mind, Yu Xiaowen flipped through her previous notes on pottery inspiration, once again contemplating the design details of the leaf-textured teacup she had been longing to create. She also briefly listed the glaze combinations she might try during her next visit to the studio—this was her way of unwinding.

events.name: Notification of apartment application passing review has been received.
events.description: In the evening, Yu Xiaowen's phone received notifications from text messages and emails one after another. The management of the talent apartment informed her that her application materials had passed the review, and she had preliminarily obtained the qualification to move in! The email also included a brief explanation of the subsequent signing process. This news instantly filled her with joy, making her feel that she had taken a significant step closer to improving her living environment.

events.name: Due to increased appetite after exercise, I ate a bit more.
events.description: After playing badminton, Yu Xiaowen felt hungry and ate half a bowl more rice than usual during dinner, which led to a slight increase in weight but still within a controllable range.

起始状态.所处地点: At home, No. 89 Jingsan Road, Jinshui District, Zhengzhou City, Henan Province
起始状态.心情: Relatively relaxed, planning to start the day with exercise.

结束状态.所处地点: Home at No. 89 Jingsan Road, Jinshui District, Zhengzhou City, Henan Province
结束状态.心情: Mixed feelings of joy and sorrow, happy for the progress of the apartment, yet worried about the state of my best friend.

date_attribute.weather: Overcast with light rain in the evening.

2025-05.daily_overview: Returning to workdays, juggling multiple tasks simultaneously. Busy during the day with internal communication for research projects and confirming apartment matters, while attempting pottery in the evening only to encounter setbacks. Both work and hobbies face challenges, but important life matters (the apartment) are steadily progressing.

events.name: Compile a list of research questions
events.description: During a break in the morning, Yu Xiaowen systematically organized the questions, key points, and matters that needed to be confirmed with the mentor or project team, which she had noted while studying the research plan and specifications in the past few days, into a clear checklist to prepare for subsequent discussions.

events.name: Proactively invite and show concern for your best friend.
events.description: Thinking about Zhang Jing all the time, Yu Xiaowen took the initiative to send her a message during the lunch break, suggesting they have dinner together after work and hoping to find a relaxed environment to talk face-to-face. Zhang Jing quickly accepted the invitation, which gave her a slight sense of relief.

events.name: Confirm the contract details with the apartment management.
events.description: In the afternoon, Yu Xiaowen took some time to call the staff of the talent apartment management office. She confirmed the official signing date, the required documents such as her ID card and proof of employment, as well as the specific timeline for the move-in process. She then recorded all this information in detail in her phone's calendar.

events.name: Report project status to the department.
events.description: At the internal brief meeting following the departmental morning session, Yu Xiaowen reported to Director Zhang Lei and relevant colleagues, including Li Wei and Wang Fang, on the key messages from the Saturday project kick-off meeting, the core points of the research plan, and the specific tasks to be undertaken by our hospital. She also shared her meeting notes summary, ensuring everyone had a unified understanding of the project.

events.name: Frustration in Pottery Creation
events.description: After work, Yu Xiaowen went to the "Between Clay" pottery studio, eager to bring to life her long-conceived idea of a leaf-textured teacup. However, during the independent throwing process, the clay body consistently turned out uneven. The glaze she attempted to mix and fire resulted in test pieces that were dull and gray, far from the clear and translucent texture she had envisioned, leaving her feeling deeply frustrated.

events.name: Feeling down due to pottery setbacks and eating snacks.
events.description: After failing at pottery, Yu Xiaowen felt down and couldn't resist eating some high-sugar biscuits for comfort when she got home, which led to a slight increase in her weight.

起始状态.所处地点: At home, No. 89 Jingsan Road, Jinshui District, Zhengzhou City, Henan Province
起始状态.心情: Monday workday, slightly busy but with clear goals.

结束状态.所处地点: Home at No. 89 Jingsan Road, Jinshui District, Zhengzhou City, Henan Province
结束状态.心情: Feeling a bit frustrated, the setbacks in pottery and work pressures are intertwined, but fortunately, the apartment matters are going smoothly.

2025-05.daily_overview: Peak stress day. The research project officially launched in the department, leading to a sudden increase in workload. During the day, I handled clinical tasks and participated in the launch meeting, which kept me mentally strained. This resulted in severe insomnia at night for the first time, marking the point where work stress began to visibly affect my physical health.

events.name: Department Project Kick-off Meeting
events.description: In the morning, department director Zhang Lei presided over an internal kick-off meeting for the clinical research project, with all participants, including Teacher Li Wei, Yu Xiaowen, and Wang Fang, in attendance. The meeting provided detailed explanations on the project background, the division of responsibilities within the hospital, the timeline, and the strict ethical review requirements. Yu Xiaowen felt the weight of her responsibilities becoming more tangible.

events.name: Handling patient discharge
events.description: After the meeting, Yu Xiaowen immediately resumed her daily clinical duties. She processed discharge procedures for several patients who met the discharge criteria and efficiently completed the organization, quality control, and archiving of all discharge medical records, ensuring the completeness and standardization of the medical documents.

events.name: Seek guidance from the mentoring teacher.
events.description: Using a bit of time before the lunch break, Yu Xiaowen took the list of questions she had compiled and proactively approached her mentor, Li Wei, to seek advice and discuss several unclear operational details in the research plan and SOP. Drawing on his clinical experience, Li Wei provided detailed answers.

events.name: Participate in the project online Q&A session
events.description: In the afternoon, Yu Xiaowen attended a centralized Q&A session organized by the project team for various centers via an online meeting platform. The meeting further clarified ambiguities in the research design and key points of data collection, and she recorded all the essential information.

events.name: Sort out key points of project execution.
events.description: Before leaving work, Yu Xiaowen carefully studied the project plan in the office, outlining the core tasks, timelines, and departmental resources required for the hospital. She also conducted a preliminary assessment of the challenges in implementation, such as how to efficiently screen patients without disrupting normal medical services.

events.name: First Insomnia Due to Stress
events.description: After returning home in the evening, despite physical exhaustion, her mind remained unusually active, repeatedly replaying the day's meeting discussions, project details, and the literature she needed to read. The intense mental strain led to her first experience of severe difficulty falling asleep, tossing and turning in bed until the early hours of the morning before finally managing to drift off.

events.name: High stress leads to loss of appetite.
events.description: Due to high levels of stress, Yu Xiaowen eats very little for dinner, primarily consuming vegetables and fruits, which has resulted in a slight weight loss.

起始状态.所处地点: Home at No. 89 Jingsan Road, Jinshui District, Zhengzhou City, Henan Province
起始状态.心情: Knowing the heavy workload today, I come with the determination to face the challenges ahead.

结束状态.所处地点: At home, No. 89 Jingsan Road, Jinshui District, Zhengzhou City, Henan Province
结束状态.心情: Exhausted yet unable to relax, with noticeable anxiety and troubled by insomnia.

2025-05.daily_overview: A day of trying to adjust after insomnia. During the day, I officially began screening research patients, and the work proceeded in an orderly manner. However, in the evening, I faced consecutive emotional support tasks (my best friend went through a breakup) and a test of mindset regarding personal finances, leading to significant emotional fluctuations, but I handled them all positively.

events.name: Initiate initial patient screening
events.description: In the morning, Yu Xiaowen logged into the hospital's electronic medical record system, set the time range, and exported a list of basic information for all patients with relevant diseases in her department over the past six months. She then conducted a rapid preliminary screening by comparing the inclusion and exclusion criteria outlined in the research protocol, excluding cases that clearly did not meet the requirements, and compiled a shortlist for detailed review.

events.name: Listening to a Best Friend's Heartbreak
events.description: After work, Yu Xiaowen had originally planned to have dinner with Zhang Jing, but she received an emotionally distraught phone call from Zhang Jing. She immediately rushed to the park near Zhang Jing's home and, under the early summer night sky, patiently listened to her friend recount the details of her breakup. She offered hugs and emotional support, helping Zhang Jing release some of the pent-up emotions.

events.name: Contact the landlord to inform them of the move-out plan.
events.description: After returning home from the park, Yu Xiaowen contacted her landlady, Aunt Song, via WeChat and phone. She politely informed her that she had secured a spot in a youth apartment and planned to move out by the end of May. She also scheduled a time for the final rental inspection. Aunt Song expressed understanding and reminded her to pack her belongings properly.

events.name: First Time Facing a Significant Fund Drawdown
events.description: While checking her mobile financial app before bed, Yu Xiaowen discovered a sharp decline in the A-share market. One of her heavily invested technology-themed funds was estimated to have dropped over 5% in a single day, turning her recent one-month gains into losses. The moment she saw the loss figures, her heart raced, and a wave of anxiety washed over her. The urge to "sell to cut losses" was overwhelming.

events.name: Restrain impulses and uphold discipline.
events.description: She even opened the fund's sell page, but her mind recalled the financial advisor's emphasis on the concept of "long-term investing and avoiding chasing gains and fearing losses." After a few minutes of intense internal struggle and deep breaths, she ultimately closed the trading page without making any moves. This was a real and difficult test of her investment discipline.

events.name: Draft the project implementation plan.
events.description: During the day's work breaks, based on prior organization, Yu Xiaowen began drafting the preliminary plan for project execution, detailing the personnel training, patient screening process, and timeline for each phase.

events.name: Difficulty waking up early due to insomnia.
events.description: Insomnia the night before caused me to get up a bit late today, feeling low in energy, but I persisted and completed my work.

起始状态.所处地点: At home, No. 89 Jingsan Road, Jinshui District, Zhengzhou City, Henan Province
起始状态.心情: Fatigue, lack of sleep leads to poor mental state.

结束状态.所处地点: At home, No. 89 Jingsan Road, Jinshui District, Zhengzhou City, Henan Province
结束状态.心情: Complicated, feeling heartbroken for my best friend, a slight sense of relief for restraining my investment impulses, but overall, it’s been quite draining.

2025-05.daily_overview: Continue to tackle multiple challenges. The issue of insomnia persists, prompting the initiation of an active health adjustment plan. During the day, she delves into screening patients and refining her work. In the evening, financial anxiety drives her to seek professional help, while she also begins making material preparations for planning her new home.

events.name: Develop a health adjustment plan.
events.description: Realizing the issue of consistently poor sleep, Yu Xiaowen jotted down a preliminary coping plan in her phone memo during her lunch break: reading physical books for half an hour before bed, increasing vegetable and fruit intake at dinner, and trying pottery on weekends to relax. She decided to systematically manage her health habits, which had been compromised by stress.

events.name: Conduct a detailed review of the patient's medical records.
events.description: In the afternoon, Yu Xiaowen retrieved the complete electronic records of the initially screened and marked medical files. She meticulously reviewed each case's progress notes, examination results, and medication history, strictly evaluating them against the complex exclusion criteria of the research project. When encountering several borderline cases, she proactively sought advice from her experienced colleague, Liu Qiang.

events.name: Schedule an appointment to communicate with a financial advisor.
events.description: After experiencing yesterday's market fluctuations, Yu Xiaowen sorted out her anxieties and specific questions. Before leaving work, she proactively contacted financial advisor Wang Mingyuan via WeChat, briefly explained the situation, and scheduled a convenient time for a phone call, hoping to gain professional advice to stabilize her emotions.

events.name: Plan Storage for the New Home
events.description: In the evening, to shift her mood and face the upcoming move with positivity, Yu Xiaowen browsed through shopping apps and social media for modern minimalist furniture and smart storage solutions. She saved numerous inspirations for multifunctional furniture suitable for small spaces and began envisioning the arrangement of her new home.

events.name: Discuss the implementation plan with the mentor teacher.
events.description: After sending the drafted project implementation plan to Teacher Li Wei for discussion, Yu Xiaowen revised and refined the plan based on feedback from a clinical practice perspective (such as optimizing the patient screening process to balance efficiency). This resulted in a more detailed initial draft, which is now ready for submission to the department head for review.

events.name: Initiating a Music Topic Gains Resonance
events.description: Before going to bed, to relax, she started a topic in a classical music WeChat group, asking for recommendations on pure music suitable for post-surgery relaxation and sharing her habit of listening to Baroque music. Unexpectedly, it sparked enthusiastic responses from group members, who recommended various pieces. Fellow doctors in the group also shared related research, making her feel an interesting connection between her hobby and her profession.

events.name: Preliminary Assessment of Moving Items
events.description: Before leaving home in the morning, she made a quick inspection around the house and listed large items, books, and collectibles in her phone’s memo app. She conducted a preliminary assessment of what needed to be taken and what could be disposed of, laying the groundwork for the moving preparations.

events.name: Due to health reasons, dinner has been adjusted to be lighter.
events.description: Implementing a health adjustment plan, with dinner primarily consisting of salads and whole grains, resulting in a slight weight loss.

起始状态.所处地点: At home, No. 89 Jingsan Road, Jinshui District, Zhengzhou City, Henan Province
起始状态.心情: There is still a sense of fatigue, but I have decided to take proactive steps to adjust, and my mindset is shifting toward a more positive approach.

结束状态.所处地点: At home, No. 89 Jingsan Road, Jinshui District, Zhengzhou City, Henan Province
结束状态.心情: Torn between anxiety (finances) and anticipation (new home), yet gaining a sense of control through planning and seeking help.

2025-05.daily_overview: On Friday, the work pace slowed down a bit. During the day, I completed the organization of patient lists and had a crucial conversation with my financial advisor, which helped stabilize my investment mindset. In the evening, I had dinner with colleagues to relieve stress and began earnestly planning the layout of my new home, shifting my life’s focus toward a "new beginning."

events.name: Complete the list of potential patients.
events.description: After synthesizing all review and discussion outcomes, Yu Xiaowen compiled the final confirmed information of eligible patients into a clear Excel spreadsheet, including medical record numbers, name abbreviations, primary diagnoses, and key compliance points. This formed a potential list of patients for project enrollment, marking a crucial step in the implementation of the project.

events.name: In-depth communication with a financial advisor.
events.description: At noon, Yu Xiaowen had a phone conversation with her financial advisor, Wang Mingyuan. She detailed her psychological struggles in the face of market volatility and raised specific questions regarding the fundamentals of her held funds, the reasons for market adjustments, and the impact on her long-term goal of saving for a down payment on a house. Wang Mingyuan provided professional answers and reassurance, commended her for not acting impulsively, and advised her to maintain her current allocation while patiently waiting.

events.name: Set the phone to Do Not Disturb mode.
events.description: To improve her sleep, Yu Xiaowen set an automatic "Do Not Disturb" mode on her phone that activates at 11 p.m., forcing herself not to check work-related WeChat messages or emails after that time. This creates a relaxing environment for her brain and marks the first step in implementing her health adjustment plan.

events.name: Dinner and conversation with colleagues
events.description: After work, Yu Xiaowen and her colleague Wang Fang from the same department had dinner together at a small restaurant near the hospital. They shared the pressures and rewards of their recent involvement in research projects, exchanged amusing anecdotes from work, and encouraged each other, easing the week's tension in a relaxed atmosphere.

events.name: Plan the layout sketch for the new home.
events.description: After returning home in the evening, Yu Xiaowen took out the electronic floor plan of the new apartment and sketched a draft by hand on paper. Drawing inspiration from the ideas she had gathered over the past few days, she roughly divided the functional areas of the living room, bedroom, and study. As she contemplated furniture placement and movement flow, she began to envision her future home in vivid detail.

events.name: Organize Music Group Recommended Playlist
events.description: She took some time to compile the songs recommended by everyone in the music group last night into a playlist, saving it in her frequently used music app. She plans to listen to it during future work breaks or leisure time, and this shared enthusiasm from like-minded friends brings her a sense of warmth.

events.name: Due to overeating during gatherings, there is a slight increase in weight.
events.description: During a dinner gathering with colleagues, Yu Xiaowen indulged in delicious food and consumed more calories than usual, resulting in a slight weight gain.

起始状态.所处地点: At home, No. 89 Jingsan Road, Jinshui District, Zhengzhou City, Henan Province
起始状态.心情: Friday is here, bringing a slight sense of relaxation as I look forward to wrapping up this week's tasks.

结束状态.所处地点: At home, No. 89 Jingsan Road, Jinshui District, Zhengzhou City, Henan Province
结束状态.心情: After communication, financial anxiety has eased, and planning for the new home has brought positive anticipation, with a steady and improving mood.

2025-05.daily_overview: On my day off, the theme is "Adjustment and Planning." In the morning, I handled finances to strengthen discipline; in the afternoon, I exercised to relax; and in the evening, I made specific preparations for the upcoming Dragon Boat Festival trip home and the move. The rhythm of life is well-balanced between work and rest.

events.name: Execute financial adjustment
events.description: In the morning, following the consensus reached through communication with her financial advisor, Yu Xiaowen logged into the bank app. She confirmed the existing fund fixed investment settings and used part of this month's surplus funds to make a small additional investment in a fund she is optimistic about in the long term. At the same time, she turned off the app's daily rise and fall push notifications to reduce emotional interference.

events.name: Planning the Soft Furnishing Style for Your New Home
events.description: She began focusing on selecting decorative paintings, green plants, and fabric soft furnishings for her new home, hoping to create a warm and tranquil atmosphere. Drawing inspiration from the style of her favorite ceramic artworks, she decided to use wood tones and off-white as the main color palette, complemented by small accents of low-saturation green or blue. She also saved links to some products for future reference.

events.name: Procure Healthy Office Snacks
events.description: Realizing that she tends to snack on unhealthy foods when stressed, Yu Xiaowen placed an order on an e-commerce platform for a batch of nuts, oatmeal, and dried fruit. She plans to use these healthier snacks as replacements for the high-sugar biscuits she previously kept in the office, aiming to meet her energy needs during work breaks.

events.name: Badminton Activity This Week
events.description: In the afternoon, this week's badminton activity proceeded as usual. Yu Xiaowen and Lin Wei sweated it out on the court, trying out new tactical combinations, and the process was full of fun. After exercising, they felt physically and mentally refreshed, gathering energy for the upcoming work and life.

events.name: Plan the itinerary for returning home during the Dragon Boat Festival.
events.description: Considering that the Dragon Boat Festival is next week, Yu Xiaowen decided to take advantage of the holiday to return to her hometown in Luoyang to visit her parents. She checked the hospital duty roster and confirmed that she would be off on June 1st (the day of the Dragon Boat Festival), so she began planning her trip, including checking the high-speed train schedules from Zhengzhou to Luoyang, and intended to inform her parents in advance.

events.name: Healthy Eating After Exercise
events.description: After playing badminton, Yu Xiaowen chose to have a fruit salad and chicken breast for dinner, and her weight remained stable.

起始状态.所处地点: Home at No. 89 Jingsan Road, Jinshui District, Zhengzhou City, Henan Province
起始状态.心情: The relaxed feeling on a day off, planning to take care of some personal matters.

结束状态.所处地点: Home at No. 89 Jingsan Road, Jinshui District, Zhengzhou City, Henan Province
结束状态.心情: Fulfilling and tranquil, with a clearer arrangement for the future through exercise and planning.

2025-05.daily_overview: Another quiet day off, mainly spent on personal life inventory and planning. In the morning, I worked on a moving shopping list and financial consultations. In the afternoon, I conducted a detailed monthly financial review and budget adjustments, laying the financial groundwork for the new life after moving next month.

events.name: Create a moving shopping list
events.description: Yu Xiaowen compiled the planning from the previous days into a detailed shopping list, including essential large furniture (such as a bed and desk), storage tools, and decorations. She also noted priorities and preliminary budgets, creating a roadmap for post-move purchases.

events.name: Consult a Financial Advisor for Large Expense Planning
events.description: Considering the upcoming large expense of paying the apartment deposit and rent, Yu Xiaowen contacted financial advisor Wang Mingyuan via WeChat to inquire whether temporary adjustments to some fund investments were necessary to optimize cash flow. After learning that her funds were sufficient, Wang Mingyuan advised maintaining the current investment pace and compensating with the surplus after the rent reduction.

events.name: May Personal Financial Review
events.description: In the afternoon, Yu Xiaowen opened the accounting software on her computer and carefully sorted out and recorded all the expenses for May. She found that due to non-essential spending such as a short trip at the beginning of the month, Mother's Day gifts, and birthday presents for close friends, the total expenditure for the month slightly exceeded the initial budget.

events.name: Adjust the June budget plan
events.description: Based on the review of this month and considering the significant reduction in rent after moving into the youth apartment, as well as the potential future allowances from participating in clinical research projects, Yu Xiaowen adjusted the budget for June in her accounting software. She plans to increase the proportion of savings and regular fund investments while controlling daily expenses by reducing non-essential dining out.

events.name: Controlling diet due to financial review.
events.description: After reviewing her progress, Yu Xiaowen decided to implement stricter dietary control, focusing on vegetables for dinner, which led to a slight decrease in her weight.

起始状态.所处地点: No. 89 Jingsan Road, Jinshui District, Zhengzhou City, Henan Province, China
起始状态.心情: Relax and prepare to handle some matters that require calm thinking.

结束状态.所处地点: At home, No. 89 Jingsan Road, Jinshui District, Zhengzhou City, Henan Province
结束状态.心情: Clear thinking, through the organization of finances, brings a greater sense of control and confidence in future life.

state.今日运动: Take a 30-minute walk in the neighborhood in the evening.

2025-05.daily_overview: In the new week, both research work and personal life have entered a phase of in-depth execution. During the day, I engage in preliminary communication with patients, while in the evenings, I simultaneously handle the ongoing emotional needs of friends and personal setbacks in hobbies (retrieving failed pottery works). I have also begun organizing items from my old residence, with the sense of farewell growing stronger.

events.name: Discuss borderline cases with the supervising teacher.
events.description: After the morning ward round, Yu Xiaowen took the initiative to consult her supervising teacher, Li Wei, regarding several borderline cases she encountered while reviewing the patient list. They discussed whether these patients met the study enrollment criteria based on clinical practice, and Li Wei provided professional judgment and recommendations.

events.name: First informal communication with potential patients
events.description: During the lunch break, accompanied by the supervising physician, Yu Xiaowen selected a patient with stable condition and a strong willingness to communicate. For the first time in her role as a research coordinator, she engaged in an informal conversation with the patient's family. She briefly introduced the research project and gained a preliminary understanding of their willingness to participate, laying the groundwork for the subsequent formal informed consent process.

events.name: Accompanying and Listening to a Close Friend
events.description: After work, Yu Xiaowen and Zhang Jing, who was still feeling down, had dinner together at a quiet restaurant. Zhang Jing shared in detail the serious disagreements and repeated arguments she had with her boyfriend over future plans. Throughout the conversation, Yu Xiaowen listened patiently, offering emotional support and comfort to help her friend sort through her feelings, but she refrained from rushing to give advice.

events.name: Retrieve the failed pottery work after firing.
events.description: After the meal, Yu Xiaowen stopped by the pottery studio on her way to pick up the piece she had fired the previous week. She discovered a fine crack on the body of the carefully crafted teacup with leaf textures, and the glaze appeared grayish and dull, falling far short of her expectations. Seeing the failed work, she felt a wave of frustration and disappointment.

events.name: Start organizing items in the old residence.
events.description: After returning home in the evening, Yu Xiaowen began sorting through the medical books, literary readings, as well as the collected zodiac commemorative coins and ceramic artworks on her bookshelf. She categorized the books, deciding which ones to take to her new home and which to donate. While organizing the keepsakes, she couldn’t help but reminisce about the little moments from 2019 when she first started working and lived in this small apartment.

events.name: Due to low mood, I slept a bit later.
events.description: Tidying up her belongings and reflecting on the failed pottery project left Yu Xiaowen with mixed emotions, causing her to fall asleep a little later than planned.

起始状态.所处地点: At home, No. 89 Jingsan Road, Jinshui District, Zhengzhou City, Henan Province
起始状态.心情: The usual busyness of Monday, but gradually adapting to the rhythm of the research project.

结束状态.所处地点: At home, No. 89 Jingsan Road, Jinshui District, Zhengzhou City, Henan Province
结束状态.心情: Feeling slightly down, I am doubly helpless over my friend's sorrow and the failure in pottery making. Sorting through old belongings also brings a faint sense of parting sorrow.

2025-05.daily_overview: On weekdays, I continue to advance the documentation preparation and ethical procedures for the research project. At the same time, I deal with setbacks in pottery, seeking guidance from the teacher. In the evenings, I proceed with sorting items before moving, a process that is tedious but necessary.

events.name: Compile the final list of patient screening.
events.description: In the morning, Yu Xiaowen conducted a final review of the potential patient list that was confirmed after yesterday's discussion to ensure the accuracy of the information. At the same time, she began to consider how to communicate more effectively with the patients on the list and their attending physicians, and prepared a brief introduction to the research project.

events.name: Prepare materials for research ethics review.
events.description: According to the requirements of the hospital ethics committee, Yu Xiaowen organized and began drafting supplementary materials such as the revised version of the research informed consent form and the patient privacy protection measures description, preparing to submit them through the online system to facilitate the formal ethics filing of the project at the hospital.

events.name: Seeking advice from a pottery teacher.
events.description: During the lunch break, unwilling to accept defeat, Yu Xiaowen consulted pottery teacher Zheng Guodong via WeChat about the reasons for the failure of her work and sent him photos. Teacher Zheng analyzed that it might be due to uneven drying of the clay body and improper control of the glaze firing temperature. He encouraged her, saying that failure is common and that she could adjust her techniques and try again next time.

events.name: Continue packing and organizing.
events.description: After work, Yu Xiaowen continued to focus on organizing the clothes, bedding, and other items in the wardrobe and storage room. She categorized them based on the season and frequency of use, packing up clothes that were no longer needed for donation, while carefully folding and placing frequently used items into moving boxes. During the process, she shared her feelings about dealing with old belongings with her close friend Zhang Jing via WeChat.

events.name: Exercise was set aside due to a busy work schedule.
events.description: Today was a busy day at work, so Yu Xiaowen didn't engage in any specific exercise and only relied on walking during her commute.

起始状态.所处地点: No. 89 Jingsan Road, Jinshui District, Zhengzhou City, Henan Province, China
起始状态.心情: Calm, focused on the day's work plan.

结束状态.所处地点: At home, No. 89 Jingsan Road, Jinshui District, Zhengzhou City, Henan Province
结束状态.心情: Feeling somewhat relieved, the teacher's explanation alleviated the frustration from pottery making. Although tidying up items brought some fatigue, there was also a sense of liberation in clearing away the past.

2025-05.daily_overview: A busy Wednesday. During the day, I attended professional training, advanced research on patient communication, and coordinated task assignments among colleagues. In the evening, I handled moving-related finances (transferring rent payments), participated in the last badminton session of May, and learned before bed that I had received an outstanding quarterly performance review, bringing a fulfilling end to a hectic day.

events.name: Participate in hospital professional development training
events.description: At noon, Yu Xiaowen attended a professional training lecture on "Rational Use of Antibiotics" organized by the hospital to update her professional knowledge. After the lecture, she had a brief exchange with Dr. Chen Mingyuan, a colleague from the Department of Stomatology whom she happened to meet, regarding cross-departmental medication issues.

events.name: Prepare for formal communication with the patient.
events.description: Based on the preliminary screening list, Yu Xiaowen selected 2-3 patients with stable conditions and strong willingness to communicate, along with their family members, as the initial formal contacts, in line with the day's ward round arrangements. She also prepared the project introduction manual and a draft of the informed consent form.

events.name: Coordinate the division of labor within the project team.
events.description: In the afternoon, Yu Xiaowen communicated with her colleague Wang Fang, who joined the company in the same year, along with several other resident physicians. They preliminarily assigned the follow-up data recording and follow-up tasks for the research project and established a project collaboration WeChat group to ensure smooth information flow and seamless teamwork within the group.

events.name: Packing Fragile Items and Scheduling Donations
events.description: In the evening, Yu Xiaowen carefully wrapped her beloved pottery pieces, tableware, and other fragile items with bubble wrap and old newspapers, placing them into a cardboard box marked "Fragile." At the same time, she contacted a local charity organization to schedule a pickup time for donated clothes and books over the weekend.

events.name: The last badminton game in May.
events.description: The Wednesday badminton session continues as usual. Yu Xiaowen and Lin Wei summarized their exercise routines for the month, both agreeing that regular physical activity is very helpful for maintaining energy and relieving stress. They happily set a tentative schedule for June's activities before saying goodbye.

events.name: Payment of apartment rent and deposit
events.description: Before going to bed, Yu Xiaowen followed the management's instructions and used her mobile banking app to transfer a total of approximately 6,000 yuan (three months' rent and one month's deposit) from her investment account to the dedicated account provided by the apartment management. This completed the crucial financial step before signing the contract.

events.name: Informed of excellent quarterly performance.
events.description: Before going to bed, Yu Xiaowen received a WeChat message from her mentor, Li Wei, who verbally informed her that her performance evaluation for the previous quarter was excellent, with a bonus of 8,000 yuan, and encouraged her to keep up the good work. Although the bonus would be paid with next month's salary, this recognition brought her comfort and eased much of her fatigue.

events.name: Weight loss after exercise
events.description: Playing badminton burned calories, leading to a slight decrease in body weight.

起始状态.所处地点: At home, No. 89 Jingsan Road, Jinshui District, Zhengzhou City, Henan Province, China
起始状态.心情: Keep a normal mindset, ready to face a busy day.

结束状态.所处地点: At home, No. 89 Jingsan Road, Jinshui District, Zhengzhou City, Henan Province
结束状态.心情: Busy yet fulfilling, feeling refreshed after exercise, and with work being recognized, the mood is joyful.

2025-05.daily_overview: A significant day of transition between work and life. During the day, I tried to engage in deeper communication with patients at the hospital, and in the evening, I officially signed the contract for a youth apartment and received the keys to my new home. At the same time, I began selecting gifts for my parents to bring home for the Dragon Boat Festival, filled with anticipation for the future.

events.name: Conduct in-depth communication with patients regarding research intentions.
events.description: After the morning ward round, Yu Xiaowen had a more in-depth discussion with a patient and their family members who showed strong interest following the initial communication. She explained the research objectives, procedures, potential benefits, and required cooperation in simple, easy-to-understand language, and carefully listened to their concerns and questions.

events.name: Submit Supplementary Materials for Ethical Review
events.description: According to the feedback from the Ethics Committee Secretary, Yu Xiaowen submitted supplementary materials such as the revised informed consent form and privacy protection measures online, and confirmed the successful submission again via phone call, thereby advancing the ethical review process of the project.

events.name: Renew Pilates classes and set new goals.
events.description: During the lunch break, Yu Xiaowen reviewed her Pilates training in May and felt that her posture had improved. After communicating with her coach, she decided to renew her classes for June and set new goals together to further improve anterior pelvic tilt and enhance the fluidity of her movements.

events.name: Formally sign the apartment lease contract
events.description: After work, Yu Xiaowen brought her prepared ID card, work certificate, and other materials to the Youth Apartment Management Office, where she officially signed the lease agreement, paid the deposit and the first month's rent, and received the keys and move-in information for her new apartment. Holding the keys, she genuinely felt that a new chapter of her life was about to begin.

events.name: Selecting Dragon Boat Festival gifts for parents.
events.description: After signing the contract, Yu Xiaowen was in high spirits and made a special trip to the mall to pick out Dragon Boat Festival gifts for her parents in Luoyang. For her tea-loving father, Yu Jianguo, she selected a box of Xinyang Maojian tea, while for her mother, Li Xiuying, she bought a silk scarf and some Zhengzhou-style pastries, imagining the smiles on their faces when they received the gifts.

events.name: Ate a bit more than usual due to the happy dinner.
events.description: After successfully signing the contract, Yu Xiaowen was in a cheerful mood. She enjoyed a delicious meal during dinner, and her weight remained stable.

起始状态.所处地点: At home, No. 89 Jingsan Road, Jinshui District, Zhengzhou City, Henan Province, China.
起始状态.心情: Filled with anticipation, as today is the day to sign the contract.

结束状态.所处地点: At home, No. 89 Jingsan Road, Jinshui District, Zhengzhou City, Henan Province
结束状态.心情: Extremely happy and full of hope, the successful signing and the process of selecting gifts have both brought a strong sense of fulfillment and happiness.

date_attribute.weather: Hot and humid, with thundershowers in the evening.

2025-05.daily_overview: On the last working day before the holiday, I handled multiple wrap-up and handover tasks. I completed the inspection for vacating the old apartment but accidentally stepped on a Lego piece left by my child, causing a minor incident. At work, I arranged holiday shift handovers and confirmed the high school reunion. The health adjustment plan is showing initial results.

events.name: Old Residence Check-out Inspection
events.description: In the morning, the landlady, Auntie Song, came to conduct the move-out inspection. Both parties confirmed that the house facilities were in good condition and settled all utility bills for water, electricity, and gas. Yu Xiaowen returned the keys to the old apartment, while Auntie Song promptly refunded the security deposit via WeChat and wished her a smooth life in her new home.

events.name: Stepping on a LEGO brick and hurting your foot.
events.description: After returning home from work in the evening, Yu Xiaowen was walking in the living room when she accidentally stepped on a stray Lego brick left behind by her close friend Zhang Jing, who had brought her child over to play a few days earlier. The sharp pain caused her to lose her balance and fall instantly. Upon inspection, she found a deep indentation on the sole of her foot, with broken skin and bleeding.

events.name: Handle the wound on your own and share the embarrassing story.
events.description: Enduring the pain, she used the first aid kit at home to clean, disinfect, and bandage the wound. After finishing the treatment, she found the incident both painful and amusing, so she shared this "unexpected misfortune" in the family WeChat group. She posted a picture to complain about the "power" of the remnants left by her friend's child, which sparked concern and teasing from her family.

events.name: Reviewing the Effectiveness of Health Adjustments
events.description: Before going to bed, Yu Xiaowen reviewed the sleep and diet adjustments she had tried over the past week. She felt that setting her phone to Do Not Disturb mode had reduced her pre-sleep anxiety and slightly shortened the time it took to fall asleep. Although work pressure remained, actively managing her health habits made her feel more in control of her life.

events.name: Confirm High School Classmate Reunion Invitation
events.description: Yu Xiaowen received an invitation from her high school friend Chen Siyu on WeChat for a class reunion during the Dragon Boat Festival. She checked her work schedule and travel plans back home, confirmed that she could make it, and began thinking about what updates she could share with her long-unseen old classmates at the gathering.

events.name: Pre-holiday Work Handover
events.description: In the department, Yu Xiaowen completed the handover of the current inpatients' conditions, confirmed the duty roster for the Dragon Boat Festival holiday with her mentor Li Wei and department head Zhang Lei, ensuring seamless continuity of medical work so she could take her leave with peace of mind.

events.name: Reduced activity due to foot injury.
events.description: After the foot injury, Yu Xiaowen reduced her activities and maintained a stable weight.

起始状态.所处地点: No. 89 Jingsan Road, Jinshui District, Zhengzhou City, Henan Province, China
起始状态.心情: The pre-holiday atmosphere feels slightly more relaxed, with plans to wrap up trivial matters and enjoy the festival in peace.

结束状态.所处地点: Home at No. 89 Jingsan Road, Jinshui District, Zhengzhou City, Henan Province
结束状态.心情: The foot injury brings a bit of discomfort, but overall, the mood is steady, and there is a strong anticipation for the holiday.

2025-05.daily_overview: Dragon Boat Festival, enjoying the tranquility of the holiday.
