In the morning, I rested and called my family; in the afternoon, I focused on packing my luggage, making final preparations for the move; in the evening, I watched a movie to completely relax. At the same time, I also took the time to wrap up and summarize this month's research work and spent time with my best friend, whose mood has gradually improved.

events.name: Leisurely rest and relaxation on the morning of the Dragon Boat Festival.
events.description: On the morning of the Dragon Boat Festival, Yu Xiaowen finally got to sleep in. After getting up, she cooked the honey date and red bean paste zongzi she had bought from the supermarket for breakfast, enjoying the unique leisure and tranquility of the holiday as she ate.

events.name: Video chatting with parents to wish each other well-being.
events.description: In the morning, Yu Xiaowen had a video call with her parents in Luoyang, exchanging greetings for a safe and healthy Dragon Boat Festival. She gave her parents a "spoiler" about the gifts she had bought for them, while her parents inquired about her foot injury and reminded her to drive safely on her way home. The deep affection between them was palpable through the screen.

events.name: Pack personal belongings centrally
events.description: In the afternoon, Yu Xiaowen focused on sorting and packing the last batch of her personal belongings at home, mainly books, clothes, and her pottery tools. As she looked at the packed cardboard boxes, the reality of moving became increasingly tangible, filled with both nostalgia for the old home and anticipation for a new life.

events.name: May Work Summary and Planning
events.description: During a break in packing, Yu Xiaowen briefly reviewed the work involved in participating in the clinical research project in May. She summarized the completed tasks, including patient screening, team formation, and material preparation, and preliminarily outlined a specific plan for officially initiating patient enrollment and data entry in June.

events.name: Accompanying a close friend for a walk and heart-to-heart conversation.
events.description: After the rain stopped in the evening, Yu Xiaowen deliberately canceled her other plans to accompany Zhang Jing, whose mood had improved slightly, on a long City Walk. They strolled along the Jinshui River, and Yu Xiaowen patiently guided Zhang Jing to rationally analyze her previous emotional issues from different perspectives, helping her sort out her thoughts and slowly emerge from the gloom.

events.name: Enjoy a Holiday Movie Night
events.description: In the evening, Yu Xiaowen watched a classic art film that she had kept in her collection for a long time at home. While enjoying a fruit salad she made herself, she immersed herself in the story of the movie. This was her exclusive relaxation time after the busy month of May, and she felt peaceful and content.

events.name: Controlling Weight During Festive Seasons
events.description: Despite it being the Dragon Boat Festival, Yu Xiaowen controlled her intake of zongzi and primarily consumed fruit salad, resulting in a slight weight loss to match the final state.

起始状态.所处地点: At home, No. 89 Jingsan Road, Jinshui District, Zhengzhou City, Henan Province
起始状态.心情: The laziness and comfort of a holiday morning, the foot injury is no longer a problem.

结束状态.所处地点: At home, No. 89 Jingsan Road, Jinshui District, Zhengzhou City, Henan Province
结束状态.心情: Calm, fulfilling, and relaxing, the holiday break and interactions with friends and family have effectively alleviated the previous stress.

state.今日运动: In the afternoon, I went for a City Walk with my best friend for about an hour.

2025-06.daily_overview: On Sunday, Yu Xiaowen first learned the new system at the hospital, then returned to her hometown in Luoyang to reunite with her parents, enjoying family time and planning a class reunion. She felt slightly tired due to poor sleep the previous night.

events.name: Learning a new system at the hospital.
events.description: In the morning, Yu Xiaowen went to the office of Zhengzhou Central Hospital to work overtime, focusing on learning the electronic data capture system for clinical research. She entered patient baseline data for the first time and recorded operational issues to seek guidance next week.

events.name: Return to Luoyang to reunite with parents.
events.description: In the afternoon, I drove back to Luoyang. My mother prepared spicy soup and stewed noodles. During the family dinner, we shared work challenges and daily life with close friends, which helped relieve stress.

events.name: Agree to attend the class reunion
events.description: In the evening, I received a WeChat invitation from my high school friend Chen Siyu and happily agreed to meet up tomorrow at the Xigong District Stewed Noodle Restaurant, a place we often visited during our student days.

events.name: Please provide methods to alleviate neck and shoulder strain.
events.description: Before going to bed, experiencing neck and shoulder pain, I consulted colleague Wang Fang via WeChat and was recommended the Tranquil Mind Pilates Studio. I decided to schedule an introductory class after returning to Zhengzhou.

events.name: Temporarily Reading Medical Journals
events.description: Before bed, I browse the latest medical journal articles to learn about new advancements in heart failure treatment, accumulating knowledge for work.

起始状态.所处地点: Inside the rental property at No. 89 Jingsan Road, Jinshui District, Zhengzhou City, Henan Province
起始状态.心情: Calm but slightly tired, looking forward to going home for a reunion.

结束状态.所处地点: Parents' home in Xigong District, Luoyang City, Henan Province
结束状态.心情: Warm, relaxing, with a sense of family belonging.

date_attribute.weather: Sunny turning to cloudy with a gentle breeze in the evening.

2025-06.daily_overview: On the day of the Dragon Boat Festival, Yu Xiaowen made zongzi and enjoyed a reunion dinner at her home in Luoyang. In the afternoon, she gathered with her high school classmates. Due to the festive feasting, she gained a little weight, and later stayed up late chatting.

events.name: Enjoying Family Time During the Dragon Boat Festival
events.description: In the morning, I made zongzi with my parents, enjoyed a sumptuous reunion meal at noon, played chess with my father after the meal, and savored a leisurely afternoon.

events.name: Visiting Aunt Zhao, a good friend of my mother.
events.description: In the afternoon, I accompanied my mother to visit Zhao Xiulan. Auntie Zhao showed concern for Xiaowen's life in Zhengzhou and gave us some local specialties from Luoyang.

events.name: Attending a high school class reunion
events.description: In the evening, I gathered with old classmates Chen Siyu, Liu Yang, and others at a stewed noodle restaurant in Xigong District, sharing our respective career stories and finding comfort in the familiar sounds of our hometown.

events.name: Having a Heart-to-Heart Talk with Parents Late at Night
events.description: Returning home in the evening for a night talk with my parents, I shared stories from the gathering. They showed concern about my relationships and career plans, and we communicated with mutual respect and care.

events.name: Try making sweet and sour pork tenderloin.
events.description: Trying to make sweet and sour pork in the kitchen before bed to prepare lunchboxes for tomorrow's return to Zhengzhou, with my mother guiding the cooking techniques.

起始状态.所处地点: At the parental home in Xigong District, Luoyang City, Henan Province.
起始状态.心情: Relaxed, joyful, and brimming with festive happiness.

结束状态.所处地点: At the parents' home in Xigong District, Luoyang City, Henan Province.
结束状态.心情: Fulfilling, warm, and content with family and friendships.

2025-06.daily_overview: On the last day of the holiday, Yu Xiaowen bid farewell to her parents and returned to Zhengzhou. That night, she took on the night shift and independently handled a critically ill patient. Due to the stress of staying up late and performing emergency care, her weight slightly decreased, but she gained a sense of professional pride.

events.name: Bid farewell to parents and return to Zhengzhou.
events.description: I drove back to Zhengzhou from Luoyang in the morning, listening to classical music on the way and rehearsing the night shift work.

events.name: Requesting Leave from the Pottery Teacher
events.description: On the way, I applied to Teacher Zheng Guodong via WeChat to suspend the pottery class due to the heavy workload of the research project and the need to organize the move. Master Zheng expressed his understanding.

events.name: Night Shift Handover and On-Call Preparation
events.description: Arrived at the hospital in the evening for shift handover, familiarizing myself with the nighttime emergency procedures and the locations of equipment.

events.name: Independently manage critically ill patients with myocardial infarction
events.description: In the early morning, I handled a patient with acute myocardial infarction complicated by shock, decisively directed the rescue efforts, and coordinated with the catheterization lab while seeking instructions from superiors.

events.name: Maintain stable vital signs and communicate with family members.
events.description: Monitor patient data, adjust medications, and communicate clearly to reassure family members.

events.name: Successfully completed patient transfer and handover.
events.description: Assist in transferring the patient to the catheterization lab and hand over to Dr. Li Wei and the catheterization lab team.

events.name: Supplementary Notes on the Course of the Disease and Receiving Affirmation
events.description: Supplementary note on the rescue record: Received praise from Head Nurse Wu Min during the handover, feeling greatly encouraged.

events.name: Temporary Handling of Data Entry Errors
events.description: During the night shift break, an error in research data entry was discovered and promptly corrected, with the issue documented.

起始状态.心情: Relaxed, with a hint of reluctance as the holiday comes to an end.

结束状态.所处地点: Duty Room, Zhengzhou Central Hospital, Henan Province
结束状态.心情: Tired but filled with a sense of accomplishment and professional pride, with increased self-confidence.

2025-06.daily_overview: On the first workday after the holiday, Yu Xiaowen received recognition for presenting a rescue case during the morning meeting and was awarded a quarterly performance bonus. Due to catching up on sleep and feeling uplifted, her weight remained stable.

events.name: The hustle and bustle of the first workday after the holiday.

2025-07.daily_overview: After completing a long day shift, Yu Xiaowen developed symptoms of a cold. Despite this, she persisted in completing her teaching duties and exam preparations, while canceling her Pilates class, demonstrating professionalism and self-discipline. Her physical condition is currently in the early stages of recovery.

events.name: Onset of a Cold and Self-Diagnosis
events.description: After finishing a long day shift from 8 a.m. to 5 p.m., Yu Xiaowen felt a slight dryness and itchiness in her throat, along with chills, while changing clothes at the hospital. In the evening, after returning to her youth apartment, her symptoms worsened, with a runny nose and noticeable fatigue. Drawing on her medical knowledge, she concluded that she had contracted a viral upper respiratory infection due to the temperature difference caused by the air conditioning.

events.name: Guiding Interns in Case Discussions
events.description: In the afternoon in the respiratory medicine ward, Yu Xiaowen guided intern Jiang to report the medical history of an elderly patient with community-acquired pneumonia, analyze the CT and blood test results, and propose a diagnosis and treatment plan. She supplemented the explanation with details on pathogens, stepwise antibiotic therapy, and precautions for medication use in the elderly.

events.name: Exam Preparation Study: First Round of Comprehensive Review
events.description: On Wednesday evening, despite feeling unwell, Yu Xiaowen still watched the fifth week's video of the attending physician exam preparation course at home. The content covered a sprint review and analysis of real exam questions in cardiovascular medicine, marking the beginning of her first round of comprehensive review and note-taking.

events.name: Cancel the Pilates class to rest.
events.description: Due to cold symptoms and lack of energy, Yu Xiaowen canceled her originally scheduled Pilates class on Thursday through a fitness app, opting instead to rest at home, drink more warm water, and supplement with vitamin C.

events.name: Listen to classical music to relax before bed.
events.description: Before going to bed, Yu Xiaowen plays Bach's [Goldberg Variations]. The music helps relax the body and mind, alleviates the discomfort of a cold, and reserves energy for the next day.

起始状态.心情: Calm, slightly tired, ready to face the workday

结束状态.所处地点: Henan Province, Zhengzhou City, Zhongyuan District, Zhengzhou Central Hospital Youth Apartment Bedroom
结束状态.心情: Feeling a bit down due to physical discomfort, but somewhat comforted by the determination to keep studying.

2025-07.daily_overview: On the day of recovering from a cold, Yu Xiaowen rested at home and practiced self-care. She also placed an order for a new phone and studied for an exam in the evening. Due to a last-minute hospital consultation, she went to bed slightly later. Her daily rhythm slowed down as she adjusted for health reasons.

events.name: Self-care for Colds
events.description: Yu Xiaowen canceled her morning run and ensured adequate rest at the youth apartment. She drank plenty of warm water, took vitamin C lozenges and throat lozenges, and monitored her symptoms to ensure there was no worsening of fever.

events.name: Place an order to purchase a new mobile phone.
events.description: After consulting with her elder brother Yu Xiaofeng for advice, Yu Xiaowen placed an order on JD.com to purchase a mid-to-high-end smartphone, opting for credit card installment payments, with the expectation of enhancing her work efficiency.

events.name: Temporary Handling of Hospital Consultation
events.description: In the evening, I received a call from a hospital colleague inquiring about an emergency case. Yu Xiaowen briefly offered advice, which caused a delay in study time.

events.name: Preparation Mock Exercises
events.description: Yu Xiaowen completed a set of simulated comprehensive practice questions for the attending physician exam to assess her learning outcomes. She reviewed the knowledge points of respiratory system diseases based on the incorrect answers and organized an error correction notebook.

events.name: Video call with mother.
events.description: Before going to bed, Yu Xiaowen had a video call with her mother, Li Xiuying, via WeChat to update her on her cold. Her mother advised her to rest more and shared a small tip about using spicy soup as a home remedy.

结束状态.心情: Satisfied with completing shopping and studying, physical symptoms have slightly eased.

2025-07.daily_overview: On Sunday, Yu Xiaowen developed acute gastroenteritis due to improper diet and decided to seek medical treatment. At the same time, she managed to handle air conditioner cleaning, plan for business trips and meetings, and received an invitation to her cousin's wedding. The day was spent navigating health challenges and handling various tasks.

events.name: Sudden acute gastroenteritis
events.description: Due to consuming unclean food, Yu Xiaowen experienced symptoms such as abdominal pain, diarrhea, and nausea at night. She decided to seek medical attention the next day and adjust her diet and rest accordingly.

events.description: Complete a set of high-difficulty comprehensive simulation questions on Sunday evening to practice answering speed and create an error correction notebook.

events.description: Inform Landlady Aunt Song via WeChat about the air conditioner odor issue and request to arrange a professional cleaning.

events.name: The landlord schedules a cleaning service.
events.description: Aunt Song replied in support and immediately scheduled a maintenance technician for an on-site cleaning.

events.name: Communicate with the maintenance technician.
events.description: The master contacted Yu Xiaowen to confirm the time for the next day's on-site cleaning.

events.name: Plan the itinerary for a business trip to Shanghai.
events.description: Upon receiving approval from the hospital, book round-trip high-speed train tickets to Shanghai and hotel accommodations, and complete the conference registration and payment.

events.name: Received an invitation to my cousin's wedding.
events.description: Upon receiving the wedding invitation from my cousin Li Yaqin, I was invited to serve as a bridesmaid. We discussed the process via video call and planned my leave schedule accordingly.

events.name: Light diet and rest
events.description: Throughout the day, focus on consuming plain congee and electrolyte water, avoid greasy foods, and rest at home while monitoring symptoms.

events.description: During the outpatient consultation, the patient's family members were dissatisfied with the treatment plan, creating a tense atmosphere.

events.name: The family members were emotionally agitated.
events.description: The family members were agitated and loudly accused, while Yu Xiaowen remained calm and thought about how to respond.

events.name: Activate the emergency plan
events.description: Listen patiently and call the senior physician Li Wei and head nurse Wu Min to assist in handling the matter.

events.name: Team Collaboration Communication
events.description: Li Wei and Wu Min communicated with the family members, explaining the plan and comforting their emotions to ease the situation.

events.name: Misunderstanding Clarified and Resolved
events.description: After the misunderstanding was clarified, the family members calmed down and expressed their apologies.

events.name: Record and Reflection
events.description: Record adverse events and reflect on the gains and losses in communication and emergency response.

events.name: Briefly confiding with a close girlfriend

2025-08.daily_overview: An ordinary workday. This was Yu Xiaowen's first day off after completing her rotation in the cardiology department. She had no daytime shifts scheduled and spent most of the day at home reviewing professional knowledge. In the evening, she focused on preparing for the upcoming attending physician qualification exam, while also beginning to entertain the idea of taking a vacation to relax. Feeling exhausted from the rotation, she decided to go to bed early to regain her energy.

events.name: Review knowledge of heart failure.
events.description: In the evening, after finishing a day's work, Yu Xiaowen sat down in her home study and opened her cardiology textbook and thick notebook. As a resident physician preparing for the specialist physician exam, she understood the importance of a solid theoretical foundation. She focused her mind, systematically reviewing the pathophysiology of heart failure, common causes, and the processes of cardiac compensation and decompensation. By reflecting on several typical cases she encountered during her rotations, she repeatedly analyzed the logic behind clinical symptoms and signs, deepening her understanding.

events.name: Discovering Holidays and Sparking the Idea of Travel
events.description: After finishing a round of intense review, Yu Xiaowen leaned back in her chair for a short rest, feeling that the exhaustion from the high-intensity rotation in the cardiology department had not completely dissipated. She picked up her phone and habitually checked the shift schedule on the hospital's internal app. When she saw a five-day consecutive holiday in mid-to-late August, a thought naturally came to mind: perhaps she could go out for a while, briefly step away from the hospital environment, and completely relax. This idea filled her with a sense of anticipation.

events.name: Go for an evening walk
events.description: In the evening, Yu Xiaowen followed her usual routine, taking a 30-minute walk in the hospital staff residential area garden and the surrounding streets. As she strolled, she listened to medical podcasts to relax and separate work from life. After the walk, she felt slightly more refreshed.

起始状态.所处地点: In the bedroom of the home at No. 89 Jingsan Road, Jinshui District, Zhengzhou City, Henan Province.
起始状态.心情: Calm, with a slight sense of fatigue after the rotation ends.

结束状态.所处地点: In the bedroom at home, No. 89 Jingsan Road, Jinshui District, Zhengzhou City, Henan Province.
结束状态.心情: Feeling fulfilled, I have a new anticipation for the holidays, and my body feels soothed by going to bed early.

state.今日运动: Take a 30-minute walk in the evening.

date_attribute.weather: Cloudy with showers in the afternoon.

2025-08.daily_overview: A day off. Yu Xiaowen allocated her time to studying, friendship, and personal interests. She continued to deepen her professional knowledge, proactively shared her life with close friends and planned trips, and also drew inspiration for pottery creation through reading and reflection. Due to eye strain from prolonged reading, she decided to go to bed early.

events.name: In-depth study of the guidelines for the diagnosis and treatment of heart failure.
events.description: In the morning, Yu Xiaowen utilized her full break time to continue delving into the topic of heart failure. She focused on studying the latest diagnostic criteria, such as the clinical significance of NYHA functional classification and biomarkers like BNP/NT-proBNP. She reviewed imaging assessment methods like echocardiography and nuclear imaging, and compared and analyzed updates in authoritative domestic and international guidelines for pharmacological and non-pharmacological treatments (such as CRT). She systematically organized the key points into her electronic notes, forming a clear and structured outline.

events.name: Sharing vacation plans with my best friend Zhang Jing.
events.description: During a study break, Yu Xiaowen remembered her travel idea from last night and immediately contacted her close friend Zhang Jing, who was also in Zhengzhou, via WeChat. In a lighthearted tone, she shared the news about the holiday and proposed: [How about a spontaneous short trip?] Zhang Jing quickly replied, agreeing happily. Even through the screen, both could sense their shared longing for a temporary escape from daily routines.

events.name: Seeking Inspiration for Ceramic Art Creation
events.description: In the afternoon shower, Yu Xiaowen stayed indoors. She brewed a cup of tea, sat by the window, and opened the medical humanities book and art critique articles she had been reading recently. The discussions in the book about the resilience of life, illness, and healing, combined with the stories of patients she had witnessed in the hospital, stirred something within her. She took out the inspiration notebook she always carried with her and solemnly wrote down the theme [Fragility and Resilience], jotting down a few keywords and vague images. This was her first step in transforming her professional insights into artistic expression.

events.name: Adjust rest for eye fatigue.
events.description: In the evening, Yu Xiaowen felt her eyes dry and fatigued from prolonged reading, so she decided to pause her studies, perform some eye relaxation exercises, and go to bed early to prevent the discomfort from worsening.

起始状态.所处地点: At home, No. 89 Jingsan Road, Jinshui District, Zhengzhou City, Henan Province
起始状态.心情: Relax and plan to make good use of the day off.

结束状态.所处地点: At home, No. 89 Jingsan Road, Jinshui District, Zhengzhou City, Henan Province
结束状态.心情: Satisfied, having gained rewards in learning, socializing, and thinking, but feeling slightly fatigued.

2025-08.daily_overview: A relaxed Sunday. Yu Xiaowen and her best friend Zhang Jing enjoyed a pleasant City Walk, and the excellent battery life of her new phone kept her in a good mood all day. When she returned home in the evening, she maintained her rational spending habits as always, conducting a monthly financial review and confirming her savings goals. Due to more outdoor activities, her weight fluctuated slightly.

events.name: City Walk with my best friend Zhang Jing on Sunday.
events.description: On a sunny Sunday, Yu Xiaowen and Zhang Jing met up for a City Walk, an activity they both enjoy. They wandered aimlessly along some of the historic streets in the old town of Zhengzhou, using their new phones to capture interesting street scenes, small shops, and the sky. Throughout the day, they frequently used their phones for navigation, scanning QR codes for payments, and replying to work group messages. Even after returning home in the evening, their phones still had plenty of battery left. This completely eliminated Yu Xiaowen's usual [battery anxiety] when going out, making her very satisfied with this purchase.

events.name: Conduct July Monthly Financial Review
events.description: After returning home in the evening, Yu Xiaowen turned on her computer in the study and logged into her frequently used budgeting software and mobile banking app. She skillfully exported and compiled all the income and expense records for July, meticulously categorizing them under headings such as [Dining], [Transportation], [Shopping], [Healthcare], and [Education]. She organized the data into a clear monthly income and expense statement, preparing it for a thorough review and analysis.

events.name: Analyze monthly income and expenses and confirm the savings rate.
events.description: During the review, it was found that in July, due to the purchase of a new mobile phone, spending in the [Electronic Devices] category significantly exceeded the budget, representing an unplanned large expense. However, thanks to deliberate control over other daily expenses (such as entertainment and takeout), the overall monthly savings rate still met the set target. This outcome brought a sigh of relief to Yu Xiaowen, proving that her budget management and rational spending habits are effective.

起始状态.所处地点: At home, No. 89 Jingsan Road, Jinshui District, Zhengzhou City, Henan Province
起始状态.心情: Joy, looking forward to leisure time with good friends.

结束状态.所处地点: At home, No. 89 Jingsan Road, Jinshui District, Zhengzhou City, Henan Province
结束状态.心情: Calm and content, having enjoyed friendships and completed the established financial plans.

2025-08.daily_overview: At the start of the new week, Yu Xiaowen found herself juggling the dual rhythms of work handover and travel preparations. During the day, she organized rotation materials at the hospital to get ready for the summary meeting; in the evenings, she efficiently prepared for the upcoming academic conference in Shanghai. Due to work pressure, her bedtime was slightly later than usual.

events.name: Preparing for the Shanghai Academic Conference
events.description: In the evening, Yu Xiaowen was at home packing for her trip to Shanghai the day after tomorrow to attend the National Cardiology Academic Annual Meeting. She carefully reviewed the conference agenda, placed her notebook, pen, and business card holder into her backpack, and printed out several abstracts of topics she was interested in, along with case outlines that might be useful for discussions. Afterward, she quickly booked round-trip flight tickets and a hotel near the conference center using a mobile app, and then simply packed her change of clothes and toiletries.

events.name: Organize the summary materials for the rotation in the cardiology department.
events.description: On the last day of her rotation, Yu Xiaowen carefully organized her work logs from the past six months, materials from the research projects she participated in, and her personal reflections during work breaks. She categorized and archived these materials, preparing to present them at tomorrow’s departmental summary meeting. This was a systematic review of her learning phase in the cardiology department.

events.name: Temporary overtime for handling medical records.
events.description: Due to a colleague's leave, Yu Xiaowen had to handle a few extra medical records temporarily, which caused her to leave work later than usual and left her feeling slightly annoyed.

起始状态.所处地点: In the bedroom at home, No. 89 Jingsan Road, Jinshui District, Zhengzhou City, Henan Province.
起始状态.心情: Slightly stressed, facing work handover and travel preparation.

结束状态.所处地点: At home, No. 89 Jingsan Road, Jinshui District, Zhengzhou City, Henan Province
结束状态.心情: All set, looking forward to tomorrow's summary meeting and the day after tomorrow's conference, but feeling a bit tired.

2025-08.daily_overview: This was a highlight day in Yu Xiaowen's career development. Receiving public praise from the department head during the cardiology rotation summary meeting brought her a tremendous sense of accomplishment. Inspired by this, she became more proactive in her studies and life planning: dedicating her evenings to a new round of exam preparation, meticulously planning a trip with her close friend, and demonstrating mature financial management skills. Due to the celebrations, her weight increased slightly.

events.name: Review the basic knowledge of coronary heart disease.
events.description: In the evening, still basking in the warmth of the praise she received during the day, Yu Xiaowen devoted herself with renewed vigor to reviewing for the attending physician exam. She opened a new chapter and began systematically studying the pathophysiological basis of coronary heart disease, focusing on the formation and development mechanisms of atherosclerosis, as well as the pathological and clinical distinctions and connections between stable angina and acute coronary syndrome (unstable angina/myocardial infarction).

events.name: Preparing for the badminton activity.
events.description: After work, remembering her badminton appointment with Lin Wei this week, Yu Xiaowen checked her racket and noticed some wear on the strings. She cleaned the racket along with her sportswear and towel, planning to restring it the next day to ensure a smooth experience for the upcoming week's activities.

events.name: Preliminary discussion with Zhang Jing regarding travel intentions.
events.description: During the lunch break, Yu Xiaowen had a WeChat voice call with Zhang Jing to formally discuss their travel plans. Considering factors such as time, distance, and entertainment value, they quickly set their sights on the nearby historical and cultural city of Kaifeng. [It’s just an hour’s drive away, perfect for a short getaway.] Zhang Jing’s words made Yu Xiaowen even more confident in their choice.

events.name: Plan the Kaifeng Trip with Division of Labor
events.description: After the initial idea was settled, the two quickly clarified their division of labor. Yu Xiaowen took on the role of [Travel Planner], responsible for selecting and booking hotels on platforms like Ctrip and Meituan, as well as initially planning a cultural sightseeing route centered around the Qingming Riverside Landscape Garden, Kaifeng Prefecture, and Daxiangguo Temple. Zhang Jing happily accepted the task of [Food Scout], diving into Xiaohongshu and Dianping to explore Kaifeng's specialty snacks and trendy restaurants.

events.name: Summary of Cardiology Rotation and Public Commendation
events.description: At the rotation summary meeting held after the morning handover in the cardiology department, department director Zhang Lei provided a comprehensive review of the work over the past six months. When discussing the performance of the resident physicians, he specifically singled out Yu Xiaowen for praise, fully acknowledging her dedication and outstanding performance in patient management, medical record documentation, research participation, and departmental consultations, describing her as a role model among young doctors. This unexpected public recognition left Yu Xiaowen both surprised and deeply moved.

events.name: Colleagues extend congratulations and share joy with family.
events.description: After the summary meeting, Li Wei, the mentoring teacher, and Wang Fang, a close colleague, among others, congratulated Yu Xiaowen and briefly exchanged their rotation experiences with her. Upon returning home from work, Yu Xiaowen, still unable to calm her excitement, immediately shared the good news with her parents and brother in Luoyang via video call. Seeing the proud smiles and encouraging words from her family on the screen, she felt that all her hard work had been worth it.

events.name: Assess the financial feasibility of the trip.
events.description: After the joy of being praised had subsided a bit, Yu Xiaowen thought of her travel plans. She opened the budgeting app on her phone and carefully reviewed the income and expense summary for July, as well as the spending records from early August, to assess her current financial situation. After confirming that her monthly budget had enough room to support a short trip, she began to estimate the approximate total cost in her mind.

events.name: Conduct preliminary research for the travel budget.
events.description: Yu Xiaowen went online to check the estimated fuel and toll costs for driving from Zhengzhou to Kaifeng. She browsed the prices of several target hotels in Kaifeng, reviewed ticket information for major attractions such as the Qingming Riverside Landscape Garden, and referred to the Dazhong Dianping APP to estimate daily dining expenses and potential souvenir purchases. She recorded the preliminary amounts of the researched expenses in her memo.

events.name: Prepare a Special Budget for Kaifeng Travel
events.description: Based on the survey data, Yu Xiaowen created a new budget project named [Kaifeng Trip] in the expense-tracking app. She set specific spending limits for subcategories such as [Transportation], [Accommodation], [Dining], [Tickets], and [Shopping & Miscellaneous], and calculated the total budget. This draft budget gave her a clear grasp of the travel expenses.

events.name: Celebration Dinner
events.description: In the evening, to celebrate the rotation commendation, Yu Xiaowen and Wang Fang had a gathering near the hospital, enjoying a sumptuous dinner that included her favorite sweet and sour pork tenderloin and stewed noodles. She was in a cheerful mood but consumed a bit more than usual.

起始状态.心情: Calm, with a slight anticipation for the summary meeting.

结束状态.所处地点: No. 89 Jingsan Road, Jinshui District, Zhengzhou City, Henan Province, bedroom in the home.
结束状态.心情: Excited, proud, and full of motivation, professional fulfillment has reached a small peak, but feeling a bit tired due to staying up late.

2025-08.daily_overview: Experienced two different [new beginnings] in a single day. During the lunch break, influenced by a colleague, I tried a light salad and unexpectedly had a great experience, opening up new ideas for healthy eating. After work, I flew to Shanghai to embark on a multi-day national academic conference trip. Due to irregular eating habits during the business trip, my weight increased slightly.

events.name: First attempt at a light salad.
events.description: Before the lunch break, the weather was scorching hot, and both Yu Xiaowen and her colleague Wang Fang had little appetite. Wang Fang suggested trying a newly opened light food restaurant nearby and took the initiative to order a popular chicken breast quinoa salad, offering to share. After the delivery arrived, Yu Xiaowen took a bite with the preconceived notion that [the salad definitely wouldn’t be filling]. To her surprise, she found the ingredients exceptionally fresh—avocado, grilled chicken breast, and mixed greens paired with vinaigrette created a refreshing and layered taste, and it turned out to be quite satisfying.

events.name: The positive afternoon brought by light meals.
events.description: After lunch for the entire afternoon, Yu Xiaowen did not feel the usual drowsiness and gastrointestinal burden that often followed a greasy meal. Instead, she felt lighter in her stomach and more mentally focused, handling medical records and doctor's orders with improved efficiency. Before leaving work, she shared this positive experience with Wang Fang, acknowledging that it had challenged her preconceptions. The two agreed to try similar healthy choices more often in the future.

events.name: Fly to Shanghai to attend an academic conference.
events.description: After work, Yu Xiaowen went directly from the hospital to the airport and took an evening flight to Shanghai. She smoothly arrived at the booked hotel by subway and checked in. Although a bit tired, she first went to the conference center to complete the registration, collected the conference materials and delegate pass, and briefly familiarized herself with the environment of the main venue for the next day. In the evening, she found a small restaurant near the hotel for dinner and previewed the conference agenda.

events.name: Planning for the Chief Physician Qualification Examination
events.description: During a break in her workday, Yu Xiaowen recalled the praise she received yesterday, feeling even more motivated. She used her rest time to start drafting a more specific review plan for the next step of obtaining her attending physician qualification, combining insights from her rotation in cardiology with her long-term goals. She also contemplated how to balance clinical learning and exam preparation during her upcoming rotation in respiratory medicine.

events.name: Airport delays lead to staying up late.
events.description: The flight was slightly delayed due to weather conditions, and the check-in time upon arrival in Shanghai was later than planned, causing Yu Xiaowen to go to bed later than scheduled and feel somewhat fatigued.

起始状态.心情: Looking forward to it, feeling a bit excited about the conference in Shanghai and the unknown experiences ahead.

结束状态.所处地点: Shanghai Pudong New Area Conference Hotel Room
结束状态.心情: Tired yet full of anticipation, the body feels refreshed from light meals, and the mind is prepared for the academic conference.

2025-08.daily_overview: A day fully immersed in an academic atmosphere. Yu Xiaowen attended the National Cardiovascular Annual Conference all day, systematically learning about the latest updates in guidelines and interventional treatment techniques. In the evening, she prepared for her presentation scheduled for the next day. Meanwhile, inspired by her positive experience with light meals the previous day, she began actively exploring information on healthy eating on her phone. Due to information overload from the conference, she felt slightly stressed.

events.name: Participate in the main venue activities of the academic conference
events.description: Yu Xiaowen spent the entire day at the conference center attending the opening ceremony and main venue presentations. She listened attentively to multiple domestic and international experts interpreting and updating the latest guidelines for the diagnosis and treatment of heart failure, taking extensive notes. In the afternoon, she participated in a specialized seminar on interventional therapy for coronary heart disease, documenting key points on the forefront of PCI technology and experiences in managing complications.

events.name: Explore Light Food Choices and Nutritional Knowledge
events.description: During the tea break at the meeting, Yu Xiaowen recalled the positive experience from yesterday's lunch. Using her spare time, she searched for keywords such as [light meal pairing principles] and [sources of high-quality protein] on her phone. She bookmarked several well-reviewed national chain light meal brands (thinking she could order them back in Zhengzhou) and browsed through posts shared by several health bloggers. She began consciously incorporating light meals into her future dietary options.

events.name: Casual exchange with peer experts
events.description: During lunch, Yu Xiaowen coincidentally shared a table with a cardiovascular expert from Beijing. They briefly exchanged clinical cases, and she received some valuable advice, which left her feeling uplifted.

events.name: Slight headache due to stress.
events.description: In the evening, due to a full day of intensive studying, Yu Xiaowen experienced a slight headache and decided to rest early, temporarily suspending some of her preparatory work.

起始状态.所处地点: Conference Hotel Room in Pudong New Area, Shanghai
起始状态.心情: Focus, ready to dive into a day of learning.

结束状态.所处地点: Conference Hotel Room in Pudong New Area, Shanghai
结束状态.心情: Information overload but quite rewarding, feeling a bit nervous about tomorrow's speech, and slightly unwell physically.

2025-08.daily_overview: The final day of the academic conference also marked a successful transition for Yu Xiaowen from being a [listener] to an [active participant]. She delivered a speech at the Young Physicians' Case Discussion Session, received expert feedback, and established connections with her peers. Before returning to Zhengzhou in the evening, she finalized her travel arrangements with Zhang Jing. Her mood was uplifted due to the success of her speech.

events.name: Delivering a speech and exchanging ideas at the Young Physicians Sub-venue
events.description: In the morning, at the sub-venue of [Young Physicians' Career Development and Case Discussions], Yu Xiaowen shared a challenging case she encountered during her rotation in the cardiology department. She clearly outlined the diagnostic and treatment process and raised her own questions. After her presentation, she received detailed feedback and valuable suggestions from the experts present. During the tea break, several young doctors from other hospitals took the initiative to engage with her. They exchanged contact information and agreed to stay in touch for future discussions.

events.name: Participate in thematic meetings and return trip
events.description: In the afternoon, Yu Xiaowen selectively attended a sub-forum on new advances in drug therapy for heart failure. After the closing ceremony of the conference, she bid farewell to several newly acquainted colleagues and then headed to Hongqiao Railway Station to take the evening high-speed train back to Zhengzhou. During the nearly five-hour journey, she organized the thick stack of meeting notes and business cards she had collected, feeling a profound sense of fulfillment from having broadened her horizons.

events.name: Final confirmation of travel details and budget
events.description: On the high-speed train, Yu Xiaowen communicated with Zhang Jing again via WeChat to confirm the successful hotel reservation, the opening hours of the attractions, and the specific daily itinerary. They decided to drive themselves and agreed on the departure time and meeting point. Yu Xiaowen also sent the draft budget to Zhang Jing, and after making minor adjustments to some details, the two reached an agreement. After returning home, Yu Xiaowen officially locked the [Kaifeng Trip] project in the expense-tracking app based on the final budget and reserved the corresponding funds, marking the successful completion of the travel planning phase.

events.name: Establish a study preparation connection with university classmate Sun Yue.
events.description: On the way back, Yu Xiaowen thought of her exam preparation plan and took the initiative to contact her university classmate Sun Yue in Zhengzhou, suggesting they form a study partnership for exam preparation. Sun Yue gladly agreed, and the two arranged to exchange their learning progress on a weekly basis.
