2025-08.daily_overview: An unplanned, heartwarming weekend. Taking advantage of her return trip from a conference, Yu Xiaowen made a special stop in Shenzhen to reunite with her high school classmate Liu Yang, whom she hadn't seen for years. They visited modern tech companies, reminisced about their youthful days, and shared the joys and challenges of working in different industries. Due to the busy schedule, her weight dropped slightly.

events.name: Transfer in Shenzhen to Visit High School Classmates
events.description: After the meeting, Yu Xiaowen did not return directly to Zhengzhou but planned a one-day layover in Shenzhen. She contacted her high school classmate Liu Yang, who works at Tencent, in advance, and he warmly agreed to host her. Early in the morning, she flew from Shanghai to Shenzhen Bao'an Airport.

events.name: Visit Tencent Company and Engage in In-depth Exchange
events.description: Liu Yang picked up Yu Xiaowen at the airport and took her to visit the public areas of Tencent’s Seafront Towers, introducing her to the company’s atmosphere and culture. They had lunch together at the distinctive staff canteen at noon. In the afternoon, the two found a quiet café, where they chatted very congenially—from reminiscing about amusing stories from Luoyang No. 1 High School to sharing their respective experiences, life reflections, and future plans in the high-pressure industries of healthcare and the internet. Yu Xiaowen felt a long-lost sense of understanding and support that transcended professional boundaries.

events.name: Loss of appetite due to hot weather
events.description: The weather in Shenzhen is hot, and Yu Xiaowen has a moderate appetite. She opts for light meals for both lunch and dinner, consuming relatively little.

起始状态.所处地点: Conference Hotel Room in Pudong New Area, Shanghai
起始状态.心情: Relaxed and happy, looking forward to meeting old friends.

结束状态.所处地点: Shenzhen Bao'an District Hotel
结束状态.心情: Warm and fulfilling, friendships were rekindled, new perspectives were gained, and the body felt light due to a light diet.

state.今日运动: Walk around the Tencent campus for approximately 1.5 hours.

2025-08.daily_overview: The end of a journey is a return to daily life. In the morning, I returned from Shenzhen, and in the afternoon and evening, I prepared at home for the upcoming new round of work (rotation in the respiratory department) and long-term goals (exam preparation, pottery). During the daily video call with my parents, a long-term project quietly emerged—transforming professional knowledge into family care.

events.name: Returning to Zhengzhou from Shenzhen
events.description: In the morning, Liu Yang escorted Yu Xiaowen to Bao'an Airport. She took the flight and returned to Zhengzhou smoothly. After several days of traveling, she missed her quiet little home even more.

events.name: Organize the housework and prepare for exams for the new rotation.
events.description: Upon returning home, Yu Xiaowen first thoroughly watered the indoor green plants and placed them in a well-ventilated area with good diffused light, preparing for the potentially busy days ahead. In the evening, she entered a state of exam preparation, but instead of learning new material, she reviewed the marked incorrect questions and difficult notes from the entire [Heart Failure and Coronary Heart Disease] topic review. She consolidated her memory, clarified the knowledge framework, and brought this phase of her review to a close.

events.name: Conceive sketches for a series of ceramic art works.
events.description: During the break, Yu Xiaowen took out her sketchbook and transformed the inspiration of [Fragility and Resilience] recorded on August 2nd into concrete designs. She conceived the preliminary forms of three pieces: one symbolizing [Rebirth] with a sprouting-from-earth shape, one representing [Support] with a twisted column form, and one metaphorically depicting [Healing] with a cracked container. She also noted the dimensions and texture ideas for each.

events.name: The idea of creating a health manual for my parents came to mind.
events.description: During a video call with her parents in Luoyang in the evening, her mother, Li Xiuying, once again brought up her father's blood lipid levels and her own recurring knee issues. Watching the increasing number of white hairs on her parents’ heads through the screen, Yu Xiaowen felt a pang of heartache. It suddenly dawned on her that scattered phone reminders were of limited effect. A clear idea took shape: to use her medical knowledge to create a tailored, illustrated "Senior Health Management Handbook" for her parents, systematizing and visualizing professional care. This idea made her feel that it held profound significance.

events.name: Feeling slightly fatigued due to jet lag.
events.description: After returning from Shenzhen, Yu Xiaowen felt a slight jet lag and decided to go to bed early to adjust.

起始状态.所处地点: Shenzhen Bao'an District Hotel
起始状态.心情: Relax, you're almost home.

结束状态.所处地点: In the bedroom at home, No. 89 Jingsan Road, Jinshui District, Zhengzhou City, Henan Province.
结束状态.心情: Calm, with a faint anticipation for the new week and a deep sense of love and responsibility towards my parents, my body feels slightly fatigued.

2025-08.daily_overview: A day of rapid rhythm shifts. Yu Xiaowen officially began her rotation in the respiratory department, quickly adapting to the new environment and taking on new patients. At the same time, she efficiently handled the monthly financial review, initiated a long-term project to create a health manual for her parents, and tried to cope with new pressures by starting morning runs after work. Due to high stress, her emotions fluctuated slightly.

events.name: Start the rotation in respiratory medicine.
events.description: Yu Xiaowen officially reported to the Respiratory Medicine Department. Guided by her colleague Wang Fang (who was also rotating in the Respiratory Medicine Department), she collected her work badge, familiarized herself with the layout of the wards, offices, and nursing stations, and learned how to use the department-specific electronic medical record system. The supervising physician, Dr. Li Wei (a different person from the supervising physician in the Cardiology Department with the same name), held a meeting with her to clarify her rotation objectives and assigned her the first three patients.

events.name: Take over new patients and write medical records.
events.description: In the afternoon, Yu Xiaowen conducted detailed history-taking and specialized respiratory examinations for the three new patients under her care, including those with community-acquired pneumonia and acute exacerbations of chronic obstructive pulmonary disease. She spent a considerable amount of time meticulously and systematically completing the initial course records for the three admission medical records on the computer, which she then submitted to Teacher Li Wei for review.

events.name: Monthly Financial Review and Planning
events.description: During the lunch break, Yu Xiaowen opened the July fund portfolio report sent by her financial advisor, Wang Mingyuan. She was reassured to see that her conservative allocation had achieved slight growth despite market fluctuations. Considering the news of her rotation bonus just received, she dynamically adjusted her personal budget: increasing this month's entertainment budget (for travel) and transferring most of the bonus into her [Career Development Fund] account.

events.name: Launch the Parent Health Handbook Project
events.description: In the evening, Yu Xiaowen formally presented her idea of creating a health handbook to her parents via video call, receiving their heartfelt support and encouragement. Through in-depth communication, she and her parents initially identified the core sections of the handbook: chronic disease management, medication records, interpretation of medical examination reports, dietary and exercise recommendations, emergency contacts, and more. They also compiled a list of materials that needed to be collected.

events.name: Plan a morning run to cope with new stress.
events.description: On her very first day in the new department, Yu Xiaowen felt a surge of pressure. After work, she decided to try morning running to boost her energy and cope with the stress. She explored nearby routes on a map app and eventually settled on a 3-kilometer circular trail in a community park in Jinshui District. She set her alarm for 6 a.m. the next morning and prepared her workout gear.

events.name: Feeling down due to work pressure.
events.description: In the evening, Yu Xiaowen felt a brief moment of low spirits due to the challenges of the new department, and she relieved it by listening to music.

起始状态.所处地点: At home, No. 89 Jingsan Road, Jinshui District, Zhengzhou City, Henan Province
起始状态.心情: Nervous yet expectant, facing a brand new work environment.

结束状态.所处地点: In the bedroom of the home at No. 89 Jingsan Road, Jinshui District, Zhengzhou City, Henan Province.
结束状态.心情: Busy but orderly, although tired, feeling that many things are moving forward, with some emotional fluctuations.

2025-08.daily_overview: A day of gradually adapting to the rhythm of the respiratory department. Under the guidance of the teaching supervisor, I conducted an in-depth teaching ward round, and my clinical learning is now on track. Outside of work, she continued to dedicate herself to the project of creating a health manual for her parents, starting systematic information collection. Due to the time-consuming nature of gathering information, she felt slightly fatigued.

events.name: First Teaching Ward Round in Respiratory Medicine
events.description: Teacher Li Wei led Yu Xiaowen in conducting the first formal teaching ward round for the patients under her care. The teacher demonstrated specialized consultation techniques in the respiratory department, focusing on key points of lung auscultation (the distinction between dry and moist rales) and differential diagnostic approaches. Additionally, he provided on-site feedback and revisions to the medical records written by Yu Xiaowen, which greatly benefited her.

events.name: Collect parents' health information
events.description: After work, Yu Xiaowen had a long video call with her mother, Li Xiuying. She inquired in detail about her parents' medication usage (including drug names, dosages, and frequency), recent physical examination results (such as blood pressure, lipid levels, blood sugar, etc.), as well as their daily diet and exercise habits. She also asked her mother to take photos of the commonly used medicines at home. Her mother cooperated fully and provided a wealth of information.

events.name: Preparing for the first morning run
events.description: In the evening, Yu Xiaowen picked out comfortable sportswear and running shoes to check, charged her fitness tracker, and downloaded a running log app on her phone. She double-checked the alarm for the next morning, feeling both a bit nervous and somewhat excited about trying this new way to relieve stress.

events.name: Feeling a slight headache due to information overload.
events.description: While collecting health information, there was a lot of data, and Yu Xiaowen felt a slight headache, so she decided to rest early.

起始状态.所处地点: At home in the bedroom, No. 89 Jingsan Road, Jinshui District, Zhengzhou City, Henan Province.
起始状态.心情: Slightly tired, but with a strong desire to learn.

结束状态.所处地点: In the bedroom at home, No. 89 Jingsan Road, Jinshui District, Zhengzhou City, Henan Province.
结束状态.心情: Fulfilling, progress has been made in teaching rounds and family communication, but there is slight physical discomfort.

2025-08.daily_overview: Having experienced the practical test of independently handling patients and responding to emergencies during night shifts, Yu Xiaowen’s growth in the respiratory department is evident. The morning runs she tried brought unexpected boosts in energy and a positive mindset, serving as an effective personalized way to manage stress. The collection of materials for the health manual is also progressing simultaneously.

events.name: Independent Ward Rounds and Patient Management
events.description: Yu Xiaowen independently conducted the morning ward rounds for the patients under her care. Based on changes in their conditions, she adjusted the antibiotic dosages for two patients, issued new examination orders, and transferred one patient with a stable condition to a general ward. In the afternoon, she meticulously documented the progress of all patients' conditions.

events.name: On night duty to handle emergencies.
events.description: During the night shift, an elderly patient suddenly experienced chest tightness and a drop in blood oxygen saturation. Yu Xiaowen quickly arrived on the scene and made a preliminary assessment, identifying it as a mucus blockage. She immediately instructed the nurses to perform suction and adjusted the oxygen therapy parameters. After addressing the situation, she reported the incident to the on-duty senior physician over the phone and followed instructions to complete the necessary examinations. The entire process, though tense, was carried out in an orderly manner.

events.name: First attempt at morning jogging
events.description: At 6 a.m., the alarm rang, and Yu Xiaowen got up as planned, changed into her sports gear, and walked to the community park. She jogged along the 3-kilometer trail, feeling the morning air and the vitality in the park. While running, she focused on her breathing and pace, temporarily forgetting her work worries. After the run, she did some stretching, feeling her body warm up and her mind exceptionally clear.

events.name: Record Positive Experiences of Morning Running
events.description: After her morning jog and during her commute, Yu Xiaowen felt more mentally alert than usual. Looking back on the day after work, she noticed that her focus and patience seemed to have improved. She briefly recorded her feelings in her phone’s memo: [Morning jog attempt successful—mind feels clear, stress somewhat relieved.] She tentatively planned to set Tuesday, Thursday, and Saturday mornings as her regular jogging times, but would adjust flexibly based on her work schedule.

events.name: Collect authoritative materials on health manuals
events.description: Utilizing breaks during work and fragmented time after work, Yu Xiaowen searched for the latest guidelines and reviews on hyperlipidemia and osteoarthritis health care on websites such as the hospital's internal database and the Chinese Medical Association's health science platform. She focused on finding charts and core conclusions suitable for elderly people to understand, and downloaded and saved them.

起始状态.所处地点: In the bedroom of the home at No. 89 Jingsan Road, Jinshui District, Zhengzhou City, Henan Province.
起始状态.心情: Determined to try new changes, with a slight discomfort of waking up early.

结束状态.所处地点: Doctor's Duty Room, Department of Respiratory Medicine, Zhengzhou Central Hospital, Henan Province
结束状态.心情: Tired but full of a sense of accomplishment, having undergone the test of clinical practice, and also having verified the effectiveness of morning runs.

2025-08.daily_overview: A compensatory rest day after night duty. Yu Xiaowen focused on reviewing for the attending physician exam during the day, studying treatment strategies for chronic diseases such as hypertension. In the evening, she carefully arranged a personal music night, thoroughly relaxing her mind and body with classical music and reading. Due to catching up on sleep and relaxation, her weight remained stable.

events.name: Review chronic disease treatment strategies
events.description: After catching up on sleep in the morning, Yu Xiaowen spent the afternoon systematically reviewing treatment strategies for coronary heart disease in her home study. This included the application of various antiplatelet, anticoagulant, and lipid-lowering drugs, as well as the indications for PCI and CABG. Subsequently, she focused on studying the latest edition of the hypertension prevention and treatment guidelines, mastering the blood pressure control targets for different populations and the principles for selecting first-line medications.

events.name: Arrange an Immersive Music Night
events.description: On her way home from work, Yu Xiaowen made a special trip to the supermarket to buy her favorite herbal tea bags and a new "After the Rain Garden" scented candle, preparing for a relaxing evening. After returning home and tidying up a bit, she set up a Bluetooth speaker and some books in a corner of the living room, lit the scented candle, and created a tranquil and cozy atmosphere.

events.name: Enjoy the Moments of Music and Reading
events.description: In the evening, Yu Xiaowen turned off her phone, brewed a cup of herbal tea, and began playing Bach's "Goldberg Variations." As she listened to the music, she flipped through a book on the history of European classical music, completely immersed in the sense of order and tranquility brought by the arts for about an hour and a half. Afterward, she briefly recorded this sense of peace in her diary.

events.name: Incorporate travel inspiration into pottery design concepts.
events.description: During a break in her daytime studies, Yu Xiaowen looked back at the photos from her trip to Kaifeng on her phone. The pavilions and towers of the Qingming Riverside Landscape Garden left a deep impression on her. She took out her sketchbook and attempted to simplify and refine the elements of Song Dynasty architecture, creating several drafts of Song-style tea bowl designs and sketches of the relief patterns on the bowl walls. She pondered how to capture this rustic elegance in clay.

events.name: Due to relaxation and early bedtime.
events.description: After the music night, Yu Xiaowen felt completely relaxed and decided to go to bed early to regain her energy.

起始状态.所处地点: In the bedroom of the home at No. 89 Jingsan Road, Jinshui District, Zhengzhou City, Henan Province.
起始状态.心情: Tired, in need of rest and recovery.

结束状态.所处地点: In the bedroom at home, No. 89 Jingsan Road, Jinshui District, Zhengzhou City, Henan Province.
结束状态.心情: Completely relaxed, the soul is nourished, filled with serene joy.

2025-08.daily_overview: A fulfilling and fruitful Friday. During the day, I worked and studied efficiently, using my new phone to smoothly acquire knowledge. I also checked the vehicle for the upcoming trip. In the evening, during a pottery class, I successfully transformed my travel inspiration into the prototype of a relief-style Song Dynasty tea bowl. The night shift gave her a more intuitive experience of the new department, and receiving the rotation bonus and making a rational allocation of it provided a perfect material conclusion to the efforts of the past half-month. The state strictly matches the end of the healthy state.

events.name: Utilize the New Smartphone for Efficient Learning
events.description: During her break, Yu Xiaowen smoothly opened several professional medical apps on her new phone, watched a demonstration video of a complex PCI surgery, and participated in an online case discussion. The fast loading and smooth operation allowed her to fully focus on the learning content itself, improving the efficiency of utilizing fragmented time.

events.name: Check the vehicle for self-driving trips.
events.description: Thinking about her upcoming trip to Kaifeng next week, Yu Xiaowen used her lunch break to drive her family car to a repair shop near her workplace for a routine pre-trip check (tire pressure, engine oil, brake pads, etc.). After confirming that the car was in good condition, she also prepared a first-aid kit, mineral water, and some snacks in the car.

events.name: Pottery Class Creation: Song Dynasty Style Relief Tea Bowl
events.description: In the evening, Yu Xiaowen arrived at the [Between Clay] pottery studio. She showed her sketches to teacher Zheng Guodong and expressed her idea of creating a relief tea bowl inspired by her trip to Kaifeng. Teacher Zheng affirmed her concept and offered suggestions on the characteristics of Song Dynasty porcelain, relief techniques, and clay shrinkage rates. With the teacher’s on-site guidance and the observation and exchange with her classmate Su Ya, Yu Xiaowen began throwing and shaping the clay, meticulously carving relief patterns of pavilions and towers on the bowl’s surface with tools. Her heart was filled with the satisfaction of transforming her experiences into creative work.

events.name: Direct Experience of Working the Night Shift in the Respiratory Department
events.description: Yu Xiaowen worked her first independent night shift in the respiratory department. With the support of the senior physician on backup duty, she handled emergency admissions during the night and managed sudden changes in the condition of ward patients (such as a drop in blood oxygen saturation). This experience provided her with a more direct and profound understanding of respiratory emergencies.

events.name: Received performance bonus for rotation in the Cardiology Department.
events.description: During a break at work, Yu Xiaowen received a bank deposit notification—an additional performance bonus had been credited. This was a direct material recognition of her outstanding performance during her rotation in the cardiology department, and she felt pleasantly surprised and gratified upon seeing it.

events.name: Plan the use of bonuses
events.description: After work, Yu Xiaowen carefully checked the bonus amount. She decided to deposit the majority (approximately 60%) into a one-year fixed-term account as a [career development reserve] for future plans, such as becoming an attending physician or participating in advanced training. The remaining portion (approximately 40%) was transferred to a current account for recent life improvements, such as purchasing long-desired professional books or skincare products. This allocation decision reflects her prudent financial mindset and long-term planning for development.

events.name: Go for a morning run
events.description: In the early morning, following her new routine, Yu Xiaowen went for a 30-minute jog in the community park, covering a distance of about 3 kilometers. After the run, she felt energetic and clear-minded.

起始状态.所处地点: In the bedroom at home, No. 89 Jingsan Road, Jinshui District, Zhengzhou City, Henan Province.
起始状态.心情: Calm, embracing the last workday before the weekend.

结束状态.所处地点: In the bedroom of the home at No. 89 Jingsan Road, Jinshui District, Zhengzhou City, Henan Province.
结束状态.心情: Fulfilled, content, and full of a sense of accomplishment, with gains in career, interests, finances, and personal growth, maintaining a positive state.

state.今日运动: Run 3 kilometers in the morning and take a 20-minute walk in the evening.

date_attribute.weather: Cloudy with a gentle breeze, temperatures ranging between 25-32 degrees Celsius, providing a relatively comfortable feel.

2025-08.daily_overview: A Fulfilling and Connected Day Off. Yu Xiaowen tried morning jogging to relieve stress, then prepared for a short trip, worked on her pieces at a pottery studio, and shared her career achievements with her parents, blending exercise, art, and family bonds.

events.name: Morning Jog Attempt
events.description: At 06:00 in the morning, Yu Xiaowen got up and tried morning jogging as part of her new routine. She ran about 3 kilometers in a nearby park, which took her 30 minutes. After finishing, she felt mentally refreshed but a bit physically warm, so she decided to adjust the timing for future runs.

events.name: Preparation of Travel Items for Kaifeng Trip
events.description: In the morning, Yu Xiaowen carefully packed the clothes and supplies needed for her trip to Kaifeng at home. Considering the late summer weather, she selected breathable and comfortable clothing, and made sure to check her sunscreen and hat. What she cared about most was her camera equipment; she carefully wiped her mirrorless camera, spare batteries, and memory cards before placing them in a dedicated bag, ensuring they would perfectly capture the moments of her journey. Her ISFJ personality led her to methodically create a checklist and go through it item by item.

events.name: Ceramic Artwork - Air Drying Treatment of Tea Bowl Clay Body
events.description: In the afternoon, Yu Xiaowen went to the community pottery studio. Under the guidance of teacher Zheng Guodong, she carefully placed the clay blank of a tea bowl she had previously made, which incorporated elements of Song Dynasty culture, onto the well-ventilated drying rack in the studio. She meticulously adjusted the position of the clay blank to ensure that all sides were evenly exposed to the air, preventing cracks caused by uneven drying. Her expression was focused and attentive.

events.name: Agree on subsequent firing plans.
events.description: After placing the clay blanks, Yu Xiaowen communicated with Teacher Zheng Guodong about the follow-up arrangements. Given the recent dry and high-temperature weather in Zhengzhou, they estimated that the clay blanks would need about three days to reach the dryness required for bisque firing. The two tentatively agreed that on August 19th or 20th, after Yu Xiaowen finished work, she would come to the studio to inspect the blanks and decide whether to proceed with the bisque firing based on their condition.

events.name: Cardiology Department Bonus Planning Savings
events.description: After returning home in the evening, Yu Xiaowen took out her phone and opened the banking app. Recalling the bonus she had received a few days earlier, she followed her usual rational and long-term financial habits by transferring 60% of the bonus into a previously opened three-year fixed-term savings account, ticking the option for [automatic renewal upon maturity]. The remaining 40% was kept in the current account linked to her salary card, designated as her [self-reward fund] and emergency living expenses. Once the transaction was completed, she felt a sense of control and reassurance about the future.

events.name: Video chatting with parents to share joy.
events.description: In the evening, Yu Xiaowen video-called her parents in Luoyang via WeChat. She shared the good news with them, and her mother, Li Xiuying, was overjoyed, repeatedly saying, "My daughter is amazing!" She also reminded Yu Xiaowen to rest and eat on time, no matter how busy she was. Her father, Yu Jianguo, nodded with a smile, affirming her decision to save most of the money and encouraging her to continue deepening her expertise in her field. The warm support from her family filled her with strength.

events.name: Reading and Relaxing Before Bed
events.description: After the video ended, Yu Xiaowen felt quite content. She brewed a cup of herbal tea, sat down at her desk, and opened the medical humanities book she had been reading recently. She enjoyed about half an hour of quiet reading time, recharging her energy for the next day.

起始状态.所处地点: Rental apartment at No. 89 Jingsan Road, Jinshui District, Zhengzhou City, Henan Province.
起始状态.心情: Calm, with a slight anticipation for the upcoming journey, feeling energized from the morning run.

结束状态.所处地点: Rental apartment at No. 89 Jingsan Road, Jinshui District, Zhengzhou City, Henan Province.
结束状态.心情: Satisfied, content, filled with the warmth of family support and the slight fatigue after exercise.

state.今日运动: Morning jog for 30 minutes, approximately 3 kilometers.

date_attribute.weather: Sunny to cloudy, a bit muggy in the afternoon with temperatures ranging from 26 to 33 degrees.

2025-08.daily_overview: A Day of Creation and Light Socializing. Yu Xiaowen immersed herself in pottery making, starting a new series and sharing her progress with her close friend. Due to poor sleep quality the previous night, she canceled her morning run and opted for extra rest, resulting in a slight weight gain.

events.name: Cancel the morning run and get more rest.
events.description: After waking up in the morning, Yu Xiaowen felt a bit tired, possibly due to a light sleep the night before. She decided to cancel her planned morning run and sleep a little longer to regain her energy, demonstrating timely adjustments for her body.

events.name: Sharing pottery progress with my best friend.
events.description: In the morning, Yu Xiaowen shared with her close friend Zhang Jing on WeChat the process of handling the tea bowl clay blanks from the previous day. She sent several photos of the clay blanks drying on the racks and wrote: [Look, our [travel souvenir] has entered the next stage!] The two agreed that once the tea bowl is finally fired, they must use this cup, which holds their shared memories, to drink tea together.

events.name: New Ceramic Series Creation - [Rebirth]
events.description: In the afternoon, Yu Xiaowen returned to the pottery studio. After completing a functional piece (a tea bowl) inspired by her travels, she decided to embark on a more personal and expressive small series centered around the theme of [Growth and Resilience]. Today, she began working on the first piece, titled [Rebirth]. Using coiling and carving techniques, she focused on shaping the clay to depict a form breaking free from constraints, cracking, and stretching upward from its base. She meticulously worked on the surface texture, repeatedly carving and refining it, striving to capture the rustic quality of soil and the surging vitality within. She spent the entire afternoon immersed in molding and contemplation.

events.name: Reviewing materials for the attending physician examination.
events.description: In the evening, considering that work might be busy next week, Yu Xiaowen took out the review materials for the attending physician exam and spent about an hour on preparatory reading of the chapters related to respiratory medicine, marking several key points and areas of difficulty.

events.name: Listen to classical music to relax.
events.description: Before going to bed, she opened a music app and played an album of Mozart's piano sonatas. The gentle melody flowed through the room, helping to soothe her slightly excited nerves after a creative session and preparing her for sleep.

起始状态.所处地点: Rental apartment at No. 89 Jingsan Road, Jinshui District, Zhengzhou City, Henan Province.
起始状态.心情: Relaxed but slightly tired, brimming with creative desire.

结束状态.所处地点: Rental apartment at No. 89 Jingsan Road, Jinshui District, Zhengzhou City, Henan Province.
结束状态.心情: Fulfilled and serene, satisfied with the day's creative work, with a slight weight gain from rest and diet.

date_attribute.weather: Sunny, with relatively high temperatures ranging from 27 to 34 degrees Celsius, suitable for travel.

2025-08.daily_overview: Busy Work and the Day of Travel Departure. After efficiently completing her morning work, Yu Xiaowen drove with her best friend to Kaifeng in the afternoon to begin a short trip. Due to increased dining out, her weight continued to rise, and she stayed up a bit later at night due to the excitement of the trip.

events.name: Morning Handover and Ward Rounds in the Respiratory Medicine Department
events.description: In the morning, Yu Xiaowen attended the morning handover meeting in the respiratory medicine department on time. Under the guidance of her mentor, Li Wei, she reviewed the overnight conditions of the patients under her care, completed the routine morning ward rounds, and documented any changes in their conditions.

events.name: Receive notification of difficult case discussion.
events.description: After the morning ward round, the teaching secretary of the department posted a notice in the work group: a department-wide difficult case discussion will be held on Thursday afternoon this week. The case involves an elderly patient with [fever and pulmonary shadow under investigation]. Upon seeing this, Yu Xiaowen immediately realized that this was the first typical complex case she would encounter after rotating to the respiratory medicine department, making it a rare learning opportunity. She silently noted down the patient's bed number and name.

events.name: Road trip to Kaifeng with my best friend.
events.description: In the afternoon, Yu Xiaowen and Zhang Jing met near the hospital. Zhang Jing drove, and the two of them set off on a self-drive trip to Kaifeng. Along the way, they played relaxing music and chatted about work and interesting moments in their lives. The journey of over an hour passed by quickly. The excitement of the trip began to ease the fatigue from the morning's work.

events.name: Check into a Song Dynasty-style inn.
events.description: Upon arriving in Kaifeng, they checked into a pre-booked inn with a Song Dynasty-style courtyard. After completing the check-in process and settling their luggage, the two found a small eatery near the inn and had a simple meal of local specialty lamb flatbread, which served as their first meal of the trip.

events.name: Preliminary Exploration of Case Data
events.description: While resting at the inn in the evening, Yu Xiaowen used her mobile phone to log into the hospital's internal network (though the connection was relatively slow). She briefly reviewed the admission records and key imaging reports (chest CT) of the patient to be discussed, gaining a preliminary understanding of the condition. She noted several key questions in her phone's memo, planning to delve deeper into them after returning to Zhengzhou.

events.name: Trying Street Food at the Night Market
events.description: Before going to bed, the two of them visited a nearby night market. Yu Xiaowen tried almond tea and sugar cakes, enjoying the culinary delights of the trip, but she was aware that eating out might lead to weight gain.

起始状态.所处地点: Rental apartment at No. 89 Jingsan Road, Jinshui District, Zhengzhou City, Henan Province.
起始状态.心情: With a slight weariness from waking up early on Monday morning, but filled with anticipation for the upcoming journey.

结束状态.所处地点: A Song-style inn in Kaifeng City, Henan Province
结束状态.心情: Relaxed and joyful, completely immersed in the freshness of travel, with a slight weight gain from dining out.

date_attribute.weather: Clear and sunny, with temperatures ranging from 28 to 35 degrees Celsius. Please take precautions against heatstroke while touring the park.

2025-08.daily_overview: Immersion in History and Cultural Exchange Day. Full-day tour of the Qingming Riverside Landscape Garden, experiencing Song Dynasty culture and watching breathtaking performances. The journey involved a lot of walking, but the food was abundant, keeping the weight high, and the nights were slightly late due to excitement.

events.name: Full-day tour of the Qingming Riverside Landscape Garden
events.description: The two of them entered the Qingming Riverside Landscape Garden early in the morning. Yu Xiaowen was captivated by the exquisitely crafted antique-style architecture and the NPCs dressed in Song Dynasty attire, feeling as if she had traveled back a thousand years in time. With her mirrorless camera in hand, she captured scenes such as the Rainbow Bridge, wine shops, and escort agencies, as well as snapshots of folk acrobatics and performances depicting the Bian River's water transport. Her sense of social responsibility and personal growth orientation led her to not only enjoy the spectacle but also ponder the possible forms of ancient urban life and healthcare.

events.name: Try local cuisine for lunch in the park.
events.description: At noon, in a restaurant within the park, Yu Xiaowen tried Kaifeng soup dumplings and carp with noodles, enjoying traditional delicacies, but noticed that the food was somewhat greasy.

events.name: Watch the performance of "The Great Song Dynasty: Dream of the Eastern Capital"
events.description: In the evening, they watched the park's famous live water show, "The Great Song Dynasty: Splendid Dreams of the Eastern Capital." The magnificent lighting, grand music, exquisite dancing, and the scene of warhorses galloping through the water deeply impressed Yu Xiaowen. She put down her camera and immersed herself in this artistic feast, experiencing the perfect blend of history and technology.

events.name: Confirm the condition of the clay body with the pottery teacher.
events.description: After the performance ended, on her way back to the inn, Yu Xiaowen remembered the clay bowl. She sent a WeChat message to Teacher Zheng Guodong: [Hello, Teacher Zheng. How is the drying of my clay bowl going? Originally scheduled for inspection tomorrow—is the timing still suitable?] Soon, she received a reply: [It’s drying well. Come and check it out tomorrow evening.] This put her mind at ease.

起始状态.所处地点: A Song-style inn in Kaifeng City, Henan Province
起始状态.心情: Excited, full of curiosity for exploration.

结束状态.所处地点: A Song-style inn in Kaifeng City, Henan Province.
结束状态.心情: Satisfied and amazed, the mind brims with visual and cultural information absorbed during the day, while body weight remains high due to abundant meals.

state.今日运动: Walking tour, high level of physical activity

date_attribute.weather: Sunny with occasional clouds, breezy in the evening, temperature 27-33 degrees.

2025-08.daily_overview: Ancient Capital's Tranquility and Return to Workdays. In the morning, visited Daxiangguo Temple to find inner peace; in the afternoon, strolled along the ancient city walls and had a deep conversation with a close friend. Returned alone to Zhengzhou in the evening to prepare for work. The extensive walking caused slight discomfort in my feet, and my weight decreased slightly due to adjustments.

events.name: Visited the Daxiangguo Temple in the morning.
events.description: In the morning, the two of them headed to the Daxiangguo Temple. As they stepped into the temple grounds, the hustle and bustle of the outside world was instantly shut out. Although Yu Xiaowen was not a religious believer, the serene and solemn atmosphere of the temple brought her a sense of inner peace. She quietly observed the ancient architecture, stone inscriptions, and devout worshippers, letting her thoughts drift away as she savored this rare moment of tranquility.

events.name: Strolling along the Ancient City Wall of Kaifeng
events.description: In the afternoon, they ascended the ancient city wall of Kaifeng. The broad top of the wall became an excellent place for a stroll. As the sun set in the west, golden sunlight bathed the ancient bricks and stones, creating a magnificent scene. Yu Xiaowen captured the beauty of the sunset over the ancient city wall with her camera.

events.name: In-depth conversation with a close friend on the city wall.
events.description: While strolling along the city wall, the two naturally began a deep conversation. They discussed their future career plans, views on marriage and family, as well as the loneliness and rewards of striving in a big city. Yu Xiaowen confided in Zhang Jing about the pressures of being a resident doctor and her anxiety over the attending physician exam. She also shared her idea of creating a health handbook for her parents, which received Zhang Jing’s strong support and resonated deeply with her. This conversation deepened their friendship even further.

events.name: End the trip early and return to Zhengzhou.
events.description: Considering the need to prepare for an important discussion on challenging cases scheduled for tomorrow, and given that she was traveling using her compensatory leave, Yu Xiaowen decided to drive back to Zhengzhou alone in the evening, allowing Zhang Jing to enjoy an extra half-day of leisure. She bid farewell to Zhang Jing beneath the city wall, expressing gratitude for the perfect trip, and then embarked on her journey home.

events.name: Preliminary preparation of the case after returning home.
events.description: Returning home in Zhengzhou close to ten in the evening, though somewhat tired, Yu Xiaowen still turned on her computer. She officially logged into the hospital's electronic medical record system, thoroughly reviewed the complete medical history, test results, and imaging data of the patient scheduled for discussion on Thursday, made preliminary notes, and gained a more concrete understanding of the topic of [fever accompanied by lung shadows].

events.name: Initial Sensation of Slight Discomfort in the Feet
events.description: Before going to bed, Yu Xiaowen felt a slight ache in the soles of her feet, likely caused by excessive walking over the past few days. She decided to reduce her physical activity the next day and observe the situation.

起始状态.所处地点: A Song-style inn in Kaifeng City, Henan Province
起始状态.心情: Peaceful, with a hint of reluctance as the journey is about to end.

结束状态.所处地点: Rental apartment at No. 89 Jingsan Road, Jinshui District, Zhengzhou City, Henan Province.
结束状态.心情: Slightly fatigued but with a clear mind, a sense of responsibility has overshadowed the lingering excitement of leisure, shifting into work mode, with initial signs of foot discomfort emerging.

state.今日运动: Walking, with a high activity level, approximately 15,000 steps.

date_attribute.weather: Cloudy with scattered short showers, temperature 26-32 degrees Celsius.

2025-08.daily_overview: Highlights of Clinical Thinking and Study Day. Yu Xiaowen proposed valuable insights during the difficult case discussion and received recognition. After the meeting, she proactively sought advice and organized her notes. Due to discomfort in her feet, she canceled her evening run, and her weight slightly decreased due to dietary control.

events.name: Morning Review and Case Analysis
events.description: In the morning, Yu Xiaowen woke up a bit earlier than usual. Before heading to work, she used the time to further organize her thoughts on the differential diagnosis for that challenging case, drawing on the materials she had reviewed the night before. She focused on considering the possibilities of atypical pathogen infections (such as Legionella and Mycoplasma) and pulmonary involvement in connective tissue diseases (like vasculitis), and she drafted a few key points for discussion.

events.name: Daily Work in the Department of Respiratory Medicine
events.description: In the morning, she completed her routine tasks as usual, including ward rounds, handling medical orders, and writing progress notes, but she kept thinking about the discussion meeting scheduled for the afternoon.

events.name: Speech at the Difficult Case Discussion Meeting
events.description: In the afternoon, the difficult case discussion meeting for the entire respiratory medicine department was held as scheduled. After analyses by several senior doctors, Yu Xiaowen mustered the courage to propose a differential diagnostic approach based on her prior preparation: [Apart from common community-acquired pneumonia, should we consider atypical pathogen infections, or the possibility of pulmonary manifestations of connective tissue disease?] She briefly elaborated on the imaging characteristics and the additional tests required. Her presentation was logically clear and sparked the interest of several deputy chief physicians present, leading to further discussion.

events.name: After the meeting, seek guidance from the mentoring teacher.
events.description: After the discussion session, Yu Xiaowen proactively approached her mentor, Li Wei. She candidly shared her uncertainties during her presentation and asked for guidance on understanding the viewpoints raised by other experts at the meeting. Li Wei first acknowledged her strengths of [being thoughtful and open-minded], then provided a detailed explanation of the significance and complexity of interpreting the relevant antibody spectrum tests related to her proposed direction of [connective tissue diseases]. He also suggested that she could focus on investigating atypical pathogens, which greatly benefited Yu Xiaowen.

events.name: Cancel the evening run.
events.description: Due to noticeable soreness in her feet, Yu Xiaowen decided to cancel her planned evening run and opted for light stretching at home to avoid exacerbating the discomfort.

events.name: Organize study notes and maintain continuous focus.
events.description: After getting off work in the evening, Yu Xiaowen meticulously compiled the key points from today’s discussion, her own remarks, the teacher’s comments, and the insightful perspectives of other doctors into electronic study notes. She also made a special note to continuously follow up on the patient’s subsequent etiological test results and diagnostic changes, and to consider how to apply this step-by-step differential diagnostic thinking to future patients.

events.name: Brief call with mother
events.description: Before going to bed, she sent a voice message to her mother, simply saying, "Mom, we discussed cases in the department today, and I spoke up. I feel like I learned a lot." Her mother quickly replied with a voice message full of encouragement: "My daughter is the best, but don’t overwork yourself."

起始状态.所处地点: Rental apartment at No. 89 Jingsan Road, Jinshui District, Zhengzhou City, Henan Province.
起始状态.心情: Feeling a mix of nervousness and anticipation, as if facing a minor test, with increased discomfort in the feet.

结束状态.所处地点: Rental apartment at No. 89 Jingsan Road, Jinshui District, Zhengzhou City, Henan Province.
结束状态.心情: Filled with a sense of achievement and strong motivation for learning, confidence has improved, but slight discomfort in the feet brings minor inconvenience.

date_attribute.weather: Showers turning to overcast, with temperatures ranging from 25 to 30 degrees, and the weather is cool.

2025-08.daily_overview: A day of routine work and exam preparation accumulation. Handled medical tasks, focused on life's pleasures, and engaged in technological discussions with my elder brother. Due to persistent foot discomfort, exercise was reduced, and weight remained stable. Stayed up slightly later at night due to exam preparation stress.

events.name: Routine Clinical Work
events.description: On Friday's workday, Yu Xiaowen was primarily occupied with handling routine treatments for the patients under her care, processing discharges, and completing admission assessments and medical record documentation for newly admitted patients. The work pace was fast-paced yet orderly.

events.name: Pay attention to concert information.
events.description: During her lunch break, she browsed her phone and saw a message shared by a group member in a WeChat group for classical music enthusiasts: Zhengzhou Grand Theatre would host a chamber music concert featuring German and Austrian composers in early next month. Yu Xiaowen, who has always enjoyed listening to European classical music, noted down this information, added it to her schedule memo, and planned to check if she had time to buy tickets over the weekend.

events.name: Sharing the new phone experience with my brother.
events.description: On her way home from work, she remembered the new phone she had recently bought with part of her bonus. She sent a WeChat message to her brother Yu Xiaofeng in Shenzhen, sharing the smooth user experience and significantly improved battery life of her new phone. Her brother quickly replied from a technical perspective, recommending a few useful productivity apps and tips for battery maintenance. As usual, the siblings engaged in a brief [tech exchange].

events.name: Simple Dinner and Rest
events.description: At home in the evening, she was too lazy to cook, so she ordered a light salad for delivery. After trying light meals, she found them refreshing and easy on the stomach, especially suitable for nights after work shifts or when she didn’t feel like cooking. After dinner, she watched some TV series to relax her mind.

events.name: The pressure of exam preparation leads to staying up late for studying.
events.description: Before going to bed, Yu Xiaowen felt the increasing pressure of the attending physician exam and decided to review the study materials for a while longer, focusing on her weak knowledge points for a last-minute cram session, which resulted in a delayed bedtime.

起始状态.所处地点: Rental apartment at No. 89 Jingsan Road, Jinshui District, Zhengzhou City, Henan Province.
起始状态.心情: Peacefulness, the slight sense of relaxation brought by Friday, but the pressure of exam preparation looms faintly.

结束状态.所处地点: Rental apartment at No. 89 Jingsan Road, Jinshui District, Zhengzhou City, Henan Province.
结束状态.心情: Relaxed yet slightly anxious, enjoying the leisurely pre-weekend atmosphere, with stable weight.

date_attribute.weather: Cloudy with occasional drizzle, temperature 24-29°C, suitable for organizing at home.

2025-08.daily_overview: Travel Memory Archiving and Emotional Revisit Day. Organized photos and notes from the Kaifeng trip, sharing the joy with parents and close friends. Cancelled badminton due to foot discomfort, and weight slightly decreased due to dietary control.

events.name: Export and Organize Travel Photos
events.description: In the morning, Yu Xiaowen transferred a large number of photos and videos taken in Kaifeng from her phone and camera to her computer. She created folders based on themes such as [Qingming Riverside Landscape Garden], [Daxiangguo Temple], [Ancient City Wall], and [Night Market Food], and organized the files accordingly. She also selected over a dozen of her favorite photos and used simple editing software to adjust the colors and crop the images, making the scenes more prominent.

events.name: Write a travel diary
events.description: In the afternoon, she brewed a cup of tea and took out her diary. She meticulously recorded the sights and interesting experiences from her travels, especially the inspiration she gained from the in-depth conversation with Zhang Jing on the city wall. She reflected in detail on how this [rewarding trip] effectively relieved her stress and gave her a more concrete understanding of balancing [hard work and a fulfilling life]. She also wrote down her anticipation for future explorations of the areas around Zhengzhou and even more distant places.

events.name: Sharing travel memories with a close friend.
events.description: In the afternoon, she connected via WeChat video with Zhang Jing, who had already returned to Zhengzhou. As they looked through the neatly organized photos on the computer, they reminisced about the wonderful moments from their journey, laughing continuously. Both felt that this trip was not only enjoyable but also deepened their friendship and understanding of each other. They agreed to plan more such [micro-trips] in the future.

events.name: Cancel the badminton activity
events.description: Due to the noticeable symptoms of plantar fasciitis, Yu Xiaowen informed her badminton partner Lin Wei to cancel tonight's badminton activity, opting instead to rest at home and apply ice to her foot.

events.name: Browse Future Short Trip Destinations
events.description: Inspired by the success of this trip, Yu Xiaowen began browsing online in the evening for destinations suitable for weekend getaways around Zhengzhou or elsewhere in Henan Province, such as Yuntai Mountain, Laojun Mountain, and the Longmen Grottoes in Luoyang (although she had visited before, she wanted to revisit them from a new perspective). She started gathering preliminary information on transportation and accommodation, planting the seeds for future travels.

events.name: Organizing travel souvenirs
events.description: She carefully placed a few small souvenirs from her trip, such as an antique-style sachet and a postcard of an ancient city wall, next to the bookshelf and photo wall at home, allowing these tangible items to remind her of those wonderful memories.

events.name: Video call with parents to share travel experiences.
events.description: At eight o'clock in the evening, she connected with her parents in Luoyang via WeChat video call as scheduled. Like telling a story, she shared her experiences at the Qingming Riverside Landscape Garden, the tranquility of the Daxiangguo Temple, the sunset over the ancient city walls, and the liveliness of the night market, while also showcasing carefully selected photos. Her parents listened with great interest—her mother inquired about what they had eaten, while her father engaged in a discussion with her about the history and culture of the Song Dynasty. The video call was filled with warm laughter and cheerful conversation.

events.name: Send photos and capture moments.
events.description: After the video call ended, Yu Xiaowen sent a few photos that particularly interested her parents, especially the sunset over the ancient city wall, to them individually via WeChat. Then, she briefly noted in her phone's memo: [Tonight, I shared my trip to Kaifeng with my parents via video call. They were very happy, and so was I. Family is always the warmest harbor.]

起始状态.所处地点: Rental apartment at No. 89 Jingsan Road, Jinshui District, Zhengzhou City, Henan Province.
起始状态.心情: Leisure, with the pleasure of sorting through memories, the discomfort in the feet persists.

结束状态.所处地点: Rental apartment at No. 89 Jingsan Road, Jinshui District, Zhengzhou City, Henan Province.
结束状态.心情: Warm and content, deeply nourished by family love and friendship, with a slight decrease in weight due to controlled diet.

date_attribute.weather: Cloudy, with temperatures ranging from 25 to 31 degrees Celsius.

2025-08.daily_overview: Family Care Project Launch and Creative Endurance Day. Officially launched the Parent Health Handbook project, establishing the framework and writing content. Progressed on the new pottery series. Diagnosed with plantar fasciitis symptoms, began self-treatment, weight slightly increased due to reduced activity.

events.name: Construct the framework for a parental health handbook.
events.description: In the morning, Yu Xiaowen opened her computer in the study and officially began the [Parents' Health Handbook] project. Drawing on the previously collected health examination reports and communication notes of her parents, she designed a highly detailed framework for the electronic handbook, including modules such as: [Basic Information], [Health Analysis and Risk Alerts], [Daily/Weekly Medication Log], [Diet and Nutrition Recommendations (with modified recipes for spicy soup and stewed noodles)], [Suitable Exercise Plans (with illustrative diagrams)], [Family First Aid Knowledge], [Mental Health Tips], [Regular Check-ups and Follow-up Reminders], and [Emergency Contacts and Medical Guidance]. She started by filling in her parents' basic information and key health examination data.

events.name: Write health analyses for each parent separately.
events.description: In the afternoon, utilizing her medical knowledge, she began drafting detailed health analysis reports for her father and mother respectively. For her father Yu Jianguo’s hypertension and hyperlipidemia, she emphasized the importance of a low-salt, low-fat diet and regular blood pressure monitoring, recommending walking and Tai Chi as preferred forms of exercise. For her mother Li Xiuying’s low bone density and occasional joint discomfort, she focused on formulating a calcium-supplementing dietary plan and outlining the key steps for daily knee care exercises.

events.name: Second Piece of the Pottery Creation Series - [Support]
events.description: In the evening, she went to the pottery studio to continue her [Growth and Resilience] series. Today, she started working on the second piece, [Support]. She shaped several clay columns that leaned against and bent into each other, forming a structure that appeared fragile yet was actually stable. On the surface, she used her hands to create uneven textures, attempting to convey the inner, mutually supportive strength of individuals under pressure.

events.name: Self-Management of Plantar Fasciitis
events.description: In the evening, the stinging sensation in the sole of her foot intensified, and Yu Xiaowen self-diagnosed it as mild plantar fasciitis. She applied an ice pack to the sole of her foot for 10 minutes, performed rolling massage with a tennis ball, recorded the symptoms, and planned to reduce exercise for the week.

events.name: Reading medical literature before bedtime.
events.description: To improve the section on nutrition for the elderly in the health manual, she logged into CNKI, reviewed several review articles on dietary guidelines for the elderly, and made excerpts to incorporate into the manual.

起始状态.所处地点: Rental apartment at No. 89 Jingsan Road, Jinshui District, Zhengzhou City, Henan Province.
起始状态.心情: Focus, with a sense of mission to start a meaningful project, foot discomfort is evident.

结束状态.所处地点: Rental apartment at No. 89 Jingsan Road, Jinshui District, Zhengzhou City, Henan Province.
结束状态.心情: Fulfilling and rewarding, it not only advanced the creative work but also accomplished practical tasks for my parents, yet the discomfort in my feet brought distress.

date_attribute.weather: Sunny, with temperatures rising to 26-33 degrees Celsius.

2025-08.daily_overview: A Day of Positive Coping Under Exam Preparation Pressure. Faced with exam stress, proactively contacted comrades to tackle it together. The health manual compilation has entered a concrete stage, and communication with the financial advisor was conducted. Foot discomfort has eased, and weight remains stable.

events.name: Routine Work in the Department of Respiratory Medicine
events.description: Monday was busy as usual. Yu Xiaowen completed her rounds, admitted new patients, and handled various paperwork. She noticed that two of the patients under her care had improved and were scheduled to be discharged the next day, which brought her a small sense of relief.

events.name: Simulated Self-Assessment for the Chief Physician Examination
events.description: During the fragmented time of her lunch break, she took out her phone and completed an online simulation test for cardiovascular medicine. The results were not ideal, revealing several gaps in her knowledge. She carefully recorded the incorrect questions and corresponding key points in the exam preparation notebook she carried with her.

events.name: Proactively initiate study group invitations for exam preparation.
events.description: In the afternoon, feeling the mounting pressure of exam preparation, Yu Xiaowen proactively reached out via WeChat to her university classmate and close friend Sun Yue, who is also in Zhengzhou and currently works at the Provincial Children's Hospital. She suggested: "I feel like the exam is getting closer, and I'm not being very efficient with my self-study. The pressure is really getting to me. How about we plan an offline study session this weekend? We can help each other with questions and share some study methods." Sun Yue responded quickly, and the two agreed to meet at the city library for self-study on Saturday afternoon, followed by a discussion at a nearby café.

events.name: Specific Content of the Health Handbook
events.description: In the evening, she continued refining the health manual. Today’s focus was on [practicality]. She translated complex medical advice into plain language that parents could easily understand, designed a user-friendly daily medication record template with illustrations for her father, and created simple step-by-step diagrams for her mother’s [knee care exercises]. She also tailored recipe suggestions to her parents’ tastes, specifically designing modified versions of [low-salt spicy soup] and [high-calcium stewed noodles].

events.name: Monthly Communication for Financial Advisors
events.description: Before going to bed, she received a WeChat message from her financial advisor, Wang Mingyuan, which was a brief report on the performance of fund investments in August and a market outlook. After a quick glance, Yu Xiaowen replied to express her gratitude and asked two questions about whether it was suitable to slightly increase positions in the current market. Wang Mingyuan promised to provide a detailed response later.

events.name: Foot Care and Relaxation
events.description: Due to plantar fasciitis, she applied ice and massaged again before bed, feeling some relief from the symptoms.

起始状态.所处地点: Rental apartment at No. 89 Jingsan Road, Jinshui District, Zhengzhou City, Henan Province.
起始状态.心情: Monday blues, feeling slightly fatigued, initial signs of exam preparation stress, foot discomfort alleviated.

结束状态.所处地点: Rental apartment at No. 89 Jingsan Road, Jinshui District, Zhengzhou City, Henan Province.
结束状态.心情: The pressure is still there, but because actions have been taken (inviting mutual assistance) and the manual writing has been advanced, it feels manageable and organized.

2025-08.daily_overview: New Phase of Ceramic Works and Manual Design Day. Inspecting tea bowl clay blanks and finalizing biscuit firing, designing the layout for the health manual. Persistent foot discomfort, limited movement, slight weight gain.

events.name: Check the drying degree of the tea bowl clay blank.
events.description: After work, Yu Xiaowen went straight to the pottery studio. Accompanied by Teacher Zheng Guodong, she carefully examined the tea bowl clay body that had been air-drying for several days. She gently tapped the body with her knuckles, producing a crisp sound, and then touched the surface with her fingertips, confirming that it was completely dry, hard, and free of any fine cracks. Teacher Zheng also nodded in agreement: "It's thoroughly dry and in excellent condition, ready for the bisque firing in the kiln."

events.name: Agree on the bisque firing and subsequent processes.
events.description: After confirming everything was correct, the two of them discussed the next steps: Teacher Zheng would place the batch of dried clay pieces (including Yu Xiaowen's tea bowl) into the electric kiln for bisque firing (at approximately 800 degrees Celsius) to produce the bisque ware. Once the bisque firing was completed, Yu Xiaowen would return to inspect the results, and together they would select suitable glazes for glazing and the final glaze firing (at a higher temperature). Teacher Zheng marked her tea bowl piece and prepared it for the next kiln load.

events.name: Design the layout of a health manual.
events.description: After returning home in the evening, Yu Xiaowen began designing the layout of the health manual on her computer. Considering her parents' age, she set the main text font to a larger size of Microsoft YaHei and increased the line spacing. She planned clear styles for chapter headings and reserved spaces for image frames for the previously drawn medication charts, care exercise diagrams, recipes, and other materials. She hoped the final manual would not only be practical in content but also appear clean, refreshing, and easy to read.

events.name: Retrieve authoritative health science popularization materials
events.description: In order to supplement the most authoritative information for the chapters [Common Knowledge of First Aid at Home] and [Seasonal Disease Prevention] in the manual, she utilized her hospital access to log into websites such as the Chinese Medical Association Health Science Popularization Platform. She searched for and downloaded several popular science articles on cardiopulmonary resuscitation (CPR), the Heimlich maneuver, and the prevention of colds and gastroenteritis in the elderly during the transition from summer to autumn, intending to extract the key points.

events.name: Try taking a walk in the evening.
events.description: Due to discomfort in her feet, she tried taking short evening walks, about 15 minutes each, to maintain light activity while avoiding aggravating the pain.

起始状态.所处地点: Rental apartment at No. 89 Jingsan Road, Jinshui District, Zhengzhou City, Henan Province.
起始状态.心情: Calm, with a little anticipation for the progress in pottery, and a slight discomfort in the feet.

结束状态.所处地点: Rental apartment at No. 89 Jingsan Road, Jinshui District, Zhengzhou City, Henan Province.
结束状态.心情: Comforted and filled with anticipation (regarding the plain firing), while feeling reassured by the progress in the manual design, and experiencing a slight weight gain due to reduced activity.

2025-08.daily_overview: Routine work and exam preparation accumulation day. Handled patient admissions and discharges, created study flashcards, and compiled materials for health manuals. Cancelled badminton due to foot discomfort, weight remained stable.

events.name: Handling Patient Discharge and Admission
events.description: Today's work focus was on handling patient admissions and discharges. She completed discharge procedures for two patients in stable condition, providing detailed instructions on post-discharge care and follow-up appointments. In the afternoon, she admitted a new patient with community-acquired pneumonia, completing the consultation, physical examination, and initial admission record documentation.

events.name: Create study flashcards for exam preparation.
events.description: During lunch breaks and after work, Yu Xiaowen compiled key points, difficult areas, and easily confused knowledge from her recent review—such as the mechanisms and side effects of different antihypertensive drugs and the comparative imaging features of various types of pneumonia—into digital flashcards. She plans to review them repeatedly on her phone app during commutes or while waiting in line to reinforce her memory.

events.name: Compile Health Manual Materials
events.description: In the evening, she compiled all the materials she had collected from various sources over the past few days—literature summaries, authoritative popular science articles, her own analysis reports, and charts she had drawn—into a folder on her computer named [Parent Health Handbook Material Library]. Following the chapter plan of the handbook, she preliminarily categorized and organized these materials, marking which ones were finished products and which ones still required further processing or simplification.

events.name: Cancel the badminton activity.
events.description: Due to incomplete recovery from plantar fasciitis, she informed Lin Wei again to cancel tonight's badminton activity, opting instead to rest at home and do some light stretching.

events.name: I accidentally ran into my high school classmate Liu Yang.
events.description: On her way home from work, she unexpectedly ran into her high school classmate Liu Yang, who was in town for a business trip to Zhengzhou near the hospital. They had a brief conversation and made plans to meet up over the weekend, adding a pleasant social experience to her day.

2025-08.daily_overview: In-depth Exam Preparation Mutual Assistance and Efficient Collaboration Day. The offline mutual assistance session with Sun Yue achieved good results, sharing stress and knowledge. Foot discomfort has eased; attempted evening jogging for adjustment, with a slight decrease in weight.

events.name: Conduct a video discussion with Sun Yue for exam preparation.
events.description: During a break in the morning workday, Yu Xiaowen and Sun Yue scheduled a brief video call to have a preliminary discussion on a few challenging review topics (primarily in cardiovascular pharmacology) that both found difficult, setting the stage for their offline meeting in the afternoon.

events.name: The City Library focuses on self-study.
events.description: In the afternoon, the two met as scheduled in the self-study area of the Zhengzhou City Library. They found a quiet corner, each took out their study materials, and began a focused two-hour study session. The library provided an excellent learning atmosphere, and Yu Xiaowen efficiently completed a systematic review of one chapter, while also noting down new questions that arose.

events.name: In-depth communication and mutual encouragement at the cafe.
events.description: After the self-study session, they moved to a quiet café near the library. Here, the atmosphere became more relaxed. They exchanged their review notes and flashcards, delving into questions that had arisen during the afternoon study session, helping each other find answers. More importantly, they shared their anxieties about exam preparation, struggles with insomnia, and effective relaxation methods (such as the meditation app recommended by Sun Yue). This camaraderie-like understanding and encouragement made Yu Xiaowen feel that the pressure of exam preparation was shared, and her motivation grew even stronger.

events.name: Summarize Gains and Agree on Follow-up Actions
events.description: After the exchange, the two of them walked together toward the subway station. Along the way, they summarized the gains from this mutual aid session, both feeling that it was much more efficient than studying alone and that it broadened their perspectives. They agreed that, depending on their respective schedules, they could organize one or two more such activities before the exam. Yu Xiaowen felt a warmth of being supported and understood.

events.name: Consult with the supervising teacher for recommendations on the health manual.
events.description: In the evening, remembering the matter of the health manual, she sought advice from her mentor Li Wei on the work WeChat (Li Wei was senior in years and known for his meticulousness and responsibility). She asked: [Teacher Li, if I want to create a family health manual for elderly individuals without a medical background, what aspects do you think should be emphasized the most? How can medical terminology be explained in a way they can understand?] Li Wei replied shortly after, offering several very pertinent suggestions, such as [emergency steps must include illustrations], [medication records are more important than theory], and [replace terms like 'low salt' with phrases like 'use one less spoonful of salt when cooking'], which greatly inspired her.

events.name: Try adjusting your routine with an evening jog.
events.description: Due to the alleviation of foot symptoms, she attempted a 20-minute evening jog covering approximately 2 kilometers to test her physical response. Feeling well, she decided to gradually resume exercise.

起始状态.心情: Looking forward to the afternoon support group, hoping it will alleviate exam preparation anxiety and relieve foot discomfort.

结束状态.所处地点: Rental apartment at No. 89 Jingsan Road, Jinshui District, Zhengzhou City, Henan Province.
