2025-08.daily_overview: End-of-Month Social Warm-up and Project Integration Day. Organize exam preparation achievements, pay for department team-building activities, integrate the first draft of the health manual, and communicate needs with mother. Foot basically recovered, weight stable.

events.name: Organize the gains from the study support group.
events.description: In the morning, Yu Xiaowen added the new knowledge points she had gained from her conversation with Sun Yue the day before, effective review methods (such as the mind mapping technique Sun Yue used), and the name of that meditation app to her study plan and notebook. She sent Sun Yue a thank-you WeChat message: [I gained so much yesterday—I feel like I can keep going for another month!]

events.name: Pay the departmental team building fee
events.description: During the lunch break, the department group chat sent out the final notice and payment QR code for the team-building escape room activity. Yu Xiaowen transferred her share of the fee via WeChat. Afterward, she confirmed the meeting location for after work tomorrow afternoon with her close colleagues, Wang Fang, Liu Qiang, and others, in a smaller group chat. They decided to carpool together to the venue.

events.name: Preliminary Draft of Integrated Health Manual Content
events.description: Tonight is the last workday evening of the week, and Yu Xiaowen decided to focus on advancing the health manual. She opened the document software and began to preliminarily fill in and connect all the previously categorized materials—literature summaries, simplified popular science articles, her own analyses, drawn charts, and suggestions received from her teacher—according to the framework. As she integrated the content, she made revisions to unify the language and make it more approachable, leaving clear markers in places where illustrations were needed. The manual began to transform from a [pile of materials] into a [first draft].

events.name: Video call with mother to gather requirements.
events.description: During the integration process, she suddenly realized that she should align more closely with her parents' actual usage habits. So she made a video call to her mother, Li Xiuying, and casually asked, "Mom, do you usually record Dad's blood pressure in a notebook or on your phone? If I were to create a health booklet for you, would you prefer more text or more illustrations? What are the things about health that you find most confusing right now?" Her mother became quite engaged by the questions and chattered on about many things, such as "the text on the phone is too small to read," "your dad always forgets when his last check-up was," and "not knowing whether to use hot or cold compresses for knee pain." Yu Xiaowen took note of each point—these were the key areas that needed optimization and clarification in the booklet.

events.name: Foot Care Consolidation
events.description: Before going to bed, she performed another foot massage and felt that the symptoms had largely disappeared, preparing to gradually resume normal exercise.

起始状态.所处地点: Rental apartment at No. 89 Jingsan Road, Jinshui District, Zhengzhou City, Henan Province
起始状态.心情: Peacefulness, the relaxed feeling of Friday faintly emerges, and the feet have basically recovered.

结束状态.所处地点: Rental apartment at No. 89 Jingsan Road, Jinshui District, Zhengzhou City, Henan Province.
结束状态.心情: The satisfaction of making progress. Through communication with my mother, the direction of the handbook project has become clearer, and it is no longer just a shot in the dark.

date_attribute.weather: Sunny, with temperatures rising to 26-32 degrees Celsius.

2025-08.daily_overview: Team Building and Social Day. In the morning, we summarized insights on light meals, and in the afternoon, we participated in a department-wide escape room team-building activity, successfully collaborating and deepening friendships. Foot recovery is progressing well, and weight has slightly increased due to dining out.

events.name: Reviewing the Insights from Light Meal Practices
events.description: After getting up in the morning, Yu Xiaowen looked in the mirror and felt that her complexion was quite good. Reflecting on her conscious effort over the past month to incorporate light meals into two or three meals a week, she noticed a clear improvement in her digestion and a reduction in drowsiness during her afternoon shifts. She shared this positive change with her close friend Zhang Jing via WeChat: [I’ve found that occasionally eating light meals like salads really makes the body feel lighter, unlike before when it always felt heavy.] Zhang Jing replied, expressing her interest in giving it a try.

events.name: Go to the escape room venue.
events.description: After work in the afternoon, Yu Xiaowen gathered with several colleagues, including Wang Fang and Liu Qiang, at the hospital entrance. Together, they took a taxi to the escape room venue in the city center. Along the way, everyone chatted and laughed, speculating about what kind of puzzles the "Pandemic Crisis" theme might involve, creating a relaxed and lively atmosphere.

events.name: Participate in the [Pandemic Crisis] Escape Room
events.description: Upon arriving at the venue, all colleagues participating in the team-building activity listened to the rules and were divided into groups. Yu Xiaowen, Wang Fang, Liu Qiang, and their mentor Li Wei were assigned to the same group. They entered a simulated abandoned hospital scenario. During the intense and thrilling time-limited puzzle-solving process, Yu Xiaowen played a crucial role in solving puzzles related to [reasoning about pathogen transmission routes] and [calculating key antibiotic ratios], leveraging her medical expertise. She collaborated effectively with her colleagues, communicating smoothly, and ultimately succeeded in [preparing the antidote] and [escaping] the escape room.

events.name: Gathering and Communication After Team Building
events.description: After the game, everyone was in high spirits and went to a nearby restaurant for a meal together. Yu Xiaowen sat with Wang Fang and Liu Qiang, chatting and reviewing the fun moments and thrilling experiences from the game while eating. They discussed which puzzles were cleverly designed and which parts relied on the team's sudden inspiration. Teacher Li Wei also cracked a rare joke. This relaxed interaction outside of the workplace made the relationships among colleagues even more harmonious.

events.name: Returning home after the event.
events.description: After the dinner, Yu Xiaowen shared a taxi home with several colleagues who lived along the way. On the ride, she was still reflecting on the unique team-building event, finding it particularly interesting how professional knowledge was presented in the form of games. Upon arriving home, she exchanged goodnight wishes with everyone in the department’s WeChat group and shared a few candid photos from the event, which once again filled the group with joy.

起始状态.所处地点: Rental apartment at No. 89 Jingsan Road, Jinshui District, Zhengzhou City, Henan Province.
起始状态.心情: Feeling relaxed, full of curiosity and anticipation for the afternoon team-building activities, with good recovery of the feet.

结束状态.所处地点: Rental apartment at No. 89 Jingsan Road, Jinshui District, Zhengzhou City, Henan Province.
结束状态.心情: Pleasant, excited. The success of teamwork and enjoyable interactions among colleagues have brought a strong sense of pleasure and belonging, with a slight increase in weight due to dining out.

state.今日运动: Mental and Light Physical Activities in Escape Rooms

date_attribute.weather: Cloudy with a gentle breeze in the evening, temperature ranging from 25 to 31 degrees.

2025-08.daily_overview: End-of-Month Summary, Planning, and In-Depth Creation Day. Review August's learning, exercise, and life projects, and plan September's goals. Complete the third piece of the pottery series. Full recovery of the foot, strict weight matching to the end state, and adjustment of daily routine.

events.name: Monthly Review Summary and Plan Adjustment
events.description: In the morning, Yu Xiaowen conducted a systematic review of her preparation for the August exams. She assessed the progress and mastery level of each subject and found that, due to rotations and case discussions, she had effectively integrated theory with practice in respiratory and cardiovascular medicine. However, her foundational knowledge in internal medicine was relatively weak. Based on this, she optimized her study plan for September by allocating more time for focused review of the weaker chapters.

events.name: Review exercise habits and plan accordingly.
events.description: She checked the exercise records on her phone. In August, she tried morning and evening runs but adjusted her routine due to plantar fasciitis. She decided to solidify the habit of evening runs in September, aiming for 2-3 times a week, and incorporate Pilates to prevent injuries.

events.name: Plan the follow-up work for the health manual.
events.description: Looking at the health handbook document on her computer, which was already taking shape, Yu Xiaowen assessed the remaining workload. She used her Sunday to clearly plan out the tasks for the next two weeks on her calendar: the first week would be dedicated to completing all the writing and initial drafts of the illustrations, while the second week would focus on layout beautification, proofreading, and contacting printing shops for quotes. She aimed to finish this gift before her parents' birthdays in mid-September.

events.name: Third Piece of the Pottery Creation Series - [Healing]
events.description: In the afternoon, she arrived at the pottery studio to complete the third piece in the [Growth and Resilience] series, titled [Healing]. She began by crafting a simple, smooth bowl-shaped vessel, symbolizing an initial state of wholeness. Then, using specialized tools, she skillfully created several natural, seemingly fractured lines along the bowl’s walls and rim. Finally, instead of employing the traditional kintsugi technique, she carefully filled and smoothed these [cracks] with another type of dark brown clay, forming a rustic, color-contrasting repair mark. This piece expresses her understanding that [trauma is inevitable, but the power of healing adds depth and beauty to life].

events.name: Confirmation of Complete Recovery from Plantar Fasciitis
events.description: In the evening, Yu Xiaowen confirmed that the symptoms of plantar fasciitis had completely disappeared. Through adjustments made this month, she successfully managed this minor injury.

events.name: Evening Reading and Music
events.description: In the evening, she completely relaxed. She made herself a cup of honey water and chose a light collection of essays to read. Afterwards, she put on her headphones and listened to Bach's "Air on the G String" in its entirety. Amidst the melodious and profound melody, she reflected on the eventful and rewarding month of August, feeling a deep sense of peace and strength within.

起始状态.所处地点: Rental apartment at No. 89 Jingsan Road, Jinshui District, Zhengzhou City, Henan Province
起始状态.心情: Calm, with the unique retrospective and reflective mood of the end of the month, the foot has fully recovered.

结束状态.所处地点: Rental apartment at No. 89 Jingsan Road, Jinshui District, Zhengzhou City, Henan Province.
结束状态.心情: Peaceful, fulfilling, with clear goals. Satisfied with the past month, filled with plans and expectations for the next month, health condition strictly matches the end state.

date_attribute.weather: Clear, comfortable temperature with a gentle breeze.

2025-09.daily_overview: At the start of the new week, Yu Xiaowen dives into her work and life with reflections on the past week and plans for the days ahead. Today, she launched a long-planned family health project, took on new learning tasks amidst her busy rotation work, and relieved stress through an evening jog.

events.name: Adapting to New Digital Life Tools
events.description: After several weeks of use, Yu Xiaowen has become fully accustomed to the NFC feature of her new phone. Whether taking the subway or buying breakfast near the hospital, paying with her phone has become incredibly convenient. She has also developed the habit of checking the fluctuations in the net asset values of the funds recommended by Wang Mingyuan every morning during her commute to work, using her mobile banking app. This digital approach to financial management has made her financial planning more intuitive and efficient.

events.name: Launch the "Elderly Health Management Manual" project
events.description: Today, Yu Xiaowen officially launched her plan to create a practical health handbook for her parents. Her initial task involved extensive material collection. At the Zhengzhou City Library, she consulted books such as "Aging Well," extracting passages on active aging and the meaning of life to incorporate into the humanistic care section of the handbook. Upon returning home, she immersed herself in medical knowledge databases and fitness tutorials. Drawing from her familiarity with Pilates, she carefully selected a few safe and effective introductory exercises for strengthening core muscles. She meticulously recorded the key points of these movements and simplified adaptations suitable for the elderly in her notebook.

events.name: Undertaking important learning tasks
events.description: After the afternoon rounds in the respiratory department, the supervising teacher Li Wei called Yu Xiaowen aside. Teacher Li informed her that the department would hold a case discussion meeting in two days and designated Yu Xiaowen to present a case of a patient with acute exacerbation of chronic obstructive pulmonary disease. He emphasized that this was an excellent opportunity to develop clinical thinking and communication skills, and he hoped she would prepare seriously. Yu Xiaowen felt the pressure but was even more excited by the trust placed in her.

events.name: Make preliminary preparations for the case presentation.
events.description: After receiving the assignment, Yu Xiaowen immediately got to work. She spent the afternoon and evening carefully reviewing the electronic medical records of the designated patients on the hospital system, sorting out key information such as medical history, test results (blood gas analysis, pulmonary function, chest CT), changes in physical signs, and treatment plans, and compiled them into a preliminary report outline. To enhance the practicality of the manual, she also took the time to look up information on balanced nutrition for the elderly, gentle exercises (such as walking and Tai Chi), and knowledge about preventing falls at home.

events.name: Evening jogging
events.description: After work, Yu Xiaowen went for an evening jog, covering a distance of approximately 4 kilometers. The route followed well-lit, tree-lined streets near her apartment, serving as both a way to decompress after a day's work and a cardiovascular workout. She paid attention to the slight discomfort in her foot due to plantar fasciitis during the recovery period.

events.name: A brief bedtime greeting with parents.
events.description: Before going to bed, Yu Xiaowen, as usual, sent greetings to her parents in the family WeChat group and briefly mentioned that she was researching some suitable exercise methods for them. Her mother, Li Xiuying, quickly replied, reminding her to rest well despite her busy work schedule, while her father, Yu Jianguo sent a "thumbs-up" emoji. This daily interaction further fueled her motivation to create a handbook for her parents.

起始状态.所处地点: No. 89 Jingsan Road, Jinshui District, Zhengzhou City, Henan Province (Rental)
起始状态.心情: Calm, with a sense of planning for the new week.

结束状态.所处地点: No. 89 Jingsan Road, Jinshui District, Zhengzhou City, Henan Province (Rental)
结束状态.心情: Fulfilling yet slightly stressful, filled with anticipation for starting new projects and focus on tackling new tasks.

date_attribute.weather: Cloudy with localized light showers in the afternoon.

2025-09.daily_overview: The work pace remained intense today. Yu Xiaowen dedicated her daytime to in-depth preparation for case presentations, while in the evening, she focused on conceptualizing the framework for a health manual. She managed to strike a delicate balance between professional responsibilities and family commitments, though she had to cancel her Pilates class due to the pressure of exam preparation.

events.name: Deepen the conceptualization of the manual framework.
events.description: At home in the evening, Yu Xiaowen's thoughts shifted from hospital cases to family health. Considering her parents' age, health conditions (her father has a slight tendency toward hypertension, and her mother occasionally experiences joint discomfort), as well as their daily habits, she began to conceptualize the framework of the manual more concretely. She decided that the manual would consist of two main sections: rigorous medical guidelines and warm humanistic care. Specific chapters were planned to cover balanced nutrition, safe exercise (with a focus on fall-prevention exercises), management of common chronic diseases, family first aid, and regular health check-ups. She also particularly wanted to include a "Life Wisdom Record Page for Elders," encouraging her parents to document their health insights and life reflections.

events.name: Conducting literature search for case presentation
events.description: To ensure the professionalism and cutting-edge nature of the report content, Yu Xiaowen utilized her lunch breaks and work intervals to search the hospital library's databases and professional academic websites for the latest GOLD (Global Initiative for Chronic Obstructive Lung Disease) guidelines and related research literature. She focused on management strategies for acute exacerbations and carefully compared the differences and similarities between the guideline recommendations and the actual diagnosis and treatment practices in the department, laying a solid theoretical foundation for subsequent analysis.

events.name: Create the first draft of the presentation PPT.
events.description: In the evening, Yu Xiaowen integrated the collected case data and literature study results, and began meticulously creating a presentation PPT on her computer in her home study. She aimed for clear logic and emphasized key points, not only fully presenting the characteristics of the case and the diagnosis and treatment process but also specially designing an analysis and comparison section. This section contrasted the actual treatment plan with guideline recommendations and included her preliminary insights. Throughout the creation process, she repeatedly refined the wording and images on each slide.

events.name: Cancelled Pilates class due to exam preparation stress.
events.description: The originally scheduled Pilates class was temporarily canceled by Yu Xiaowen due to the tight preparation time for the attending physician exam. Instead, she opted for a brief stretching session at home to alleviate the mild discomfort caused by plantar fasciitis.

events.name: Simulated Reporting Drill
events.description: After finishing the first draft of her PowerPoint presentation, Yu Xiaowen did not relax. She conducted her first simulated presentation in front of her computer camera, carefully controlling her speaking pace and timing. Following that, she connected via WeChat video with her close friend and college classmate, Sun Yue, who also lives in Zhengzhou. Although Sun Yue is not in the medical field, she has a clear sense of logic and is an excellent "listener." Yu Xiaowen rehearsed the entire presentation for her, and Sun Yue, from the perspective of an ordinary person, raised several questions about the clarity of the explanations and offered words of encouragement. This rehearsal significantly boosted Yu Xiaowen’s confidence.

起始状态.所处地点: No. 89 Jingsan Road, Jinshui District, Zhengzhou City, Henan Province (For Rent)
起始状态.心情: Focus, with case materials and manual frameworks swirling in the mind.

结束状态.所处地点: No. 89 Jingsan Road, Jinshui District, Zhengzhou City, Henan Province (Rental)
结束状态.心情: Slightly fatigued but with a clear mind, I feel both nervous and eager anticipation for tomorrow's presentation.

state.今日运动: No specific exercise, only brief stretching.

2025-09.daily_overview: Today marks a significant milestone in Yu Xiaowen's professional growth. She successfully completed her first leading presentation at the departmental case discussion meeting, earning recognition from her seniors. She also engaged in an in-depth professional exchange with her mentor, which significantly boosted her career confidence. In the evening, she went to bed a bit earlier than usual to relax.

events.name: Successful Presentation at the Respiratory Medicine Case Discussion Meeting
events.description: In the afternoon, the case discussion session in the Department of Respiratory Medicine was held as scheduled. Following the predetermined order, Yu Xiaowen delivered a clear and well-organized presentation of the case using a meticulously prepared PowerPoint. She not only provided a comprehensive overview of the diagnosis and treatment process but also conducted an in-depth analysis of the treatment plan in accordance with the GOLD guidelines, offering her own insights. Throughout her presentation, her voice remained steady, and she maintained eye contact with the attending chief and attending physicians present.

events.name: Received affirmation from the mentor and the department head.
events.description: After the presentation concluded, the supervising teacher Li Wei was the first to speak. He acknowledged Yu Xiaowen's thorough preparation and clear logic, and provided professional supplements and extensions to the analysis section. Subsequently, when the department director Zhang Lei summarized, he specifically praised Yu Xiaowen, saying that she "has begun to demonstrate the potential for independent case analysis," and encouraged all young doctors in the department to maintain this spirit of dedication. These words filled Yu Xiaowen's heart with warmth and encouragement.

events.name: Actively Seek Advice to Deepen Learning
events.description: After the meeting, Yu Xiaowen did not leave immediately. She took the initiative to approach Teacher Li Wei and raised questions about several key points in the individualized treatment plan discussed during the meeting that she did not fully understand. Teacher Li Wei appreciated her dedication to learning and patiently provided explanations. He also shared valuable practical insights by drawing on his own experiences and lessons from handling similar cases during his early years as a doctor. The conversation, which lasted about half an hour, left Yu Xiaowen feeling greatly enriched.

events.name: Take a relaxing walk in the evening.
events.description: After work, Yu Xiaowen took a 20-minute evening stroll along the internal corridor of the hospital. With relaxed steps and a reflective mindset, she contemplated her report insights, effectively easing the day's tension.

events.name: Record insights and share joys
events.description: In the evening, Yu Xiaowen meticulously recorded in her personal work notes the insights gained from the presentation, the key feedback from the teachers, and the experiences shared by Professor Li Wei. Later, she shared her feelings about this in-depth exchange with her childhood best friend, Zhang Jing, via WeChat, expressing her joy at receiving recognition from her seniors and her satisfaction with the strengthened teacher-student relationship. Zhang Jing immediately sent a series of celebratory stickers and invited her to meet over the weekend for a detailed chat.

起始状态.所处地点: No. 89 Jingsan Road, Jinshui District, Zhengzhou City, Henan Province (For Rent)
起始状态.心情: Nervousness and anticipation intertwined, repeatedly reciting the key points of the presentation.

结束状态.所处地点: No. 89 Jingsan Road, Jinshui District, Zhengzhou City, Henan Province (Rental)
结束状态.心情: Filled with a sense of achievement and joy, professional confidence has greatly increased, and there is more motivation for future learning.

state.今日运动: Take a 20-minute walk in the evening.

date_attribute.weather: Zhengzhou is sunny, Hangzhou is cloudy.

2025-09.daily_overview: Yu Xiaowen took leave from her department and embarked on a brief trip to Hangzhou. She would attend her cousin Li Yaqin’s important life ceremony as a bridesmaid, stepping away from her daily medical work to immerse herself in the warmth and joy of family. The journey left her feeling slightly fatigued.

events.name: Depart for the airport in the early morning.
events.description: Yu Xiaowen got up early in the morning and checked the bridesmaid dress and personal items she had prepared for the wedding. Dressed in comfortable casual clothes, she hailed a ride-hailing car and headed to Zhengzhou Xinzheng International Airport. The morning traffic was smooth, and as she looked out the window at the familiar cityscape, she felt relaxed and full of anticipation.

events.name: Flying to Hangzhou to reunite with my cousin.
events.description: The flight arrived on schedule at Hangzhou Xiaoshan International Airport. Her cousin-in-law and his family were already waiting at the arrival gate. After exchanging greetings, Yu Xiaowen followed them to the car and headed to the pre-booked hotel to check in. In the evening, her cousin Li Yaqin came to the hotel specifically to see her. The two sisters had dinner together in the hotel restaurant. Li Yaqin shared the details of the wedding preparations and her pre-wedding jitters with a hint of nervousness, while Yu Xiaowen listened with a smile, comforting her sister with the calm mindset she had developed as a doctor when handling emergencies. The bond between them grew even stronger amidst their laughter and conversation.

events.name: Due to travel fatigue, the discomfort in the feet has worsened.
events.description: After prolonged walking and standing, Yu Xiaowen felt that the mild symptoms of plantar fasciitis had worsened. She applied ice and massaged her feet at the hotel in the evening to alleviate the discomfort.

起始状态.所处地点: No. 89 Jingsan Road, Jinshui District, Zhengzhou City, Henan Province (Rental)
起始状态.心情: Excitement, filled with anticipation for the journey and the wedding.

结束状态.所处地点: A hotel in Hangzhou, Zhejiang Province
结束状态.心情: Warm and relaxed, immersed in the joyful atmosphere of sisterly reunion and pre-wedding celebrations, yet feeling slightly physically fatigued.

state.今日运动: Long-distance flights and walking, no specialized exercise.

2025-09.daily_overview: The day before the wedding, Yu Xiaowen fully immersed herself in her role as a bridesmaid. From the solemn ceremony rehearsal in the afternoon to the warm and lively pre-wedding party in the evening, she served not only as an assistant but also as one of her cousin's closest supporters, though dining out continued to contribute to her weight gain.

events.name: Wedding Ceremony Process Rehearsal
events.description: In the afternoon, Yu Xiaowen arrived at the wedding venue with the other groomsmen and bridesmaids. Under the guidance of the emcee, everyone carefully rehearsed the entire ceremony process. Yu Xiaowen took note of her position, the timing for handing over the rings, and the details of helping the bride adjust her dress. The rehearsal was solemn and orderly, giving her a clear picture of the formal ceremony the next day.

events.name: Bride's Pre-Wedding Single Ladies' Gathering
events.description: In the evening, Li Yaqin invited her closest girlfriends and her younger sister Yu Xiaowen for a small pre-wedding gathering. The atmosphere was relaxed and joyful, with everyone sharing love stories and offering blessings to the bride. During the gathering, a sumptuous dinner and desserts were enjoyed. Yu Xiaowen consciously opted for lighter dishes but still ended up consuming more than usual due to dining out.

events.name: Assist in the final inventory of wedding supplies.
events.description: After the gathering, Yu Xiaowen stayed behind to help her cousin do a final check of the wedding supplies needed for the next day. She confirmed details such as the jewelry, red envelopes, and spare stockings to ensure everything was in order. Seeing her cousin’s face, filled with happiness yet tinged with exhaustion, Yu Xiaowen felt her heart brimming with blessings for her.

起始状态.所处地点: A certain hotel in Hangzhou, Zhejiang Province
起始状态.心情: Looking forward to officially entering the wedding countdown phase.

结束状态.所处地点: A hotel in Hangzhou, Zhejiang Province
结束状态.心情: Warm and slightly sentimental, moved by the happiness of loved ones, and feeling the weight of marital commitment.

state.今日运动: Participate in rehearsals, gatherings, and engage in more walking.

2025-09.daily_overview: Wedding day. As the maid of honor, Yu Xiaowen witnessed the most important moment of her cousin's life from start to finish. From the busy preparations in the early morning to the end of the banquet late at night, she poured all her emotions and energy into the experience, personally taking part in a grand celebration filled with love and ritual. The high-intensity activities and dining out led her weight to reach its peak.

events.name: Assist the bride with her makeup and preparations in the early morning.
events.description: As dawn was just breaking, Yu Xiaowen arrived at the bride's residence. She assisted the makeup artist in applying makeup for her cousin Li Yaqin, helped her put on the magnificent wedding dress, and carefully checked every detail. The room was filled with a busy yet joyful atmosphere, and the photographer captured these heartwarming moments.

events.name: Participate in the lively wedding gate-crashing games
events.description: After the groom and his groomsmen arrived, Yu Xiaowen, along with the other bridesmaids, designed several fun yet tasteful wedding gatecrashing games. She playfully "challenged" the groom to liven up the atmosphere, and amidst the laughter, she watched as her brother-in-law successfully "passed the challenges" and put the wedding shoes on her cousin. This moment allowed her to relive the intimate bond she shared with her cousin during their playful childhood days.

events.name: Wedding Ceremony and Reception
events.description: Afterwards, everyone proceeded to the wedding venue. As a bridesmaid, Yu Xiaowen participated in the solemn and heartwarming marriage ceremony from start to finish. During the banquet, she assisted her cousin in changing into the toast dress and accompanied the newlyweds as they went from table to table to toast and express their gratitude to the guests. Watching her cousin shedding tears of happiness on stage and the contented family members below, she was deeply moved herself. Throughout the banquet, she enjoyed multiple dishes and, although she tried to choose lighter options, her overall intake was relatively high.

events.name: Farewell after the wedding ceremony
events.description: After the banquet, Yu Xiaowen helped her cousin pack up her personal belongings and the gifts she had received. At the hotel entrance, she bid farewell to the newlyweds and the elders. Her cousin gave her a tight hug, thanking her for traveling so far to be there. Yu Xiaowen returned to the hotel filled with heartfelt blessings and a touch of weariness, her heart brimming with profound feelings for family and love.

起始状态.所处地点: A certain hotel in Hangzhou City, Zhejiang Province
起始状态.心情: Excited and busy, filled with the joy of a sense of mission.

结束状态.所处地点: A certain hotel in Hangzhou City, Zhejiang Province
结束状态.心情: Deeply moved and satisfied, physically exhausted but warm at heart.

state.今日运动: All-day high-intensity activities, with extremely long periods of standing and walking.

date_attribute.weather: Hangzhou is sunny, and Zhengzhou will have rain in the evening.

2025-09.daily_overview: With the lingering warmth and fatigue of the wedding, Yu Xiaowen returned to Zhengzhou. The end of the journey also marked a return to daily life. She needed some time to process this emotionally impactful experience and began adjusting her diet to regain her weight.

events.name: Returning on an early morning flight.
events.description: Yu Xiaowen took an early morning flight from Hangzhou back to Zhengzhou. On the plane, she reflected on the scenes from the past few days, gazing at the rolling sea of clouds outside the window. Her mood gradually settled from the excitement of the celebrations, shifting to thoughts about her own life and growth.

events.name: Rest and organize at home in the afternoon.
events.description: Back in her rented apartment in Zhengzhou, Yu Xiaowen felt a familiar sense of relaxation. She unpacked her luggage, carefully hung up her bridesmaid dress, and placed the wedding candies and small gifts she brought back on the desk. In the afternoon, she didn’t go anywhere. Instead, she stayed at home, listening to soothing European classical music, allowing the fatigue of the past few days to gradually fade away. She also sorted out her work and plans for the upcoming week and decided to start incorporating light meals into her diet from the next day to manage her weight.

events.name: Having a heart-to-heart conversation with my best friend Zhang Jing to share insights.
events.description: In the evening, Yu Xiaowen called her close friend Zhang Jing. She shared in detail her experience as a bridesmaid, the touching moments at the wedding, and the personal reflections it sparked about family, responsibility, and personal growth. Zhang Jing listened quietly on the other end of the line, offering timely responses and empathy. This deep conversation, which extended beyond the wedding context, allowed Yu Xiaowen to fully vent and sort through her emotions, while also making her appreciate the invaluable support of friendship.

起始状态.所处地点: A certain hotel in Hangzhou, Zhejiang Province
起始状态.心情: Slightly weary, my heart yearns for home.

结束状态.所处地点: No. 89 Jingsan Road, Jinshui District, Zhengzhou City, Henan Province (Rental)

2025-09.daily_overview: On her first day back at work, Yu Xiaowen quickly switched back into doctor mode. At the same time, the arrival of the new month meant a stable income, bringing her a sense of security amid the busyness. She also channeled the emotional energy from the wedding into further improving the health handbook and resumed her exercise routine with evening jogs.

events.name: Return to the daily work of the respiratory medicine department.
events.description: Yu Xiaowen arrived on time and immersed herself in the daily rounds and medical record writing in the respiratory department. Her colleague Wang Fang asked with concern about her experience at the wedding, and she briefly shared a few words before quickly focusing on the patient at hand. Rotating work left little room for distraction.

events.name: Received August salary and Mid-Autumn Festival subsidy.
events.description: The notification tone for a text message sounded, and Yu Xiaowen’s bank card received her salary for August. As an employee of a public institution, her income is punctual and stable. At the same time, the hospital issued a holiday subsidy for the Mid-Autumn Festival. This extra income made her happy, and she planned to use it to pay for the upcoming pottery class tuition or add some budget to her Mid-Autumn Festival holiday arrangements.

events.name: Evening jogging to adjust body weight.
events.description: After work, Yu Xiaowen went for an evening jog, covering a distance of approximately 4.5 kilometers. She focused on improving her endurance and burning off the extra calories accumulated during the wedding period. The discomfort in her soles has largely subsided.

events.name: Complete the content of the health manual in the evening.
events.description: After work, Yu Xiaowen resumed her work on creating a health handbook for her parents. She began transforming the collected materials into specific content. First, she wrote targeted nutritional advice based on the local dietary habits of Henan, guiding her parents on how to control oil and salt while enjoying dishes like spicy soup and stewed noodles. Next, using drawing software, she created clear step-by-step illustrations for the previously selected Pilates fall-prevention exercises, accompanied by detailed written instructions. Finally, she started inputting the text content into the computer, considering fonts and layouts suitable for elderly readers.

起始状态.心情: Switching back to the calm of the work state, with a slight sense of adjustment typical of Mondays.

2025-09.daily_overview: Today's work progressed steadily. Yu Xiaowen utilized fragmented time to continue refining the health manual, integrating and reviewing the completed draft, gradually clarifying the manual's preliminary form. In the evening, stress was relieved through a badminton activity.

events.name: First Draft of the Integrated Health Manual
events.description: Yu Xiaowen compiled the written chapters—dietary guidelines, exercise diagrams (including fall-prevention Pilates movements), chronic disease prevention knowledge, and more—into a single document. She conducted preliminary formatting, adjusting font sizes and line spacing, to create a complete draft of the "Parent Health Management Handbook."

events.name: Simulate the reader's perspective for a thorough reading check.
events.description: After completing the initial draft, Yu Xiaowen did not finalize it immediately. She printed out a copy of the draft and read it through from the perspective of her parents. She paid special attention to whether the medical terms were explained in a sufficiently accessible manner and whether the language was friendly. From the standpoint of what her parents might not understand, she revised and simplified some expressions. She also intentionally added a few tips closely related to her parents' daily lives, such as "Precautions for Arthritis on Rainy Days" and "Tips for Selecting High-Quality Flour."

events.name: Regular Wednesday Badminton Activity
events.description: Wednesday evenings are reserved for the weekly badminton session. Yu Xiaowen and Lin Wei played an intense game at the sports hall for over an hour. After exercising, they headed to the night market for a late-night snack as usual. Yu Xiaowen mentioned to Lin Wei that she was working on a health manual for her parents, which Lin Wei praised highly, also sharing her own experience of buying health supplements for her parents. This combination of exercise and socializing serves as an important stress-relief method for Yu Xiaowen.

起始状态.心情: Stable, focused on the day's plan.

结束状态.所处地点: No. 89 Jingsan Road, Jinshui District, Zhengzhou City, Henan Province (Rental)
结束状态.心情: Relaxed and joyful, the dopamine after exercise coexists with the sense of achievement brought by the progress in the manual.

date_attribute.weather: Clear and crisp, a fine autumn day

2025-09.daily_overview: A day filled with curiosity. Yu Xiaowen not only made steady progress in her daily work and personal projects but also proactively made interesting new arrangements for her future leisure life and spiritual enjoyment. However, she experienced slight emotional fluctuations due to work-related stress.

events.name: Add a Humanistic Core to the Manual
events.description: Yu Xiaowen felt that the handbook shouldn't only contain cold, clinical medical knowledge. At home, she used her computer to integrate the humanistic content she had previously excerpted from the library on positive aging and the meaning of life with the medical guidelines, carefully formatting and merging the two sections. She also specially designed an elegant 'Elder Life Wisdom Journal' template, which included space for writing and was accompanied by warm guiding words: "Write down your health insights for today, or a happy memory that brought you joy."

events.name: Discover and sign up for in-depth City Walk activities
events.description: During the lunch break, Yu Xiaowen browsed a local cultural and lifestyle public account she followed and came across a promotional article about a paid City Walk event titled "Between Warp and Weft: Industrial Memories and Spatial Regeneration of Zhengzhou's Cotton Mill Area." The format, led by urban history researchers and combined with historical image interpretations, greatly intrigued her. It perfectly aligned with her interests in City Walk activities and exploring urban history. Without hesitation, she immediately filled out the information via the link in the article, made the online payment, and completed her registration.

events.name: Work pressure leads to emotional fluctuations.
events.description: While handling a complex case in the afternoon, Yu Xiaowen felt an increase in mental exertion, leading to mild anxiety and tension in her shoulders and neck. She managed to regulate these feelings by taking a short break and practicing deep breathing.

events.name: Plan weekend cultural activities.
events.description: In the evening, Yu Xiaowen checked the performance schedule of the Zhengzhou Grand Theater on her mobile app and discovered that the local symphony orchestra would soon host a European classical music concert, featuring her favorite piece, Debussy's "Clair de Lune." She immediately shared the link with her close friend Zhang Jing, and the two quickly agreed to attend. They selected well-positioned tickets online and completed the payment, eagerly anticipating the artistic enrichment over the weekend.

events.name: Schedule a video call with parents in advance.
events.description: Before going to bed, Yu Xiaowen sent a message in the family WeChat group, inviting her parents to have a video call on Saturday evening and mentioning that she had a "little health gift" to share with them. Her parents quickly replied, expressing great anticipation. This kind of planned interaction adds a sense of ritual to family connections.

起始状态.心情: Positive, full of interest in newly discovered activities

结束状态.所处地点: No. 89 Jingsan Road, Jinshui District, Zhengzhou City, Henan Province (Rental)

2025-09.daily_overview: Today's work went smoothly. The highlight of the evening was a video call with my parents, during which Yu Xiaowen presented them with a carefully prepared "health gift" for the first time, conveying care in a tangible form. This marked a new phase in family interaction. Additionally, she alleviated shoulder and neck fatigue through a Pilates session.

events.name: Completion of the electronic version final draft of the manual.
events.description: After work, Yu Xiaowen conducted a final review of the electronic draft of the manual, confirming the design of the cover, table of contents, inner pages, and back cover. She then saved the final document as a PDF file and backed it up to both the cloud drive and an external hard drive, marking the official completion of the manual's content creation phase.

events.name: Participate in a Pilates class
events.description: In the evening, Yu Xiaowen attended a small group class at the "Mindful Pilates Studio," focusing on lower limb stability exercises and shoulder and neck relaxation to alleviate muscle tension caused by work.

events.name: Video Sharing Health Handbook First Draft
events.description: At eight o'clock in the evening, the video call began promptly. Yu Xiaowen shared her computer screen, presenting and explaining the electronic draft of the health manual page by page to her parents in Luoyang. She emphasized the dietary suggestions tailored to their tastes, the safe exercise diagrams she personally drew (especially the fall-prevention Pilates movements), and passionately explained the purpose of the "Elderly Life Wisdom Record Page"—to document their daily life and health insights. Her father, Yu Jianguo, listened attentively, nodding from time to time and praising his daughter for being "thoughtful and scientifically grounded." Her mother, Li Xiuying, was overjoyed, saying the record page "felt like a childhood diary" and expressed her eagerness to start recording immediately. The entire call was filled with warmth, care, and meaningful two-way communication.

events.name: Make fine adjustments to details based on feedback.
events.description: After the call, Yu Xiaowen made final detailed modifications and improvements to the electronic draft of the manual based on her parents' suggestions (such as "Can the font be made one size larger?" and "Can the critical value on your dad's blood pressure chart be highlighted in red?"), making it more aligned with their actual usage needs.

起始状态.心情: Looking forward to and preparing for the evening family interaction.

结束状态.所处地点: No. 89 Jingsan Road, Jinshui District, Zhengzhou City, Henan Province (Rental)
结束状态.心情: Extremely warm and fulfilled, seeing the positive feedback from parents makes all the efforts worthwhile, and the bond of family becomes even closer.

2025-09.daily_overview: Friday, approaching the weekend. While completing her work, Yu Xiaowen's thoughts were particularly active. The profound insights gained from reading began to spark a wonderful chemical reaction with her artistic hobbies, infusing new inspiration into her pottery creations. Meanwhile, her weekend social plans were also arranged, but she stayed up late studying for exams.

events.name: Deep Reading Triggers Artistic Inspiration
events.description: During her break, Yu Xiaowen continued reading "Aging Well." The book's discussions on aging, fragility, and the resilience of life deeply moved her. She reflected on the self-repair of cells under damage and the tenacity of life in the face of pressure. These abstract insights sparked a creative urge within her. At home, she took out her sketchbook and drew several preliminary pottery designs: a heart-shaped ornament covered in fine cracks yet structurally stable, and a cell-like container with a rough surface but a full, vibrant form, brimming with vitality. She aimed to use the texture of clay to express the theme of "fragility and resilience" in life.

events.name: Make plans with my best friend Zhang Jing to meet up over the weekend.
events.description: Yu Xiaowen contacted Zhang Jing via WeChat, suggesting a meeting on Saturday afternoon. They chose a newly opened, well-reviewed independent café in Jinshui District as their meeting spot and agreed on a specific time. Both looked forward to a relaxing and heartfelt conversation.

events.name: Prepare Materials and Concepts for Ceramic Art Creation
events.description: In the evening, Yu Xiaowen organized her pottery toolkit, checked the stock of clay, and took photos of the design sketches she had drawn during the day, saving them on her phone. She had already begun thinking about how to explain this somewhat abstract yet deeply personal creative concept to her teacher, Zheng Guodong, when she visited the pottery studio over the weekend.

events.name: Staying up late to study for exams
events.description: Due to the approaching attending physician examination, Yu Xiaowen stayed up late at night to review, focusing on the respiratory system pathology chapter, which resulted in a delayed sleep schedule.

2025-09.daily_overview: A typical and fulfilling day off. In the morning, I handled personal matters. In the afternoon, I had a high-quality, in-depth conversation with my best friend, and our friendship deepened through shared plans for growth. In the evening, I gained a little weight from eating out.

events.name: Print and mail the physical health handbook.
events.description: In the morning, Yu Xiaowen took the finalized electronic version of the health handbook to a printing shop near her residential area. She opted for high-quality matte paper for color printing and perfect binding. The finished handbook felt substantial in her hands, with clear images and text, and a comfortable layout. Afterwards, she went to a courier service point, carefully packaged the handbook along with a handwritten warm greeting card, and sent it to her parents’ home in Luoyang. After completing this "project," she let out a long sigh of relief, feeling a strong sense of accomplishment.

events.name: Deep heart-to-heart talk at the cafe
events.description: In the afternoon, Yu Xiaowen met with Zhang Jing at the café as scheduled. The two ordered pour-over coffee and desserts, sharing updates about their recent lives in a relaxed atmosphere. As the conversation deepened, Zhang Jing opened up about her mixed feelings and determination to pursue an on-the-job postgraduate degree, while Yu Xiaowen shared her professional uncertainties during her rotation work, as well as her plans and underlying pressure regarding her goal of "becoming an attending physician within three years."

events.name: Agree to become each other's "supervisor."
events.description: During this in-depth conversation, the two discovered that they were both at a critical stage in their life planning. They immediately hit it off and decided to become each other's "supervisor" and emotional supporter on the path of exam preparation. They agreed to regularly report their progress to each other, share materials, and cheer each other up when they felt like giving up. This commitment elevated their friendship from sharing life's joys to a "life comrade" relationship, characterized by mutual growth and support.

events.name: Dining out for dinner
events.description: In the evening, Yu Xiaowen and Zhang Jing enjoyed dinner together at a newly opened restaurant, trying sweet and sour pork tenderloin and fruit salad. Although they opted for lighter choices, their intake was still slightly high.

events.name: Review and Planning
events.description: After the heart-to-heart talk, Yu Xiaowen returned home. She reflected on her conversation with Zhang Jing, noting down specific ideas for her review plan for the attending physician exam in a dedicated schedule book. She also considered how to implement the "supervision agreement," such as setting up a biweekly study review call.

2025-09.daily_overview: Sunday is a day where personal interests intertwine with family care. Yu Xiaowen transformed her reading insights into pottery practice, embarking on a new creative series. At the same time, she followed up on the "after-sales service" of the health manual to ensure her parents' health management truly began. She also started adjusting her exercise schedule for autumn by going for a morning run.

events.name: Morning Running Adapts to Autumn
events.description: In the early morning, Yu Xiaowen attempted to adjust her running time to the morning and went for a run on the lakeside trail in the park near her apartment, covering a distance of approximately 4 kilometers. She enjoyed the cool autumn weather, marking the beginning of her transition to a morning running habit.

events.name: Follow up on the usage of the manual.
events.description: In the morning, Yu Xiaowen messaged her parents on WeChat to ask if they had received the package. Upon learning that the manual had been safely delivered, she sent an electronic version as a backup and highlighted key sections in a text message. She reminded her parents to start slowly and within their limits when trying Pilates movements for the first time, and encouraged them to ask her any questions they might have.

events.name: Pottery Studio Creates New Series
events.description: In the afternoon, Yu Xiaowen brought her design sketches to the "Between Clay" pottery studio. Under the guidance of Teacher Zheng Guodong, she began shaping the clay, bringing the abstract theme of "the resilience of life" into practice. She first focused on creating the rough form of the heart-shaped ornament, carefully controlling its shape, and planned to carve special textures in the subsequent steps. After completing the rough form, she placed it in a shaded area of the studio for initial drying, looking forward to refining it during her next visit.

events.name: Eating out for lunch
events.description: Had lunch with Suya near the pottery studio and chose stewed noodles, which resulted in a higher calorie intake and a slight weight gain.

events.name: Evening routine call with parents.
events.description: In the evening, Yu Xiaowen video-called her parents as usual. This conversation was more specific—her parents had already started flipping through the manual. Her mother, Li Xiuying, adjusted the vegetable ratio in their dinner according to the recipes in the manual, while her father, Yu Jianguo, showed great interest in the fall-prevention exercises and asked for some details. Yu Xiaowen patiently answered their questions and encouraged them to start with the simplest steps. Seeing that her efforts were genuinely influencing her parents' lifestyle habits, she felt immensely gratified.

2025-09.daily_overview: At the start of the new week, Yu Xiaowen returned to work with the energy she had accumulated over the weekend. She reinforced her autumn exercise routine through morning runs, continued to advance her pottery creations, and began systematically preparing for her attending physician examination. The main threads of her life—career, interests, and family—unfolded clearly, with her state of being strictly aligned with the conclusion of her health regimen.

events.name: Morning run 5 kilometers
events.description: In the early morning, Yu Xiaowen went for a morning run, extending the distance to 5 kilometers. She followed the lakeside trail in the park near her apartment, maintaining a steady pace. She focused on dynamic stretching before the run and relaxation afterward to enhance endurance and adapt to the cooler autumn weather.

events.name: Handle routine work in rotating departments.
events.description: Monday's work is always busy. Yu Xiaowen efficiently completed ward rounds, admission of new patients, and medical record documentation. Having experienced the successful case presentation last time, her thinking has become more proactive and organized when facing complex cases.

events.name: Refining ceramic artworks
events.description: After work, Yu Xiaowen returned to the pottery studio. The rough heart-shaped ornament she had made yesterday was already half-dried. She picked up her tools and began refining the details and carving with precision. Using a carving knife, she carefully etched lines symbolizing the texture of life and repeatedly polished the surface, aiming to achieve the envisioned texture of "roughness with a touch of warmth." The process of fine-tuning required immense patience and focus, and she became so immersed in it that she lost track of time.

events.name: Initiate the preparation plan for the attending physician examination.
events.description: Returning home in the evening, Yu Xiaowen fulfilled her agreement with Zhang Jing and officially launched her exam preparation plan. She logged into the relevant medical examination website, reviewed this year's exam syllabus and registration guidelines (although formal registration had not yet begun), and selected respiratory medicine as her primary focus. She compiled a list of core textbooks and past exam papers that required focused review, formulated a preliminary two-week study plan, and prepared to start tackling the challenging topic of respiratory system physiology and pathology.

2025-09.daily_overview: Today is a workday. Yu Xiaowen efficiently handled personal matters during work breaks on the first weekday after her day off. In the morning, she dedicated herself to her duties as a doctor at the hospital. In the afternoon, she briefly switched to explorer mode and participated in an in-depth city history tour. In the evening, she transformed her solo experience into social interaction by sharing it with others. She also kicked off a new health challenge with a breakthrough morning run, but stayed up late revising due to exam preparation pressure.

events.name: Morning hospital ward rounds and case management.
events.description: Yu Xiaowen is rotating in the respiratory medicine department. In the morning, she followed her supervising teacher, Li Wei, on routine ward rounds, focusing on the recovery of several COPD patients and updating their medical orders. She writes medical records with meticulous attention to detail, a habit influenced by her father's rigorous approach.

events.name: Communicated with colleague Wang Fang during the noon break.
events.description: While having lunch in the hospital cafeteria, Yu Xiaowen ran into her colleague Wang Fang. The two chatted about their weekend plans, and Yu Xiaowen mentioned that she would be attending a special City Walk in the afternoon. Wang Fang expressed great interest and suggested they could join together next time.

events.name: Participate in a paid City Walk activity: Industrial Memory Exploration
events.description: Using half a day of her adjusted leave, Yu Xiaowen headed to the gathering point at the cultural and creative park, which was transformed from an old cotton mill. Guided by a city history researcher, she and a group of like-minded enthusiasts explored the area that carries Zhengzhou’s industrial memories in depth, capturing the details with her newly purchased phone.

events.name: Post-event café exchange with participants.
events.description: After the guided tour concluded, Yu Xiaowen and a few participants she had connected with sat down for a while at a café in the cultural and creative park. They continued discussing urban space regeneration, and Yu Xiaowen also shared her perspective as a doctor on public health concerns.

events.name: Breakthrough Morning Running Training
events.description: At 6:30 in the morning, Yu Xiaowen extended her usual 4-kilometer morning run to 5 kilometers on the park greenway near her residential community. She focused on completing the goal and successfully achieved it.

events.name: Organize and Share Activity Records
events.description: After returning home in the evening, Yu Xiaowen imported the photos and clips captured during the day's City Walk into her computer, conducted preliminary screening and organization, and saved them in a dedicated folder.

events.name: Staying up late for exam preparation and review.
events.description: Before going to bed, Yu Xiaowen stayed up late reviewing her collection of incorrect questions in preparation for the final sprint of the attending physician exam, which delayed her sleep time and caused slight fatigue in her shoulders and neck.

events.name: Daily communication with patients in routine work

events.name: Sharing City Walk Experiences on Moments

2025-09.daily_overview: At the start of the new week, Yu Xiaowen successfully registered for the attending physician qualification exam, taking a substantial step toward her core career goal. Meanwhile, she integrated her health manual with professional resources to seek expert guidance. After registration, her spirits were high, but she stayed up late studying in the evening.

events.name: Complete the online registration for the attending physician examination.
events.description: During the afternoon break, Yu Xiaowen logged into the registration system at home, filled in the information, uploaded materials, paid the fee, and felt nervous and excited after clicking submit.

events.name: Download the exam syllabus and make a preliminary plan.
events.description: After successfully registering, she downloaded the exam syllabus, marked the weak sections, and sketched out a framework for allocating study time in her schedule planner.

events.name: Report to and seek advice from the mentor teacher, Li Wei.
events.description: Yu Xiaowen informed Teacher Li Wei of the successful registration. Li Wei offered encouragement and shared exam preparation experiences, emphasizing the importance of reviewing clinical cases in conjunction with study.

events.name: Please have Teacher Li Wei review the first draft of the health manual.
events.description: Yu Xiaowen showed Li Wei the initial draft of some chapters from the health manual to seek professional feedback. Li Wei acknowledged the effort and provided suggestions for revisions.

events.name: A small gathering to celebrate successful registration
events.description: In the evening, Yu Xiaowen and her colleague Wang Fang had a simple meal near the hospital to celebrate their successful registration, discussing their study plans and consuming a considerable amount.

2025-09.daily_overview: Wednesday evening is Yu Xiaowen's regular time for sports and socializing. 2025-09.daily_overview: On Sunday, Yu Xiaowen received her annual performance bonus. She swiftly and rationally executed the allocation plan, channeling the funds into her dream fund, emergency savings, and investment account. Meanwhile, to manage her weight, she practiced intermittent fasting.
