2025-10.daily_overview: After the shock of a colleague's sudden death, Yu Xiaowen began her new day with a heavy heart. During the day, she participated in a group discussion in the hospital department and reviewed her studies. After work, she had a deep conversation with her friend Wang Fang, and together they agreed to establish a health support alliance and began exploring new ways to relieve stress.

events.name: Morning Cardiovascular Disease Review
events.description: After getting up early in the morning, Yu Xiaowen utilized the quiet time before work to review core chapters of cardiovascular medicine, such as hypertension, coronary heart disease, and heart failure, in her study. By reflecting on typical cases she encountered during her rotations, she organized key diagnostic points, treatment principles, and commonly used medications in her notebook, thereby strengthening her ability to connect theory with practice.

events.name: Breakfast and Commute Preparation
events.description: She simply prepared milk, cereal, and fruit for breakfast while checking work messages and the weather on her phone. The autumn morning was slightly cool, so she added a light jacket.

events.name: Commuting to Work and Reflecting on the Journey
events.description: Yu Xiaowen drove her family car to Zhengzhou Central Hospital, with a commute of about 10 minutes. Along the way, she continuously reflected on the sudden death of her colleague, deeply contemplating the balance between the high-intensity pressure of the medical profession and personal health. She also began to outline key points for seeking career guidance.

events.name: Clinical work in the morning
events.description: Upon arriving at the hospital, Yu Xiaowen immersed herself in her daily tasks of ward rounds, medical record documentation, and patient care. During her rotation in the cardiology department, she carefully examined the conditions of several patients with cardiovascular diseases.

events.name: Collective Conversation within the Department
events.description: In response to the impact of a colleague's sudden death, Zhang Lei, the head of the department, organized an informal group discussion within the department. He gathered everyone to sit together, share their feelings and thoughts, and earnestly emphasized the importance of medical staff paying attention to their own physical and mental health and balancing work and life. Yu Xiaowen remained mostly silent during the conversation, but she was deeply moved and reflective inside.

events.name: Afternoon work and case handling
events.description: After the conversation, Yu Xiaowen continued to handle clinical matters, including reviewing test results and adjusting the medication dosage for a patient with heart failure. While working, she tried hard to focus, but from time to time, she felt a sense of oppression.

events.name: In-depth conversation with Wang Fang at the cafe.
events.description: After work, Yu Xiaowen left the hospital with her closest colleague and best friend, Wang Fang. Instead of heading straight home, they went to a quiet café near the hospital. There, Yu Xiaowen finally let down her guard and confided in Wang Fang about her fears regarding her own health following a colleague’s sudden death, her confusion about the meaning of high-intensity medical work, and her worries about the future. Wang Fang also shared similar anxieties and pressures. The two listened to and comforted each other, gaining significant emotional support.

events.name: Establish a Health Support Alliance
events.description: During a deep conversation at the café, Yu Xiaowen and Wang Fang reached a consensus, deciding to elevate their work friendship into a deeper emotional and health support alliance. They solemnly agreed: from now on, they would remind each other to avoid overworking and prioritize rest; regularly engage in outdoor activities together (such as the previously signed-up hiking event) to relieve stress and exercise; and maintain open communication, sharing challenges from work and life at any time. This agreement empowered them to find strength to move forward positively amidst their sorrow.

events.name: Dinner and Household Chores
events.description: After returning home, Yu Xiaowen used the ingredients in the refrigerator to cook a simple bowl of noodles for dinner and tidied up the room. As the autumn night grew cooler, she turned on the heater in the living room.

events.name: Search for archery range information
events.description: To alleviate the persistent feelings of depression and anxiety, Yu Xiaowen proactively searched online for activities that could help her focus and relieve stress. Recalling her previous interest in shooting and archery, she ultimately decided to look into and inquire about the courses, pricing, and contact information of a well-reviewed archery range near her home.

events.name: Evening Meditation and Late-Night Reflection
events.description: After finishing her daily activities, Yu Xiaowen performed evening meditation in her bedroom at home. She no longer used an app for guidance; instead, she independently set a 15-minute timer, focusing on her breath and body scanning to release work-related stress. However, after meditation, she still stayed up late reflecting on events and did not rest until the early hours of the morning.

起始状态.所处地点: In the bedroom of the home at No. 89 Jingsan Road, Jinshui District, Zhengzhou City, Henan Province.
起始状态.心情: Heavy, reflective, with concerns about professional risks.

结束状态.所处地点: Bedroom at home
结束状态.心情: Slightly relieved yet still worried, finding a sliver of comfort in having established a support alliance.

state.今日运动: No specific exercise, commuting and daily activities

2025-10.daily_overview: Yu Xiaowen continued to actively address the impact of her colleague's sudden death, proactively turning her reflections into action. She practiced with mock exams, booked an archery experience class, and engaged in in-depth conversations with her close friend, parents, and mentor, gaining emotional support and career guidance from multiple sources. However, she stayed up late due to the conversations.

events.name: Morning Mock Exam Practice
events.description: Yu Xiaowen utilized the online question bank for the attending physician examination to conduct simulation exercises focusing on the cardiovascular system chapter. She completed a set of practice questions within a time limit, carefully checked the answers afterward, and marked the incorrect questions and easily confused knowledge points in red. These were then organized into a dedicated error notebook.

events.name: Commute Meditation Attempt
events.description: On her way to the hospital by car, Yu Xiaowen took advantage of the red light intervals to take several deep breaths, focusing her attention on the present sensations. She attempted to bring a meditative state into her daily commute, aiming to start the day's work with a calm mindset.

events.name: Clinical Work and Handover in the Morning
events.description: At the hospital, Yu Xiaowen conducted the morning rounds for the rotating patients and completed the handover with the night shift doctor. She paid special attention to the condition changes of a patient with coronary heart disease.

events.name: Contact the archery range to make a reservation.
events.description: During a break at work, Yu Xiaowen called the archery range she had found yesterday, inquired in detail about the content, price, and timing of the beginner experience class, and successfully booked a session for the following afternoon (Saturday).

events.name: Contact the supervising teacher Li Wei.
events.description: During a break in the morning, Yu Xiaowen contacted her mentor Li Wei via WeChat, expressing her desire for a private discussion about career development and inquiring about his availability. Teacher Li Wei promptly responded, arranging to meet at a quiet café near the hospital after work that afternoon.

events.name: Lunchtime conversation with colleagues
events.description: While having lunch at the hospital cafeteria, Yu Xiaowen ran into her colleague Wang Fang. The two briefly exchanged thoughts on their deep conversation from the previous night and reaffirmed their commitment to the health support alliance.

events.name: Afternoon Case Discussion and Study
events.description: In the afternoon, Yu Xiaowen participated in a departmental discussion on complex arrhythmia cases. She actively asked questions and took notes on key points, integrating theory with practice.

events.name: Career Development Talk with Teacher Li Wei
events.description: After work in the afternoon, Yu Xiaowen met with Teacher Li Wei at the agreed-upon café. She candidly shared the impact of her colleague's sudden death, expressed concerns about her physical and mental health under long-term high-intensity work, and conveyed her interest in specializing in cardiology. Teacher Li Wei listened attentively and, drawing from his own experiences from being a resident to a chief physician, offered specific advice on how to efficiently manage clinical work hours, utilize fragmented time for study and exam preparation, and regulate stress through methods like regular exercise. He also encouraged her to stay committed to her goals and transform pressure into motivation for growth. The conversation lasted well into the evening.

events.name: Meet up with my best friend Zhang Jing to pour out my heart.
events.description: After speaking with Teacher Li Wei, in order to further alleviate her inner emotions, Yu Xiaowen arranged to meet her close friend Zhang Jing at another café. She recounted the incident in detail to Zhang Jing, expressing her lingering fear and confusion about the future, seeking emotional support. Zhang Jing listened patiently and offered comfort, and the two chatted late into the night.

events.name: View exercise data and adjust the plan
events.description: After returning home, Yu Xiaowen reviewed the recent data report compiled by her fitness app and noticed a slight but consistent upward trend in both her average resting heart rate and exercise heart rate. Combined with her recent feelings of fatigue, she realized it was necessary to adjust her workout plan. Based on the data analysis and her personal experience, she reorganized her morning running schedule for the week on the app. She changed the original 5-kilometer steady run to an interval pattern of "3 kilometers of slow running + 1 kilometer of brisk walking" and specifically noted the need to extend her warm-up and stretching time.

events.name: Video call with parents
events.description: In the evening, Yu Xiaowen took the initiative to have a video call with Luoyang's parents. She did not directly mention the specific incident of her colleague's sudden death to avoid causing them excessive worry, but she showed more concern than usual for their well-being and subtly expressed her own anxieties about her heavy workload, drawing warmth and strength from her family's care. Her parents also shared daily trivial matters with her, making her feel reassured.

events.name: Review Plan Adjustment and Recording
events.description: After the conversation and sharing, Yu Xiaowen returned home feeling relieved and inspired. She recorded the key points of Teacher Li Wei's advice in her notebook and, based on her own situation, made preliminary adjustments to her study and work plans for the next few months. She decided to prepare more systematically for the cardiology direction and the attending physician exam, while officially incorporating regular exercise three times a week into her schedule.

起始状态.所处地点: Bedroom at home
起始状态.心情: Relatively calm, yet with underlying concerns, deciding to take proactive measures.

结束状态.所处地点: Bedroom at home
结束状态.心情: After receiving support, I felt relieved and inspired, and I have a clearer plan for the future.

state.今日运动: No specific exercise, but attempted commuting meditation.

2025-10.daily_overview: On the first day of the weekend, Yu Xiaowen temporarily stepped away from work pressure, focusing on exam preparation and personal interests. She adjusted her morning routine with a run and tried archery for the first time. In the evening, she attended an offline gathering with online music friends, enjoying a classical concert together. The experience provided artistic enrichment and social relaxation, though she stayed up late due to the concert.

events.name: Adjusted Morning Run Implementation
events.description: Yu Xiaowen strictly followed the new plan, completing a 3-kilometer jog combined with a 1-kilometer brisk walk, and diligently performed dynamic warm-ups before running and static stretches afterward. During the exercise, she closely monitored the real-time heart rate feedback on the app, feeling more relaxed than before, and her weight slightly decreased after the workout.

events.name: Breakfast and Reading
events.description: After her run, she prepared a protein-rich breakfast (eggs, whole wheat bread) at home and read medical news and health articles on her phone while eating.

events.name: Endocrine System Review
events.description: Yu Xiaowen shifted her review focus to the endocrine system, primarily studying the pathophysiology, clinical manifestations, and diagnostic and treatment protocols for common diseases such as diabetes and thyroid disorders. She read textbooks and referred to the latest clinical guidelines to ensure the accuracy of the knowledge points.

events.name: Review and exchange with colleague Wang Fang.
events.description: During her break in the department (she was on duty today), Yu Xiaowen discussed her study progress and difficulties with her colleague Wang Fang, who is also preparing for the attending physician qualification exam. They answered each other's questions and shared some effective memorization techniques.

events.name: Archery Range Experience Class
events.description: In the afternoon, Yu Xiaowen went to the scheduled archery range, where she learned basic actions such as safety rules, nocking arrows, drawing the bow, and aiming under the guidance of the coach. Through focused practice, she felt the pressure release as the arrows left the bowstring. By the end of the session, her arms were slightly sore, but her mind felt much more at ease.

events.name: Review and Sharing of Archery Experience
events.description: Reflecting on the archery experience, Yu Xiaowen noted in her diary the focus and sense of release brought by this new activity, deciding to make it one of her regular stress-relief methods in the future. During a video chat with her close friend Zhang Jing in the evening, she shared this attempt, and Zhang Jing also expressed interest.

events.name: Pre-concert dinner gathering
events.description: Before the concert began, Yu Xiaowen and three music enthusiasts she met in a classical music WeChat group arranged to have dinner together at a restaurant near the Zhengzhou Grand Theater. This was their first offline meeting, transitioning from online IDs to real-life friends. The atmosphere was relaxed and pleasant, with the conversation mainly revolving around their shared love for classical music and their respective lives.

events.name: Appreciating Beethoven's Symphony Concert
events.description: Inside the concert hall of Zhengzhou Grand Theater, I enjoyed Beethoven's symphonic works performed by a professional symphony orchestra alongside three new friends. Immersed in the beautiful music, I experienced the awe and emotion brought by art, temporarily forgetting the worries of work. The performance lasted until quite late.

events.name: Post-concert exchange and farewell.
events.description: After the concert, the four of them lingered briefly in the theater lobby, sharing their thoughts on the evening's performance and discussing their favorite movements. They exchanged WeChat contacts and agreed to attend future concerts together whenever there was a good show. Then, as it was already late, they bid each other farewell and headed home.

events.name: Evening Rest and Recording
events.description: After returning home, Yu Xiaowen briefly recorded this pleasant experience in her diary or social media, sharing a few on-site photos (not of the performance) and her feelings. She also thanked the organizer once again in the classical music WeChat group, interacted with other group members, and then hurriedly rested.

起始状态.所处地点: Bedroom at home
起始状态.心情: Relax and look forward to the leisure activities of the weekend.

结束状态.所处地点: Bedroom at home
结束状态.心情: Pleasant and fulfilling, feeling invigorated by music and social interactions.

state.今日运动: Morning jog of 3 kilometers at a slow pace + 1 kilometer brisk walk, archery experience class.

date_attribute.weather: Cloudy turning overcast, temperature 12-19°C, slightly cool.

2025-10.daily_overview: On Sunday, Yu Xiaowen continued to enjoy her weekend, taking care of personal matters and pursuing her interests. She prepared hometown delicacies, which led to a slight weight gain. While reviewing, she sought advice from colleagues, checked and registered for a hospital-organized hiking activity. She also reflected on and adjusted her life balance plan to prepare for the upcoming week, going to bed early due to fatigue.

events.name: Weekend Lazy Sleep and Breakfast
events.description: Yu Xiaowen got up a bit later than usual, enjoying the weekend laziness. Missing the taste of her hometown, she bought instant spicy soup seasoning packets and added her favorite ingredients like tofu skin and wood ear mushrooms at home, cooking a small pot of simplified spicy soup. Paired with baked flatbread, it served as a brunch, providing a higher calorie intake.

events.name: Seeking Clarification on Difficulties During Review
events.description: During her lunch break (she was on duty today), Yu Xiaowen met her colleague Liu Qiang at the hospital cafeteria. She asked Liu Qiang for advice on an analytical approach to a complex arrhythmia case she had encountered during her review. Liu Qiang provided a detailed explanation based on his clinical experience and recommended several related articles.

events.name: Check the hospital's mountain climbing activity notice.
events.description: On the internal notification platform or work group of Zhengzhou Central Hospital, I saw the detailed notice issued by the labor union regarding the one-day Mount Song hiking activity on October 25th. I learned about the activity time, meeting location, fees, and registration method.

events.name: Discuss the mountain climbing activity with Wang Fang.
events.description: Considering the emotional impact of recent work pressure and the sudden death of a colleague, Yu Xiaowen proactively reached out to her close colleague Wang Fang to discuss whether they should participate in a mountain climbing activity together. Both felt it was a great opportunity to relax and connect with nature, and they decided to join the activity as companions.

events.name: Register online for the mountain climbing activity.
events.description: Following the instructions from the union notice, Yu Xiaowen used the designated online registration system to fill in her and Wang Fang's personal information, emergency contacts, and completed the online payment for the activity fees.

events.name: Receipt of Registration Confirmation and Preparation
events.description: After submitting the registration, she received a confirmation message from the union or event organizer confirming the successful registration, along with detailed pre-trip notifications such as the itinerary, assembly time and location, dress code suggestions, and important reminders. Following the advice, she began checking and preparing personal items suitable for hiking, including sports shoes and clothing.

events.name: Withdrawal and Summary of Ceramic Artworks
events.description: In the afternoon, Yu Xiaowen went to the previous pottery exhibition hall, carefully removed her pottery works from the display stand, packaged them, and brought them back to the studio. She conducted a personal summary of this exhibition experience and expressed gratitude for the guidance of her teacher, Zheng Guodong.

events.name: Reflection on Life Balance and Adjustment of Plans
events.description: After several days of reflection, Yu Xiaowen decided to prioritize her health. She revisited her annual goals and resolved to more firmly adhere to her plan of "engaging in regular exercise at least three times a week." Additionally, she began exploring ways to better relax and cultivate her pottery hobby outside of work, seeking a new balance in her life.

events.name: Dinner and Household Chores
events.description: In the evening, she cooked a simple meal of stir-fried vegetables with meat and rice at home, tidied up the study room, and organized her review materials to prepare for the intense work and study schedule of the upcoming week.

events.name: Evening Reading and Relaxation
events.description: Before going to bed, Yu Xiaowen read a non-medical book (a novel) for a while and listened to some soft classical music to help relax her mind and body. Due to fatigue, she went to bed early.

起始状态.所处地点: Bedroom at home
起始状态.心情: Relaxed, content, enjoying the weekend.

结束状态.所处地点: Bedroom at home
结束状态.心情: Calm and planned, with both anticipation and preparation for the new week.

2025-10.daily_overview: A new week begins, and Yu Xiaowen continues to move forward with her clinical work and exam preparation. She engages in mock practice, uses mindfulness to cope with work stress, and receives exciting career development news—she has qualified to attend the national academic conference. This brightens the previous gloom and brings new motivation, though she stays up late studying.

events.name: Morning Review and Mock Practice
events.description: Yu Xiaowen continued to use the online question bank to engage in specialized practice for the endocrine system chapter. She paid particular attention to details in the questions regarding medication dosage adjustments and complication management, once again marking incorrect answers and uncertain options for focused review later.

events.name: Commuting and Work Preparation
events.description: Driving to work in her car, she listened to classical music on the radio for a while to adjust her mood. As autumn deepened, she noticed the leaves along the roadside beginning to turn yellow.

events.name: Clinical work in the morning and mindfulness practice
events.description: After handling an urgent case in the department, Yu Xiaowen felt a bit of pressure. She used a short break to practice three minutes of mindfulness in the doctor's on-call room, quickly calming her emotions by observing her breath and bodily sensations.

events.name: Meeting with pottery teacher Zheng Guodong
events.description: During the lunch break, Yu Xiaowen met with teacher Zheng Guodong at the pottery studio to review the entire exhibition process and listen to his feedback and suggestions on the display effect of her works and her future creative direction. The teacher encouraged her to keep going.

events.name: Confirm registration for mountaineering activity.
events.description: Yu Xiaowen confirmed the previously registered information for the Mount Song hiking activity in the hospital's internal system and double-checked the assembly details with Wang Fang.

events.name: Obtain the qualification to participate in the national academic annual conference
events.description: In the afternoon, during her rotation in the cardiology department, Yu Xiaowen was officially notified by department director Zhang Lei and her mentor Li Wei at a departmental meeting that she had been granted hospital funding to attend the National Cardiovascular Disease Academic Annual Conference, in recognition of her outstanding performance in clinical research and patient management. Yu Xiaowen felt both excited and a strong sense of responsibility.

events.name: Examination and Adjustment of Lifestyle Habits
events.description: Deeply affected by the sudden death of a colleague, Yu Xiaowen began to seriously examine her lifestyle habits. She used her rest time to reorganize her schedule, forcing herself to ensure more adequate sleep and setting more regular exercise reminders. She also reviewed the commercial insurance she had previously purchased and considered whether additional coverage was necessary. This was her first step in turning reflection into concrete action.

events.name: Pet Adoption Information Search After Work
events.description: After the incident, Yu Xiaowen returned home alone, feeling an unprecedented sense of loneliness and a longing for emotional companionship. She began to seriously consider adopting a pet, particularly a cat with an independent personality that could adapt to her work schedule. That evening, she searched online for local animal adoption information and considerations in Zhengzhou.

events.name: Dinner and Study Plan
events.description: She prepared a simple fruit salad and pan-fried chicken breast for dinner. After the meal, she continued reviewing her incorrect answers and began planning a preliminary itinerary for the academic conference. She studied late into the night.

events.name: Evening Meditation and Staying Up Late
events.description: I meditated for 10 minutes before bed, focusing on my breathing. However, due to heavy review tasks, I didn’t rest until late at night, storing up energy for the next day.

起始状态.心情: Focused, with a slight Monday work pressure.

结束状态.所处地点: Bedroom at home
结束状态.心情: Inspired, hopeful, with confidence boosted by professional recognition, yet weary.

state.今日运动: No specific exercise, but mindfulness practice was conducted.

2025-10.daily_overview: The rainy day brought a touch of gloom, and Yu Xiaowen focused indoors on reviewing summaries and preparing for meetings. She revisited mistakes to build a knowledge network, began planning her trip to the Shanghai Academic Annual Conference, and organized data for the community hypertension project. Her work and studies proceeded in an orderly manner, and her morning run was canceled due to the rain.

events.name: Morning Review of Incorrect Questions
events.description: Yu Xiaowen did not attempt new questions; instead, she focused on reviewing all the mistakes she had marked this week. She not only understood the correct answers but also delved into analyzing the reasons for her errors. Furthermore, she conducted a horizontal comparison and connection of the relevant knowledge points with the previously reviewed content on the respiratory and digestive systems, aiming to construct a more systematic knowledge network.

events.name: Commuting and Driving in the Rain
events.description: On a rainy day, Yu Xiaowen drove carefully to the hospital, and the commute took a bit longer than usual. She turned on the car heater and tuned in to the weather forecast and news.

events.name: Morning clinical work
events.description: At the hospital, she handled routine ward rounds and medical orders, paying special attention to changes in the physical conditions of several cardiovascular disease patients on rainy days.

events.name: Conference Registration and Itinerary Planning
events.description: Yu Xiaowen logged into the official website of the National Annual Academic Conference on Cardiovascular Diseases on her office computer, completed the registration for the conference, and began planning the specific itinerary for her trip to Shanghai. This included checking round-trip high-speed train schedules, booking a hotel for the duration of the conference, and submitting a business trip application to her department.

events.name: Community Hypertension Project Data Compilation
events.description: During a break at work, Yu Xiaowen sat in front of her office computer, reviewing and filtering data from the recent community hypertension management project she participated in. She identified the core findings and logical framework for her report, and compiled preliminary data charts and written explanations.

events.name: Lunchtime conversation with colleagues
events.description: I had lunch with Wang Fang in the hospital cafeteria, sharing the joy of qualifying for the annual meeting and discussing preparations for the mountain climbing activity.

events.name: Case Discussion in the Afternoon
events.description: Participating in the department's difficult case discussions, she actively contributed by integrating her review of knowledge with clinical practice.

events.name: Dinner and Household Chores
events.description: After returning home from work, she cooked a hot bowl of noodle soup to ward off the cold, and sorted out the seasonal clothes, taking out the thick coats for future use.

events.name: Evening Review and Music Relaxation
events.description: After dinner, I continued reviewing for a while, then listened to a Bach record, letting the music ease the gloom of the rainy day.

events.name: Further Inquiries on Pet Adoption
events.description: Before going to bed, she made initial contact with a staff member from an animal protection organization via WeChat to inquire about the adoption process and requirements.

起始状态.心情: Calm, slightly dull due to the rainy weather.

结束状态.所处地点: Bedroom at home
结束状态.心情: Fulfilling, well-organized, and satisfied with the progress of meeting preparations.

2025-10.daily_overview: Yu Xiaowen conducted a review summary for this week, planned key tasks for the next phase, and simultaneously advanced the preparation of the meeting report. She reviewed typical cases to conceptualize the report framework and reported to the director for guidance. Due to discomfort in her lower back, she rested early in the evening, and her weight increased slightly due to stress-related eating.

events.name: Morning Review Summary
events.description: Yu Xiaowen summarized her review progress for the two key subjects of cardiovascular and endocrinology this week, assessed her level of mastery, and planned the focus areas for the upcoming week's review. She listed the sections that need reinforcement in her notebook.

events.name: Commuting and Morning Meditation
events.description: On her way to work, she tried a brief mindful breathing exercise to help focus her attention. The weather improved, with sunlight breaking through the clouds.

events.name: Clinical work in the morning
events.description: Handle the daily diagnosis and treatment of inpatients, including blood sugar adjustment for a diabetic patient and medication review for a patient with coronary heart disease.

events.name: Meeting Report Framework Conceptualization
events.description: After work, Yu Xiaowen reviewed typical cases she handled during her rotation in the cardiology department in her home study. She selected several representative cases, organized relevant examination data, treatment plans, and follow-up results, and began to outline a preliminary framework for the conference report.

events.name: Report the framework to Director Zhang Lei.
events.description: Yu Xiaowen scheduled a brief meeting with Director Zhang Lei, during which she presented the preliminary reporting framework and key data in the director’s office. She also sought the director’s professional guidance on academic focus, logical rigor, and how to highlight clinical value.

events.name: Lunch and Exercise Reminder
events.description: During lunch, Wang Fang reminded her to take breaks, and they agreed to encourage each other during their weekend hike. Yu Xiaowen also set up exercise reminders on her phone.

events.name: Work and Study in the Afternoon
events.description: In the afternoon, I continued with clinical work and took some time to read a cardiology literature recommended by Teacher Li Wei.

events.name: Rest for lower back discomfort.
events.description: Due to prolonged sitting while studying, Yu Xiaowen experienced tension and slight soreness in her lower back muscles. She decided to rest early in the evening, apply a hot water bottle for heat therapy, and canceled her originally scheduled study plan.

events.name: Dinner and Relaxation
events.description: In the evening, she temporarily set aside her books, listened to some European classical music for a while, and had a phone call with her close friend Zhang Jing. They chatted about recent updates and shopping plans to relax her tense nerves.

events.name: Meditation and Rest
events.description: Before going to bed, I practiced 15 minutes of meditation, focusing on relaxing my body to build up energy for tomorrow, and went to bed early due to discomfort.

2025-10.daily_overview: On her rest day after working the night shift, Yu Xiaowen mainly focused on reviewing and organizing materials, as well as writing meeting reports. She compiled error-prone knowledge points, consulted literature to support her reports, and began drafting the initial version of a PowerPoint presentation. In the evening, she relieved her fatigue with a bowl of hot noodle soup, and her weight remained stable.

events.name: Rest after working the night shift
events.description: On the morning after her night shift, Yu Xiaowen stayed at home to catch up on sleep and regain her energy. After getting up, she noticed that the weather had turned noticeably colder.

events.name: Have hot noodle soup for lunch.
events.description: At noon, she ordered a bowl of tomato and egg noodle soup at a noodle shop near her home. The hot soup helped dispel the fatigue and chill from her night shift.

events.name: Compilation of Error-Prone Knowledge Points
events.description: In the afternoon, Yu Xiaowen focused on organizing the error-prone knowledge points and difficult questions encountered during the previous two weeks of review in her home study. She categorized the challenging topics in internal medicine, surgery, obstetrics and gynecology, and pediatrics separately, using different colored pens to mark them in her notebook, and added her own understanding and mnemonic techniques.

events.name: Meeting Report Literature Review
events.description: Yu Xiaowen utilized the hospital database and academic websites to review the latest cardiology research literature related to the selected cases, in order to support her clinical observations and conclusions, and began writing the textual part of the report.

events.name: Create the first draft of the presentation PPT.
events.description: Based on the collected data and the guidance of Director Zhang Lei, Yu Xiaowen concentrated on creating the initial draft of the presentation PPT in her home study. She completed content filling, chart optimization, and layout design to ensure accuracy and visual clarity.

events.name: Dinner and Household Chores
events.description: In the evening, I cooked a simple meal, tidied up the room, and took out the winter quilt for washing.

events.name: Evening Review with Music
events.description: I reviewed the compiled list of common mistakes for a while, then listened to a Mozart piano piece to relax.

events.name: Pet Adoption Progress
events.description: She contacted the animal protection organization again to learn about the currently available cats for adoption and scheduled a weekend appointment to see them.

2025-10.daily_overview: On Friday, Yu Xiaowen pushed forward with both work and review. She tackled difficult points through targeted exercises, consulted her mentor for guidance, refined her meeting presentation, and prepared for the upcoming mountain hike the next day. Her life was busy yet orderly, and she experienced a slight weight loss.

events.name: Morning Special Practice
events.description: Based on the error-prone points compiled the previous day, Yu Xiaowen utilized online question banks for targeted practice, focusing on the diagnosis and treatment principles of cardiovascular and digestive system diseases. She repeatedly studied the answer explanations for the questions she got wrong until she fully understood them.

events.name: Commuting and Work
events.description: Driving to work, she planned out her tasks for the day and her study schedule along the way. The weather was clear but cold, so she wore a thick coat.

events.name: Ask Teacher Li Wei for advice on a question.
events.description: Taking advantage of the relatively quiet Saturday morning in the department (she was off duty today), Yu Xiaowen brought several clinical challenges she had organized to consult her mentor, Li Wei. Through discussions of actual clinical cases, she deepened her understanding of theoretical knowledge.

events.name: PPT Revision and Enhancement
events.description: Yu Xiaowen sent the initial draft of the PPT to her mentor, Li Wei, via WeChat. During a break in her work that same day, she met with Mr. Li in person to discuss his specific suggestions for revisions regarding the details of the PPT, the accuracy of clinical data interpretation, and the pacing of the presentation. She subsequently made adjustments and improvements based on the feedback received.

events.name: Preparation of Mountaineering Equipment
events.description: After work, Yu Xiaowen checked and prepared the items needed for the hike at home, including comfortable hiking shoes, sportswear, a backpack, drinking water, a small amount of snacks, a power bank, and emergency medicine, to ensure a smooth trip the next day.

events.name: Dinner and Review
events.description: She prepared a simple dinner, and after the meal, she continued to review for a while, focusing on the content that might be covered in tomorrow's mock exam.

events.name: Evening Relaxation and Connection
events.description: I had a brief phone call with my parents to update them on my recent situation, then listened to some music to relax. I also confirmed the meeting time and location with Wang Fang for tomorrow.

events.name: Meditation and Early Bedtime
events.description: To have energy for tomorrow's mountain climbing, she meditated in advance and went to bed early.

2025-10.daily_overview: On Saturday, Yu Xiaowen participated in a one-day hiking activity on Mount Songshan organized by the hospital's labor union. Together with her colleague Wang Fang and others, she relaxed in nature, reached the summit to enjoy the autumn scenery, and relieved work-related stress. After returning home in the evening, she recorded and shared the wonderful experience. Her weight decreased as a result of the exercise.

events.name: Gather and depart in the early morning.
events.description: In the early morning, Yu Xiaowen and Wang Fang arrived at the designated meeting point at Zhengzhou Central Hospital on time. They joined other colleagues participating in the activity and boarded the bus arranged by the labor union, setting off together for Songshan Mountain.

events.name: The process of mountain climbing and team interaction.
events.description: Upon arriving at Mount Song, we began our ascent. The autumn mountain scenery was beautiful. Yu Xiaowen, Wang Fang, and colleagues from other departments chatted and laughed along the way, encouraging each other as they climbed the steeper sections, enjoying the fun of group activities.

events.name: Successfully reaching the summit and broadening one's state of mind.
events.description: After a strenuous climb, Yu Xiaowen and her colleagues successfully reached the summit. Gazing down at the magnificent mountain scenery, she temporarily forgot the pressures of her hospital work, immersing herself in the beauty of nature and a sense of sudden enlightenment.

events.name: Descending and Returning
events.description: After resting and taking photos at the mountain peak, the team began their orderly descent. They then boarded a bus to return to Zhengzhou Central Hospital, concluding the day's mountain climbing activity.

events.name: Return Journey Sharing and Reflection
events.description: Returning to the urban area of Zhengzhou from Mount Songshan with colleagues such as Wang Fang, we shared photos of the hike in the car, reminiscing about the scenery and amusing incidents along the way. Though physically exhausted, our spirits were high.

events.name: Go home to wash and tidy up.
events.description: After returning home in Jinshui District, I cleaned the hiking shoes and clothes, put the backpack back in its place, and imported the hiking photos and videos from my phone into the computer for backup, initially selecting some highlights.

events.name: Muscle Relaxation and Recovery
events.description: Due to sore leg muscles after mountain climbing, I soaked my feet in hot water and used a fascia gun to relax the calf and thigh muscles, ensuring full body recovery to avoid affecting work the next day.

events.name: Dinner and Sharing
events.description: In the evening, I had a video chat with my best friend Zhang Jing on WeChat, where I described in detail the process of hiking, the scenery I saw, and the fun moments I had with my colleagues. Zhang Jing was also happy for me.

events.name: The final draft of the PPT is completed.
events.description: Based on the previous feedback from Teacher Li Wei, Yu Xiaowen meticulously revised the PPT, refining the wording, adjusting the charts, and emphasizing key conclusions, ultimately finalizing the PPT for the presentation.

events.name: Evening Rest
events.description: Go to bed early and prepare for tomorrow's mock exam.

events.name: Lunch and a short break
events.description: After the exam, she prepared a simple lunch and rested for half an hour to relax her mind.

events.name: Professional Knowledge Subject Mock Examination
events.description: In the afternoon, the simulation exam for relevant professional knowledge subjects continued. After the exam, Yu Xiaowen immediately checked the answers, conducted preliminary review, tallied the scores for each section, and identified obvious areas of knowledge weakness.

events.name: Organization and Sharing of Mountaineering Photos
events.description: The day after the hiking activity, Yu Xiaowen sorted through the photos and videos taken on her phone at home, selected a few satisfying ones to share on her social media feed, and reminisced about the fun moments of the event with colleagues like Wang Fang in a WeChat group.

events.name: Dinner and Study Plan
events.description: I prepared a healthy dinner in the evening. After the meal, based on the results of the mock exam, I developed a targeted review plan for the final sprint phase and snacked a bit due to stress.

events.description: She had a video call with her brother Yu Xiaofeng, sharing her mountain climbing experiences and exam progress. Her brother offered her some encouragement and advice.

2025-11.daily_overview: On a relaxed Sunday morning, Yu Xiaowen stepped away from her intense exam preparation and embarked on a long-planned journey between two cities. She methodically completed a warm check-in with her family, made final preparations for the trip, and then boarded the high-speed train to Shanghai. During the journey, she used fragmented time to handle personal matters and plan for upcoming work and life. It was a day filled with anticipation and warmth, serving as a preparatory day.

events.name: Video calling with my mother to discuss purchasing a foot bath.
events.description: After getting up, Yu Xiaowen remembered that the weather had turned cooler recently, and her parents in Luoyang needed to pay more attention to keeping their feet warm. She contacted her mother, Li Xiuying, via WeChat video call and shared her idea of buying a foot bath basin for them. She patiently inquired about her parents' specific preferences regarding the style and functions of the basin and confirmed the delivery address. Her mother was delighted, and the two discussed for nearly ten minutes before finally settling on a few alternative models. Yu Xiaowen then bookmarked the relevant products in her shopping app.

events.name: Pack your bags and plan your itinerary.
events.description: After hanging up the phone, Yu Xiaowen began packing for her trip to Shanghai. Based on Shanghai's weather and the conference schedule, she prepared several sets of appropriate professional attire, comfortable casual shoes, a laptop, a power bank, and materials for her conference presentation. Considering she might need something to read during the journey and the conference, she also tucked a medical journal she was currently reading and a novel into her bag.

events.name: Take the high-speed train to Shanghai.
events.description: At noon, Yu Xiaowen drove her family car from her home in Jinshui District to Zhengzhou East Railway Station. After parking her car in the station's parking lot, she smoothly boarded the afternoon high-speed train to Shanghai. During the nearly five-hour journey, she once again familiarized herself with the meeting agenda and her presentation materials, and used her phone's memo app to review and adjust her Double Eleven shopping list.

events.name: Arrive in Shanghai and check into the hotel.
events.description: In the evening, Yu Xiaowen arrived at Shanghai Hongqiao Station. She took the subway to the conference hotel to check in. The room was tidy and quiet, and she quickly settled in. After a brief rest, she went downstairs to familiarize herself with the hotel environment and the route to the conference venue.

events.name: Added: Brief evening meditation to adjust state.
events.description: Before going to bed, Yu Xiaowen engaged in 10 minutes of mindfulness meditation to help herself recover from the fatigue of travel and prepare for tomorrow's meeting. Using an app for guidance, she focused on her breathing and felt her mood gradually calm down.

结束状态.所处地点: In a guest room at a conference hotel in Shanghai
结束状态.心情: Calm and well-prepared, the novelty of being in a foreign place intertwines with a faint anticipation for tomorrow's meeting.

2025-11.daily_overview: On the first day of the National Annual Conference on Cardiovascular Diseases, Yu Xiaowen immersed herself wholeheartedly in the grand academic atmosphere. From the awe-inspiring keynote report at the opening ceremony to the cutting-edge thematic sessions, a wealth of information flooded her mind, filling her with excitement while also subtly bringing a sense of pressure to reflect on the breadth and depth of her own knowledge. It was a day of broadening professional horizons and stimulating thought.

events.name: Attend the opening ceremony of the annual conference and the main venue reports
events.description: Yu Xiaowen changed into a formal shirt and trousers early in the morning and headed to the main venue of the annual conference to attend the opening ceremony. She listened to reports from top domestic and international experts on cutting-edge topics such as new targets for heart failure, artificial intelligence-assisted diagnosis of cardiovascular diseases, and risk prediction. The grand academic atmosphere and the refreshing research findings left her deeply impressed.

events.name: Lunch and exchange with peers
events.description: At noon in the conference cafeteria, Yu Xiaowen ran into several resident doctors of her age from hospitals in other provinces and cities. As they ate, they chatted and shared their respective hospital work models, common cases, and career development concerns. This peer-to-peer exchange made her feel a sense of familiarity.

events.name: Attend the Cardiology Sub-venue in the afternoon.
events.description: In the afternoon, Yu Xiaowen chose to attend a specialized session on cardiovascular medicine that was more relevant to her rotation department. She attentively listened to expert lectures on the clinical application of new anticoagulant drugs and management strategies for refractory hypertension, taking detailed notes throughout.

events.name: New: Due to a light diet, there has been a slight decrease in weight.
events.description: Returning to the hotel in the evening, Yu Xiaowen noticed that the conference meals were relatively light. She intentionally controlled her intake, feeling that her weight might have slightly decreased. She decided to increase her protein intake the next day to maintain her energy levels.

events.name: Organize notes, relax in the evening.
events.description: To relax her mind, she opened her phone and played her favorite Bach's "Air on the G String." As the soothing classical music played, she reflected on the day's experiences and briefly shared her conference highlights with her close friend Zhang Jing in Zhengzhou via WeChat.

起始状态.所处地点: In a guest room at a conference hotel in Shanghai
起始状态.心情: Focused and slightly nervous, filled with anticipation for the upcoming academic feast.

结束状态.所处地点: In a guest room of a conference hotel in Shanghai
结束状态.心情: The mind is enriched yet slightly weary, impacted by cutting-edge knowledge while also mingled with a slight anxiety over one's own inadequacies and a determination to catch up.

date_attribute.weather: Shanghai: Cloudy turning to clear, temperature 14-21°C, light breeze.

2025-11.daily_overview: On the second day of the conference, opportunities and inspirations came one after another. The in-depth learning in the morning and the unexpected reunion with an old classmate, Zhou Haoran, in the afternoon became the two highlights of the day. From specialized skills to research perspectives, and further to discussions on personal career paths, Yu Xiaowen’s reflections were continuously deepened, and a more valuable academic connection spanning regions was being reestablished.

events.name: Attended a workshop on clinical research methods in the morning.
events.description: Yu Xiaowen chose to attend a basic skills workshop on clinical research design and statistical methods. This was highly practical for her, as she aspires to integrate clinical practice with scientific research. She diligently took notes on key points, ranging from case-control studies to the design of randomized controlled trials (RCTs).

events.name: Bumped into my university classmate Zhou Haoran during the tea break.
events.description: During the afternoon tea break, Yu Xiaowen unexpectedly spotted a familiar figure in the crowd—Zhou Haoran, a college classmate. The two greeted each other with pleasant surprise and then found a quiet corner for a deeper conversation. They shared their experiences since graduation, and Zhou Haoran's research perspectives and resources opened up new possibilities for Yu Xiaowen.

events.name: Poster Presentation and Peer Exchange
events.description: In the afternoon, Yu Xiaowen browsed the posters of other researchers in the designated area. She proactively engaged with several presenters, asking questions about experimental designs and results that piqued her interest.

events.name: Having dinner with colleagues.
events.description: In the evening, Zhou Haoran invited Yu Xiaowen, along with several of his colleagues from Beijing and Shanghai, to have dinner together. During the meal, everyone relaxed and chatted about interesting anecdotes in the medical field, the healthcare ecosystems in different cities, and the growth challenges faced by young doctors. Yu Xiaowen listened attentively and also appropriately shared her experiences working in Zhengzhou.

events.name: New: Slight weight gain due to dinner socializing.
events.description: The dinner was quite sumptuous, and Yu Xiaowen enjoyed the social interactions, but she realized she had consumed a high number of calories, which might lead to a slight weight gain. She decided to pay more attention to maintaining a balanced diet starting tomorrow.

起始状态.心情: Feeling rejuvenated and full of curiosity, looking forward to learning more practical skills today.

结束状态.所处地点: In a guest room of a conference hotel in Shanghai
结束状态.心情: Excited and deeply inspired, the reunion and in-depth conversation with Zhou Haoran acted like a powerful stimulant, greatly expanding her professional imagination and positively transforming her network of interpersonal relationships.

2025-11.daily_overview: On the final day of the conference, Yu Xiaowen embarked on her journey home with a wealth of insights and reflections. The closing ceremony marked the end of her trip to Shanghai, while the solitary contemplation on the high-speed train allowed her to internalize the external impact into a clear self-awareness—her English proficiency had become a distinct shortcoming in her career development. Upon returning home, a complex mix of emotions, blending the joy of newfound knowledge with the challenge of confronting her shortcomings, began to settle in.

events.name: Attend the closing ceremony of the annual conference
events.description: Yu Xiaowen attended the brief closing ceremony of the conference and listened to the summary of the meeting. Reflecting on the three-day schedule, she felt that the trip was truly worthwhile, as it not only updated her knowledge base but, more importantly, helped establish new academic connections.

events.name: Take the high-speed train back to Zhengzhou.
events.description: After the meeting, Yu Xiaowen immediately returned to the hotel to pick up her luggage, then hurried to Shanghai Hongqiao Station to catch the afternoon high-speed train back to Zhengzhou. During the journey, instead of resting, she carefully organized the business cards, materials, and thick notes she had collected during the meeting.

events.name: Reflection and Identification of Weaknesses in English Proficiency
events.description: While sorting through those brilliant English reports, Yu Xiaowen repeatedly recalled the English slides that required strenuous effort to understand. A strong realization emerged: fluent professional English skills in listening, speaking, reading, and writing are the key to accessing a broader academic world, and this is precisely her current fatal weakness.

events.name: New: Slight Weight Gain Due to High-Speed Rail Meals
events.description: On the high-speed train, Yu Xiaowen ate the provided meal and felt it was high in calories, possibly leading to a slight weight gain. She decided to adjust her diet after returning home.

events.name: Return to Zhengzhou apartment
events.description: In the evening, Yu Xiaowen arrived at Zhengzhou East Station, picked up her car, and returned home in Jinshui District. After putting down her luggage, she faced the suddenly quiet room, where the exhaustion from three days of intense input and a sense of clarity washed over her simultaneously.

2025-11.daily_overview: The first day back to the routine work. Yu Xiaowen needed to digest the insights gained from the meeting and translate them into concrete actions and reports. However, a piece of distressing news she saw in her classmates' group chat during a work break was like a stone thrown into the calm lake of her heart, stirring intense reflections on the balance between work and health, laying the groundwork for subsequent changes.

events.name: Report the meeting attendance to the department.
events.description: In the morning, Yu Xiaowen returned to the Cardiology Department of Zhengzhou Central Hospital. She first gave an oral report to her mentor Li Wei and the department director Zhang Lei, briefly introducing the latest trends from the annual conference. In the afternoon, she submitted a more detailed written summary report to the department.

events.name: Upon hearing the tragic news of a colleague's sudden death
events.description: During the lunch break, Yu Xiaowen saw a heartbreaking message in her medical school classmate’s WeChat group: a resident doctor of their age from a hospital in another city had suffered sudden cardiac death due to overwork from consecutive shifts. The group was filled with mourning and shock. Yu Xiaowen stared at her phone screen, speechless for a long time.

events.name: Reflecting on Work Patterns and Health
events.description: While working in the afternoon, Yu Xiaowen felt somewhat restless. The news of the sudden death of that colleague kept echoing in her mind. She began to unconsciously observe herself: Are my shoulders tighter? How has my sleep quality been lately? When was the last time I exercised regularly?

events.name: New: Appetite decreased due to stress, with a slight weight loss.
events.description: Feeling down, Yu Xiaowen ate less for lunch and noticed a slight decrease in her weight. She realized the need to better manage her emotions and diet.

events.name: Preliminary study of English learning resources after work.
events.description: After returning home from work, Yu Xiaowen temporarily set aside her heavy emotions and focused on handling the newly established goals. She searched for learning apps and online courses related to medical English and academic spoken language in mobile app stores and on web pages.

events.name: Taking care of green plants soothes the mood.
events.description: While getting up to pour water, Yu Xiaowen noticed that a few leaves of the pothos plant in the study had turned yellow. She moved the pot to a well-ventilated spot by the window and carefully trimmed away the yellowed leaves with scissors. This simple, focused act of care provided her with a moment of tranquility, allowing her to escape the chaotic thoughts of the day.

2025-11.daily_overview: A night shift in the cardiology department where challenges and growth coexisted. Yu Xiaowen independently handled multiple emergency patients, including a case of acute chest pain suspected to be pulmonary embolism. From patient admission and emergency management to coordinating examinations and formulating treatment plans, the entire process was intense yet orderly. In this high-intensity clinical practice, her adaptability and decision-making skills were fully exercised and validated.

events.name: Evening shift change, preparing for the night shift.
events.description: In the evening, Yu Xiaowen arrived early at the cardiology ward of Zhengzhou Central Hospital. She conducted a detailed and efficient bedside handover with the day-shift doctor, thoroughly understanding the changes in condition of all inpatients, key patients requiring attention, and pending matters.

events.name: Receive and urgently manage patients with acute chest pain.
events.description: At night, a middle-aged man was rushed to the emergency department due to sudden severe chest pain. Yu Xiaowen promptly took charge, quickly inquired about his medical history, conducted a physical examination, and immediately ordered emergency tests such as an electrocardiogram, myocardial enzyme profile, and D-dimer to differentiate between acute myocardial infarction, aortic dissection, or pulmonary embolism.

events.name: Analyze the condition and arrange key examinations.
events.description: The preliminary examination ruled out acute myocardial infarction, but D-dimer levels were significantly elevated. Based on the clinical presentation, Yu Xiaowen strongly suspected pulmonary embolism or aortic dissection. She immediately contacted the on-duty radiologist to arrange an urgent chest CT angiography.

events.name: Diagnose pulmonary embolism and formulate a treatment plan.
events.description: The CTA results confirmed acute pulmonary embolism. Following the latest clinical guidelines, Yu Xiaowen promptly developed a detailed treatment plan, which included adjusting the dosage of anticoagulant medication, assessing the risk of thrombolysis, and coordinating with the intensive care unit for bed arrangements.

events.name: Continuous Nighttime Rounds and Management of Other Patients
events.description: After dealing with the main critically ill patients, Yu Xiaowen did not rest. She conducted routine rounds in the emergency observation area and for two other patients admitted during the night, handling a mild drug allergy reaction for one of them.

events.name: New: Night shifts are energy-intensive, resulting in a slight weight loss.
events.description: Working overnight consumed a lot of energy, and Yu Xiaowen felt that her weight might have slightly decreased. She decided to rest well and replenish her nutrition after her shift.

起始状态.所处地点: No. 89 Jingsan Road, Jinshui District, Zhengzhou City, Henan Province (Rental)
起始状态.心情: Calm, with the usual caution and focus before a night shift, mentally prepared to face the challenges.

结束状态.所处地点: Cardiology Department Doctor's Office, Zhengzhou Central Hospital
结束状态.心情: Extremely exhausted yet filled with a sense of accomplishment. Having experienced high-intensity clinical decision-making and management, I have gained stronger confidence in my ability to independently handle critical and urgent cases, significantly enhancing my professional identity and sense of value.

state.今日运动: Frequent brisk walking between the ward, emergency department, and imaging department at night, with steps exceeding 12,000.

date_attribute.weather: Zhengzhou: Light rain turning to overcast, temperature 4-10°C, with increasing chill.

2025-11.daily_overview: After the physical exhaustion of pulling an all-night shift, Yu Xiaowen achieved a small yet significant breakthrough in her professional habits—she successfully declined a non-urgent overtime task for the first time. Meanwhile, she made a final decision to adopt the pet cat Orange and proactively sought guidance from her mentor on research ideas. On this day, she took a step forward in both protecting herself and striving for progress.

events.name: Night Shift Morning Handover and Report
events.description: In the early morning, Yu Xiaowen mustered her energy to systematically review the treatment processes of all patients from the night shift, updated the electronic medical records, and wrote a detailed handover report. During the morning meeting in the cardiology department, she provided a clear and well-organized summary of the key points from the night shift to the department head Zhang Lei, her mentor Li Wei, and all her colleagues.

events.name: After work rest, replenish sleep
events.description: After the shift handover, Yu Xiaowen felt completely drained. She quickly left work and went home, washed up briefly, and fell asleep immediately, not waking up naturally until the afternoon. The ample rest restored most of her energy.

events.name: First attempt at setting work boundaries
events.description: After waking up and checking her phone, she found that her mentor, Li Wei, had sent her a message on WeChat asking her to help organize the minutes of last week's departmental case discussion meeting, and requested that she send it to him before the end of the workday. Yu Xiaowen looked at the message and remembered the adjustment principles she had set for herself. She took a deep breath and politely but firmly replied, requesting a postponement. Teacher Li replied, agreeing to her request.

events.name: Decided to adopt an orange cat and named it Orange.
events.description: After finishing her work messages, Yu Xiaowen clicked on the video of the ginger cat sent by the animal protection volunteer again. The sight of the cat quietly grooming itself instantly touched her heart. Without hesitation, she replied to the volunteer, formally expressing her intention to adopt and deciding to rename it Orange.

events.name: Added: Video call with brother to discuss adoption decision
events.description: In the evening, Yu Xiaowen made a video call to her brother Yu Xiaofeng in Shenzhen and shared the news about her decision to adopt Orange. Her brother was very happy, offering her some advice on pet care, and they agreed to play together the next time they meet.

events.name: Ask Teacher Li Wei for advice on AI-assisted diagnostic applications.
events.description: In the evening, Yu Xiaowen took the initiative to go to the hospital and found Teacher Li Wei in his office. Not only did she submit her initial thoughts on organizing the meeting minutes, but she also raised her own questions about the cutting-edge report on AI-assisted diagnosis she had heard at the Shanghai annual conference.

events.name: Final Check of the Double Eleven Shopping Cart
events.description: Returning home in the evening, Yu Xiaowen opened the shopping app one last time to check the prices, discount combinations, and delivery addresses for all the items in her cart. She removed two accessories that had been added on impulse, making sure that everything left was a necessity.

起始状态.所处地点: Cardiology Department Doctor's Office, Zhengzhou Central Hospital
起始状态.心情: The body is utterly exhausted, but the spirit is invigorated by the successful handling of the night shift, maintaining the lingering tension after intense focus.

结束状态.所处地点: No. 89 Jingsan Road, Jinshui District, Zhengzhou City, Henan Province (Rental) Living Room
结束状态.心情: Complex yet positive. Attempts to break through work boundaries bring slight unease and immense relief; the decision to adopt Orange fills the heart with tender anticipation; exchanges with teachers bring a sense of academic fulfillment. A feeling of power, actively taking control of life on multiple fronts, is growing.

date_attribute.weather: Zhengzhou: Sunny, temperature 3-11°C, significant temperature difference between day and night.

2025-11.daily_overview: The execution day of the Double Eleven shopping festival also marked the official launch of the new plan. Yu Xiaowen completed her shopping rationally and, after consulting and comparing, decisively enrolled in a professional English course. From recognizing her shortcomings to taking action, the speed was swift, reflecting her goal-oriented personality. At the same time, the positive feedback after setting work boundaries strengthened her resolve to make changes.

events.name: Midnight Flash Sale, Complete Your Double 11 Shopping
events.description: Just after midnight on November 11th, Yu Xiaowen quickly operated her phone, submitted all the shopping cart orders, and completed the payment using the pre-bound payment method. The total expenditure was 2,987 yuan, strictly within the 3,000 yuan budget.

events.name: Consulting English Learning Experience
events.description: In the morning, Yu Xiaowen sent WeChat messages to her university classmates Zhou Haoran in Beijing and Zhao Ming in Shenzhen, respectively, to seek their advice on improving professional English, particularly in preparation for attending international conferences.

events.name: Compare and Enroll in Professional English Courses
events.description: Combining her classmates' suggestions with her previous research, Yu Xiaowen focused on comparing two online English learning apps that specialize in medical scenario conversation and academic communication. In the afternoon, she ultimately selected a platform whose course system better met her needs and purchased a three-month package online, which included two one-on-one sessions with foreign teachers each week.

events.name: New: Having a midnight snack after late-night shopping leads to a slight weight gain.
events.description: Due to staying up late for shopping, Yu Xiaowen had some snacks as a late-night meal in the early morning, feeling that her weight might have slightly increased. She decided to pay attention to her diet control tomorrow.

events.name: Observe the feedback after setting boundaries.
events.description: During the afternoon work hours, Yu Xiaowen sent the organized minutes of the case discussion meeting to Teacher Li Wei. Teacher Li quickly replied with "Received, thank you," accompanied by a smiling emoji. Yu Xiaowen noticed that Teacher Li did not show any dissatisfaction due to her delay from the previous day.

events.name: First Experience Music Healing Favorites
events.description: Feeling a bit tired after work in the evening, Yu Xiaowen remembered her curated music therapy playlist. She opened the player, selected Debussy's "Clair de Lune," and let the ethereal, soothing piano melody flow throughout the room.

起始状态.心情: Starting a new day with the satisfaction of completing shopping goals and a bit of drowsiness from staying up late.

结束状态.所处地点: No. 89 Jingsan Road, Jinshui District, Zhengzhou City, Henan Province (rental) living room
结束状态.心情: A sense of joy filled with action. Rational consumption and successfully launching an English learning plan brought dual satisfaction; attempts to set boundaries at work received positive feedback, boosting confidence; the initial experience with music therapy was promising. Overall, the state is positive and uplifting.

2025-11.daily_overview: A day when life returns to its regular rhythm. The first batch of spoils from Double Eleven arrived, adding a touch of small, everyday happiness. After work, the badminton appointment with her friend Lin Wei was a concrete step in fulfilling her commitment to regular weekly exercise. The exhilarating workout and the post-game chat at the night market effectively released the accumulated stress from the week.

events.name: Received the first batch of Double 11 packages.
events.description: During the lunch break, Yu Xiaowen received a pickup notification from the courier station. After work, she retrieved two packages and discovered they contained the medical textbooks she had ordered and a novel by Keigo Higashino. She placed the professional books on the shelf next to her desk for easy access whenever needed.

events.name: Plan an English learning schedule
events.description: Based on her schedule for the next month, Yu Xiaowen marked the times for her two weekly one-on-one English lessons on her phone calendar. She also planned to use fragmented time, such as daily commutes and lunch breaks, to complete vocabulary check-ins and listening practice tasks on the app.

events.name: Added: Commence writing a literature review on AI-assisted diagnosis.
events.description: As the beginning of a cross-day event, Yu Xiaowen started working on a literature review about the application of AI-assisted diagnosis in the field of cardiovascular diseases. She organized the previously collected literature and drafted an outline.

events.name: Playing badminton with my badminton buddy Lin Wei.
events.description: After work, Yu Xiaowen drove her car as planned to the badminton court near her workplace. She and her friend Lin Wei thoroughly warmed up, then engaged in nearly an hour and a half of doubles practice followed by a friendly match.

events.name: Gathering at the night market, sharing recent updates.
events.description: After the sports event, Yu Xiaowen and Lin Wei went to the night market near the stadium. They ordered skewers, hot pot, and drinks, chatting as they ate. Yu Xiaowen shared her decision to adopt a cat and her plan to start learning English.

events.name: New: Slight weight gain due to night market gatherings.
events.description: The night market offered a variety of foods, and Yu Xiaowen enjoyed the pleasure of dining together, but she realized that she had consumed a relatively high amount of calories, which might lead to a slight weight gain.

起始状态.心情: Peace, starting the day with a steady sense of executing the plan.

结束状态.所处地点: No. 89 Jingsan Road, Jinshui District, Zhengzhou City, Henan Province (Rental) Study Room
结束状态.心情: Refreshing and fulfilling. The dopamine released from exercise elevates the mood; dining with friends satisfies social needs; starting the literature review brings a sense of academic fulfillment. A balance between life and work is beginning to take shape.

2025-11.daily_overview: A day of preparation before facing a challenge. Yu Xiaowen was responsible for an elderly patient with complex heart failure, requiring a multidisciplinary consultation the following day. She invested significant effort, meticulously reviewing the medical records, consulting the latest guidelines, and preparing a presentation PPT. She was fully prepared to present the case clearly and professionally in front of numerous experts, feeling both the pressure and a determined resolve to embrace the challenge.

events.name: Conduct an in-depth review of medical records for complex cases.
events.description: Today, Yu Xiaowen's primary responsibility involved an elderly patient with heart failure whose condition showed signs of relapse, accompanied by complex comorbidities. The department decided to organize a multidisciplinary consultation the following day. Yu Xiaowen spent the entire day in the office meticulously reviewing all of the patient's medical records.

events.name: Reviewing Literature and Guidelines
events.description: During the process of reviewing the cases, Yu Xiaowen frequently logged into clinical decision support systems such as UpToDate to address several diagnostic and treatment uncertainties. She also consulted the latest heart failure management guidelines and relevant research literature, taking notes on key information.

events.name: Create an MDT Presentation PPT
events.description: Working overtime in the evening, Yu Xiaowen used the office computer to start creating the presentation PPT for tomorrow's multidisciplinary consultation. She aimed for simplicity and clarity, visually presenting the patient's core information, diagnosis and treatment process, key existing issues, and the points she hoped experts from various departments would discuss.

events.name: New: Due to ordering takeout during overtime work, weight remains stable.
events.description: Due to working overtime, Yu Xiaowen ordered takeout for dinner, feeling that her diet was relatively balanced and her weight remained stable.

events.name: First time completing an online English course.
events.description: At nine o'clock in the evening, it was time for Yu Xiaowen's first one-on-one English lesson. She logged in on time, and the foreign teacher was an instructor with a medical background. The first lesson primarily focused on needs analysis and proficiency testing.

events.name: Added: Cancel the originally scheduled exercise and focus on preparation.
events.description: The scheduled evening workout was canceled to focus on preparing for the consultation. Yu Xiaowen felt this was a necessary trade-off but decided to make up for the exercise tomorrow.

起始状态.心情: Focus, aware that today's tasks are heavy and require concentration.

结束状态.所处地点: No. 89 Jingsan Road, Jinshui District, Zhengzhou City, Henan Province (Rental) Study Room
结束状态.心情: Exhaustion after intense mental labor, yet mingled with the reassurance of thorough preparation and satisfaction from the first English class. Pressure coexists with motivation.

2025-11.daily_overview: A highlight in career growth. Yu Xiaowen successfully completed a case presentation in front of a multidisciplinary panel of experts and calmly handled the questions. This experience not only benefited her professionally but also greatly honed her communication skills and ability to think on her feet. A celebratory dinner with colleagues after the meeting brought a pleasant conclusion to this intense yet rewarding day.

events.name: Pre-rehearsal with the supervising teacher before the consultation.
events.description: In the morning, Yu Xiaowen approached her mentor, Li Wei, ahead of time and used a brief moment before the consultation began to quickly conduct a pre-presentation. She briefly explained the logic and key points of her PowerPoint, and after listening, Teacher Li offered suggestions for adjustments on several details.

events.name: Presided over multidisciplinary consultation case presentations
events.description: In the afternoon, the MDT meeting commenced on time in the conference room of the Cardiology Department. The meeting was chaired by the department director, Zhang Lei, and attended by multiple experts from the Cardiac Surgery, Respiratory Medicine, Nephrology, and Clinical Pharmacy departments. As the attending resident physician, Yu Xiaowen stood in front of the projector and delivered a clear, well-organized, and appropriately paced case presentation using the PowerPoint slides she had prepared.

events.name: Calmly respond to expert questions and discussions.
events.description: After the presentation, the experts began to ask questions and engage in discussions. The questions covered various aspects, including differential diagnosis, assessment of surgical timing, drug interactions, and nutritional support. Yu Xiaowen responded to and analyzed each question by drawing on the materials she had prepared in advance and her clinical observations.

events.name: Organize Consultation Opinions and Reflections
events.description: After the consultation concluded, Yu Xiaowen promptly recorded detailed MDT consultation opinions in the medical record system based on the discussion results and organized a specific next-step diagnosis and treatment plan. Subsequently, she reviewed the entire consultation process and reflected on her gains and losses in reporting and responding in her notebook.

events.name: New: Continue writing the literature review
events.description: As a continuation of the cross-day event, Yu Xiaowen took time in the evening to continue writing the literature review on AI-assisted diagnosis, adding new sections and references.

events.name: Celebratory dinner with colleague Wang Fang
events.description: After work, Yu Xiaowen and her close colleague Wang Fang found a nice restaurant near the hospital to have a meal, which served as a small celebration. The two shared their tension and excitement about participating in such a high-level consultation.

起始状态.所处地点: No. 89 Jingsan Road, Jinshui District, Zhengzhou City, Henan Province (Rental) Bedroom
起始状态.心情: Tense and highly focused, making final mental preparations for the upcoming important presentation.

结束状态.所处地点: No. 89 Jingsan Road, Jinshui District, Zhengzhou City, Henan Province (Rental) Home
结束状态.心情: A sense of relief, fulfillment, and pride. The joy of successfully completing a challenge is intense, with a significant boost in self-efficacy and professional confidence reaching new heights.
