2025-11.daily_overview: A warm and busy day off. In the morning, I enjoyed authentic hometown delicacies with my best friend, filled with the joyful atmosphere of everyday life. In the afternoon, I wholeheartedly devoted myself to welcoming our new family member, Orange, from completing the adoption procedures to bringing it home and settling it in. The entire process was filled with love and a sense of responsibility. Yu Xiaowen’s solitary life has since gained an additional warm bond.

events.name: Enjoying a breakfast of spicy soup with my best friend Zhang Jing.
events.description: There was no need to rush on Saturday morning. Yu Xiaowen and Zhang Jing met at a highly recommended authentic spicy soup restaurant. They ordered steaming bowls of spicy soup, freshly fried dough sticks, and steamed buns, chatting away in the lively and warm atmosphere of the bustling market.

events.name: Go to the foster family to pick up Orange.
events.description: In the afternoon, as scheduled, Yu Xiaowen drove to the foster home where Orange was staying, bringing along a prepared carrier, a cat bag, and pee pads. She saw the gentle orange cat again, who seemed to remember her and came over to rub against her hand.

events.name: Formally complete the adoption procedures
events.description: Subsequently, Yu Xiaowen went to the office of the animal protection organization, filled out a detailed adoption application form, signed a legally binding adoption agreement, and paid the necessary deposit and donation fees, officially becoming the adopter of Orange.

events.name: Pick up the oranges and settle them in at home.
events.description: After completing all the formalities, Yu Xiaowen carefully placed Orange into a well-padded carrier and brought it back to her home in Jinshui District. Following the instructions, she first settled Orange in the relatively quiet study, opened the carrier door, and set up the litter box, water bowl, and cat food.

events.name: Arrange daily necessities for the orange.
events.description: In the evening, Yu Xiaowen unpacked and assembled the Double 11 packages she had picked up during the day—a cat tree, a scratching board, and a few cat toys for Juzi—and carefully placed them in the study. She also prepared new cat food and a water bowl.

events.name: Consult colleagues about pet insurance matters.
events.description: While settling the cat, Yu Xiaowen remembered risk management. She sent a WeChat message to her colleague Wang Fang, who also has pets, to ask about her experience with purchasing pet health insurance.

events.name: Added: Evening interaction with cats, adjusting daily routine
events.description: Before going to bed, Yu Xiaowen had a brief interaction with Orange to observe how well it was adapting. She adjusted her own schedule to better align with the rhythm of her new pet.

起始状态.所处地点: No. 89 Jingsan Road, Jinshui District, Zhengzhou City, Henan Province (Rental) Bedroom
起始状态.心情: Feeling relaxed and happy, I'm full of anticipation for the upcoming food gathering and the big event of adoption.

结束状态.所处地点: No. 89 Jingsan Road, Jinshui District, Zhengzhou City, Henan Province (Rental) Living Room
结束状态.心情: Gentle, content, and slightly novel. The presence of a new life at home feels incredibly magical, and a sense of responsibility naturally arises. The day's activities not only fulfilled social needs but also accomplished an important little milestone in life, filling the heart with warmth.

events.description: Yu Xiaowen received the package of cat food and toys she bought for her orange cat [Orange] at home. After unpacking it, she interacted with Orange using a feather teaser wand and mixed the new and old cat food to observe its eating habits.

events.description: Demonstrate and guide the father in performing gentle stretches such as Cat-Cow Pose, and advise him to rest, avoid lifting heavy objects, and apply heat therapy.

events.name: Setting the Observation Period and Follow-up Plan
events.description: A three-day observation period is set; if there is no relief, an X-ray is required, with a commitment to contact classmates for advice.

events.name: Concerns and Plans Following the Incident
events.description: After the call, I was worried about my father's condition and planned to consult colleagues for rehabilitation guidance, while thinking about how to persuade him to seek medical treatment.

2025-12.daily_overview: On a Monday workday, Yu Xiaowen started this month's personal skill enhancement plan alongside her clinical duties. Busy with her shift during the day, she switched to relaxation and planning mode after returning home in the evening. As the weather turned colder, she flexibly adjusted her morning run to a combination of indoor workouts and outdoor jogging.

events.name: Stress Relief and Companionship After Work
events.description: After a busy day at the hospital, Yu Xiaowen returned to her home in the Jinshui District. After dinner, she curled up on the sofa, flipping through a book on medical humanities. Her pet cat, Orange, naturally nestled at her feet, dozing off and emitting a soft purr. She didn’t intentionally disturb the tranquility, but simply enjoyed the feeling of being accompanied—a moment of effective stress relief after her high-pressure day.

events.name: Launch a Professional English Learning Plan
events.description: After a short break, Yu Xiaowen turned on her computer and began searching and comparing several well-known online English education platforms. Considering her professional needs, she focused on institutions that offered specialized courses for medical scenarios, carefully comparing course content, teaching staff (particularly whether there were foreign teachers with medical backgrounds), class schedule flexibility, and user reviews. After nearly an hour of screening, she tentatively selected a platform with a good reputation and a curriculum tailored to medical professionals.

events.name: Department Quarterly Performance Submission Process
events.description: Today, the department where Yu Xiaowen works completed the internal performance accounting and review. The detailed statement containing performance data of all doctors, including Yu Xiaowen, was signed and stamped, and officially submitted to the Performance Management Section of the hospital's Finance Department, entering the hospital-level review process.

events.name: Temporary overtime work to handle urgent medical records.
events.description: At 9 p.m., Yu Xiaowen received a call from her department, requiring her to remotely assist with the documentation work for a complex case. She spent half an hour completing it on her computer, which caused her to go to bed later than planned.

起始状态.心情: Calm, preparing for the work of the new week, with a hint of anticipation in my heart for the upcoming English learning plan.

结束状态.所处地点: No. 89 Jingsan Road, Jinshui District, Zhengzhou City, Henan Province (Rental)
结束状态.心情: Relaxed yet slightly weary, having completed a personal task as planned, with temporary overtime work bringing a bit of pressure.

2025-12.daily_overview: On Tuesday, Yu Xiaowen spent her daytime hours handling routine medical tasks at the hospital. During her lunch break and after work, she utilized fragmented time to put the English learning plan she had finalized the previous night into action, completing the course purchase. In terms of her workflow, her quarterly performance data entered the review process of the hospital's finance department.

events.name: Finalize and purchase the English course.
events.description: During her lunch break and after work, Yu Xiaowen logged onto the official website of the English learning platform she had selected the previous night. She carefully reviewed the details, prices, and user reviews of different course packages. After evaluating her learning goals (improving medical spoken English) and time constraints (shift-based schedule), she ultimately chose a three-month package that included two 25-minute one-on-one video sessions with a foreign teacher each week. After completing the purchase through online payment, she felt she had taken a solid step toward her annual learning goal.

events.name: Intra-hospital Review of Performance Data
events.description: Staff from the Performance Management Section of the hospital's Finance Department received the performance calculation materials submitted by various departments. They began verifying the accuracy of the performance calculation formulas, checking the consistency between the reported data and the hospital's HIS (Hospital Information System) records, and reviewing the completeness and compliance of the entire approval process.

events.name: Lunchtime Communication Stress with Colleagues
events.description: During the lunch break, Yu Xiaowen had a meal with her colleague Wang Fang. They talked about the recent increase in work pressure, confiding in each other and easing their emotions.

2025-12.daily_overview: Wednesday is Yu Xiaowen's regular badminton day. During the day, she follows her work routine and uses spare moments to align her English class schedule with the complex hospital shifts. In the evening, she relieves stress through exercise and exchanges tips on winter sports with her fellow players.

events.name: Arrange English learning time meticulously.
events.description: During a break at work, Yu Xiaowen took out her phone calendar and the hospital's shift schedule. She carefully marked all the day shifts, night shifts, and rest days for the next three months. Then, ensuring it wouldn't affect her rest or work, she selected Wednesday and Sunday evenings at 8 p.m. as fixed times for her English classes, scheduling them on her rest days and evenings when she wasn't on night duty. She promptly entered these times into the reservation system of her learning platform. This meticulous planning gave her more confidence in sticking to her study routine.

events.name: Wednesday Badminton Appointment with Badminton Friend Lin Wei
events.description: In the evening, Yu Xiaowen arrived at the badminton court near her workplace as scheduled and met up with her friend Lin Wei. After an hour of exhilarating play, the two sat by the court to rest. Yu Xiaowen shared her experience of sticking to adaptive morning workouts since winter began, including how she switches to indoor exercises when the weather is unfavorable and the mental clarity brought by morning meditation. Lin Wei also shared her tips for staying warm during winter workouts and her favorite fitness videos. The dopamine released from exercise and the relaxed conversation effectively eased the tension from the day.

events.name: Final approval of quarterly performance.
events.description: The Finance Department will submit the verified quarterly performance summary report of the entire hospital to the designated hospital leadership for final approval and signature. At this point, Yu Xiaowen’s third-quarter performance bonus has completed all administrative procedures and is now pending disbursement.

events.name: Try a new dinner recipe
events.description: After returning home from exercise, Yu Xiaowen attempted to make a simple stewed noodle dish, adding more vegetables to practice her healthy eating plan.

2025-12.daily_overview: The drizzly weather adds a touch of damp chill to Zhengzhou's winter days. Yu Xiaowen is busy at the hospital during the day, squeezing in time to prepare professional materials for her upcoming English class. After work, she actively plans her weekend leisure and social activities, arranging a City Walk with friends. Meanwhile, the countdown to her performance bonus payout has begun.

events.name: Organize medical English oral materials
events.description: Based on her daily ward rounds, interactions with patients, and literature review, Yu Xiaowen began systematically compiling a collection of spoken medical English materials in her notebook and computer. The content included descriptions of common symptoms, medical instructions, classic phrases for doctor-patient communication, and frequently used professional vocabulary in her department. She planned to use these "practical" materials as key components for subsequent English courses, focusing on practice and seeking guidance from foreign teachers, making her learning more targeted and practical.

events.name: Performance Distribution Notice and Weekend Appointment
events.description: The hospital's internal platform issued a notice informing employees that the third-quarter performance calculations had been completed and would be distributed along with their salaries in the near future. Almost simultaneously, Yu Xiaowen reconnected with her college friend Sun Yue via WeChat. The two quickly arranged to meet for a City Walk on Saturday afternoon, tentatively planning to gather near Erqi Square. They briefly exchanged updates on their recent work situations, both looking forward to their weekend reunion, which became a bright spot amid the cold workdays.

events.name: Postpone evening exercise due to fatigue.
events.description: Feeling particularly exhausted after work, Yu Xiaowen decided to skip the originally planned indoor workout and instead opted for a simple stretch before going to bed early.

起始状态.心情: Steady, the rain seems to slow the pace a bit, but there's the anticipation of the weekend in the heart.

2025-12.daily_overview: Friday was a day filled with "harvests" and "new beginnings." Yu Xiaowen received her quarterly bonus and annual health check-up report, and also started her first English class with a foreign teacher. She juggled multiple tasks, including attending to her pet’s health, investing in personal interests, and preparing for weekend relaxation. Though busy, each activity was aimed at self-improvement and enhancing her quality of life.

events.name: Purchase art books to nurture an interest in pottery.
events.description: During the lunch break, Yu Xiaowen browsed an online bookstore and purchased several hardcover books on the history of ceramic art and modern art appreciation. She hopes these books will help her better understand the culture and aesthetics behind pottery, enrich her creative inspiration, and contribute to her goal of "learning to create basic pottery works within a year."

events.name: Strengthen trust with the pet orange.
events.description: After work, Yu Xiaowen took Juzi to the pet hospital for a comprehensive health check-up after adoption. The results showed that Juzi was in excellent health. She also bought several new cat toys for Juzi. When they returned home, Juzi seemed to sense her affection and became more active in playing and rubbing against her, clearly strengthening the bond of trust between them.

events.name: Nervous and Precious First Foreign Teacher's Class
events.description: At 8 p.m., Yu Xiaowen had her first video conversation with a foreign teacher through an online platform in her home study. The topic was 'Initial Communication Between Doctor and Patient.' Although she had prepared English sentences for self-introduction and common symptom inquiries in advance, she still felt nervous when facing the foreign teacher, experiencing moments of hesitation and inappropriate word choices. However, the foreign teacher was very patient. After the class, she saved the conversation recording for review.

events.name: Preparing for the Weekend Music Night
events.description: After English class, Yu Xiaowen began preparing for the immersive music night planned for tomorrow evening. She carefully selected several vinyl records of Mozart and Debussy from her bookshelf, meticulously checked the condition of the record player and sound system to ensure they were in perfect working order. At the same time, she retrieved scented candles and her favorite floral tea, placing them in advance on the living room coffee table.

events.name: Quarterly Performance Bonus Has Been Credited
events.description: During the lunch break, Yu Xiaowen received a text message notification from the bank, informing her that the 8,000 yuan third-quarter performance bonus had been deposited into her salary card. This unexpected income brought her a small wave of joy.

events.name: Preliminary Planning for Bonus Usage
events.description: After receiving the text message, Yu Xiaowen opened her mobile banking app to confirm the arrival of the bonus and checked her current total asset balance. She began to consider preliminary ideas for how to use the money—whether to increase savings, supplement investments, or allocate it to other plans—but had not yet reached a conclusion.

events.name: Claim the Annual Physical Examination Report
events.description: Today, Yu Xiaowen collected her annual personal medical examination report at the Physical Examination Center of Zhengzhou Central Hospital. The thick report folder contained various test results, including complete blood count, comprehensive biochemical panel, and imaging studies.

events.name: Carefully study the physical examination report.
events.description: After returning home from work, Yu Xiaowen carefully read her physical examination report in the study. She reviewed each indicator one by one, paying special attention to the slightly abnormal lipid profile, which may be due to her irregular shift schedule, as well as her vitamin D levels, which suggested possible insufficient sun exposure. She also pulled out last year's report for comparison, pondering what lifestyle adjustments she needed to make.

events.name: Having an impromptu gathering with friends to celebrate
events.description: After the evening English class, Yu Xiaowen received a call from her close friend Zhang Jing, who spontaneously invited her out for a late-night snack to celebrate the arrival of their bonus. They enjoyed barbecue at a nearby small restaurant and had a great conversation, which led to them staying up late.

起始状态.心情: Looking forward, because it's Friday, and I know there are a few things worth anticipating today.

结束状态.所处地点: No. 89 Jingsan Road, Jinshui District, Zhengzhou City, Henan Province (Rental)
结束状态.心情: Complex yet overall positive, experiencing the frustration and nervousness of the first English class, the gathering brought joy, but with a slight sense of indulgence.

date_attribute.weather: Clear and sunny, a rare warm sun in winter.

2025-12.daily_overview: On Saturday, her day off, Yu Xiaowen spent a fulfilling and therapeutic day. In the morning, she reviewed her studies and sought financial advice. In the afternoon, she went on an in-depth City Walk with her good friend Sun Yue. In the evening, she held a solo classical music appreciation session at home. This day perfectly blended personal growth, emotional connection, and artistic enjoyment.

events.name: Review of the First English Class
events.description: In the morning, Yu Xiaowen repeatedly listened to the recording of last night's conversation with her foreign teacher in her home study. Like a strict teacher, she scrutinized her own performance, carefully marking instances of expression stumbles, grammatical errors, and inappropriate word choices. She recorded these weak points one by one in her study notes, planning to address them in subsequent lessons. This review process gave her a clearer goal for the next class.

events.name: Consulting Financial Advisor Bonus Planning
events.description: After the review session, Yu Xiaowen contacted financial advisor Wang Mingyuan via WeChat to inform him that her bonus had been deposited. She also inquired whether, given the current market conditions, it would be more appropriate to increase her existing fund fixed investment amount or to prioritize replenishing her emergency funds. Advisor Wang replied that it would depend on her overall asset allocation and suggested scheduling a time to discuss it in detail.

events.name: Consult with colleagues about the physical examination report.
events.description: Regarding several indicators in the medical examination report that she did not fully understand, Yu Xiaowen sent screenshots to her acquaintance, Dr. Chen Mingyuan, through the hospital's internal communication software for a brief professional consultation, seeking preliminary interpretation and advice. Dr. Chen promptly replied, explaining that those minor abnormalities were quite common among young doctors and were related to stress and lifestyle habits, while also offering some adjustment suggestions.

events.name: In-depth City Walk with Sun Yue
events.description: In the afternoon, Yu Xiaowen took the subway to Erqi Square to meet up with Sun Yue. The sunlight was lovely, and the two strolled leisurely along Dehua Street, naturally reminiscing about fun times from their university days, laughing continuously. The conversation gradually shifted to work, with Sun Yue sharing heartwarming stories from the pediatric ward, while Yu Xiaowen talked about the stress of her recent night shifts. They confided in each other, feeling a strong sense of resonance. Passing by a small shop, they bought a bag of warm sugar-roasted chestnuts and chatted while eating. Finally, they entered a quiet café, where they delved deeper into discussions about professional burnout and their plans for the next three years (such as obtaining a specialist physician qualification), encouraging each other and feeling empowered. As evening approached, the two bid farewell at the subway station, promising to meet again soon.

events.name: Create an Atmosphere for a Personal Music Night
events.description: Returning home in the evening, Yu Xiaowen began to set up her listening space. She lit a scented candle, allowing the tranquil aroma of sandalwood to slowly fill the air; boiled water to steep a pot of rose tea; and then placed the vinyl record she had selected that morning within easy reach.

events.name: Immersive Classical Music Appreciation
events.description: Turning off her phone notifications, Yu Xiaowen settled into the comfortable sofa and played Mozart's *Clarinet Concerto in A Major*. Soft, layered music flowed from the vinyl record player, accompanied by the flickering candlelight and the warmth of the tea in her hands. She became completely immersed in the world of music, as the thoughts of the day gradually settled, and her mind and body felt an unprecedented sense of relaxation. Later, she listened to Debussy's *Clair de Lune*.

events.name: Music Night Conclusion and Recording
events.description: After the music listening session, Yu Xiaowen carefully put away the vinyl record, extinguished the candle, and washed the tea set. She felt that her spirit had been well nourished and, before going to bed, she briefly recorded the sense of tranquility and the sparks of inspiration brought by this music night in her phone's memo.

起始状态.所处地点: No. 89 Jingsan Road, Jinshui District, Zhengzhou City, Henan Province (Rental)
起始状态.心情: Relaxed and expectant, feeling free to be able to arrange a whole day on my own.

结束状态.所处地点: No. 89 Jingsan Road, Jinshui District, Zhengzhou City, Henan Province (Rental)
结束状态.心情: Feeling deeply satisfied, joyful, and fulfilled, with social interactions, artistic pursuits, and self-reflection all being gratified.

2025-12.daily_overview: On Sunday, the themes of Yu Xiaowen's life were "planning" and "maintaining." She took the lead in establishing a monthly health review mechanism with her parents, made the final allocation of her bonus, and developed a detailed health action plan based on her medical examination report. At the same time, she also maintained warm interactions with her friends.

events.name: Establish a monthly family health review mechanism.
events.description: In the evening, Yu Xiaowen had her first monthly health review video call with her parents, Yu Jianguo and Li Xiuying. She inquired in detail about her father's recent blood lipid monitoring and patiently reassured her mother, who was anxious about not being able to complete all the health exercises due to knee joint pain, emphasizing the principle of "doing what one can and progressing step by step." She recorded her parents' health status, medication, and exercise feedback in her electronic notes and agreed with them to make this video call a regular monthly family health initiative, aiming to establish a continuous and iterative family health support system. Her parents were very supportive of this idea.

events.name: Finalize the bonus distribution plan.
events.description: Based on the online communication with her financial advisor and her own financial goal (steady growth), Yu Xiaowen made a decision: to add the 5,000 yuan bonus to her existing steady-growth fund investment plan and transfer the remaining 3,000 yuan to a money market fund as flexible reserve funds. She quickly completed both transactions through her mobile banking app.

events.name: Update personal financial records.
events.description: After completing the operation, Yu Xiaowen opened her personal accounting software and updated the records of this bonus income and expenditure. She added detailed notes on the allocation of the funds ("additional fund fixed investment" and "supplement to emergency funds") for future tracking and review.

events.name: Develop a New Year's Health Action Plan
events.description: Based on the analysis of her physical examination report and suggestions from colleagues, Yu Xiaowen meticulously planned her health actions for the upcoming year on her mobile health app: 1. Maintain three morning runs and two badminton sessions per week; 2. Add two weekly home-based core strength training sessions; 3. Plan to incorporate a 15-minute outdoor walk during lunch breaks to improve vitamin D levels; 4. Adjust the dinner diet structure and reduce the frequency of high-oil and high-salt takeout meals. The plan is specific and feasible.

events.name: Continuing the Warmth of Friendship
events.description: In the afternoon, Yu Xiaowen sent a message to Sun Yue on WeChat, thanking her for the company and deep conversation from the previous afternoon, and sharing some links to medical materials they had discussed. Sun Yue quickly replied, expressing the same pleasant feelings, and both agreed that this City Walk was a valuable emotional recharge.

events.name: Commence the three-day medical training program.
events.description: In the evening, Yu Xiaowen received a notification from the hospital that starting tomorrow, she will participate in a three-day online medical training on the latest advances in cardiovascular diseases, which will require her to set aside time in the evenings for study.

2025-12.daily_overview: As the new week began, Yu Xiaowen dove into work with the plan she had formulated the previous Sunday. During the day, clinical tasks kept her busy, but she used her breaks to prepare for the second English class and further develop the family health management project she had recently launched. In the evening, she began her medical training.

She looked up relevant medical English vocabulary and mentally organized how to clearly and systematically explain the procedures and precautions for routine blood tests, imaging examinations, and other processes to the "patient" in English, attempting to apply what she had learned from reviewing the first class.

events.name: Improve the family health records.

She also considered topics to delve into during next month's call (such as cardiovascular protection in winter) and set up monthly reminders on her phone calendar, laying a more solid foundation for this long-term family health support system.

Thanks to her advance preparation, she was able to describe the steps of the check-up more fluently and confidently compared to her first class. However, when the foreign teacher simulated a patient asking unexpected questions, she still struggled a bit and needed time to organize her thoughts. Nevertheless, she felt she had made progress in "listening" and "responding." After the class, as usual, she recorded the session.

2025-12.daily_overview: This was a critical high-pressure night in Yu Xiaowen's career. She independently worked the night shift and successfully led the entire rescue process for a critically ill patient with acute myocardial infarction. Her clinical adaptability and communication and coordination skills were put to the ultimate test and validated in real-world practice.

events.name: Meticulous preparation before the night shift.
events.description: In the afternoon, Yu Xiaowen arrived at the hospital early to conduct a detailed bedside handover with the day-shift doctor, gaining a thorough understanding of the conditions of all inpatients. She reviewed the night-shift consultation procedures and emergency contact numbers, and personally inspected the emergency equipment in the duty room and nursing station to ensure it was in standby condition, making comprehensive preparations for any potential emergencies.

events.name: Receive and rapidly diagnose acute myocardial infarction.
events.description: Not long after the night shift began, a middle-aged male patient with sudden severe chest pain and profuse sweating was brought to the emergency department. Yu Xiaowen quickly took charge of the case. After inquiring about the patient’s medical history and conducting a physical examination, she immediately ordered an electrocardiogram and cardiac enzyme tests. The electrocardiogram results showed typical ST-segment elevation, leading her to quickly diagnose it as an acute ST-elevation myocardial infarction (STEMI). She promptly activated the hospital’s chest pain center green channel.

events.name: Efficient Communication and Initiation of Emergency Procedures
events.description: After the diagnosis was confirmed, Yu Xiaowen faced pressure on two fronts: one was the medical rescue line, where she contacted the on-duty cardiologist by phone for an emergency consultation and notified the catheterization laboratory team to prepare for emergency PCI surgery; the other was the communication line with the family, where she clearly and calmly explained to the anxious patient's family the extreme severity of the condition, the diagnostic basis, and the necessity and risks of immediate interventional surgery. With professionalism and composure, she earned the family's trust and obtained their consent for the surgery.

events.name: Complete key intra-hospital transfer and handover
events.description: After the cardiologist arrived and confirmed the emergency PCI plan, Yu Xiaowen worked closely with Wu Min, the head nurse on duty. She directed the nurses to connect the patient to transport monitoring equipment and administer necessary preoperative medications. Subsequently, she personally accompanied the patient and, together with the nursing team, safely, smoothly, and swiftly transferred the patient from the emergency department to the cardiac catheterization lab. There, she completed the critical handover of the patient's condition and treatment plan with the catheterization lab doctors, securing valuable treatment time for the patient.

events.name: Summary of the Last Night of Medical Training
events.description: During a break in the night shift, Yu Xiaowen took the time to complete the final test of the training, received her certificate of completion, and felt that her knowledge had been enhanced.

起始状态.所处地点: No. 89 Jingsan Road, Jinshui District, Zhengzhou City, Henan Province (Rental)
起始状态.心情: Focused and slightly tense, conserving energy for the night shift ahead.

state.睡觉时间: Sleep in after the morning shift the next day.

结束状态.所处地点: Duty Room of Zhengzhou Central Hospital, Henan Province
结束状态.心情: Extremely exhausted yet filled with a strong sense of accomplishment and professional confidence. The experience of successfully handling critical cases made her feel she had taken a significant step toward becoming a mature doctor, and completing the training brought additional satisfaction.

state.今日运动: None (night shift, mainly involving mental and emergency physical exertion)

2025-12.daily_overview: After a thrilling night shift, Yu Xiaowen caught up on sleep during the day. Upon waking up in the afternoon, she handled the paperwork left over from the night shift, conducted an in-depth handover and self-reflection, and finalized weekend dinner plans with her best friend. Though physically exhausted, she gained immense mental satisfaction.

events.name: Handling Patients with Sudden Onset of Atrial Fibrillation During Night Shifts
events.description: In the latter half of the night, an elderly patient in the ward showed signs of new-onset rapid atrial fibrillation accompanied by shortness of breath on the cardiac monitor. Yu Xiaowen immediately assessed the situation and found the patient's vital signs to be stable. Following medical guidelines, she issued orders for heart rate control and anticoagulant therapy. She stayed by the patient's bedside, offering reassurance and closely monitoring the situation until the patient's heart rhythm gradually returned to normal and the symptoms subsided.

events.name: Complete the medical documentation for the night shift.
events.description: After handling the major critical cases in the early hours, Yu Xiaowen took advantage of the relatively quiet time to check on other patients. With an exceptionally high standard, she meticulously and systematically documented the progress notes, consultation records, and resuscitation records for several key patients she managed during the night shift—particularly those with myocardial infarction and atrial fibrillation—ensuring that all medical actions were promptly and accurately documented for traceability.

events.name: Deep Handover and Self-Review
events.description: In the early morning, Yu Xiaowen conducted the morning shift handover with the oncoming doctor and the department director, Zhang Lei. She systematically reported the handling of all patients during the night shift, particularly detailing the entire emergency process for the myocardial infarction patient and the outcome of the atrial fibrillation patient. After the handover, despite feeling drowsy, she took some time to mentally review the entire night shift. She reflected on her emergency decision-making, multi-tasking communication, and teamwork abilities, feeling that she had gained invaluable experience in independently managing complex situations.

events.name: Making plans to have a weekend meal with my best friend Zhang Jing.
events.description: After resting in the afternoon, Yu Xiaowen contacted her close friend Zhang Jing via WeChat to discuss weekend plans. They quickly decided to have dinner together on Saturday night, chose a newly opened restaurant that both were interested in, and set a meeting time.

events.name: Slight soreness appears on the sole of the foot.
events.description: In the evening, Yu Xiaowen felt a slight tingling sensation in the sole of her left foot, suspecting it was caused by prolonged standing while handling cases, and began to pay attention to rest and stretching.

state.起床时间: 14:00 in the afternoon (catching up on sleep after the night shift)

2025-12.daily_overview: On Friday, Yu Xiaowen returned to her regular daytime shift schedule. In the evening, she attended her third English oral class, where the topic advanced to the more complex "discussing treatment plans," and her learning continued to progress steadily. At the same time, she was also preparing theoretically and planning for the important lumbar puncture procedure scheduled for the next day. The discomfort in her feet persisted.

events.name: Third English Oral Class: Discussing Treatment Plans
events.description: In the evening, Yu Xiaowen attended her third English tutoring session with a foreign teacher at home. The theme of this lesson was 'Discussing Treatment Plans.' She attempted to apply the vocabulary and sentence structures she had recently accumulated to describe a hypothetical chronic illness case and its comprehensive treatment plan to the foreign teacher. She also practiced how to explain the more complex aspects of the plan to patients or their families. The foreign teacher acknowledged her progress while correcting a few pronunciation errors and provided more authentic expressions for doctor-patient communication.

events.name: Prepare for tomorrow's lumbar puncture procedure.
events.description: During the break, Yu Xiaowen remembered that she was scheduled to perform a planned lumbar puncture the next day (under the supervision of her instructor). Before going to bed, she took some time in the duty room to review the patient's medical records, mentally rehearsing the steps of the lumbar puncture procedure, anatomical landmarks, potential complications, and contingency plans.

events.description: Due to soreness in the soles of her feet, Yu Xiaowen used a tennis ball to perform plantar rolling massage before bed and did Achilles tendon stretches to alleviate the symptoms.

2025-12.daily_overview: On Saturday, Yu Xiaowen successfully performed a crucial lumbar puncture procedure in the hospital during the morning, earning recognition from her supervising teacher. In the afternoon, she enjoyed a leisurely time with her close friend Zhang Jing, shopping, exploring delicious food, and engaging in deep conversations, effectively balancing work pressure with the joys of life. In the evening, she also had a warm phone call with her parents. The discomfort in her feet has somewhat eased.

events.name: Successfully completed lumbar puncture independently.
events.description: In the morning, under the supervision of her mentor Li Wei, Yu Xiaowen performed a lumbar puncture on a patient requiring a definitive diagnosis. Before the procedure, she once again discussed the indications and risks with Mentor Li and thoroughly communicated with the patient's family, obtaining signed informed consent. During the operation, she took a deep breath, recalled the key points of the procedure, and calmly inserted the needle. The process went smoothly, and she successfully obtained a cerebrospinal fluid sample on the first attempt. Mentor Li nodded in approval and later commended her tactile skill and strict adherence to aseptic techniques. This success marked a breakthrough in her critical clinical procedural abilities.

events.name: Weekend Sweet and Sour Pork Exploration with Zhang Jing
events.description: Zhang Jing mentioned that a new restaurant near her home served excellent sweet and sour pork tenderloin, so the two of them arranged to meet near Erqi Square in the afternoon. They first went for a stroll around the area before heading to the restaurant. They ordered the signature sweet and sour pork tenderloin along with a few other dishes, and as they ate, they both agreed that the flavors were perfectly balanced—crispy on the outside, tender on the inside, with just the right mix of sweet and sour. For Yu Xiaowen, being able to indulge in good food with a close friend after a busy day felt like a genuine little joy in the winter.

events.name: Gathering and Deep Conversation with Close Friends
events.description: During dinner, the two shared the pressures from their respective work (Yu Xiaowen’s recent night shift and morning procedures, Zhang Jing’s teaching anecdotes and frustrations) as well as updates on their personal lives. They also discussed their individual plans for the future, offering each other emotional support and practical advice.

events.name: Review the English course
events.description: After returning home in the evening, Yu Xiaowen reviewed the previous day’s oral English class. She organized the pronunciation corrections from the foreign teacher, newly learned expressions related to treatment plans, and key points from the class dialogue into her digital notes. She then repeatedly practiced by following along with the recording to reinforce her memory.

events.name: Weekend video call with parents.
events.description: Before going to bed, Yu Xiaowen had a video call with her parents. They shared their experience using the simple family health handbook she had created and provided specific suggestions, such as noting that the exercise steps were drawn too complicatedly and expressing a desire for more content on winter health food supplements. Yu Xiaowen listened attentively and took notes on these key points, planning to optimize the handbook accordingly.

2025-12.daily_overview: Sunday was a day intertwined with artistic enrichment and family responsibilities. In the morning, Yu Xiaowen attended her monthly pottery class, finding relaxation in the creative process. In the afternoon, she transformed into a "family financial advisor," offering her parents professional, low-risk investment advice for their maturing deposits, showcasing further personal growth. Foot care continued as usual.

events.name: Attend the monthly pottery class
events.description: In the morning, Yu Xiaowen attended the monthly class at the community pottery studio. Under the guidance of Teacher Zheng Guodong, she learned and practiced new throwing techniques, focusing on shaping a lump of clay into the envisioned bowl form. The creative process required immense patience and concentration, allowing her to momentarily forget the stress of the hospital.

events.name: Post-Class Exchange on Pottery Art
events.description: After the class ended, Yu Xiaowen and her classmate Su Ya cleaned up their tools while discussing the inspiration behind their creations and the technical challenges they had encountered. They agreed to meet in the next class to see each other's finished pieces after firing. Yu Xiaowen carefully placed her unfinished work in the designated area of the studio, waiting for it to air-dry before the subsequent firing process.

events.name: Receiving financial advice from parents.
events.description: In the afternoon, Yu Xiaowen had a routine video call with her parents in Luoyang from her home in Zhengzhou. Her mother, Li Xiuying, mentioned that they had a substantial fixed-term bank deposit about to mature and asked for her daughter's advice on how to handle the money afterward, believing she was knowledgeable about financial management.

events.name: Preliminary Analysis of Parents' Financial Situation
events.description: Yu Xiaowen inquired in detail about the specific amount of the deposit, the exact maturity date, and her parents' future plans for the money (whether it is purely for retirement savings or might be used for medical expenses or improving their quality of life). Considering that her parents are retired, have stable but limited income, and an extremely low risk tolerance, she initially concluded that the most conservative financial instruments should be recommended.

events.name: Conduct in-depth research on low-risk financial investment options.
events.description: After the call ended, Yu Xiaowen felt a heavy sense of responsibility. She spent the entire evening researching low-risk financial products suitable for the elderly through channels such as mobile banking apps and authoritative financial information websites. She focused on government bonds, R1-level capital-preserving wealth management products from large state-owned banks, and well-known money market funds, carefully comparing their yields, liquidity (ease of withdrawal), safety (degree of principal protection), and minimum purchase thresholds. She planned to organize this information into clear and easy-to-understand recommendations before sharing it with her parents.

events.name: Foot Relief and Core Training
events.description: In the evening, Yu Xiaowen performed plantar rolling massage and attempted light core strength training to maintain her exercise routine without increasing the burden on her feet.

2025-12.daily_overview: Monday began with a chilly, rainy day. Yu Xiaowen experienced an exceptionally busy and exhausting clinical workday, and after work, she chose to take care of herself in the simplest way possible. At the same time, she was also preparing for the upcoming year-end financial planning meeting. The discomfort in her feet persisted, reflecting the end of a healthy state.

events.name: High-intensity and exhausting clinical day.
events.description: The department admitted several patients with complex conditions today, and Yu Xiaowen was so busy that she barely had time to take a sip of water. Taking consultations, conducting physical examinations, issuing medical orders, writing medical records, communicating with family members... the high-intensity, high-attention mental work lasted the entire day. By the time she finished work, she felt physically and mentally exhausted, overwhelmed by a profound sense of depletion.

events.name: Minimalist Dinner and Self-Care
events.description: After work, Yu Xiaowen had no appetite and didn't want to expend the energy to cook. She bought a heated rice ball and a bottle of soy milk at a convenience store on her way home. Upon arriving, she simply heated the food and sat at the dining table, eating in silence. This simple dinner had nothing to do with flavor—it was merely the most basic sustenance for her exhausted body, while also allowing her overworked mind to completely unwind and rest. Orange seemed to sense her fatigue, quietly lying nearby to keep her company.

events.name: Prepare year-end financial planning materials
events.description: After a brief rest, Yu Xiaowen remembered that she had an annual financial review meeting with her financial advisor, Wang Mingyuan, in a few days. Summoning her energy, she printed out the fund investment statements and quarterly bonus payment records from the past year at home. She also prepared a list of questions she wanted to discuss with Manager Wang, including concerns about recent market fluctuations and financial goals for the new year (2026), such as increasing emergency savings and setting aside funds for potential training expenses related to the attending physician examination.

events.name: Plantar Fasciitis Care and Reflection
events.description: In the evening, Yu Xiaowen performed plantar rolling massage and Achilles tendon stretching, recorded the soreness in her feet, reflected on the strain caused by standing at work, and planned to adjust her exercise routine.

2025-12.daily_overview: This is a typical workday for Yu Xiaowen, balancing the demands of a busy clinical schedule with personal development tasks. In the morning, she attends to patients at the hospital, while in the afternoon, she utilizes breaks at work and evenings at home to focus on two major systematic tasks: contextualized review for her weekend spoken language class and the final refinement of financial advice for her parents. This reflects her efficient and well-organized approach to managing her life.

events.name: Morning clinical rounds and handling medical orders.
events.description: Yu Xiaowen rotated to the respiratory medicine department. In the morning, she followed her supervising teacher, Li Wei, on routine ward rounds, focusing on several patients with COPD and pneumonia. She carefully documented changes in their conditions and adjusted medication plans for some patients based on medical orders. After the rounds, she promptly handled newly prescribed medical orders and medical records on the computer.

events.name: Review oral English class during the lunch break.
events.description: During the half-hour lunch break, Yu Xiaowen put on her headphones in the doctor's on-call room, took out her phone, and reviewed the preparatory materials for this week's oral English class. She focused on previewing key vocabulary and common sentence patterns for two medical scenarios: "treatment plans" and "drug side effects," silently organizing the dialogue framework in her mind.

events.name: Admitting new patients in the afternoon and writing medical records.
events.description: In the afternoon, an elderly patient was admitted due to an acute asthma attack. Yu Xiaowen carefully inquired about the patient's medical history, conducted a physical examination, and completed the initial documentation of the new patient's admission record. During this process, she confirmed the patient's nursing level and precautions with Head Nurse Wu Min.

events.name: Immersive Oral Simulation Practice After Work
events.description: After returning home from work in the Jinshui District and having a simple dinner, Yu Xiaowen opened her laptop in the study. Drawing from her digital notes, she simulated conversations around two complex scenarios: "Explaining Long-Term Management Plans for Chronic Illness to Anxious Patients" and "Informing Family Members About Potential Side Effects of Medications." She role-played both the doctor and patient sides, recording the dialogues on her phone. During playback, she focused on checking the accuracy of her pronunciation of medical terms, the clarity and empathy of her explanations, and noted several sentence structures that needed improvement.

events.name: Refine and Systematize Parents' Financial Advice
events.description: After finishing her oral practice, Yu Xiaowen switched gears and began organizing a low-risk financial plan for her parents. She compiled her previous research findings—including the characteristics, yield ranges, and purchasing channels (such as mobile banking and bank counters) of government bonds, bank R1/R2 wealth management products, and money market funds—into a clear, point-by-point list written in plain language. She also highlighted in red common sales pitches that her parents should be wary of, such as "guaranteed high returns," "limited-time offers," and "recommendations from acquaintances," preparing to explain them systematically during their next video call.

events.name: Evening Reading and Relaxation
events.description: Before going to bed, Yu Xiaowen flipped through a medical journal for a while and listened to a soothing Mozart piano sonata. Having used her brain extensively during the day, she fell asleep half an hour earlier than usual to recharge for tomorrow.

起始状态.所处地点: In the bedroom at home, No. 89 Jingsan Road, Jinshui District, Zhengzhou City, Henan Province.
起始状态.心情: Calm, with a day's plan and a slight sense of work pressure.

结束状态.所处地点: In the bedroom at home, No. 89 Jingsan Road, Jinshui District, Zhengzhou City, Henan Province.
结束状态.心情: Fulfilling and somewhat accomplished, I have completed two important personal tasks, but I feel a slight sense of responsibility and pressure about explaining complex financial information to my parents tomorrow.

state.今日运动: Due to hazy weather, the morning run was canceled. Instead, I did 20 minutes of indoor aerobic exercise and 10 minutes of mindfulness meditation at home, followed by a plantar rolling massage.

2025-12.daily_overview: Wednesday was a day filled with "remote support" for Xiaowen. During the day, she handled routine tasks at the hospital, but the core events unfolded in the evening. First, she had an efficient online financial meeting with her financial advisor, finalizing the details of her annual plan. Immediately afterward, she engaged in a deep and professional video call with her parents, offering them financial guidance. She successfully translated her personal knowledge into practical assistance for her family, marking a subtle shift in her role.

events.name: Morning Adaptability Exercise
events.description: The weather cleared up and the air quality improved, so Yu Xiaowen resumed her morning runs. However, due to early-stage plantar fasciitis, she only jogged 2 kilometers around the neighborhood to alleviate the symptoms. After returning, she drank a cup of warm water and turned on the humidifier.

events.name: Daily Work and Departmental Mini-Lectures
events.description: In the morning, I was busy handling the follow-up examinations and treatments for the asthma patient admitted yesterday. In the afternoon, there was a brief lecture in the department, where a senior doctor shared the diagnostic and treatment approach for a challenging case of pulmonary infection. Yu Xiaowen took careful notes.

events.name: Online Financial Meeting with a Financial Advisor
events.description: After returning home from work, Yu Xiaowen had a roughly 40-minute conversation with her financial advisor, Wang Mingyuan, via video conferencing software. She shared details about the quarterly bonus she recently received, and together they reviewed the performance of her conservative fund portfolio amid recent market fluctuations (with an annualized return stabilizing around 4.2%). Based on her risk tolerance and the potential additional expenses she may incur next year while preparing for the specialist physician qualification exam (such as training and material costs), they made slight adjustments to her asset allocation ratio. Wang Mingyuan commended her for consistently investing through fixed contributions and maintaining sufficient liquidity.

events.name: Systematic Guidance for Parents on Financial Management
events.description: After the meeting, Yu Xiaowen took a short break and then proactively initiated a video call with her parents. She pulled out the list of key points she had prepared in the afternoon and, using language her parents could easily understand, systematically explained the safety of government bonds backed by "national credit," the varying risk levels of bank financial products (emphasizing that she only recommended principal-guaranteed or low-risk options), and the flexibility of money market funds, which she likened to "demand deposits." As she explained, she used screenshots from her phone or simple drawing tools to illustrate her points, repeatedly reminding her parents that "high returns inevitably come with high risks" and urging them to "always use the bank's official app or visit the counter for transactions." Her parents listened attentively, and her father, Yu Jianguo, asked questions from time to time.

events.name: Organize Meeting Consensus and Execution Actions
events.description: After speaking with her parents, Yu Xiaowen compiled the key discussion points and consensus reached from the two evening meetings (with Wang Mingyuan and with her parents) into electronic notes. Subsequently, she logged into her mobile banking app, made minor adjustments to her asset allocation based on the plan confirmed with Wang Mingyuan, and set a reminder for next month's fixed investment plan.

起始状态.所处地点: In the bedroom of the home at No. 89 Jingsan Road, Jinshui District, Zhengzhou City, Henan Province.
起始状态.心情: Looking forward to it, as important communication matters have been arranged, hoping everything goes smoothly.

结束状态.所处地点: Home Bedroom, No. 89 Jingsan Road, Jinshui District, Zhengzhou City, Henan Province
结束状态.心情: Comforted and filled with a sense of responsibility, I successfully played the role of a "family financial advisor." Seeing my parents accept my advice made me feel trusted and satisfied.

state.今日运动: Morning jog of 2 kilometers, followed by foot stretching.

2025-12.daily_overview: Today, Yu Xiaowen's work and personal affairs were interwoven. During the day at the hospital, a COPD patient under her care was discharged after recovery, bringing a warm professional moment. After work, she continued the theme of family support from the previous night, remotely guiding her parents through their first financial purchase and simultaneously optimizing their health manual. Additionally, she made an appointment for weekend vehicle maintenance, demonstrating her thoughtful life management skills.

events.name: Patient Discharge and Handover upon Recovery
events.description: Supervisor Yu Xiaowen had a patient with acute exacerbation of chronic obstructive pulmonary disease who, after more than a week of treatment, showed significant symptom relief and met the criteria for discharge. In the morning, Yu Xiaowen provided detailed instructions in the doctor's office to the patient and her daughter regarding the post-discharge medication plan (including techniques for using inhalers), precautions for home oxygen therapy, rehabilitation exercise methods, and key follow-up appointment times. The patient and her family expressed their gratitude multiple times.

events.name: Based on feedback, conceptualize the optimization of the health manual.
events.description: During the lunch break, Yu Xiaowen received feedback from her parents on the first edition of the health manual. They mainly felt that some exercise illustrations had too many steps, making them look overwhelming. Combining their feedback with her medical knowledge, she began sketching optimization ideas in her notebook: she decided to simplify the exercise diagrams by using clearer arrows and breaking down the movements. She also planned to add seasonal sections such as "Winter Fall Prevention Guide for the Elderly" and "Key Points for Preventing Respiratory Diseases During the Autumn-Winter Transition."

events.name: Remotely assist parents in completing financial management operations.
events.description: During a video call in the evening, her parents indicated that they were inclined to follow her advice and purchase some treasury bonds and bank-guaranteed wealth management products. Using the "screen sharing" feature of the video chat, Yu Xiaowen remotely guided her mother, Li Xiuying, on how to use the mobile banking app: locating the wealth management product page, reviewing the product descriptions and risk levels, and completing the necessary risk assessment tests. Eventually, she helped her parents finalize the fund allocation plan and watched as her mother followed each step until the submission was successful. She repeatedly reminded them to save the electronic contracts and transaction records.

events.name: Schedule Annual Vehicle Maintenance
events.description: After helping her parents with their finances, Yu Xiaowen remembered that her beloved car needed maintenance. She contacted the familiar 4S store customer service by phone and, based on her upcoming rotating day off schedule (Monday, December 22nd), successfully scheduled the annual routine maintenance service for that morning. She also preliminarily confirmed the required service items and the approximate cost range with the customer service representative.

events.name: Temporary overtime to handle emergency cases
events.description: At nine o'clock in the evening, Yu Xiaowen received a call from the hospital informing her that an emergency patient required her assistance. She immediately returned to the hospital and spent over an hour stabilizing the patient's condition, which resulted in her staying up late.

起始状态.心情: Smooth, carrying the residual warmth from yesterday's successful communication.

2025-12.daily_overview: Friday marks the end of the workweek and is a day dedicated to handling personal matters. During the day, Yu Xiaowen completed a busy week of work at the hospital. After work, she had an important in-person annual financial review with her financial advisor, Wang Mingyuan. This meeting not only reviewed her investments but also established a budget framework and goals for the new year, signifying that her financial management has entered a more systematic and forward-looking phase.

events.name: Work wrap-up before the weekend.
events.description: In the morning, she completed rounds and updated medical orders for all inpatients this week. In the afternoon, she focused on writing and organizing this week's medical records, ensuring all documentation was complete and accurate in preparation for the handover next week. During this time, she also participated in a brief departmental case discussion.

events.name: Prepare a mock report for oral class.
events.description: During her lunch break, Yu Xiaowen used her phone to look up several English medical abstracts, seeking inspiration for the topic of this Saturday's oral class, "Giving a Brief Presentation at an International Conference." She came up with a mock presentation direction on "New Advances in the Diagnosis and Treatment of Community-Acquired Pneumonia."

events.name: Annual face-to-face review with a financial advisor
events.description: After work, Yu Xiaowen went directly to the coffee shop downstairs of China Merchants Bank, where she had arranged to meet Wang Mingyuan. This was their annual in-depth review. Wang Mingyuan brought a printed annual performance report of the investment portfolio, providing a detailed analysis of the performance of each fund and the influencing factors in the market. Yu Xiaowen shared her annual income and expenditure situation as well as her year-end bonus expectations. In a relaxed atmosphere, the two discussed the economic outlook for the coming year.

events.name: Formulate the Personal Income and Expenditure Budget Framework for 2026
events.description: Based on a review of investment performance, Yu Xiaowen, with the assistance of Wang Mingyuan, preliminarily outlined her personal income and expenditure budget for the new year on a spreadsheet, taking into account her projected salary income and potential bonuses for 2026. The main expense items include: fixed rent, vehicle-related costs (insurance, maintenance, fuel), personal insurance, continuing education fund, hobbies (pottery classes), and daily living expenses. She particularly emphasized the priority of savings and investment.

events.name: Confirm the core financial goals for the new year.
events.description: At the end of the meeting, Yu Xiaowen and Wang Mingyuan jointly confirmed two core financial goals for 2026: first, to steadily increase the emergency savings from the current three months' living expenses to six months' living expenses, in order to enhance risk resilience; second, to specifically establish a "Special Fund for Obtaining the Qualification of Attending Physician" to cover potential training courses, academic conferences, and material expenses. They reached a consensus on the implementation path.

events.name: Cancel evening exercise due to fatigue.
events.description: Due to exhaustion from working late the night before, Yu Xiaowen decided to cancel her planned exercise and instead go to bed early to regain her energy.

起始状态.心情: Slightly weary but full of anticipation, looking forward to the financial planning meeting tonight to bring clear direction for the new year.

2025-12.daily_overview: Saturday is Yu Xiaowen's day off, but it is also a highly productive day for her to handle multiple personal development and social planning tasks. Instead of sleeping in, she utilized the uninterrupted time to systematically advance her English studies, upgrade the family health handbook, and make preliminary plans for a Christmas gathering. In the afternoon, she also received an unexpected notification about a career development opportunity, adding new anticipation for the upcoming week.

events.name: Morning Run and Breakfast
events.description: Yu Xiaowen enjoyed a leisurely morning run over the weekend. With her foot condition improving, she jogged 4 kilometers along the Jinshui River Park to avoid overexertion. After returning home, she prepared a hearty breakfast for herself, which included fried eggs, whole-wheat bread, and a fruit salad, while leisurely browsing through news on her phone.

events.name: In-depth Preparation for English Case Discussions
events.description: In preparation for the afternoon oral class on the theme of "Participating in Case Discussions," Yu Xiaowen opened her computer in her home study. She selected a typical clinical case she had handled, involving "heart failure complicated by pulmonary infection," and wrote a detailed case description in English. This included the chief complaint, present illness history, key findings from the physical examination, results of auxiliary tests, and a preliminary diagnosis. She also prepared several open-ended questions for discussion.

events.name: Comprehensive Update of the Electronic Version of the Family Health Handbook
events.description: This is today's main task. Yu Xiaowen spent nearly three hours using graphic editing software to upgrade the health manual for her parents to version 2.0. She redrew simplified diagrams for cervical spine health exercises and knee joint workouts, pairing each step with brief text. She also added two new sections: "Winter Home Environment Assessment Checklist for Fall Prevention" and "Key Points for Preventing Respiratory Infectious Diseases in Autumn and Winter." Additionally, she adjusted the overall layout and font size to make the manual clearer and more user-friendly. After completing it, she let out a long sigh of relief.

events.name: Preliminary Proposal for a Small Christmas Friends Gathering
events.description: During the break, Yu Xiaowen sent messages on WeChat to her close friend Zhang Jing, her colleague and friend Wang Fang, and her sports partner Lin Wei, suggesting that if everyone is free next Friday (Christmas Eve), they could have dinner together to celebrate. She recommended a few restaurants with a pleasant atmosphere for everyone to choose from and waited for their feedback.

events.name: Received the training notice for the advanced study class.
events.description: In the afternoon, Yu Xiaowen received an official notification from the hospital's personnel department on her phone, informing her that she had been selected to attend the advanced training course on "Latest Advances in the Diagnosis and Treatment of Cardiovascular Diseases," organized by the Municipal Health Commission from December 28th to 30th. She immediately opened the attachment to the notification, carefully reviewing the training schedule, location, and the list of keynote experts, while mentally planning how to adjust her shifts for those days.

events.name: Temporarily decided to try a new pottery technique.
events.description: In the evening, inspired by a sudden burst of creativity, Yu Xiaowen tried using a newly learned pottery sculpting technique to make a small vase at home. She spent two hours immersed in the process, completely losing track of time.

起始状态.心情: Relaxed and joyful, enjoy the autonomous moments of the weekend.

结束状态.心情: Fulfilling and rewarding, the manual optimization is complete, study preparations are in place, and a rare training opportunity has been received, filling the upcoming week with positive anticipation.

2025-12.daily_overview: Sunday coincided with the Winter Solstice, and Yu Xiaowen’s day revolved around two main themes: "family warmth" and "life maintenance." During the day, she completed the long-planned vehicle maintenance and insurance renewal, handling practical life matters. In the evening, she spent the Winter Solstice with her parents in Luoyang through a carefully prepared video call, making this winter exceptionally warm with remote care and affection.

events.name: Drive to the 4S shop for annual maintenance.
events.description: Yu Xiaowen arrived at the familiar 4S dealership at 9 a.m. as scheduled, driving her personal family car. She handed the car keys to the service advisor and once again discussed the maintenance details: changing the engine oil, oil filter, and air conditioning filter, along with a comprehensive vehicle safety inspection.

events.name: Complete car insurance renewal in the rest area.
events.description: During the more than an hour spent waiting for maintenance, Yu Xiaowen used her phone in the 4S store's rest area. She compared quotes and plans from several insurance companies and ultimately chose a comprehensive package that included vehicle damage insurance, 2 million yuan third-party liability insurance, and passenger accident insurance. She paid approximately 3,500 yuan in premiums online via an app and received an electronic policy.

events.name: Confirm maintenance results and payment.
events.description: After the maintenance was completed, the service advisor invited Yu Xiaowen to the workshop to inspect the replaced old parts and reported the vehicle inspection results: normal tire wear, good brake pad thickness, and sufficient fluid levels. After confirming everything was correct, Yu Xiaowen paid approximately 1,200 yuan for the maintenance and retrieved her beloved car.

events.name: Afternoon home organizing and Winter Solstice preparations.
events.description: After returning home, Yu Xiaowen filed the maintenance receipt and the electronic insurance policy into the family finance folder. Then, she tidied up the living room, checked the Wi-Fi connection, and prepared snacks in advance for the video call with her parents that evening—a plate of homemade dumplings (frozen dumplings cooked until done).

events.name: A Warm Video Call with Parents on the Winter Solstice
events.description: At seven o'clock in the evening, the video call connected right on time. Yu Xiaowen and her parents exchanged greetings, and she began by asking, "Dad, Mom, did you have dumplings for the Winter Solstice today?" Her mother, Li Xiuying, excitedly showed the dumplings and a few side dishes on the dining table, while her father inquired about the weather in Zhengzhou. Yu Xiaowen shared that she had also eaten dumplings and, as a doctor, reminded her parents to keep warm at night, asking if the heating at home was sufficient. Her mother even turned the phone camera toward a freshly arranged vase of wintersweet flowers in the living room, filling the room with fragrance. Her father, in turn, reminded her to eat on time no matter how busy she was with work.

events.name: Send Optimized Health Handbook
events.description: Before the video call ended, Yu Xiaowen sent the optimized electronic version of the Health Handbook 2.0 to her parents via WeChat, along with a voice message. She briefly explained the newly added and revised sections, inviting them to preview it when they had time and continue providing feedback.

events.name: Save the Warm Moments
events.description: After hanging up the video call, Yu Xiaowen felt a warm glow in her heart. She saved the photo of the wintersweet flowers her mother had shown her into her phone's album and sent a message in the family WeChat group: "Seeing the wintersweet flowers and dumplings at home makes me feel like I'm there too. Wishing you a peaceful and healthy winter solstice. Love you all."

events.name: Preliminary discussion with my best friend about birthday arrangements.
events.description: Before going to bed, Yu Xiaowen called her best friend Zhang Jing to discuss the celebration arrangements for her 28th birthday at the end of the month. The two decided to book a small private room at a well-reviewed fusion cuisine restaurant in Zhengzhou. They also drafted a preliminary guest list (including Sun Yue, Wang Fang, Lin Wei, and others) and divided the tasks: Yu Xiaowen would be responsible for booking the restaurant, while Zhang Jing would help select the cake.

起始状态.心情: Relaxed, with a sense of purpose in completing tasks.

结束状态.所处地点: No. 89 Jingsan Road, Jinshui District, Zhengzhou City, Henan Province, bedroom in the home
结束状态.心情: Warm, happy, and tinged with a hint of longing, the sense of ritual during the holiday and the care from her family greatly nourished her emotions, leaving her feeling deeply satisfied.

2025-12.daily_overview: Monday was Yu Xiaowen's day off, but it turned out to be a day filled with immense professional satisfaction. In the morning, she delivered a high-quality English speaking class for the week, earning praise from her foreign teacher. In the afternoon, upon returning to the hospital to handle her pending tasks, she learned that a patient under her care had recovered and was discharged. To her surprise, she also received a handwritten thank-you letter from the patient's family. This unexpected recognition was like a beam of light, illuminating her daily hard work and allowing her to deeply feel the warmth and value of the medical profession.

events.name: Online English Speaking Course: Simulating International Conference Presentations
events.description: In the morning at home, Yu Xiaowen had an oral English lesson with a foreign teacher via an online platform. Using the PPT summary on "Advances in the Diagnosis and Treatment of Community-Acquired Pneumonia" prepared over the weekend, she simulated an 8-minute brief oral presentation at an international conference. She made an effort to maintain clear logic and a steady speaking pace. The foreign teacher highly praised her organization of professional content and use of terminology, while also correcting a few details in linking sounds and intonation. Additionally, the teacher suggested that she could make her opening remarks more engaging.

events.name: Reserve a restaurant for Christmas dinner
events.description: During the break, Yu Xiaowen made a reservation in advance for a private room at a cozy and conveniently located Italian restaurant, based on feedback from her friends, to arrange the small Christmas gathering for Friday evening.

events.name: Patient Discharge and Receipt of Handwritten Thank-You Letter
events.description: In the afternoon, Yu Xiaowen went to the hospital to handle the paperwork for the last patient under her care who was ready for discharge—a patient with chronic obstructive pulmonary disease (COPD). In the doctor's office, she carefully explained all the post-discharge precautions to the patient and his daughter. After completing the formalities, the patient's daughter made a special trip back to find Yu Xiaowen and handed her a handwritten thank-you letter with great sincerity. The letter read, "Dr. Yu, thank you for your professional treatment and patient encouragement during my father's hospitalization. You are not only skilled in medicine but also kind-hearted. Wishing you all the best in your work!" Yu Xiaowen read it on the spot, her eyes growing slightly warm, and she thanked them repeatedly.

events.name: Cherish the Warm Recognition of the Profession
events.description: After returning home from work, Yu Xiaowen carefully smoothed out the folded letter and placed it into a wooden box specifically for storing important mementos, which also contained a copy of her medical practitioner qualification certificate, among other things. She sat quietly for a while, savoring the words in the letter.

events.name: Record Touching Moments and Reflections in a Diary
events.description: In the evening, Yu Xiaowen wrote in her personal diary: "December 22, 2025, Monday, sunny. Today, I received the first handwritten thank-you letter of my medical career. It was from the daughter of the elderly man with chronic obstructive pulmonary disease who is always anxious. The letter wasn’t long, but every word was sincere. The pressure from recent exam preparation and work has sometimes left me feeling numb, but this letter was like a dose of good medicine, instantly healing my exhaustion. It reminded me that what we face is not just illnesses, but also the living individuals behind them and the expectations of their families. Medicine is a science, but it is also a study of humanity. I must continue to work hard to be worthy of this trust."

events.name: Staying up late reading due to heightened emotions.
events.description: Excited by the gratitude she received during the day, Yu Xiaowen spent an extra hour reading medical books at night, which caused her to stay up late.

起始状态.所处地点: In the bedroom at home, No. 89 Jingsan Road, Jinshui District, Zhengzhou City, Henan Province.
起始状态.心情: Peaceful, with an anticipation for learning new knowledge.

结束状态.所处地点: In the bedroom at home, No. 89 Jingsan Road, Jinshui District, Zhengzhou City, Henan Province.
结束状态.心情: Deeply moved, a strong sense of professional value, and an inner surge of strength. The recognition from patients has offset all the exhaustion, elevating the recognition and love for the medical profession to a new height.

state.今日运动: I did 20 minutes of yoga at home in the evening to relax both my body and mind.
