2025-12.daily_overview: The theme of Tuesday was "sharing" and "wrapping things up." The warmth of yesterday's emotions lingered, and at work, Yu Xiaowen shared the joy of receiving a thank-you letter with trusted colleagues, gaining resonance and encouragement from her peers. At the same time, she also shared this happiness with her parents, earning the pride of her family. After work, she brought several recent important matters (health handbook, vehicle maintenance) to a satisfying conclusion, restoring order and balance to her life.

events.name: Share joy with colleagues.
events.description: During a break in the morning ward rounds, Yu Xiaowen quietly shared the news of receiving the thank-you letter with her closest colleague, Wang Fang. Wang Fang was genuinely happy for her, and the two exchanged a few words about the heartwarming moments they had each encountered in their work. In the afternoon, her mentor, Li Wei, also learned about the matter. While discussing a case, he patted her on the shoulder and said, "Well done, keep it up." This simple recognition made Yu Xiaowen feel deeply warmed.

events.name: Final fine-tuning of the health manual.
events.description: During her lunch break, she received feedback from her parents on the optimized manual, mainly suggesting to increase the font size of the main text by one level. After returning home from work, Yu Xiaowen made final adjustments and proofreading to the electronic version of the manual based on this detailed suggestion, generating the final version 2.1. She plans to print it out and replace the old version when she returns home for the Spring Festival.

events.name: Organize vehicle maintenance records
events.description: She placed the paper receipt from the vehicle maintenance the day before yesterday, along with the printed copy of the electronic insurance policy from her phone, into a dedicated folder labeled "Vehicle Records," keeping them together with records from previous years for easy future reference and potential claims.

events.name: A routine video call with parents.
events.description: During a video call with her parents in the evening, Yu Xiaowen mentioned the thank-you letter she had received, her tone slightly shy but unable to conceal her joy. Upon hearing this, her father, Yu Jianguo, nodded repeatedly, a smile breaking through his usually serious expression. "This shows that my daughter is dedicated and responsible in her work, earning the trust of her patients. Well done!" Her mother, Li Xiuying, was even more delighted and said from the other side of the screen, "I always said our Xiaowen is the most meticulous. Being a doctor requires both compassion and skill." The pride of her family made her feel that all her efforts were worthwhile.

events.name: Confirm the follow-up of parents' financial management operations.
events.description: At the end of the call, Yu Xiaowen reminded her parents to pay attention to the confirmation message for the successful purchase of the financial product and to remember the maturity date. Her parents assured her that everything had been set up as she had taught them, so she could rest assured.

events.name: Feeling a bit down because of the rainy weather.
events.description: The continuous rainy weather made Yu Xiaowen feel a bit gloomy, so she decided to cancel her evening exercise and instead relax at home by listening to music.

起始状态.所处地点: No. 89 Jingsan Road, Jinshui District, Zhengzhou City, Henan Province, China, in the bedroom of the home.
起始状态.心情: Warmth continues, carrying the afterglow of yesterday's emotions and the anticipation of sharing.

结束状态.所处地点: In the bedroom at home, No. 89 Jingsan Road, Jinshui District, Zhengzhou City, Henan Province.
结束状态.心情: Perfect, peaceful yet slightly dull. Joy is shared and amplified, multiple tasks are perfectly concluded, the heart is filled with a sense of order and the support of family, but the weather affects the mood.

state.今日运动: Due to rain and mood, the originally planned exercise was canceled, and only 10 minutes of stretching was done.

2025-12.daily_overview: On Christmas Eve, Yu Xiaowen spent her day in a blend of busyness and anticipation. The daytime was filled with fulfilling work and study: she handled clinical affairs in the morning and engaged in a high-quality oral English practice session in the afternoon. After work, she made a special trip to the mall to pick out small gifts for the gathering with friends the following evening and bought herself a small bouquet of flowers to brighten up her room. The evening was spent quietly reading medical literature, immersed in academic tranquility rather than the festive hustle and bustle.

events.name: Daily Work and English Oral Class
events.description: In the morning, she handled newly admitted patients. In the afternoon, during a brief break from her adjusted work schedule, she took her second online oral English lesson of the week with a foreign teacher at home, focusing on the topic of "Participating in Case Discussions." Using a prepared case of "heart failure with infection," she simulated a multidisciplinary consultation scenario with the teacher, smoothly asking questions and responding to opinions from different specialists. She noticed that her nervousness significantly decreased once she immersed herself in the role, and the foreign teacher praised her for her strong interactivity during the session.

events.name: Selecting small gifts for the Christmas party
events.description: After work, Yu Xiaowen didn't head straight home. Instead, she went to a boutique mall she often visited. She carefully selected a few small gifts: a gardenia-scented aromatherapy candle for Zhang Jing, a cute book-shaped bookmark for Wang Fang, and a pair of warm badminton socks for Lin Wei. The gifts weren’t expensive, but each was thoughtfully chosen to match her friends’ preferences, filled with sincerity.

events.name: Decorating the Home and Purchasing Flowers
events.description: After leaving the mall, she bought a small bouquet of holly and eucalyptus leaves from the flower shop and placed it in a vase in the living room. Instantly, the room gained a touch of vitality and a festive atmosphere.

events.name: Evening study of medical literature.
events.description: In the evening, following her study plan, she opened the electronic version of the New England Journal of Medicine and selected a review article on the "Latest Management Strategies for Heart Failure with Preserved Ejection Fraction (HFpEF)." She brewed a cup of floral tea and carefully read the article at her desk, understanding its core viewpoints, research methods, and clinical significance. She also made numerous annotations with a highlighter on her tablet.

events.name: Suddenly received an invitation to a friend's gathering.
events.description: At nine o'clock in the evening, Yu Xiaowen received a message from her badminton friend Xu Tao, who was in Shenzhen, inviting her to participate in an online badminton game the following night. After some hesitation, she decided to join in order to maintain her social connections.

起始状态.所处地点: In the bedroom of the home at No. 89 Jingsan Road, Jinshui District, Zhengzhou City, Henan Province.
起始状态.心情: Calmness carries a subtle anticipation for tonight's study and tomorrow's gathering.

结束状态.所处地点: In the bedroom of the home at No. 89 Jingsan Road, Jinshui District, Zhengzhou City, Henan Province.
结束状态.心情: Fulfilling and peaceful, I enjoyed the process of efficient studying and preparing heartfelt gifts for friends, and I am full of anticipation for tomorrow's gathering.

state.今日运动: Had a badminton session in the evening, played with Lin Wei for 1.5 hours and worked up a good sweat.

2025-12.daily_overview: For Xiaowen, Christmas is a blend of "breakthrough" and "reunion." During the day at the hospital, she bravely applied her English learning achievements to her practical work, sharing English literature with colleagues and receiving valuable positive feedback, which greatly boosted her confidence. In the evening, she enjoyed a relaxed and joyful Christmas dinner with several close friends, where gifts, delicious food, and laughter intertwined, effectively relieving the recent work pressure.

events.name: Try sharing literature in English
events.description: After the morning rounds, there was a brief moment of free time. Yu Xiaowen mustered up her courage and said to her colleague Wang Fang, "Fang Jie, I read a really interesting English review about HFpEF yesterday. Could I try summarizing the main points in English for you?" Wang Fang was very interested. Taking a deep breath, Yu Xiaowen began to explain the core ideas and research methods of the paper in English, her speech somewhat hesitant but still conveying the meaning clearly. After listening, Wang Fang was quite surprised and gave her a thumbs up, saying, "Xiaowen, you're really good! You explained it quite clearly, and you used the professional terms correctly. Maybe you could try sharing something briefly at our morning meetings in the future!" This small, successful practice gave Yu Xiaowen a huge boost of confidence.

events.name: Organize English study notes before leaving work.
events.description: During the lunch break, Yu Xiaowen organized the study notes from this week's oral class in the duty room, categorizing the expressions corrected by the foreign teacher and the newly learned terms to reinforce her learning outcomes. She felt that the intensive study over the past month had yielded significant results.

events.name: Christmas Friends Gathering
events.description: In the evening, four close friends—Yu Xiaowen, Zhang Jing, Wang Fang, and Lin Wei—gathered in a private room at an Italian restaurant that Yu Xiaowen had reserved. They exchanged the small gifts they had prepared, each one bringing delightful surprises. Yu Xiaowen received a scarf from Zhang Jing, a planner notebook from Wang Fang, and badminton strings from Lin Wei. They enjoyed a delicious dinner together, chatting about amusing work stories, venting about life’s pressures, and sharing updates on their recent hobbies, with laughter filling the room. The red wine that Yu Xiaowen had specially ordered added to the warm and relaxed atmosphere.

events.name: Safe Return Home and Pet Care
events.description: The dinner party lasted until after nine o'clock, and everyone left in high spirits. After making sure all her friends had safely gotten into their cars, Yu Xiaowen called a designated driver to take her home. On the way, she remembered that she had a three-day training session next week, so she messaged her close friend Zhang Jing on WeChat to ask if she could look after Juzi for a few days over the weekend. Zhang Jing readily agreed.

events.name: Review and Planning
events.description: Back home, Yu Xiaowen, slightly tipsy, was in a good mood. She carefully put away the gifts from her friends, then briefly reflected on the breakthrough in her English practice and the joy of the gathering. In her phone’s memo, she noted: "English output attempt successful! Confidence boosted. From now on, I can do a mini English sharing session in the department once a month."

events.name: Feeling guilty for overeating during the gathering.
events.description: Yu Xiaowen realized that she had consumed a high-calorie dinner and decided to increase her exercise tomorrow to balance it out.

起始状态.所处地点: In the bedroom at home, No. 89 Jingsan Road, Jinshui District, Zhengzhou City, Henan Province.
起始状态.心情: With a hint of nervousness about trying something new and anticipation for the evening gathering.

结束状态.所处地点: In the bedroom at home, No. 89 Jingsan Road, Jinshui District, Zhengzhou City, Henan Province.
结束状态.心情: Happy, relaxed, and full of energy, but with a slight sense of dietary guilt. The breakthrough during the day and the joyful gathering in the evening complement each other perfectly, satisfying social needs and boosting professional confidence.

2025-12.daily_overview: Friday is the last working day of the week, and Yu Xiaowen steadily advances all her tasks. In the morning, she handles routine clinical matters, and in the afternoon, she participates in a highly realistic medical English speaking class. After work, she begins preparing for next week's training and confirms the details of pet care arrangements with her close friend, smoothly transitioning into the weekend rhythm of life.

events.name: Clinical work wrap-up
events.description: Completed routine ward rounds and documentation for all inpatients this week, and conducted a brief handover for next week's work during my training period, informing colleagues in the same group about the status of the patients under my care.

events.name: High-Fidelity English Oral Course
events.description: Taking the afternoon off at home, Yu Xiaowen attended her third scheduled oral English lesson of the week, which was also her last one for the month. The topic was "Explaining Surgical Risks to Patients." She simulated explaining the necessity, potential risks (such as bleeding, infection, and bile duct injury), and postoperative precautions of a "laparoscopic cholecystectomy" to a hypothetical native English-speaking patient. Utilizing the extensive medical communication vocabulary she had accumulated over the month and the "empathy-explanation-confirmation" communication framework, the entire process was relatively fluent and clear. The foreign teacher praised her significant improvement in organizing complex information and her reassuring tone when comforting patients.

events.name: Adjust work arrangements for next week's training.
events.description: After class, Yu Xiaowen logged into the hospital's OA system, reconfirmed the training notification, and formally submitted an application for external training from December 28th to 30th in the department scheduling system, copying her mentor Li Wei and department head Zhang Lei.

events.name: Confirm pet care details with Zhang Jing.
events.description: In the evening, Yu Xiaowen communicated in detail with Zhang Jing via WeChat about the arrangements for entrusting Juzi. She listed Juzi's dietary schedule (cat food brand, feeding times), daily habits (likes to sleep in the corner of the sofa at night), and special precautions (no human food, regular cleaning of the litter box). Zhang Jing noted everything down and arranged to have Juzi sent over on Sunday evening.

events.name: Increase exercise to balance your diet.
events.description: To make up for yesterday's dinner gathering, Yu Xiaowen did a 30-minute core strength workout and a 20-minute aerobics session at home in the evening, feeling rejuvenated.

起始状态.所处地点: Home bedroom at No. 89 Jingsan Road, Jinshui District, Zhengzhou City, Henan Province
起始状态.心情: Steady, the main tasks for this week have been largely completed, and the mindset is relaxed.

结束状态.所处地点: In the bedroom at home, No. 89 Jingsan Road, Jinshui District, Zhengzhou City, Henan Province.
结束状态.心情: Steady and prepared to welcome the weekend and the upcoming training, everything is going according to plan.

state.今日运动: At home in the evening, I did 30 minutes of core strength training and 20 minutes of aerobic exercise.

2025-12.daily_overview: Saturday is a day of "handover" and "preparation." In the morning, Yu Xiaowen completed her final English speaking class of the month, marking a milestone in her intensive month-long study. The focus of the afternoon and evening shifted to the handover of personal matters: entrusting her beloved cat, Orange, to her trusted friend Zhang Jing for care. This process was filled with the warmth of friendship and a sense of responsibility, clearing away any worries and allowing her to participate in the upcoming three-day training with peace of mind.

events.name: The last English speaking class of this month
events.description: In the morning, Yu Xiaowen completed her final oral lesson of the month at home. The topic was "Email/Phone Communication with Foreign Colleagues." She simulated two scenarios: first, politely consulting a foreign expert via email about the imaging findings of a complex case; second, briefly discussing the choice of a treatment plan with several "foreign colleagues" during a conference call. The foreign teacher focused on correcting a few slightly verbose grammatical errors in her written email and praised her for her excellent grasp of professional communication etiquette.

events.name: Organize and pack items for oranges.
events.description: After class, Yu Xiaowen began to "pack luggage" for Juzi. She prepared a bag of sufficient cat food, a new pack of cat litter, Juzi's two favorite toys, its small blanket, and a portable cat carrier.

events.name: Send oranges to Zhang Jing's home.
events.description: In the afternoon, Yu Xiaowen arrived at Zhang Jing’s home in the Guancheng Hui District, bringing Juzi along with several bags. The two of them settled Juzi in, setting up a temporary cat bed, food bowl, and water bowl. Yu Xiaowen went over every detail of the care instructions once again, and Zhang Jing smiled reassuringly, saying, "Don’t worry, I’ll make sure your little master is well taken care of and comfortable."

events.name: Final preparations before training
events.description: After returning from Zhang Jing's house, Yu Xiaowen checked the notebook, pen, and water cup she had prepared for the training the next day, and saved the address and schedule of the training venue in her phone's memo. She simply packed a few appropriate outfits suitable for the training.

events.name: Relaxing evening time
events.description: In the evening, Yu Xiaowen made herself a steaming bowl of stewed noodles and then curled up on the sofa to watch a lighthearted documentary. The thought of being able to temporarily step away from the clinical front line for the next three days and focus on learning new knowledge filled her with a sense of excitement and anticipation.

events.name: Temporarily discovered that the sole of the foot has fully recovered.
events.description: Yu Xiaowen noticed that the soreness in the soles of her feet had disappeared. She conducted a test jog to confirm her recovery and decided to gradually resume exercise during the training period.

起始状态.所处地点: In the bedroom at home, No. 89 Jingsan Road, Jinshui District, Zhengzhou City, Henan Province.
起始状态.心情: Relax, the weekend begins, with clear tasks ahead.

结束状态.所处地点: In the bedroom of the home at No. 89 Jingsan Road, Jinshui District, Zhengzhou City, Henan Province.
结束状态.心情: At ease with a touch of anticipation. The oranges are well arranged, the training preparations are complete, and I can fully immerse myself in the upcoming studies.

state.今日运动: A 30-minute morning yoga session was conducted in the morning, followed by a 15-minute test jog to confirm plantar recovery.

2025-12.daily_overview: On Sunday, Yu Xiaowen temporarily left the familiar hospital environment and stepped into the training classroom at the Municipal Health Commission, embarking on a three-day advanced training course titled "Latest Advances in the Diagnosis and Treatment of Cardiovascular Diseases." The first day was primarily focused on receiving information. Like a sponge, she attentively absorbed new concepts and cutting-edge technologies in the field while beginning to establish initial connections with peers from various hospitals across the city.

events.name: Report to the training location for registration.
events.description: At 8:30 in the morning, Yu Xiaowen drove to the Municipal Health Commission Training Center located in Zhengdong New District. She signed in at the front desk and received her participant badge, a detailed training manual, handouts, and a commemorative pen.

events.name: Attend the Opening Ceremony and Special Lecture
events.description: At nine o'clock, the opening ceremony began on time. The organizers' leaders and experts delivered brief speeches. This was followed by a series of intensive thematic lectures. The morning lecture focused on "From Guidelines to Practice: Updates in the Diagnosis and Treatment Strategies for Acute Coronary Syndrome (ACS)," while the afternoon session covered "New Targets in Heart Failure Drug Therapy and Advances in Device Treatment." Yu Xiaowen listened attentively throughout, filling her handouts with dense notes and capturing photos of key PowerPoint slides.

events.name: Lunch Exchange and Initial Familiarization
events.description: Lunch was served in the training center cafeteria. Yu Xiaowen and several young doctors from other hospitals at her table introduced themselves to each other. They briefly exchanged information about their respective hospital departments and the common types of cases they handled, discovering that they shared many similar challenges and interests.

events.name: Group Case Discussion Lottery
events.description: After the afternoon lecture concluded, the host announced the rules for tomorrow's group case discussion session. All participants were randomly divided into 8 groups. Yu Xiaowen was assigned to the third group, which also included a total of 5 doctors from City First Hospital, City Second Hospital, and a district-level hospital. Their group drew a complex case package on "Refractory Hypertension Combined with Heart Failure with Reduced Ejection Fraction (HFrEF)."

events.name: Initial internal meeting of the group
events.description: After the meeting, the members of the third group stayed behind for a brief discussion. They quickly skimmed through the case materials and found it quite challenging. Yu Xiaowen volunteered, "I’ve been reading a lot of literature on heart failure lately. If no one objects, I can organize our discussion points and represent the group in tomorrow’s presentation?" Seeing her initiative and confidence, the other group members agreed and decided to have a preliminary discussion in the WeChat group that evening.

events.name: Evening Data Organization and Preliminary Preparation
events.description: After settling into the hotel room arranged by the training center, Yu Xiaowen wasted no time resting and immediately opened her laptop. She digitized and organized the notes from the day's lectures. Then, she delved into the case materials assigned to her group, integrating the new knowledge she had gained in the afternoon. In her mind, she began constructing a preliminary framework for diagnosis and analysis. She also posted several key discussion questions in the group's WeChat chat to guide everyone's thinking.

events.name: Slight insomnia due to stress
events.description: Yu Xiaowen experienced mild insomnia and fell asleep late due to contemplating the case report.

起始状态.所处地点: In the bedroom of the home at No. 89 Jingsan Road, Jinshui District, Zhengzhou City, Henan Province.
起始状态.心情: With a thirst for new knowledge and a slight nervousness about entering a new environment.

结束状态.所处地点: Zhengzhou Municipal Health Commission Training Center Cooperative Hotel Room
结束状态.心情: The mind is fully loaded, excited, and slightly stressed. A day of intense information input left her feeling fulfilled, while actively taking on the group presentation task also brought a significant sense of responsibility and a desire for challenge.

state.今日运动: None, primarily engaged in seated learning throughout the day.

2025-12.daily_overview: Today is Yu Xiaowen's 28th birthday, and it also marks a day of high-stakes challenges for her during her training. Throughout the day, she immersed herself in in-depth discussions on group case studies and prepared diligently for the presentation. In the afternoon, as the group representative, she delivered an outstanding presentation, earning high praise from the instructor and peers alike. Her professional competence was recognized on a broader platform. On her birthday, she received remote video blessings from her parents and online greetings from friends. The blend of career fulfillment and the warmth of family affection created a uniquely memorable birthday experience.

events.name: Birthday Video Greetings from Parents
events.description: Just after waking up in the morning, Yu Xiaowen received birthday wishes from her parents via WeChat. During a break in her morning training session, she slipped into the hallway to video call her parents back. In the video, her parents sang "Happy Birthday" to her, and her mother, Li Xiuying, even showed off a pot of spicy soup she had made that morning, expressing regret that she couldn’t send it to Zhengzhou. Her parents reminded her to stay safe during her evening gathering with friends and to treat herself to something good to eat. The brief video call warmed her heart.

events.name: In-depth Discussion and Task Division of Group Case Studies
events.description: The morning training session included a time for group case discussions. The third group gathered in a corner of the meeting room and engaged in a lively discussion around the case of "refractory hypertension combined with HFrEF." Drawing on her prior preparation, Yu Xiaowen guided everyone to analyze the case from multiple dimensions, including etiology screening, optimization of drug therapy (including the latest ARNI drug applications), possibilities for non-drug therapies (such as CRT-D), and patient compliance management. She quickly noted everyone’s viewpoints and organized the logical flow.

events.name: Carefully prepare the presentation slides and speech script.
events.description: After the discussion, the group members fully entrusted the task of organizing and creating the PPT to Yu Xiaowen. During her lunch break and the time before the afternoon training began, she quickly prepared a logically clear presentation PPT using her laptop in the hotel room. She integrated the consensus reached in the group discussion, the points of disagreement, and the basis for the recommended diagnosis and treatment plan (citing the latest guidelines and content from the morning lecture). She also prepared a brief script.

events.name: Simulation exercises during training breaks.
events.description: After the first lecture in the afternoon, there was a brief break. Yu Xiaowen pulled a doctor from her group into the hallway and quickly rehearsed the presentation, asking for feedback from the perspective of an audience member. Based on the feedback, she adjusted the order of some content to make the key points more prominent.

events.name: As the group representative, I will now present the report on stage.
events.description: In the afternoon group presentation session, Yu Xiaowen took the stage as the representative of the third group. She remained calm and composed, using clear language and a well-structured PowerPoint presentation to elaborate on the characteristics of the case, a step-by-step differential diagnosis approach, the recommended comprehensive treatment plan, and the evidence-based rationale within eight minutes. Her presentation was logically rigorous, featured cutting-edge content, and left a deep impression on the audience.

events.name: Receive positive feedback from the instructor and engage in peer communication.
events.description: After the presentation, the senior expert instructor who was conducting the training specifically commented on Yu Xiaowen’s report, praising her for having "clear clinical thinking and appropriate literature citations, demonstrating the potential of an outstanding young physician." During the break after the meeting, several peers from other hospitals took the initiative to exchange contact information with her and discuss the details of the case as well as clinical insights.

events.name: Friends' birthday wishes bombardment
events.description: Throughout the day, her WeChat kept receiving birthday wishes and red envelopes from friends. Zhang Jing, Wang Fang, Sun Yue, and Lin Wei all sent their blessings in the group chat and reminded her not to forget the evening gathering. University classmates Zhao Ming and Zhou Haoran also sent their greetings.

events.name: Receive Graduation Certificates (Partial) and Return Trip
events.description: After the afternoon training session concluded, the conference team distributed the first phase of training certificates. Yu Xiaowen collected hers and drove back from the training center to Zhengzhou Central Hospital, as she needed to return to her department first.

events.name: Briefly report to the department head.
events.description: Back at the hospital, I happened to run into Zhang Lei, the head of the department, who was still at work. Yu Xiaowen took the initiative to approach him, briefly reported on the training, and specifically mentioned her experience of serving as the group presenter and receiving positive feedback. After hearing this, Director Zhang nodded and said, "Well done. It’s important to take such initiative when going out for training. When you return, you can share what you’ve learned with the department."

events.name: Staying up late due to excitement to celebrate.
events.description: Yu Xiaowen stayed up late due to an online celebration with friends for her birthday and successful presentation.

起始状态.所处地点: Zhengzhou Municipal Health Commission Training Center Cooperative Hotel Room
起始状态.心情: The small joy brought by the birthday is mingled with the tension and excitement of an important presentation that is about to take place.

结束状态.所处地点: In the bedroom of the home at No. 89 Jingsan Road, Jinshui District, Zhengzhou City, Henan Province.
结束状态.心情: Extremely fulfilled, proud, and happy. Her outstanding performance in her professional field during the day brought immense satisfaction, while in the evening, joyful gatherings with close friends and an outpouring of blessings from all directions enveloped her in love. It was a day of dual harvests in both her career and personal life.

2025-12.daily_overview: On the final day of the training, the theme was "Transformation and Application." In the morning, Yu Xiaowen participated in a discussion on the application of training outcomes. In the afternoon, as the training officially concluded, she immediately turned her attention to "reclaiming" her personal life: picking up her beloved cat, Orange, and expressing heartfelt gratitude to her close friend. In the evening, she hosted a postponed birthday dinner with friends, bringing the training period and birthday celebrations to a perfect close in a warm and lively atmosphere.

events.name: The last half-day of training: Discussion on cutting-edge technologies and their transformation.
events.description: The morning training session covered "The Application of Artificial Intelligence in Cardiovascular Imaging Recognition" and "New Models of Cardiac Rehabilitation." Following the lecture, a roundtable discussion was organized on the topic of "How to Translate Training Knowledge into Clinical Practice Enhancement." Yu Xiaowen, drawing from the actual conditions at her hospital, proposed the preliminary idea of establishing a "New Drugs/Technologies Study Group" within the department and engaged in in-depth discussions with several peers.

events.name: Training completed, receive the full completion certificate.
events.description: At noon, all the courses of this advanced training program came to an end, and a brief closing ceremony was held. Yu Xiaowen received a formal certificate of completion stamped with the official seal of the Municipal Health Commission and carefully placed it into her document folder.

events.name: Go to Zhang Jing's house to pick up Orange.
events.description: As soon as the training ended, Yu Xiaowen didn’t go back to her own home. Instead, she drove straight to Zhang Jing’s place to pick up Juzi. Seeing that Juzi was safe and sound, even looking a little chubbier, she felt relieved. Zhang Jing excitedly shared with her the fun moments she had spent with Juzi over the past three days—how Juzi had taken over her sofa and how he woke her up in the mornings. The two chatted over tea, creating a warm and cozy atmosphere.

events.name: Express gratitude to Zhang Jing.
events.description: Before leaving, Yu Xiaowen presented Zhang Jing with a box of exquisite pastries she had prepared in advance, along with a handwritten thank-you card. She said sincerely, "Jingjing, thank you so much for these past three days! I really don’t know what I would have done without your help." Zhang Jing gave her a hug and replied, "No need to be so polite with me. Orange is such a well-behaved cat—feel free to bring him over anytime!" The two agreed to have a meal together over the weekend.

events.name: Birthday dinner gathering
events.description: In the evening, Yu Xiaowen finally gathered with her close friends Zhang Jing, Sun Yue, Wang Fang, and Lin Wei in the private room of the fusion cuisine restaurant she had reserved, celebrating her belated birthday. Everyone brought various gifts, including books, scented candles, handmade pottery, and more. The waiter wheeled out the birthday cake, and her friends sang "Happy Birthday" together. Under the candlelight, Yu Xiaowen made a wish for the new year. Throughout the dinner, they chatted freely about their experiences at the end of the year and their plans for the new year, with laughter filling the room. Yu Xiaowen deeply felt the warmth and support of their friendship.

events.name: Minor Weight Fluctuations Due to Social Dining
events.description: Yu Xiaowen noticed that she consumed slightly more at dinner, but through today's activities, her weight remained stable.

起始状态.所处地点: Home bedroom at No. 89 Jingsan Road, Jinshui District, Zhengzhou City, Henan Province
起始状态.心情: Relaxed, the training is nearing its end, and there's a long-awaited party tonight.

结束状态.所处地点: In the bedroom at home, No. 89 Jingsan Road, Jinshui District, Zhengzhou City, Henan Province
结束状态.心情: Perfect, joyful, and a bit tired. The training has concluded successfully, Orange has returned home safely, the birthday celebration ended perfectly, everything is back on track, and my heart is full.

date_attribute.weather: Zhengzhou, sunny, temperature -5~4°C, New Year's Eve, dry and cold.

2025-12.daily_overview: On the last day of 2025, Yu Xiaowen chose a quiet and introspective way to spend her time. During the day, she wrapped up her year-end tasks at the hospital and exchanged New Year’s greetings with her colleagues. After work, she retreated into her personal world: carefully preparing a healthy New Year’s Eve dinner, having a video call with her family, and then immersing herself in deep reflection and review of the year. In her journal, she systematically reflected on the gains and losses of the past year, transforming the health challenges she had faced into an inner philosophy of life. She also set "sustainable growth" as the core theme for 2026. Accompanied by classical music, she welcomed the New Year with calmness and hope.

events.name: Year-end Work Wrap-up and Handover
events.description: In the morning, Yu Xiaowen carefully reviewed and filed all the medical records at hand to ensure nothing was overlooked. She tidied up her desk and coordinated with her colleague Wang Fang and the on-duty doctor to hand over patient information for the holiday period. The department was filled with a relaxed festive atmosphere, with everyone exchanging wishes of "Happy New Year."

events.name: Purchase ingredients for the New Year's Eve dinner and do simple decorations.
events.description: After work, Yu Xiaowen went to the supermarket and bought fresh pork tenderloin, ingredients for a fruit salad, as well as a small bouquet of flowers and a few scented candles. Upon returning home, she arranged the flowers in a vase, set up the candles, and gave the dining table a simple yet cozy touch, creating a warm atmosphere for the New Year's Eve celebration.

events.name: New Year's video call with family
events.description: At seven in the evening, Yu Xiaowen simultaneously initiated a video call with her parents and her brother, Yu Xiaofeng, for a four-way conversation. They exchanged greetings and shared their main achievements from the past year (Yu Xiaowen mentioned passing the specialist qualification exam and delivering a training report; her brother mentioned his promotion; and their parents said they were both in good health). They chatted briefly about their simple wishes for the new year and exchanged New Year’s blessings. Though separated by screens, the warmth of family affection was palpable.

events.name: Cooking a Healthy New Year's Eve Dinner
events.description: After the call ended, Yu Xiaowen prepared a simple but thoughtful dinner for herself: sweet and sour pork tenderloin, stir-fried seasonal vegetables, and a generous fruit salad. She turned on some music and slowly enjoyed her meal, reflecting on how her cooking frequency had increased over the past year and the progress she had made in her culinary skills.

events.name: Deep Annual Reflection and Diary Writing
events.description: This is the core moment of New Year's Eve. After dinner, Yu Xiaowen opened her diary at the desk and flipped through the records of the past year. She systematically reviewed her work (from the nervousness of working night shifts independently to the touching moments of receiving thank-you letters), health (the shock of a colleague's sudden death at the beginning of the year, followed by a commitment to regular exercise and mindful eating), personal growth (English learning, pottery, financial planning), and relationships (deepening bonds with parents and strengthening friendships). She wrote in particular, "The biggest turning point in 2025 was realizing that 'sustainability' is more important than 'overexertion.' Health is the number 1, and everything else follows as zeros. Next year, I hope to build a more balanced and resilient lifestyle."

events.name: Develop a plan for a "Sustainable Living Model"
events.description:
After reflecting, she wrote down her specific expectations for 2026 on a new page of her diary:  
1. Sleep schedule: Try to go to bed before 11:30 p.m. every night.  
2. Exercise: Maintain at least three sessions per week (badminton/morning runs/indoor training).  
3. Learning: Continue studying English and give a short English presentation in the department each month; strive to complete a satisfactory piece of pottery.  
4. Work: Improve daytime efficiency, reduce unnecessary overtime, and allocate more time to life and health.  
She integrated these into her personal "Sustainable Living Model" plan.

events.name: A Quiet Moment for the New Year's Eve
events.description: It was nearly midnight by the time she finished writing her diary. Yu Xiaowen played her favorite piece, Bach's "Air on the G String," poured herself a glass of warm water, turned off the main light, and left only the faint glow and fragrance of candles and an aroma diffuser. Nestled in the sofa, she quietly reminisced, occasionally glancing at the lively scenes of the New Year's Eve gala on TV. As the chime of midnight echoed through the television, she silently whispered in her heart, "Goodbye, 2025. Hello, 2026."

events.name: Send New Year's greetings
events.description: After the New Year countdown, she wasn't sleepy. Instead, she picked up her phone and sent brief but heartfelt New Year's greetings to several important friends and colleagues (Zhang Jing, Sun Yue, Wang Fang, Lin Wei, and Teacher Li Wei), sharing her current feelings of calm and contentment.

起始状态.所处地点: In the bedroom at home, No. 89 Jingsan Road, Jinshui District, Zhengzhou City, Henan Province.
起始状态.心情: Calm, imbued with the unique retrospective mood of the year's end and the subtle melancholy and anticipation of bidding farewell to the old and welcoming the new.

结束状态.所处地点: In the bedroom at home, No. 89 Jingsan Road, Jinshui District, Zhengzhou City, Henan Province.
结束状态.心情: Tranquil, clear, and full of hope. Deep annual reflection has allowed her to clearly see her growth trajectory and future direction, making her heart feel very grounded and peaceful. She is filled with a positive sense of control over the new year.

state.今日运动: None, primarily focused on contemplation and organization.
